{"kind": "blogger#postList", "nextPageToken": "CgkIChjDjYWA8SsQy4Ca9ZL8nrwx", "items": [{"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "2107472916318040869", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2017-10-30T19:17:00+05:30", "updated": "2017-11-01T20:47:56+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxNTA5NTQ5NDc2NjgyCm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/10/blockchain-smart-contracts-part-8-capt.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/2107472916318040869", "title": "BLOCKCHAIN, SMART CONTRACTS , HASHGRAPHS ,  PART 8 - CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">THIS POST IS CONTINUED FROM PART 7 , BELOW--</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/10/blockchain-smart-contracts-part-7-capt.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/10/blockchain-smart-contracts-part-7-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Smart code MUST accurately reflect&nbsp; obligations in the natural human language legal agreement.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In many respects, at least for lawyers, the\nexternal model is only a small step further than the operational mechanics\nderivatives counterparties already have in place.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Indeed, there are areas\nwhere&nbsp; such automation already takes\nplace \u2013 for example, daily collateral flows are already automated in&nbsp; the manner described above in certain\nmargining arrangements. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">That is not to belie the potential&nbsp; impact a widespread adoption of the external\nmodel might have operationally, but merely to note&nbsp; that it would likely be a fairly\ninconsequential step for lawyers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In the external model, therefore, it is not\nthe contract itself that is \u2018smart\u2019, but rather the code&nbsp; building blocks that would accompany it and\nwould be used to execute it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In the internal model, much of the legal\ncontract would likely remain in its present form but,&nbsp; critically, with certain conditional logic\nelements of the legal contract rewritten in a more formal representation than\nthe current natural human language form. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A computer would then take that more formal\nrepresentation and execute the conditional logic automatically.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Lawyers would need to learn this programming\nlanguage to be able to draft&nbsp; smart\ncontracts.&nbsp; &nbsp; We cant have BOTTOM DREGS OF THE SCHOOL CEREBRAL BARREL LAWYERS\nanymore.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">When everybody and every tech in the world\nwas trying to build technology for our intermediaries \u2013 FIs, brokers and middle\nmen in trade deals there was one guy <b style=\"background-color: white;\">Satoshi Nakamoto </b>who believed that no\nintermediary should be involved in asset exchange and he invented blockchain,\nwhich is primarily a decentralized database with great and magical\ncryptography.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/emDJTGTrEm0/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/emDJTGTrEm0?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain can be used to guarantee that\nresults of clinical trials won\u2019t be changed by pharmaceutical corporations to\nfit desired results.&nbsp; Creating a unique\nidentifier for each clinical test and registering it in a blockchain, we can\nguarantee its safety and integrity.&nbsp;&nbsp; In\nthe medical field, blockchain can also be used to ensure the correctness of\nprescriptions for drugs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Dubai announced that all government documents\nshould be secured with blockchain by 2020. Such step may be considered as a\nprerequisite for agencies to stop using paper sooner or later.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Again, blockchain networks rely on a\ndecentralized infrastructure that can\u2019t be controlled by any one person or\ngroup. Unlike political regulation, blockchain governance is not emergent from\nthe community.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Rather, it is ex ante, encoded in the protocols and processes as\nan integral part of the original network architecture. To be a part of a\ncommunity supporting a blockchain is to accept the rules of the network as they\nwere originally established.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In a blockchain transaction, you don\u2019t have\nto trust your counterpart to perform their obligations or properly record\ntransactional data, since these processes are standardized and automated, but\nyou do have to trust that the code and the network will function as you expect.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain networks resist political\ngovernance because they are governed by everyone who participants in them, and\nby no one in particular.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The power of blockchain technology is that it\ncan algorithmically enforce private agreements and community principles at a\nglobal scale by shifting the cost of trust and coordination to the network.\nThis is what allows blockchains to create new markets where they couldn\u2019t exist\nbefore, whether for political or for economic reasons. To do this, we have to\nbe able to trust the blockchain, and to trust that no one controls it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In today's traditional banking system, a\ncourt might order a bank to freeze at-risk funds before a would-be thief has\nthe chance to abscond with them. In the blockchain's completely trustless\nworld, there is no such authority to implement the court's protective measures.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Similarly, banks can often unwind or alter fraudulent transactions, such as\nthose initiated by the victim of a scam. When settling a transaction on a\nblockchain, there is comparatively little that can be done once the transaction\nis broadcast to the network.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Short of convincing a substantial majority of\nusers to coordinate a hard fork and change prior entries to the ledger to\nreturn the stolen funds, victims are out of luck.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The ineffectiveness of legal remedies is only\nthe tip of the proverbial iceberg when it comes to the legal uncertainties\nassociated with using blockchain technology.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Courts will soon have to grapple\nwith the jurisdictional implications of assets that exist solely in the cloud,\non hundreds of identical copies of a digital ledger, and are stored on\ncomputers throughout the globe.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">For these and other reasons, anyone curious\nabout the blockchain-ULU ( or is it blockchain-UDU? ) &nbsp;and its disruptive potential should consider\nthe effect that existing, somewhat-incompatible laws could have on society's\nability to regulate this emerging technology.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Not all legal principles can easily be\nconverted or encoded into technical code or be expressed by means of Boolean\nlogic (in which values are reflected as either true or false), for example,\nrequirements of reasonableness and good faith.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Similarly, a machine may have difficulty applying or verifying\nwarranties that a certain state of affairs exists. For a smart contract to be\npurely self-enforcing, we would need to build it in a way which addresses these\nissues.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Smart contracts may need to anticipate every\npossibility, including factors extraneous to the contract itself, for example,\nif it later becomes evident that the agreement or performance is illegal.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">While\nthis may be possible in relation to real-time performance (such as buying a\nCoke from a vending machine), this becomes more complex in long-term contracts.\nThe DAO hack is again a good example of the need to anticipate multiple\npermutations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Many of these issues can be addressed by the\ncareful crafting of both the legal agreement and the smart code.. Our current\nlegal system has been developed around traditional contracts, using\nwell-established principles that have developed over time, such as\nreasonableness. Smart Contract 2.0 must bring new and unique challenges and\nrisks, which will require creative legal and technical thinking.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Smart contracts are a natural progression for\nthe legal system, and traditional lawyers will need to rise cerebrally&nbsp; to meet their challenges. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">For Smart Contract 2.0, our role as lawyers\nmust extend beyond finding a way to apply traditional contract principles to\nsmart contracts, to understanding and developing new constructs which support\nthe operation of smart contracts.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">We may also need to start applying Boolean\nlogic. After all, the aim is to develop the perfect smart contract which admits\nno ambiguity, can be interpreted in a binary fashion and anticipates every\npossible outcome.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;Smart\nContract 2.0 will certainly need the BRAINY,&nbsp;\nCREAM OF THE SCHOOL CEREBRAL BARREL&nbsp;\n\"smart lawyer\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;IoT is\nalso implicitly about automating everything. And that implies bringing a lot of\nbusiness concepts along for the ride -- including the idea of a contract to\ngovern business transactions by.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Contract law has a rich history, with several\ncenturies of common law practice and legislation. So, when forward thinkers\npropose to make contracts \"smart\" and power them through blockchain,\nit's both exciting and daunting. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">One of the biggest issues in IoT is knowing\nwho you are connecting to. That requirement for trust mechanisms across\nmillions or billions of sensors is what makes a distributed system like a\nblockchain vital<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Internet of Things is rapidly expanding\nits potential to transform everyday life with smart homes, cities, farms and\nmanufacturing facilities.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This development is already taking place,\nhowever, he current server infrastructure and internet architecture is unlikely\nto be able to support the imminent IoT revolution.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">With so many devices\nconnected to the internet, management and security are a concern. The servers\nwill become overloaded and represent a single point of failure, making the\nsystem vulnerable to cyber-attack. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain allows digital information to be\ndistributed but not copied and in doing so has created a new type of internet\nthat seems incorruptible. Initially designed for financial transactions\nblockchain technology can be used to record just about anything of value.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nobjective is to create a single version of any particular transaction,\ncontaining more information than what can be offered by any one singular\nsystem, revealing transparent, real-time data for various uses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The technology itself underpinning blockchain\nconsists of encryption enabling security and anonymity, mutual consensus\nverification resulting in collective network updates and hence an accurate\ndataset at all times without the need for a central governing authority.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">By providing a secure mesh network,\nblockchain can deliver a platform for IoT to interconnect reliably and avoid\nthe threats that plague central server models.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">There are companies already\nusing blockchain to power IoT systems, especially in the agriculture and\nmanufacturing industries where there is a need for remote sensors and\nautomation. IoT, powered by blockchain technology, enables a low power, secure\nnetwork that can remotely manage physical operations without centralized cloud\nservers. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Smart homes are the next port of call for\nblockchain technology.&nbsp; Companies\nare&nbsp; using blockchain to secure smart\nhome IoT ecosystems by storing biometric and authentication data on a private\nblockchain. In this way, blockchain is able to verify identity of IoT devices\nand the people interacting with them to prevent compromised devices usurping\nthe platform.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Right now, IoT is mainly concerned with\ncollection of data, remote monitoring and device automation. Going forward, the\ntransition is likely to be towards a network of autonomous devices that\ninteract with each other and the surrounding; and make input-based smart\ndecisions, without any human involvement.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain has the potential to support this\ncommunal economy based on machine-to-machine interactions<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain will permit the monetization of\ndata, whereby IoT device owners can sell data generated from IoT sensors for\ndigital currency. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;With\nthe ability to create a secure and equal framework for interactions, where no\none individual is in charge, incidentally levels the playing field and opens a\ndevelopment platform for digital entrepreneurs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Adaptive/continuous analytics is about&nbsp; \u2018What are the appropriate actions /decisions,\nand how can we adapt to the latest changes?\u2019<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The interdependence between IoT and AI also\nworks the other way. IoT\u2019s capacity to enable real-time feedback is critical to\nadaptive learning systems, since other technologies do not really enable this\nadvanced type of AI/analytics. So they both need each other.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain technology serves as a platform\nthat allows the transit of digital information without the risk of being\ncopied.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Imagine a spreadsheet that\u2019s practically\naugmented tons to times across a plethora of computing systems. And then\nimagine that these networks are designed to update this spreadsheet from time\nto time. This is exactly what blockchain is.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Information that\u2019s stored on a blockchain is\na shared sheet whose data is reconciled from time to time. It\u2019s a practical way\nthat speaks of many obvious benefits. To being with, the blockchain data\ndoesn\u2019t exist in one single place. This means that everything stored in there\nis open for public view and verification.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Further, there isn\u2019t any centralized\ninformation storing platform which hackers can corrupt. It\u2019s practically\naccessed over a million computing systems side-by-side, and its data can be\nconsulted by any individual with an internet connection.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It is vital to note, blockchain cannot be\ncontrolled by a single people, entity or identity, and has no one point of\nfailure.&nbsp;&nbsp; Just like the internet has\nproven itself as a durable space since last 30 years, blockchain too will serve\nas an authentic, reliable global stage for business transaction as it continues\nto develop.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Veterans of the industry claim that\nblockchain lives in a state of consciousness. It practically checks on itself\nevery now and then. It\u2019s similar to a self-auditing technology where its\nnetwork reconciles every transaction, known as a block, which happens aboard at\nregular intervals.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This gives birth to two major properties of\nblockchain \u2013 it\u2019s highly transparent, and at the same time, it cannot be\ncorrupted. Each and every transaction that takes place on this server is\nembedded within the network, hence, making the entire thing very much visible\nall the time to the public.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Furthermore, to edit or omit information on\nblockchain asks for a humongous amount of efforts and a strong computing power.\nAmid this, frauds can be easily identified. Hence, it\u2019s termed incorruptible.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">There isn\u2019t a defined rule or regulation\nabout who shall or can make use of this immaculate technology. Though at\npresent, its potential users are banks, commercial giants and global economies\nonly, the technology is open for the day to day transactions of the general\npublic as well. The only drawback blockchain is facing is global acceptance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">All IoT transactions on the Blockchain will\nbe timestamped thus ensuring that they are available essentially \u2013 for\nposterity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Navigating the human element needs to be a\ncentral component of an IoT strategy. Workers must be informed, trained and\nmotivated to help ensure that IoT information flows freely through systems and\nis used to reduce the guesswork of decision-making.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The IoT involves smart\ndevices, deployed at scale, collecting massive quantities of data every day.\nAnd that data must be trustworthy. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Internet of Things (IoT) may be better\nunderstood by breaking it down into four elements:---<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The widespread use of inexpensive sensor\ntechnology by billions of devices to collect data<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The ubiquitous data networks through which\nthat data then flows<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The scalable, shared data center resources in\nthe cloud, which ingest that data<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The analysis of the data (often referred to\nas big data\u201d), to extract value which justifies the considerable investments\nand challenges involved in the first three parts<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>WHEN I CHANGE MY EMAIL PASSWORD ,&nbsp; I GET A OTP\n( ONE TIME PASSWORD )&nbsp; ON MY MOBILE.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>IT IS IMPORTANT TO HOOK UP AADHAR TO&nbsp; MOBILE PHONE, BANK ACCOUNTS, PAN CARDS, VOTER\nIDs, PASSPORT, DRIVER LICENCE&nbsp; ETC <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">INDIA WILL SOON ABOLISH INCOME TAX AND GO FOR\nBTT</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/11/abolish-income-tax-in-india-have.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/11/abolish-income-tax-in-india-have.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Last week, criminals launched a phishing scam\nagainst MyEtherWallet owners, reportedly earning over $15,000 over the course\nof a few hours.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The phishing email, claimed that the wallet\nprovider was implementing a hard fork update, urging the victims to unlock\ntheir accounts using their Keystore Files or private keys, synchronize their\nwallets and verify their ETH and token balances.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">By doing all that, one could\nhave exposed their private keys along with providing information on the hackers\nabout his wallet balance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The hackers went to great lengths to make the\nphishing site look almost identical to the legitimate MyEtherwallet.com site,\neven going to the lengths of registering an almost identical domain.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Only upon\ncloser inspection was it clear that the site used a Unicode trick and that\nthere was a comma under the t.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">When someone followed the link and entered\ntheir details, the phishers would then have access to a victim\u2019s wallet,\nallowing for the transfer of funds<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain account holders who have been\ntricked by the scam are asked to attempt to change their passwords and contact\nBlockchain for help.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">To help protect their accounts against\nphishing scams Blockchain account holders can enable 2-Step-Verification on\ntheir accounts .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This is an extra layer of security that will prevent\ncybercriminals from gaining access to their accounts even if they have stolen\ntheir account credentials.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A number of blockchain and cryptocurrency\ncompanies have fallen victims to phishing scams that utilize the messaging\nservice Slack<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Have you ever received a threat that your\naccount would be closed if you didn't respond to an email message?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Phishing email messages, websites, and phone\ncalls are designed to steal money. Cybercriminals can do this by installing\nmalicious software on your computer or stealing personal information off of\nyour computer.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Cybercriminals also use social engineering to\nconvince you to install malicious software or hand over your personal\ninformation under false pretenses. They might email you, call you on the phone,\nor convince you to download something off of a website.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Phishing is the attempt to obtain sensitive\ninformation such as usernames, passwords, and credit card details (and,\nindirectly, money), often for malicious reasons, by disguising as a trustworthy\nentity in an electronic communication.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The word is a neologism created as a\nhomophone of fishing due to the similarity of using a bait in an attempt to\ncatch a victim. According to the 2013 Microsoft Computing Safety Index,\nreleased in February 2014, the annual worldwide impact of phishing could be as\nhigh as US$5 billion<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Phishing is typically carried out by email spoofing\nor instant messaging, and it often directs users to enter personal information\nat a fake website, the look and feel of which are identical to the legitimate\none and the only difference is the URL of the website in concern.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;Communications purporting to be from social\nweb sites, auction sites, banks, online payment processors or IT administrators\nare often used to lure victims. Phishing emails may contain links to websites\nthat are infected with malware.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Phishing is an example of social engineering\ntechniques used to deceive users, and exploits weaknesses in current web\nsecurity.[8] Attempts to deal with the growing number of reported phishing\nincidents include legislation, user training, public awareness, and technical\nsecurity measures.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Phishing attempts directed at specific\nindividuals or companies have been termed spear phishing.&nbsp; Attackers may gather personal information\nabout their target to increase their probability of success. This technique is\nby far the most successful on the internet today, accounting for 91% of attacks.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Threat Group-4127 used spear phishing tactics\nto target email accounts linked to Hillary Clinton's 2016 presidential\ncampaign. They attacked more than 1,800 Google accounts and implemented\naccounts-google.com domain to threaten targeted users.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The most common form of phishing is the\ngeneral, mass-mailed type, where someone sends an email pretending to be\nsomeone else and tries to trick the recipient in doing something, usually\nlogging into a website or downloading malware. Attacks frequently rely on email\nspoofing, where the email header \u2014 the from field \u2014 is forged to make the\nmessage appear as if it was sent by a trusted sender.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">However, phishing attacks don\u2019t always look\nlike a UPS delivery notification email, a warning message from PayPal about\npasswords expiring, or an Office 365 email about storage quotas. Some attacks\nare crafted to specifically target organizations and individuals, and others\nrely on methods other than email.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A phishing attack specifically targeting the\nenterprise\u2019s top executives is called whaling, as the victim is considered to\nbe high-value, and the stolen information will be more valuable than what a\nregular employee may offer. The account credentials belonging to a CEO will\nopen more doors than an entry-level employee. The goal is to steal data,\nemployee information, and cash.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Whaling also requires additional research\nbecause the attacker needs to know who the intended victim communicates with\nand the kind of discussions they have. Examples include references to customer\ncomplaints, legal subpoenas, or even a problem in the executive suite. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Attackers typically start with social\nengineering to gather information about the victim and the company before\ncrafting the phishing message that will be used in the whaling attack.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Aside from mass-distributed general phishing\ncampaigns, criminals target key individuals in finance and accounting\ndepartments via business-email compromise (BEC) scams and CEO email fraud. By\nimpersonating financial officers and CEOs, these criminals attempt to trick\nvictims into initiating money transfers into unauthorized accounts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Clone phishing requires the attacker to\ncreate a nearly identical replica of a legitimate message to trick the victim\ninto thinking it is real. The email is sent from an address resembling the\nlegitimate sender, and the body of the message looks the same as a previous\nmessage. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The only difference is that the attachment or\nthe link in the message has been swapped out with a malicious one. The attacker\nmay say something along the lines of having to resend the original, or an\nupdated version, to explain why the victim was receiving the \u201csame\u201d message\nagain.</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Vishing stands for \u201cvoice phishing\u201d and it\nentails the use of the phone. Typically, the victim receives a call with a\nvoice message disguised as a communication from a financial institution.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">For\ninstance, the message might ask the recipient to call a number and enter their\naccount information or PIN for security or other official purposes. However,\nthe phone number rings straight to the attacker via a voice-over-IP service.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Snowshoeing, or \u201chit-and-run\u201d spam, requires\nattackers to push out messages via multiple domains and IP addresses. Each IP\naddress sends out a low volume of messages, so reputation- or volume-based spam\nfiltering technologies can\u2019t recognize and block malicious messages right away.\nSome of the messages make it to the email inboxes before the filters learn to\nblock them<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In a recent phishing campaign, Group 74\n(a.k.a. Sofact, APT28, Fancy Bear) targeted cybersecurity professionals with an\nemail pretending to be related to the Cyber Conflict U.S. conference, an event\norganized by the United States Military Academy\u2019s Army Cyber Institute, the\nNATO Cooperative Cyber Military Academy, and the NATO Cooperative Cyber Defence\nCentre of Excellence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;While\nCyCon is a real conference, the attachment was actually a document containing a\nmalicious Visual Basic for Applications (VBA) macro that would download and\nexecute reconnaissance malware called Seduploader.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A number of senior cyber security pros were\nin for an embarrassment after it came to light that they fell for a phishing\nscam conducted by Fancy Bear, a Russian hacker group.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Fancy Bear used a malicious code in a Word\ndocument that it sent to cyber security pros who were to attend the Cyber\nConflict US conference.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Fancy Bear &nbsp;is a Russian cyber espionage group.&nbsp; They employ zero-day vulnerabilities and use\nspear phishing and malware to compromise targets. Fancy Bear's targets have\nincluded Eastern European governments and militaries, the country of Georgia\nand the Caucasus, security-related organizations such as NATO, as well as US\ndefense contractors Academi (formerly known as Blackwater) and Science\nApplications International Corporation (SAIC)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Paranaoid travellers have always been wary of\nhotel Wi-Fi. Now they have a fresh justification of their worst wireless\nnetworking fears: A Russian espionage campaign has used those Wi-Fi networks to\nspy on high-value hotel guests, and recently started using a leaked NSA hacking\ntool to upgrade their attacks.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Russian hacker group Fancy Bear, has targeted\nvictims via their connections to hacked hotel Wi-Fi networks<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Fancy bear have used EternalBlue, the leaked\nNSA hacking tool, as one technique to broaden their control of hotel networks\nafter gaining an initial foothold via phishing or other techniques<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Once those hackers take control of hotels'\nWi-Fi, they\u2019re using that access to harvest victim computers\u2019 usernames and\npasswords silently, with a trick that doesn\u2019t even require users to actively\ntype them when signed onto the hotel network.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The attackers used a network-hacking tool\ncalled Responder, which allowed them not only to monitor traffic on the\nhijacked networks, but also to trick computers connecting to them to cough up\nusers' credentials without giving victims any sign of the theft.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">When the\nvictim computer reaches out to known services like printers or shared folders,\nResponder can impersonate those friendly entities with a fake authentication\nprocess, fooling the victim machine into transmitting its network username and\npassword. And while the password is sent in a cryptographically hashed form,\nthat hashing can sometimes be cracked.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">If the Fancy Bear cyberattack was successful,\nthe team would attempt to siphon any secretive data from victims' computers. In\none of its most famous attacks, it exfiltrated tens of thousands of emails from\nthe DNC network, which were later leaked online for the world to see.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Cyberwarfare &nbsp;includes denial of service attacks, hacker\nattacks, dissemination of disinformation and propaganda, participation of\nstate-sponsored teams in political blogs, internet surveillance using SORM\ntechnology, persecution of cyber-dissidents and other active measures.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Ten months ago at Estonia's Tapa military\nbase, Estonian soldiers noticed their contacts were disappearing from their\nphones and music that they had never downloaded would start playing<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">DHINKA CHIKKAA DHINKA CHIKKKA<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/Un3x7VHcr-o/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/Un3x7VHcr-o?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Dhinka chika, Dhinka chika<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Dhinka chika, Dhinka chika<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">A..A..A..A..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Dhinka chika, Dhinka chika<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Dhinka chika, Dhinka chika<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">A..A..A..A..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Barah maheenay mein, Barah tareekay se,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">In 12 months, in 12 different ways</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Tujhko pyaar jataunga re<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">I shall express My love<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Dhinka chika, Dhinka chika<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Dhinka chika, Dhinka chika<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">A..A..A..A..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Dhinka chika, Dhinka chika<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Dhinka chika, Dhinka chika<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">A..A..A..A..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Barah minute bhi lagta hai ab na tere bin reh paunga\nre<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">It feels now that I can't even live without You for\n12 minutes </span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Dhinka chika, Dhinka chika<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Dhinka chika, Dhinka chika<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">A..A..A..A..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Dhinka chika, Dhinka chika<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Dhinka chika, Dhinka chika<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">A..A..A..A..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Haye January mein jab aayegi winter, on kar lenge\nchaahat ka heater<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">In January when there shall be winter, We will turn\non the heater of Love</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">February jitni chhoti rajaai, Jis mein khelein hum\nchhupan chhupayi<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The blanket shall be as small as February in which\nwe shall play hide and seek</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">March hoga romantic mahina, Woh karenge jo kiya\nkabhi na<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Estonian troops on the base now have to\nfollow a \"no smartphones\" policy and are forced to remove their SIM\ncards.. It's gotten so bad that their superiors order them to jump into lakes\nduring operations to make sure they're following the policy, and some soldiers\nare even wrapping their phones in condoms\u2026&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">DONALD TRUMP SEND 59 TOMAHAWK CRUISE MISSILES\nFROM TWO US NAVAL SHIPS , INTO A REMOTE SYRIAN AIR BASE.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">HARDLY\nANY MISSILE FOUND ITS TARGET\u2014WASTE OF 75 MILLION USD<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/h_zE3VDcOrM/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/h_zE3VDcOrM?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">SAUDI KING CAME TO KNOW THE HARD WAY THAT HIS GOLDEN ESCALATOR FOR DESCENDING FROM HIS PLANE KOSHER STYLE COULD BE STALLED.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/1qZOUVjVJg8/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/1qZOUVjVJg8?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">PUTIN SOMETIMES DOES GAAND MASTI</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/P4YRV9evA6k/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/P4YRV9evA6k?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Security firm Cisco Talos announced that it\nhas discovered a sophisticated phishing operation carried out by Russian hacker\ngroup Fancy Bear and targeted at cyber security professions attending the cyber\nsecurity conferences<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Fancy Bear posed as event organisers and sent\nan email to the targeted individuals with a detailed itinerary of the\nconference which they lifted from the conference website.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The emails contained\na Word document titled \"Conference_on_Cyber_Conflict.doc\" that\ncontained a well-known reconnaissance malware dubbed 'Seduploader'. Seduploader\nPayload is a downloader used by Sednit's operators as reconnaissance malware<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Fancy Bear targeted cybersecurity\nprofessionals for good reason \u2013 they are privy to huge amounts of vital data.\nThese conferences are attended by large enterprises, security vendors, and\ngovernment bodies, making them a huge payload for any hacker<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain, the underlying technology of\ncryptocurrencies offers a completely unique approach to cybersecurity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Some of the major corporations in the world,\nlike Lockheed Martin and the US military, have deployed blockchain for securing\ntheir data. In India too, state governments of Andhra Pradesh and Telangana, as\nwell as a few commercial banks are using this blockchain-ULU ( or is it\nblockchain-UDU ? ) technology to protect their database records and fight\nagainst cybercrime.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Recently, attackers had hacked into Equifax\u2019s\nnetwork that led to a potential compromise of sensitive data of over 146\nmillion of its users, all of which was held in a centralized location. Equifax\nInc. is a consumer credit reporting agency. Equifax collects and aggregates\ninformation on over 800 million individual consumers and more than 88 million\nbusinesses worldwide.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Founded in 1899 and based in Atlanta, Georgia, it is one\nof the three largest credit agencies along with Experian and TransUnion (known\nas the \u201cBig Three\u201d)&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The company claims to have discovered evidence of the\ncybercrime event on July 29, 2017 Equifax did not immediately disclose whether\nPINs and other sensitive information were compromised, nor did it explain the\ndelay between its discovery of the breach in July and its public announcement\nin early September.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Equifax stated that the delay was due to the time needed to\ndetermine the scope of the intrusion and the large amount of personal data\ninvolved..&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;
