text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">CHINA DOES 82% OF THE WORLDs MINING -WHY ?</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/eLa9peN6kO8/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/eLa9peN6kO8?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Chinese mining pools control more than 82% of\nthe Bitcoin network\u2019s collective hashrate. &nbsp;Most mining pools are in China.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-wnX8_1bgaLQ/WfnRtdw9unI/AAAAAAABWcQ/Ls40TrJJMSIt9snhE0ds4DkGaZi0xz1sQCLcBGAs/s1600/rpools-2017-03-19.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"489\" data-original-width=\"762\" height=\"410\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-wnX8_1bgaLQ/WfnRtdw9unI/AAAAAAABWcQ/Ls40TrJJMSIt9snhE0ds4DkGaZi0xz1sQCLcBGAs/s640/rpools-2017-03-19.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">1. AntPool<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Antpool is a Chinese based mining pool,\nmaintained by the ASIC manufacturer, BitMain.&nbsp; Antpool has mined nearly 20% of\nall blocks over the past year. Antpool currently has a hashrate of about 675\nPetahash per second (PH/s).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">AntPool\ndisguises its true hashrate by running subsidiary pools. These are said to\ninclude ViaBTC, BTC.com, GBMiners, CANOE and possibly others.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">2. F2Pool / DiscusFish<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">F2Pool, also known as DiscusFish, is based in\nChina.&nbsp; F2Pool has mined about 18.5% of all blocks over the past twelve months-- it controls about 380 PH/s.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">3. BTCC<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">BTCC is China\u2019s third largest Bitcoin\nexchange and also operates a large mining pool. The BTCC pool has mined about\n11% of all blocks over the past year. It controls about 240 PH/s.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">4. BW Pool<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">BW, established in 2014, is another mining\ncompany based in China. BW\u2019s pool has mined about 10% of all blocks over the\nlast year. It controls in the region of 225 PH/s.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><b>China is home to four of the five largest\nBitcoin mining pools over the past year.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Cloud mining is where you pay a service\nprovider to miner for you and you get the rewards. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">KOSHER controlled Georgia is home to BitFury,\none of the largest producers of Bitcoin mining hardware and chips.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">BitFury\ncurrently mines about 15% of all bitcoins.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The main difference between the Bitfury pool\nand other mining pools is that Bitfury is a private pool.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Bitfury, the company, makes its own mining\nhardware and runs its own pool. So, unlike Slush or Antpool, Bitfury cannot be\njoined if you run mining hardware at home.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/h8iBKbubCxM/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/h8iBKbubCxM?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">IT IS NOT <span style=\"color: red;\">JUST</span> \u2014ROTHSCHILD IS BEHIND THE BITCOIN\nSHADOW</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"https://steemit.com/news/@cryptocentral/breaking-rothschild-just-invested-in-bitcoin\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://steemit.com/news/@cryptocentral/breaking-rothschild-just-invested-in-bitcoin</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/BoboO6QPGow/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/BoboO6QPGow?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Bitcoin miners are crucial to Bitcoin and its\nsecurity. Without miners, Bitcoin would be vulnerable and easy to attack. &nbsp;Miners are responsible for the creation of all\nnew bitcoins.. &nbsp;&nbsp;Mining is now mostly\ndone in large, specialized warehouses with massive amounts of mining hardware.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Antpool in China remains the largest Bitcoin\nmining pool in terms of its Bitcoin network hash rate. Antpool holds roughly\n15% of the total hash rate of all Bitcoin mining pools. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Chinaman Jihan Wu is the co-founder of\nBITMAIN, one of most recognized and valuable bitcoin companies.. Jihan Wu\nfounded Bitmain maintains AntPool which holds the largest hashrate distribution\namongst mining pools; currently AntPool mines 17 % of all blocks.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; When you break it down, each American citizen\u2019s share of the debt is more than $60,000, and so if you have a family of five your share is more than $300,000. And when you throw in more than 6 trillion dollars of corporate debt and nearly 13 trillion dollars of consumer debt, it is not inaccurate to say that we are facing a crisis of unprecedented magnitude.\"<br />\n---<br />\n<br />\nIf Trump or someone who have balls, mint a coin, and call it a \"20 Trillion USD\" coin, and wipes the slate clean, what will be implications?<br />\n<br />\nI am sure whichever the president does that, he will be assassinated. padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_134b+seedCuUuD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_132B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7399705419462473682\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_132M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/10/blockchain-smart-contracts-part-8-capt.html?showComment=1509500751567#c7399705419462473682\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">November 1, 2017 at 7:15 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_132MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">JEW OBAMA HAS SOLD USA TO ROTHSCHILD</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ROBERT MUELLER SHOULD BE INVESTIGATING OBAMA--WHY HE NEVER REVEALED THE 20 TRILLION DEBT , IN ANY OF HIS SOTU SPEECHES</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IF CHINA WANTS TO SCREW USA THEY CAN--THEY ARE THE LARGEST HOLDERS OF US DEBT&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IN THE LINK BELOW, LOOK AT THE TOP LEFT HAND CORNER -- 20.45 TRILLION USD DEBT</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://www.usdebtclock.org/</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Hilly Billy Yanks do not know that the Social Security Trust Fund, aka retirement money, owns most of the national debt.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The U.S. Treasury manages the U.S. debt through its Bureau of the Public Debt.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The debt falls into two broad categories: Intragovernmental Holdings and Debt Held by the Public.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Intragovernmental Holdings. This is the portion of the federal debt owed to 230 other federal agencies. It totals $5.6 trillion, almost 30 percent of the debt. Why would the government owe money to itself? Some agencies, like the Social Security Trust Fund, take in more revenue from taxes than they need. Rather than stick this cash under a giant mattress, these agencies buy U.S. Treasurys with it.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">By owning Treasurys, they transfer their excess cash to the general fund, where it is spent. Of course, one day they will redeem their Treasury notes for cash. The federal government will either need to raise taxes or issue more debt to give the agencies the money they will need.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Debt Held by the Public. The public holds the rest of the national debt ($14.7 trillion). Foreign governments and investors hold nearly half of it. One-fourth is held by other governmental entities. These include the Federal Reserve, as well as state and local governments. Fifteen percent is held by mutual funds, private pension funds and holders of savings bonds and Treasury notes. The remaining 10 percent is owned by businesses, like banks and insurance companies. It's also held by an assortment of trusts, companies, and investors.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">As the nation's central bank, the Federal Reserve is in charge of the country's credit. It doesn't have a financial reason to own Treasury notes. So why did it double its holdings between 2007 and 2014?</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">That's when it ramped up its open market operations by purchasing $2 trillion in Treasurys. This quantitative easing stimulated the economy by keeping interest rates low. It helped the United States escape the grips of the recession.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Did the Fed monetize the debt?</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Yes, that's one of the effects. The Fed purchased Treasurys from its member banks, using credit it created out of thin air. It had the same effect as printing money. By keeping interest rates low, the Fed helped the government avoid the high-interest rate penalty it would usually incur for excessive debt.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MONEY OUT OF THIN AIR?</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">DO YOU KNOW WHY PRICES OF GOODS ALWAYS GO UP AND NEVER DOWN ?</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THERE IS A METHOD TO THIS ROTHSCHILD MADNESS.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">THIS IS WHY I SAY\u2014&nbsp; &nbsp;95% OF INDIAN PROFESSORS WHO TEACH ECONOMICS NEED TO BE SACKED.</span><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AND HULLO SWAMY\u2014YOU HAVE BECOME SENILE. YOU ARE NOT THE OLD SWAMY</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/murky-truths-of-inflation-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b>USA NEEDS A WAR WITH INDIA AND CHINA FIGHTING EACH OTHER--THIS IS THE ONLY WAY THEY CAN COME OUT OF THEIR UNPAYABLE DEBT</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/10/blockchain-smart-contracts-part-8-capt.html?showComment=1509521585778#c1545211942117808994\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">November 1, 2017 at 1:03 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_168MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nBACKSWING IS A CHANGE MANAGERs TECHNIQUE<br />\n<br />\nWHEN INDIA SENT OUR ROCKET TO MARS--IT WENT THE OPPOSITE DIRECTION FIRST<br />\n<br />\nIsro engineers employed an unusual \"slingshot\" method for Mangalyaan<br />\n<br />\nLacking enough rocket power to blast directly out of Earth's atmosphere and gravitational pull, it orbited the Earth for several weeks while building up enough velocity to break free. That helped avoid using a more expensive more expensive heavy launch vehicle.<br />\n<br />\nGravity assist, sometimes called an interplanetary slingshot (a CHOOT ter term), involves approaching an intermediate planet (not the one you initially start from, or are destined to go to) in a hyperbolic orbit.<br />\n<br />\nA gravitational slingshot, gravity assist maneuver or swing-by is the use of the relative movement and gravity of a planet to alter the path and speed of a spacecraft, typically in order to save fuel, time, and expense<br />\n<br />\nThere was no gravity slingshot used on Mangalyaan.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">We did 6 periapsis burns at Earth to raise the apogee, then a burn to go to the Mars Transfer Trajectory,</span> then another burn when they get to Mars to put themselves in orbit<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">BALLS BRUTUS IS A HONORABLE GUY !</span></b><br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gravity_assist</span><br />\n<br />\nTEE HEEEEEEEEEEEE<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_168B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">..</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7641453816932103076\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_6M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/10/blockchain-smart-contracts-part-8-capt.html?showComment=1509374433504#c7641453816932103076\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">October 30, 2017 at 8:10 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_6MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nhttps://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/home/environment/pollution/centre-turns-to-sewage-eating-microbes-to-treat-ganga-water-at-54-new-sites/articleshow/61336579.cms</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nBE WARNED</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nGANGA DOES NOT NEED SEWAGE EATING BACTERIA LIKE OTHER RIVERS ON THIS PLANET...</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nGANGA HAS ITS OWN SELF CLEANING BACTERIA BUSTING BACTERIOPHAGES ....NO OTHER RIVER ON THIS PLANET HAS THIS UNIQUE LIVING CREATURES...THIS IS WHY GANGES IS A HOLY RIVER....</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nBacteriophage, is a virus, any of a group of viruses that infect bacteria\u2014it literally means \u201cbacteria eater\u201d</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nWHO IS GIVING PM MODI ALL THIS DEVASTATING ADVISE? .. HIS WHITE JEWS MASTERS IN ISRAEL?...</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nPROTECT GANGA AGAINST CHEMICAL ( FROM TANNERIES ) AND PLASTIC POLLUTION--THAT IS ALL THAT IS NEEDED...</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThousands of varieties of such phages exist, each of which may infect only one type or a few types of bacteria.... The nucleic acid may be either DNA or RNA and may be double-stranded or single-stranded...</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nDuring infection a phage attaches to a bacterium and inserts its genetic material into the cell. ..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nAfter this a phage follows one of two life cycles, lytic (virulent) or lysogenic (temperate). .. Lytic phages take over the machinery of the cell to make phage components... They then destroy, or lyse, the cell, releasing new phage particles...</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nAfter the discovery of antibiotics in the 1940s it was virtually abandoned. With the ever increasing rise of anti-biotic resistant bacteria , phages will now command fresh attention..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nMore than 120 years ago there was a cholera outbreak in India and dead bodies were dumped in the upper river... Yet strangely Ganges water did NOT spread the cholera down the river . ...</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nGanges is heavily populated with phages which multiply rapidly , travel fast and home in on targets ...</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThey are harmless to humans because they are strain specific. ... This means phages that infect the cholera bacterium can only infect the cholera bacterium and no other bacteria....</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nWhen a bacteriophage finds a bacterium with proteins which match its receptors, it can insert DNA or RNA into the bacterium and direct the organism to start producing replicas of the virus.....</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nPhages have been keeping keeping bacteria in check for three and a half billion years! Antibiotics have been around for a few decades are they are already failing to do their job.....</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nI ASK MY READERS - SPREAD THIS COMMENT LIKE WILD FIRE.. INDIA IS BEING RULED BY DESH DROHIS OR VERY IGNORANT PEOPLE...</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/06/ganga-manthan-cleaning-of-river-ganges.html</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><b>WARNING--&nbsp; &nbsp;DO NOT INTRODUCE EXTERNAL BACTERIA .. THIS WILL KILL GANGA ....</b></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\ncapt ajit vadakayil</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n..</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_6BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Smart contracts will not be suited to all\ntypes of transactions, or circumstances without a conscious brain especially\nbefore it has been set rolling and it has steadied its course &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>WE DON\u2019T WANT \u201cIF MY AUNTY HAD BALLS, &nbsp;&nbsp;SHE WOULD BE MY UNCLE \u201c TYPE &nbsp;KOSHER SMART CONTRACTS ON BLOCK CHAIN.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>THE BEST COMPUTER CANNOT LAUGH AT A SUBTLE JOKE\nEVEN TODAY.. <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>THE BEST COMPUTER CANNOT TELL THE MORAL OF A\nSTORY NARRATED TO IT.&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><b>ONLY HUMAN BEINGS CAN DO THAT</b></span><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\">Below: You have to show the mirror to a&nbsp; SMART CONTRACT before it is unleashed on the hapless public</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-xCzuhyJ6rEY/WfOU5oeUavI/AAAAAAABWXo/MqQKVdJ64G0Z0aD8sDdrihnBSd0w7LJwQCLcBGAs/s1600/Top-D10-Reflective-Cats-in-Reflections-2.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"444\" data-original-width=\"534\" height=\"532\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-xCzuhyJ6rEY/WfOU5oeUavI/AAAAAAABWXo/MqQKVdJ64G0Z0aD8sDdrihnBSd0w7LJwQCLcBGAs/s640/Top-D10-Reflective-Cats-in-Reflections-2.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">KICK STARTING A SMART CONTRACT REQUIRES HUMAN\nINTERVENTION \u2013 LEST LAND BE GRABBED BY WHITE JEWS USING BLOCKCHAIN &nbsp;THE WAY IT IS DONE IN GEORGIA AND UKRAINE</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Xg0UzxnuJ30/WfOV8AMdyPI/AAAAAAABWXw/l777EaZnUeAFVqcMExuu67GHloY58Kf4QCLcBGAs/s1600/Seaemus-the-Philanthropist.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"600\" data-original-width=\"600\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Xg0UzxnuJ30/WfOV8AMdyPI/AAAAAAABWXw/l777EaZnUeAFVqcMExuu67GHloY58Kf4QCLcBGAs/s400/Seaemus-the-Philanthropist.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Kickstarting Smart Contract 2.0 will need a\n\"smart lawyer\".<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">IN FUTURE WE WILL HAVE LAWYERS AND \u201cSMART\nLAWYERS\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE DIFFERENCE IS,&nbsp; &nbsp; SMART LAWYERS WILL BE THE\nTOP CREAM OF THE SCHOOL CEREBRAL BARREL - CAPABLE OF EXECUTING SELF ENFORCING\nBONAFIDE SMART CONTRACTS<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Many technologists prefer a pure focus on the\nsmart code. Their logic is: if the technology can automate and self-enforce\nperformance, we should be able to do away with the need for legal contracts,\nand law in general.&nbsp;&nbsp; This is perhaps too\nsimplistic a view.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A truly \"smart contract\" will be\none which serves the purpose of a valid and binding agreement coupled with\ntechnological auto-performance, without further CONSCIOUS human intervention.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Technology is changing almost every aspect of\nour lives. It is therefore no surprise that it has already had a profound\neffect on how legal contracts are made (and signed), for example, we now\nnegotiate via email, VC and Skype and sign electronically without ever meeting\nface to face.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Technology is also revolutionising other broader issues of\nelectronic contracting, including identification of parties, and is forcing us\nto rethink the very fundamental ideals of what it means to conclude and perform\nunder a contract.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Our law specifically recognises the validity\nof electronic contracts, accepts contracts concluded with electronic agents,\nand is even starting to recognise biometrics as the equivalent of a signature.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">12 It is important to note that while all\ndata on a permissionless, public distributed ledger can be viewed by all full\nnodes, the data might be anonymised in the sense that it cannot be linked to a\nparticular individual or entity. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">DLT allows the code to be embedded in the\ndistributed ledger. This means there is only one \u2018golden\u2019 version, which\neffectively binds both parties. More importantly, once the code is switched on,\nthe parties can take comfort from the fact that it will self-execute\nautomatically and neither party can tamper with that. This is what is meant\nwhen smart contracts are described as \u2018self-enforcing\u2019.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">There should be no need\nto resort to the courts to enforce the legal contract for payment because, when\nthe relevant event occurs, failure to pay is not something that can happen\nwithin the code.&nbsp; It is important to\nremember, though, that smart contracts and DLT are distinct and come with their\nown respective challenges. Confusingly, in the legal context, these often get\nintertwined.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">One example for DLT is the issue of situs. Under various legal\nregimes, it is necessary to identify the location of an asset or contract to\ndetermine the applicable legal jurisdiction for various legal questions\nrelating to it \u2013 for example, whether a property right has been created.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In law, the situs of property is where the\nproperty is treated as being located for legal purposes. This may be important\nwhen determining which laws apply to the property, since the situs of an object\ndetermines the lex situs, that is, the law applicable in the jurisdiction where\nthe object is located, which may differ from the lex fori, the law applicable\nin the jurisdiction where a legal action is brought.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">For example, real estate\nin England is subject to English law, and real estate in France is subject to\nFrench law.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It can be essential to determine the situs of an object, and the\nlex situs, because there are substantial differences between the laws in\ndifferent jurisdictions governing, for example: whether property has been\ntransferred effectively; what taxes apply (such as inheritance tax, estate tax,\nwealth tax, income tax and capital gains tax); and whether rules of intestacy\nor forced heirship apply.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The rules for determining situs vary between\njurisdictions and can depend on the context.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The English common law rules,\nwhich apply in most common law jurisdictions, are in outline as follows:---<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">the situs of real estate (land) is where it\nis located.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">the situs of a chattel (tangible moveable\nitem) is where it is currently located.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">the situs of a bearer instrument is where the\ndocument is located, but the situs of a registered instrument is where the\nregister is held.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">the situs of debts is where the debtor\nresides, since that is generally where legal action can be taken to enforce the\ndebt.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">the situs of intangible property, including\nintellectual property and goodwill, is where the property is registered, or, if\nnot registered, where the rights to the property can be enforced.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">the situs of a ship within territorial waters\nis where it is located, but the situs of a ship in international waters is its\nport of registry.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Smart contracts and DLT are distinct technologies,\nbut DLT provides a central platform on which smart contracts can be executed<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In the case of dematerialised financial\nassets where ownership is recorded on a register, it is often the place where\nthe register is held or where the registrar is situated that is deemed to be\nthe situs of that financial asset.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">However, the distribution of the register\nacross nodes in multiple jurisdictions raises a seemingly intractable problem \u2013\nunder current legal principles at least \u2013 as to where the situs should be.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This point is often raised by experts as\nevidence that DLT and smart contracts suffer from legal issues relating to\nsitus. It is important to note, though, that this legal issue is one relating\nto DLT rather than smart contracts.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">To be sure, smart contracts raise their own\nlegal issues (although the degree to which such issues arise depends on the\nconception of what a smart contract is), but they are distinct issues from\nthose that arise for DLT.&nbsp; &nbsp;There isn\u2019t an analogous situs problem for smart legal\ncontracts themselves.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Immutability, a fundamental pillar of the\nblockchain, is often upheld as one of the key advantages of the smart contract.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">However, it raises challenges, for example, in circumstances in which\nCONSCIOUS human&nbsp; regulators might need to\nintervene. Many KOSHER&nbsp; proponents of the\npurely technical smart contract will argue this should never be allowed to\nhappen.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In object-oriented and functional\nprogramming, an immutable object (unchangeable object) is an object whose state\ncannot be modified after it is created. This is in contrast to a mutable object\n(changeable object), which can be modified after it is created.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Apparently there are two types of software\nengineers in the world. One type writes code, pushes it out into the world to\nsee how it works, keeps track of the bugs, and then goes back to drawing board,\nre-writes the code, fixes the bugs, and re-releases.&nbsp; &nbsp;Write-release-fix,\nwrite-release-fix.&nbsp; &nbsp;A never-ending circle.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The other type of software engineer seems to\nbe able to write code once, and because it was carefully KOSHER&nbsp; planned and carefully KOSHER&nbsp; implemented, it runs correctly forever on the\nKOSHER criminal&nbsp; path . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: white; font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: blue;\">Write - release - DUN DANNADDUN DONE !</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">SIX MILLION JEWS DEAD IS IMMUTABLE.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">IF YOU CHALLENGE IT ,&nbsp; &nbsp;18 NATIONS WILL KICK\nYOU INTO JAIL AND MAKE SURE YOU COME OUT AS A PAUPER AND BRANDED MENTALLY\nDISABLED</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The advancement of blockchain technology as a\ndecentralised database, with the ability to store a public registry of assets\nand transactions across a shared, trusted, peer-to-peer network, is lauded as\none of the most significant technological innovations since the internet.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Coupled with the sophistication of software code as a form of communicating\ninformation and automating complex instructions, blockchain technology provides\na new means of recording information and facilitating the exchange of value in\nthe global economy in a decentralised and IMMUTABLE way.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">At the centre of this battleground lie\nso-called \"smart contracts\", which are essentially agreements reduced\nto or replicated in software code whose execution is both automatable and\nenforceable.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">SMART CONTRACT &nbsp;is used to specify software code that is\ntypically stored, verified and executed on a blockchain .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">SMART LEGAL CONTRACT &nbsp;focuses on legally enforceable contracts\npartially expressed and/or executed in code <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://www.livelaw.in/chief-justice-khehar-supports-entry-foreign-lawyers-india/\">http://www.livelaw.in/chief-justice-khehar-supports-entry-foreign-lawyers-india/</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Smart legal contracts differ from smart\ncontract code in terms of what aspect is being enforced; the former involves\nthe enforcement of complex legal rights and obligations while the latter may\nsimply involve the execution of the code. When speaking about the\ntransformational and disruptive capacity of smart contracts, therefore, we\ntypically refer to smart contract code or business logic which can be\nprogrammed, verified, executed, and enforced automatically under conditions set\nin advance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">One other important distinction to make in\nthis context is between syntactic (or operational) information, which describes\nthe rules governing the relationship between symbols and coded language, and\nsemantic (or denotational) information, which describes the meaning attributed\nto such symbols or the intent behind the coded language. As discussed in our previous\narticle, semantic information, like the notion of \"good faith\",\ncannot yet be translated into code. Undoubtedly, this poses a significant\nobstacle to the practical implementation and widespread adoption of smart\ncontracts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The clever waiter knows 5 dollars cannot be\nsplit between 3 regular dutchmen. so he pockets 2 dollars and returns 3 one\ndollar notes .<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The three of them put back one dollar each\ninto their respective wallets.&nbsp; Initially\neach wallet had one 10 dollar bill--now it has only one single dollar bill.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Now comes the perception part:</span></i></span><i style=\"font-family: Cambria, serif; font-size: 14pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;</span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">All three of them spent 9 dollars each-- 27\ndollars total.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The waiter got 2 dollars.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><i><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue;\">WHERE IS ONE DOLLAR GONE--&nbsp; &nbsp;POOF???</span></i></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Be honest to yourself and dont read further,\ntill you figure this out.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">You tell an accountant without perception to\ngive you a debit/ credit accounts statement--and see the way he sweats.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">See literacy has nothing to do with\nperception.&nbsp; A illiterate chaiwala boy in\nmumbai can make an ass out of you, when it comes to accounts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Daft accountants make a mistake when it comes\nto \"receipts\" and \" balance \".</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\"><b>Here in this case it is -&nbsp; <span style=\"color: red;\">30+0 = 27+3.</span></b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: x-large;\"><b>Opening cash + receipts&nbsp; =&nbsp; spent cash + balance\ncash.&nbsp; </b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">It can never ever be&nbsp;<span style=\"color: red;\"> 30-3+2 = 29</span></span></b><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">See, you cant argue with dorks.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">2 dollars is something which happened in the\nmann mandir of the waiter.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">How do you\nknow that he stole 2 dollars ?&nbsp; &nbsp; Accounting has to be objective.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">One of the key advantages of smart contracts\non a blockchain is that transactions are recorded accurately and consistently\nin a distributable and shared way that allows every party (or node) in a\nnetwork to verify the accuracy of the central ledger by reference to their own\ncopies. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This system embeds HAJAAAR &nbsp;trust in the contractual relationship,\nenabling multiple parties to transact with each other with the certainty that a\ntransaction will be performed as agreed. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Linked to this is the transparency of source\ncode, which allows any party to access the written code online and\nindependently verify its functionality.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Aside from the inherent limitation to capture\nlegal concepts and intent, blockchain- based smart contracts offer not only more\nflexibility in the implementation of decentralised digital asset transfers, but\nalso the capability to perform a range of functions that traditional contracts\ncannot. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">For example, in a traditional sale of goods,\nsmart contracts can automate both the performance and payment element of a\ncontractual agreement by reference to an external set of dynamic or live\nconditions, such as the fluctuation of the market price of goods, the exchange\nrate, or even the weather. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Smart contracts have the capacity to\nstreamline business processes and transform traditional business models in\nindustries that strongly rely on such external dependencies, like finance,\ninternational trade, and insurance, something which we are already beginning to\nsee.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Related to the above, smart contracts are\nless likely to result in a mismatch or breach of the terms in an agreement.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;In a\ntraditional contract, there can be a mismatch where there is a mutual\nmisunderstanding of the initial terms, confusion due to multiple forms or\nversions of the original terms, or a disagreement with what actually happened\nin the external dependencies. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">With a smart contract, there is only one set\nof contractual terms, written in software code, less verbose than legalese, and\nagreed upon in advance by reference to external dependencies that are fed in\nvia a mutually agreed feed (or so-called oracles). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-5PVFvbMao0s/WfOmdcULiGI/AAAAAAABWYE/D2Q6AufS6T4U5m4I98daQWYhpjPaYdG9ACLcBGAs/s1600/Dom4inant%252BInformation%252Bis%252BNot%252BTechnical.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"720\" data-original-width=\"960\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-5PVFvbMao0s/WfOmdcULiGI/AAAAAAABWYE/D2Q6AufS6T4U5m4I98daQWYhpjPaYdG9ACLcBGAs/s640/Dom4inant%252BInformation%252Bis%252BNot%252BTechnical.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">WHY ARE LEGAL CONTRACTS ALWAYS <span style=\"color: red;\">VERBOSE</span>.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">IT IS\nTO BAMBOOZLE THE ORDINARY CITIZEN .&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">IT IS TO MAKE SURE THAT NO MAN CAN ARGUE HIS OWN CASE&nbsp;</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-95r-DP3xYWs/WfOmFnOXj2I/AAAAAAABWYA/LPxEb7lj5boYmBT7EWILvAQmAoBfAPXEACLcBGAs/s1600/education-teaching-lRRaw_school-legal_contracts-legal_jargon-contract-law_course-hscn2803_low.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"336\" data-original-width=\"400\" height=\"536\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-95r-DP3xYWs/WfOmFnOXj2I/AAAAAAABWYA/LPxEb7lj5boYmBT7EWILvAQmAoBfAPXEACLcBGAs/s640/education-teaching-lRRaw_school-legal_contracts-legal_jargon-contract-law_course-hscn2803_low.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It stands that the smart contract will exist\non the blockchain and run when an event occurs or when the agreement expires.\nWhile this does not offer a utopian dispute-less context, the scope for disputes\nwould be greatly reduced.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Finally, smart contracts on an immutable\nblockchain provide the added certainty that an agreement will perform as\nagreed, in strict accordance with the code.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Once a smart contract is\nprogrammed, it can no longer be changed, unless parties build in an express\nprovision that allows for performance or execution of the contract to be halted\non a set of mutually agreed conditions. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Although an integral feature of the\nfunctionality and usefulness of blockchain, as discussed below, immutability\nalso poses the most significant challenge for the practical implementation and\nadoption of smart contracts at the level of industry.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">As displayed by \"The DAO attack\",\nwhich involved the exploitation of a flaw in the code of a smart contract on\nthe Ethereum blockchain , smart contracts when immutably embedded in a\nblockchain cannot be changed or updated.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This means that defects and\nvulnerabilities in the code cannot be fixed and code is effectively deprived of\nthe benefit of being subject to a process of refinement and testing to allow it\nto reach \"maturity\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This problem is further expounded by the\ndifficulty, or near impossibility, of writing large pieces of code free of any\nbugs, as well as the inability of code to capture the semantic intent of the\ndeveloper or curator. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The immutability of the Ethereum blockchain,\nthis incapability to fix vulnerabilities in the written code, coupled with the\ninherent inability of processing semantic information or capturing the real\nintent behind The DAO smart contract, is what ultimately led to the logical\nimpasse that resulted in the decision to change (or HARD FORK ) the Ethereum\nblockchain protocol, effectively reversing The DAO transactions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</b></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">A <span style=\"color: red;\">HARD FORK</span> HAD TO BE SHOVED INTO THE ASSHOLE\nOF THE&nbsp; SMART CONTRACT.&nbsp;
