, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">When I introduced Predictive analysis at sea\nall were scratching their collective heads and balls.&nbsp; &nbsp;I could take it to\nprescriptive only on one highly automated ship where I could get TRENDS. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This helped me to take decisions which\nbamboozled everybody\u2014some white CUNTS accusing me of behaving like a prophet <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/naive-sailor-ship-construction-capt.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/naive-sailor-ship-construction-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><b>I WAS A GRANDMASTER OF CHANGE AT SEA<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><b>I USED DOMINO METHOD AND CASCADE METHOD TO\nEFFECT CHANGE \u2013 AND I SWUNG LIKE TARZAN <o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/change-management-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/change-management-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/04/domino-effect-in-change-management-capt.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/04/domino-effect-in-change-management-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">PSSST\u2014WHAT WAS TARZANs LAST WORDS ?<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</b></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">\u201cWHICH BASTARD GREASED THE VINES\n\u2013KREEEGAAAHHHHHHHH\u201d</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Prescriptive analytics not only anticipates\nwhat will happen and why it will happen, but also WHEN it will happen.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">There lies the critical element of Time\nManagement.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">I was a TIME manager at sea<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/time-management-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/time-management-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The way the world conducts businesses is\nchanging at a fast pace, the world has leaped from an era of traditional\nadvertising, marketing and sales to an era where almost every digital data has\na strong media elements including boring office productivity tools.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Real-time\ndata analysis that even predicts future outcomes and trend even by a fraction\nof minutes might just be the differentiating factor and this is how most\nbusinesses are operating and will operate.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Predictive analytics is a modern marketing\ntool. Prediction becomes difficult if significant meaning cannot be translated\nfrom a large data set.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Interesting and beautiful solutions are\npopping up due to data growth, forcing scientists to come up with even more\nbrilliant algorithms; entrepreneurs more groundbreaking solutions. As data\ncreation and consumption grows, it only indicates that there is more data\nevolution to come</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;Blockchain is a few years away from becoming a massive\nmarketing tool. Blockchain will be the most significant technological\nbreakthrough since the invention of the internet, and it will become an\nimportant part of many businesses in the coming years.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">AI is gaining practical use and is becoming\ninseparable from daily life activities, gaining relevance across almost sectors\nranging from banking, health, transportation defence etc. With a wide and an\nalmost endless variety of AI applications, we are most certainly in the dawn of\nan automated world.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain, big data, predictive analytics,\nAI or machine learning, -- technologies share so much in common because they\nall depend upon the other for an effective solution.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Big Data has ushered in an era of data\nanalytics that is taking different forms, including prescriptive analytics.\nThis type of business analytics helps you find the best approach for a specific\ncircumstance. It is also considered the third or final part of business\nanalytics, which also encompasses descriptive analytics and predictive\nanalytics.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Prescriptive analytics leverages predictive analytics and\ndescriptive analytics to derive ideal outcomes or solutions from helping you\nsolve business problems, and it is driving the future of Big Data. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Raw data is plentiful in today's digital age.\nApproximately 90 percent of today's online data represents a compilation of\ndata that was generated in only a few years, and it is projected to grow\nrapidly.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Consumers send billions of messages via instant messaging apps and\nsocial networking sites, such as Facebook and Twitter, and generate upwards of\nsix billion on Google every day via their mobile devices and desktops.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">However,\nthis raw data does not create value on its own. It must be processed in a way\nthat delivers valuable insight to your enterprise for it to be resourceful.\nWith raw data, you can identify patterns, build models based on these patterns\nand other known information and make data-driven projections to solve business\nproblems.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Both prescriptive analytics and predictive\nanalytics enable you to turn primary data into valuable insights. However,\nprescriptive analytics and predictive analytics differ in the type of insights\nyou can leverage. Predictive analytics allows you to make future projections\nbased on historical and present data.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It enables you to use the known raw data\nand process it so that you can make predictions on the information you do not\nknow. With prescriptive analytics, you not only can make sense of raw data but\nalso use it to determine the actions to take now.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It leverages machine\nlearning, simulations, and mathematical optimization to help enterprise leaders\nmake better-informed decisions that are data-driven. Prescriptive analytics\nalso helps evolve decision-making logic to maintain or improve its\neffectiveness over time.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Prescriptive analytics showcases viable\nsolutions to a problem and the impact of considering a solution on future\ntrend. It is considered the aim of any data analysis project. The prescriptive\nanalysis is still an evolving technique and there are limited applications for\nit in business.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Predictive and prescriptive analytics\ncalculate probabilities, i.e. the likelihood of something happening in the\nfuture.&nbsp; For these forecasts to be\nreliable, giant amounts of data needs to be mined (\u201cbig data\u201d).&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">These can include numerous different sources\nof external data such as posts on social media or competitive intelligence. The\ndata volumes analyzed are in fact so staggering that only very complex\npredictive models can make sense of them.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">An already widespread area of application is\nsentiment analysis. Also known as opinion mining, predictive analytics is set\nto replace traditional methods of market research as the amount of data it\nsifts through is huge and the result thus considered more reliable than for\nexample focus groups.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It enables businesses to gauge what people think and, as\na result, to take a more pro-active approach in spotting business opportunities\neven before they arise.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This type of \u201cadvanced\u201d analytics also uses\nexisting historical data to train predictive machine learning (ML) models. This\nculminates into the most sophisticated type analytics \u2013 prescriptive \u2013 that\nserves as a basis for deciding how to react to forecasted trends. Prescriptive\nanalytics is considered to be fully digitalized decision-making and the nearest\napproach to artificial intelligence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Big data explosion has rapidly become a\npivotal tool for the business intelligence sector. This powerful data stream is\nbuilding the momentum and magnitude for the predictive and prescriptive\nanalytics market.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This platform helps swiftness of diverse data, combining with\nbig data, and utilizing better models and business outcomes of leading\nhealthcare organizations. It improves quick-decision, profits, measures social\nmedia influence and tries to avert scams and frauds, through the application of\nadvanced analytics and decision optimization.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Every day, quintillion bytes of\nfiles are created for authentication and to examine future trends of the\nmarket. Many organizations implement predictive and prescriptive analytics for\ndata validation, to increase data accessibility, reduce the cost to providers,\nand individual risk for payers, etc.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Prescriptive analytics can suggest all\nfavorable outcomes according to a specified course of action and also suggest\nvarious course of actions to get to a particular outcome.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Hence, it uses a\nstrong feedback system that constantly learns and updates the relationship\nbetween the action and the outcome. The computations include optimisation of\nsome functions that are related to the desired outcome.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">For example, while\ncalling for a cab online, the application uses GPS to connect you to the\ncorrect driver from among a number of drivers found nearby. Hence, it optimises\nthe distance for faster arrival time. Recommendation engines also use\nprescriptive analytics.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The other approach includes simulation where\nall the key performance areas are combined to design the correct solutions. It\nmakes sure whether the key performance metrics are included in the solution.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The optimisation model will further work on the impact of the previously made\nforecasts. Because of its power to suggest favorable solutions, prescriptive\nanalytics is the final frontier of advanced analytics or data science, in\ntoday\u2019s term.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Prescriptive analytics answers the question\nof what actions need to be taken&nbsp; to make\nsomething happen or\u2026 prevent something from happening. Prescriptive analytics\nis considered to be fully digitalized decision-making and the nearest approach\nto artificial intelligence.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">If applied with the right data, the insights gained\nfrom prescriptive analytics can represent valid recommendations of the actions\na company can take in the future to boost to business outcomes.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-YRt4UJWElnU/WfSUMJQ23BI/AAAAAAABWY4/gbqRmmwnimUXMpzp3zmizqlsLJTzb_xSACLcBGAs/s1600/hamsspCI.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"400\" data-original-width=\"400\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-YRt4UJWElnU/WfSUMJQ23BI/AAAAAAABWY4/gbqRmmwnimUXMpzp3zmizqlsLJTzb_xSACLcBGAs/s320/hamsspCI.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Prescriptive\nanalytics enable companies to transform descriptive data into\nbusiness-critical, actionable insights. Often used by management, prescriptive\nanalytics can help optimize operations, prioritize spending by looking at\ncondition- or risk-based models, quantify changes from past data sets, conduct\naudits and budget more accurately for the future.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">While the sheer quantity of\ndata available today, the ability to extract it for quality descriptive,\npredictive and prescriptive analytics is vitally important to businesses of all\ntypes.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Prescriptive Analytics industry research report analyses the supply,\nsales, production, and market status comprehensively. Production market shares\nand sales market shares are analysed along with the study of capacity,\nproduction, sales, and revenue.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Several other factors such as import, export,\ngross margin, price, cost, and consumption are also analysed under the section\nAnalysis of Prescriptive Analytics production, supply, sales and market status.&nbsp; Prescriptive analytics can recommend multiple\ncourses of action and the likely outcomes of each decision.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Prescriptive goes\nbeyond predictive analytics, because in addition to the shared data model, it\nrequires actionable data and a way to feed data back into the system to track\noutcomes. It can also be more powerful than predictive analytics, especially\nfor those NON-PERCEPTIVE , NON-CONSCIOUS that might need help choosing the\ncorrect route.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Prescriptive analytics try to define the outcomes of future\ndecisions in order to advise on possible outcomes before the decisions are\nmade. In theory, prescriptive analytics predict not only what will happen, but\nalso why it will happen, offering recommendations on how to take advantage of\nthe predictions.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-hDDA8sLanWw/WfSUyt-ziXI/AAAAAAABWZE/ZtVUdgDMh2YTNmJ3dOQWrVV-s8G2WjUkQCLcBGAs/s1600/ihmages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"239\" data-original-width=\"211\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-hDDA8sLanWw/WfSUyt-ziXI/AAAAAAABWZE/ZtVUdgDMh2YTNmJ3dOQWrVV-s8G2WjUkQCLcBGAs/s400/ihmages.jpg\" width=\"353\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">When given several options to choose from,\nprescriptive analytics is helpful in identifying the best outcome or solution\nbased on known limitations and scenarios. It takes predictive analytics further\nby helping you see what the probable outcome relies on each decision. That helps\nyou to decide what business decision to make.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Prescriptive analytics comes with some\nbenefits you can leverage with Big Data, such as enhanced awareness of the\nimpact of new technologies or techniques, improved utilization of resources and\nincreased insight into patterns and habits of consumers.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">For example, you can\nuse prescriptive analytics to determine the best social media engagement\nopportunities to take or when to knock on the door of opportunity<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The future of prescriptive analytics will\nfacilitate further analytical development for automated analytics where it\nreplaces the need of human decision-making with automated decision-making for\nbusinesses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">With the expanding use and value of\nprescriptive analytics, it is driving the future of Big Data. Enterprise\nleaders can avoid risky business moves and reduce financial losses with the\npower of prescriptive analytics to evolve the logic of their business\ndecisions.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">When you incorporate prescriptive analytics in your Big Data\nstrategy, it can help you make business decisions faster to enhance efficiency\nand productivity of your enterprise.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Referred to as the \"final frontier of\nanalytic capabilities,\" prescriptive analytics entails the application of\nmathematical and computational sciences and suggests decision options to take\nadvantage of the results of descriptive and predictive analytics. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-J1YwSaAhd1I/WfSUXgQp2VI/AAAAAAABWY8/ry86hrOZBLEg0GITw5VCe3Gx3pEvbFKZwCLcBGAs/s1600/downfjload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-J1YwSaAhd1I/WfSUXgQp2VI/AAAAAAABWY8/ry86hrOZBLEg0GITw5VCe3Gx3pEvbFKZwCLcBGAs/s400/downfjload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Prescriptive analytics, goes beyond\npredicting future outcomes by also suggesting actions to benefit from the\npredictions and showing the implications of each decision option.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Prescriptive analytics suggests decision\noptions on how to take advantage of a future opportunity or mitigate a future\nrisk and shows the implication of each decision option.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Prescriptive analytics\ncan continually take in new data to re-predict and re-prescribe, thus\nautomatically improving prediction accuracy and prescribing better decision\noptions.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Prescriptive analytics ingests hybrid data, a combination of\nstructured (numbers, categories) and unstructured data (videos, images, sounds,\ntexts), and business rules to predict what lies ahead and to prescribe how to\ntake advantage of this predicted future without compromising other priorities.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Prescriptive analytics technologies need to\nbe adaptive to take into account the growing volume, velocity, and variety of\ndata that most mission critical processes and their environments may produce.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Prescriptive analytics incorporates both\nstructured and unstructured data, and uses a combination of advanced analytic\ntechniques and disciplines to predict, prescribe, and adapt..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The technology\nbehind prescriptive analytics synergistically combines hybrid data, business\nrules with mathematical models and computational models. The data inputs to\nprescriptive analytics may come from multiple sources: internal, such as inside\na corporation; and external, also known as environmental data. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In addition to this variety of data types and\ngrowing data volume, incoming data can also evolve with respect to velocity,\nthat is, more data being generated at a faster or a variable pace.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Business\nrules define the business process and include objectives constraints,\npreferences, policies, best practices, and boundaries.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Mathematical models and\ncomputational models are techniques derived from mathematical sciences,\ncomputer science and related disciplines such as applied statistics, machine\nlearning, operations research, natural language processing, computer vision,\npattern recognition, image processing, speech recognition, and signal\nprocessing.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The correct application of all these methods and the verification\nof their results implies the need for resources on a massive scale including\nhuman, computational and temporal for every Prescriptive Analytic project.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In\norder to spare the expense of dozens of people, high performance machines and\nweeks of work one must consider the reduction of resources and therefore a reduction\nin the accuracy or reliability of the outcome. The preferable route is a\nreduction that produces a probabilistic result within acceptable limits.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\"><b>Below: When you have CUNTS in charge --whose brains are worse than SHIT you need machines</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\"><b>Capt Ajit Vadakayil never allowed a machine to run his ship</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Bq-GkA5uDBQ/WfSSGuonbPI/AAAAAAABWYo/QZkUyr7A06QG7nNKBogK_pKVv6OVAfLYACLcBGAs/s1600/GIMw%2Bchallenge_1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"355\" data-original-width=\"871\" height=\"260\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Bq-GkA5uDBQ/WfSSGuonbPI/AAAAAAABWYo/QZkUyr7A06QG7nNKBogK_pKVv6OVAfLYACLcBGAs/s640/GIMw%2Bchallenge_1.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Td_vrVMMhDU/WfST_-w4zxI/AAAAAAABWY0/n1dD3cVX1U8gHo_J5lgZn_zRbA2upEizgCLcBGAs/s1600/dohwnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Td_vrVMMhDU/WfST_-w4zxI/AAAAAAABWY0/n1dD3cVX1U8gHo_J5lgZn_zRbA2upEizgCLcBGAs/s400/dohwnload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Prescriptive analytics outcomes don't just\ninform those involved in the decision-making process, they are the\ndecision-making process.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-0wKu_AiMySI/WfSdKWi6BOI/AAAAAAABWZY/yAjAGTBwHhQxeqMRP9Kog4M_h5eL4YgwACLcBGAs/s1600/valuRe_difficult_3_856374.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"942\" data-original-width=\"1560\" height=\"386\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-0wKu_AiMySI/WfSdKWi6BOI/AAAAAAABWZY/yAjAGTBwHhQxeqMRP9Kog4M_h5eL4YgwACLcBGAs/s640/valuRe_difficult_3_856374.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Prescriptive analytics&nbsp; examines data from a wide variety of internal\nand external sources and uses a number of different techniques; from machine\nlearning, image processing, applied statistics and natural language processing.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Prescriptive analytics not only tries to predict what will happen but also\nunderstand why it will happen and present different options on how to take\nadvantage of future opportunities.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The pandits say\u2014\u201cThe ongoing advance of AI is\nalso having a further impact: it\u2019s causing AI to converge with IoT, to the\nextent that it\u2019s rapidly becoming indispensable to IoT solutions. The core\ncomponents of IoT\u2014connectivity, sensor data and robotics\u2014will ultimately lead\nto a requirement for almost all \u2018dumb\u2019 devices to become intelligent. In other\nwords, the IoT needs smart machines. Hence the need for AI\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">WHEN YOU ALLOW A CUNT MACHINE TO DO \u201cROOT\nCAUSE ANALYSIS\u201d&nbsp; AND ACT,&nbsp; YOU CAN KISS YOUR ASSHOLE GOODBYE !</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; AS COMPUTERSARE NOT\nCONSCIOUS LIKE THE HUMAN BRAIN<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot;
