, serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">THAT WE WILL MAKE CHINA SELF DESTRUCT AND HANG ALL COMMIE LEADERS USING THEIR OWN\nPEOPLE , AS SOON AS A FULL BLOWN WAR STARTS. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">( PSSST APCO MODI STILL THINKS THAT HIS 56\nINCH CHEST AND SIDEKICK &nbsp;AMIT SHAHs CLOUT\nSCARED THE COMMIE SHIT OUT OF THE CHINESE ) </span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Mlb9f2X_J5E/WfT6FQid7dI/AAAAAAABWaI/7EtvVCjArOM987fONimZ_-hdOOb3lrmhgCLcBGAs/s1600/imjages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"170\" data-original-width=\"297\" height=\"228\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Mlb9f2X_J5E/WfT6FQid7dI/AAAAAAABWaI/7EtvVCjArOM987fONimZ_-hdOOb3lrmhgCLcBGAs/s400/imjages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/07/can-china-afford-war-with-india-come-on.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/07/can-china-afford-war-with-india-come-on.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/08/can-china-afford-war-with-india-come-on.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/08/can-china-afford-war-with-india-come-on.html</a><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/--RqbfW9XqjQ/WfT40VYDiDI/AAAAAAABWZw/02Z2PGiny4Y6yeHoMJfB9xWPEI2W8lwrwCLcBGAs/s1600/This-Changes-Everuything.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"342\" data-original-width=\"456\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/--RqbfW9XqjQ/WfT40VYDiDI/AAAAAAABWZw/02Z2PGiny4Y6yeHoMJfB9xWPEI2W8lwrwCLcBGAs/s640/This-Changes-Everuything.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The right way to view blockchain, though, is\nto see blockchain as a technology and cryptocurrency as the first business\ndomain where it was successfully applied. The features of blockchain are\napplicable to any industry, and they specifically address the concerns about\ndata correctness and security that limit the use and sharing of big data.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">After all, blockchain is essentially a\ndistributed database forming a ledger. Changes to the ledger need to be agreed\nupon by every participant in the blockchain, which is reached through a\nconsensus mechanism such as Proof of Work or Proof of Stake. In addition, the\nhash algorithm and timestamp ensures that data on a blockchain is immutable,\nverifiable and traceable. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">However, it important to note that\nlow-quality data isn\u2019t magically transformed into high-quality data.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Garbage in\nstill means garbage out.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">As such, it is vital that data is verified when it is\nacquired to ensure that bad data is not recorded on the blockchain.</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">Organizations that want to apply Blockchain-</span><span style=\"color: red;\">ULU</span><span style=\"color: blue;\">\n( or is it Blockchain-</span><span style=\"color: red;\">UDU</span><span style=\"color: blue;\"> ? ) &nbsp;within\ntheir organization, will need to ensure that their big data is correct and of\nthe highest standards, since once on a blockchain it can no longer be altered.&nbsp;</span></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">If done correctly, Blockchain could be a catalyst for better data, resulting in\nbetter insights.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The rise of cloud storage has helped\ncompanies collect and manage massive amounts of data. Data comes from corporate\nsystems, Internet of Things objects and unstructured sources like online\nforums. New analytics tools like Hadoop help companies make sense of that data.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/FHVuRxJpiwI/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/FHVuRxJpiwI?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Since the advent of the internet, the\ntechnology industry has been steadily moving away from local storage to remote,\nserver-based storage and processing\u2014what is known as the cloud.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">You no longer need to be sitting at your work\nPC to see your work files: With cloud syncing you can get to them from your\nsmartphone on the train, from your tablet on your couch, and from the laptop in\nyour hotel room or kitchen. Using a service like those included here means no\nmore having to email files to yourself or plug and unplug USB thumb drives.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/MfF750YVDxM/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/MfF750YVDxM?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Cloud storage is a model of data storage in\nwhich the digital data is stored in logical pools, the physical storage spans\nmultiple servers (and often locations), and the physical environment is\ntypically owned and managed by a hosting company. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">These cloud storage providers are responsible\nfor keeping the data available and accessible, and the physical environment\nprotected and running. People and organizations buy or lease storage capacity\nfrom the providers to store user, organization, or application data.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Cloud storage services may be accessed\nthrough a co-located cloud computer service, a web service application\nprogramming interface (API) or by applications that utilize the API, such as\ncloud desktop storage, a cloud storage gateway or Web-based content management\nsystems.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/KIb6Gkdfkds/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/KIb6Gkdfkds?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The cloud part of cloud-based storage\nservices refers to storing your files somewhere other than your computer's hard\ndrive, usually on the provider's servers. &nbsp;There is no DANG Cloud. It's just someone\nelse's computer.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Having data in the cloud refers to the\nability to access those files through the internet. Your data is usually\nencrypted before making the journey over the internet to the providers'\nservers, and, while they live on those servers, they're also encrypted. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The services don't upload entire files every\ntime they change. They just upload the changes, saving your connection\nbandwidth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">You can access your cloud files through an\napp or software installed on your computer (once it's installed, it's usually\npretty much invisible), though you need an internet connection for it to work. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Many cloud storage services have a free\naccount that usually comes with some limitations, such as the amount of storage\nthey provide or a size limit on files you can upload.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-zUd6CiAujfc/WfT5GmBgMdI/AAAAAAABWZ4/660wvT6EzBUm_UCyp_q2Dh4GFDDs0LYxACLcBGAs/s1600/iumages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"249\" data-original-width=\"202\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-zUd6CiAujfc/WfT5GmBgMdI/AAAAAAABWZ4/660wvT6EzBUm_UCyp_q2Dh4GFDDs0LYxACLcBGAs/s400/iumages.jpg\" width=\"324\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The first place to look at applying\nblockchain to big data is finance. Every Bitcoin transaction is held within\nBitcoin\u2019s blockchain.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">While Bitcoin offers a level of anonymity, the\ntransaction data is not private; Bitcoin is pseudo-anonymous. With sufficient\ndata, is it possible to find patterns in Bitcoin transactions and eventually\nlink those to people.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">There are multiple companies working on such solutions,\nsuch as Skry, which was recently purchased by Bloq. Skry offers big data\nBitcoin analytics to help companies avoid transactions with criminal\ncounterparties.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The case for the cloud so far has been based\non its potential to lower computing costs and increase business flexibility.&nbsp; &nbsp;By\ntapping into a large cloud computing company, such as Amazon Web Services\n(AWS), clients have hoped to move more quickly and cheaply to increase or\ndecrease their computing resources as their needs change.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The most recent change, has involved a\ncombination of cloud and mobile, with smartphones acting as the delivery\nmechanism for services in the cloud.&nbsp; This\nis starting to evolve into the next thing-- this will be the combination of\nartificial intelligence (AI) and the cloud.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Microsoft y offers more than 20 such \u201ccognitive\nservices\u201d, such as analysing images, known as computer vision, and language\ncomprehension. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Cloud-delivered services like these are\nstarting to proliferate. Companies have &nbsp;added predictive analytics \u2014 data mining to\nforecast trends \u2014 to its cloud services, opening up machine-learning algorithms\nfirst developed for internal use. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Google said its speech recognition API could\nturn a client\u2019s audio file into a written transcript in 50 languages.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Such technologies have many potential\napplications. Facial recognition technology, for instance, could lead to more\neffective security and access control systems. In retail, this same technology\ncould alert staff to the identity or interests of potential customers and help\nthem make a sale.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">AI can also have much higher accuracy around\nthings like image recognition coming &nbsp;back from drones. When there is a tactical nuclear\n&nbsp;EMP attack GPS goes PHUTT.&nbsp; After that it will be land recognition for\nnavigation<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Read all 4 parts of the post below--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/11/world-war-3-sans-gps-and-emp-taken-out.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/11/world-war-3-sans-gps-and-emp-taken-out.html</a><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The API is intended to provide programmatic\naccess to published economic statistics using industry-standard methods and\nprocedures. The intended audience of this document is programmers who are\nfamiliar with the concepts and techniques of retrieving data from Web Services.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">An application program interface (API) is code that allows two software\nprograms to communicate with each other. The API defines the correct way for a\ndeveloper to write a program that requests services from an operating system\n(OS) or other application.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">When you use an application on your mobile phone,\nthe application connects to the Internet and sends data to a server. The server\nthen retrieves that data, interprets it, performs the necessary actions and\nsends it back to your phone.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The application then interprets that data and\npresents you with the information you wanted in a readable way. This is what an\nAPI is - all of this happens via API.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/TbVtliFXOOY/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/TbVtliFXOOY?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Application Programming Interface&nbsp; acts as an interface and usually function to connect large amounts of relevant\ninformation with Internet of things. This makes it more useful and powerful.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In\ncomputer programming, an application programming interfaceis a set of\nsubroutine definitions, protocols, and tools for building application software.\nIn general terms, it is a set of clearly defined methods of communication\nbetween various software components.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A good API makes it easier to develop a\ncomputer program by providing all the building blocks, which are then put\ntogether by the programmer. An API may be for a web-based system, operating system,\ndatabase system, computer hardware or software library.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">An API specification\ncan take many forms, but often includes specifications for routines, data\nstructures, object classes, variables or remote calls.. APIs have become so\nvaluable that they comprise a large part of many business\u2019 revenue.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Major\ncompanies like Google, eBay, Salesforce.com, Amazon, and Expedia are just a few\nof the companies that make money from their APIs<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">API\u2019s are considered as market enabler and\nare quintessential part of Internet of Things, without which they cannot work.\nModern APIs adhere to standards (typically HTTP and REST), that are\ndeveloper-friendly, easily accessible and understood broadly<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-5LeMBMmpcZc/WfT5YXbxtAI/AAAAAAABWZ8/qz1iQpiJedAh-WTFtMhp2gJK5S4gmQ4OwCLcBGAs/s1600/imgages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-5LeMBMmpcZc/WfT5YXbxtAI/AAAAAAABWZ8/qz1iQpiJedAh-WTFtMhp2gJK5S4gmQ4OwCLcBGAs/s400/imgages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Artificial intelligence (AI) refers to the\nability of computers to perform tasks usually associated with human\nintelligence. Today\u2019s AI-enabled computers can recognize images, understand\nlanguage, and perform complex reasoning while making decisions based on\nsophisticated mathematical analyses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Apps driven platform is getting replaced by\nArtificial Intelligence driven platform.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Oracle Management Cloud is an example of an\nAI-powered application available as a cloud service. It combines big-data\nprocessing techniques with machine learning to help companies detect anomalies\nin very large data sets that indicate problems on a manufacturing line, for\nexample, or patterns that indicate system security has been breached. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Oracle Management Cloud helps end users\nquickly address critical problems whose solutions are hidden in data sets too\nlarge for humans to evaluate. The software can notify a systems operator to\ntake corrective action or even fix the problem automatically. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Oracle\u2019s management capabilities include\nsecurity services. Oracle\u2019s Cloud Access Security Broker uses machine learning\nto enhance its threat- and data-protection capabilities.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Oracle embeds\nmachine-learning capabilities into Oracle Database, where moving analytics\ncloser to the data helps customers get fast, accurate answers to business\nquestions and make fact-based predictions about the future.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Oracle is introducing the world\u2019s first\nautonomous database with machine learning built in. With the autonomous\ndatabase, users just define policies and the database makes things happen. It\nis fully-managed, preconfigured, and automatically tuned.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">With Oracle Analytics Cloud, powerful\nanalytics tools do the hard work behind the scenes while business users simply\nask the computer a question. The answers can be in English or the end-user\u2019s\nnative language. Or the answers can be displayed as graphs, charts, or other\nvisual representations. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Sophisticated visualization tools allow the\nsystem to automatically select the best way to display the data in graphs or\ncharts. The system will also generate a detailed description of the analytics\nfindings for study and discussion.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Because business decisions are only as sound\nas the data they are based on, the more information available to analyze, the\nbetter the conclusions and recommendations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Good platforms provide enormous value by\nlinking IoT to advanced analytics and applications to generate business\noutcomes. This enables the generated data to be meaningfully used by the users.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Platforms must be able and efficient enough\nto add close loop automation, privacy, security, cognitive and insight\ngeneration.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">IoT can act as an agent to transform\nbusiness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The commoditization of sensors, memory and\nprocessors has made things more intelligent rather than just being connected in\na network and being identified with their IP addresses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Traditional IoT implementations are\naccompanied by cognitive computing which increases the amount of data that\nhelps in improving the learning environment and increases the possibilities of\nedge analytics.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Multiple data streams can be combined with\ncognitive IoT.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">Sensors can be made capable of diagnosing and\ngetting adapted with the environment, without human interference.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">IoT value is further showcased by artificial\nintelligence, cognitive IoT and machine learning. To make use of existing IoT\ndata and information new approaches are required.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">There is a need to&nbsp; reduce both sensors\u2019 power needs and the need\nfor the AI system to process a lot of \u201cbackground noise\u201d data that has little\nor no value (the data processing&nbsp; will\nincreasingly be done \u201cat the edge,\u201d where it\u2019s collected, to avoid overloading\nthe system). Both IoT and AI will benefit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">More advanced sensors will also play a role\nin the IoT-AI synthesis: There exists DARPA research on sensors for\nlife-or-death situational awareness in battlefield conditions, where computing\npower is limited and soldiers can be killed if they have to replace sensor\nbatteries.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">These new sensors \u2014 which must work 24/7 to protect the troops \u2014\nhave: \u201cpersistent, event-driven sensing capabilities in which the sensor can\nremain dormant, with near-zero power consumption, until awakened by an external\ntrigger or stimulus.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Companies that want to make use of big data\nand blockchain will find new tools developed to support this, such as\nBigChainDB built on top of MongoDB. By adding the features needed for\nenterprise development, including scalability, queryability, and audit trails,\nit will become easier for organizations to build blockchain-based applications\nthat meet corporate standards.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The spread of these tools, along with the\ncontinued push for digital transformation that requires companies to make\nbetter use of digitally generated and collected data, will drive companies to\nadopt blockchain in order to effectively out-compete others in their\nindustries.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Being able to analyze data provenance and be\nensured that the data is reliable by being immutable, verifiable and traceable\nis a paradigm shift. Blockchain could be a catalyst for data quality and as\nsuch, the convergence of big data and blockchain offers tremendous\nopportunities for organizations and consumers.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Just as companies that are\nhanging back on the IoT are still paving the way for adopting it by acquiring\nsophisticated data analysis tools and hiring data scientists to interpret the\ngrowing amount of data they are already generating, investing now in\ncloud-based AI capability will allow an easier transition to the IoT and the\neven greater quantities of data it will generate.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Viewing blockchain as simply a database means\nit is applicable to any industry, not just finance. By storing granular\ntransaction data, any industry can understand its interactions with suppliers\nand its customers..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">With Walmart producing 40 petabytes of data daily, managing\nbig data is integral to the store\u2019s continued success and having immutable,\nverifiable and traceable product data on a blockchain could offer <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In the UK, Google DeepMind and the NHS are\npartnering to use blockchain to encrypt and safely store patient data. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>HAVING SAILED AND DEALT WITH WHITE MEN\nTHROUGHOUT MY LIFE , I CAN TELL THIS<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>THE AVERAGE WHITE MAN CANT STRETCH HIS BRAINS\n( LIKE AN INDIAN ) AND HENCE THE NEED TO HAVE CHECKLISTS FOR EVERYTHING AT SEA <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>INSTEAD OF PUTTING HIS UNDIES FIRST AND THEN\nHIS PANTS LIKE A SANE HUMAN BEING \u2014 LACK OF CHECK LIST MAY CAUSE HIM TO PUT HIS\nUNDIES ON TOP OF HIS PANTS LIKE PHANTOM<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>ASK ME<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;
