, serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/05/hot-work-permit-on-chemical-tankers.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/05/hot-work-permit-on-chemical-tankers.html</a><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>ENGINEERS WANTED MY TO WRITE CHECKLISTS \u2013&nbsp; BECAUSE,\nAS A DECK BOY , &nbsp;I HAD NO PRE-CONCEIVED\nNOTIONS .<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;IF &nbsp;SOMEONE MADE A MISTAKE FOR 30 YEARS , I WOULD\nSTOP IT ON&nbsp; DAY ONE,&nbsp; HOUR ONE \u2014</span></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><br /></span></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\">I DID NOT CARE FOR THAT POWERFUL CUNTs REPUTATION , WHICH\nWOULD BE SMASHED TO SMITHEREENS BY MY OWN </span><span style=\"font-size: 18.6667px;\">INTELLIGENT</span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;CHECKLIST<o:p></o:p></span></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>MOST SAILORS DIED AT SEA, BECAUSE THEY\nFOLLOWED OFFICIAL PROCEDURES \u2013&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>THIS IS A VERY SERIOUS CHARGE COMING FROM A CAPTAIN WHO HOLDS THE WORLD RECORD FOR SHIP COMMAND .<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/me-crankcase-oil-mist-detector-alarm-on.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/me-crankcase-oil-mist-detector-alarm-on.html</a><o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>EVEN A STUPID CUNT CAN UNDERSTAND THE\nCONTENTS OF THE POST BELOW\u2014BUT OH NO\u2014NOT THE CUNT WHITE POWERS WHO RUN SHIPS AT\nSEA<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/naive-sailor-cargo-tank-explosions-capt.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/naive-sailor-cargo-tank-explosions-capt.html</a><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-vG3e4yBDTaU/WF61PSK1MlI/AAAAAAABP5g/DNh5i6N7VbEuFyZOlv1_bosR9sG0B50GgCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7934737102240359761\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_2M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/me-crankcase-oil-mist-detector-alarm-on.html?showComment=1485514403815#c7934737102240359761\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 27, 2017 at 4:23 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_2MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/naive-sailor-low-sulphur-fuels-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\nFOR MARINE ENGINEERS ONLY<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">STEP MOTHERLY TREATMENT </span></b>GIVEN TO THE BOILER FURNACE -- WHILE MOTHERLY TREATMENT IS GIVEN TO THE MAIN ENGINE CRANKCASE<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><b>boiler ACC does NOT understand the FIRE TRIANGLE,&nbsp;the way the main engine crank case understands it.</b></span><br />\n<br />\nthe crank case equates a hot spot to HEAT, the FUEL&nbsp;is already there, and wont allow the third leg of OXYGEN&nbsp;to make up the fire triangle for at least 30 minutes.<br />\n<br />\nwhile boiler ACC ( step motherly treatment ) is desperate&nbsp;to PURGE with FD fan ASAP -- ( a dribbling nozzle can&nbsp;produce a STEADY glowing lump underneath which wont&nbsp;activate the photo electric cell flame sensor and <span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>NOT gate</b></span>&nbsp;of&nbsp; \" NO FLAME / NO FUEL \" ( reminds me of NO&nbsp;WORK/ NO PAY ! ) HO solenoid ,<br />\n<br />\n-- or if the burner assembly is set back in too much,&nbsp;a circle of incendive heated lifeless plastic refractory&nbsp;provides the HEAT leg ). unburnt explosive gases is&nbsp;already there-- and as soon as FD fan gives the purge&nbsp;-- <span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>BOOOOOOM!</b></span><br />\n<br />\nWHEN THE HIGH TEMP ALARM COMES FOR THE MAIN ENGINE CRANKCASE--THE HOT SPOT IS ALLOWED TO COOK--<br />\n<br />\nTHE ENGINE ROOM IS ABANDONED FOR 30 MINUTES<br />\n<br />\nI WAS ASKED AS A DECK BOY TO LAY DOWN ENGINE ROOM SAFETY PROCEDURES .. I AM NOT AN ENGINEER..<br />\n<br />\nMORE THAN 20 ENGINEER SUPERINTENDENTS OF THE SHORE OFFICE SULKED FOR MONTHS<br />\n<br />\nWHAT IS BELOW IS NOT FOUND IN BOOKS ---IT COMES FROM THE FERTILE BRAINS OF A BAD BOY HARDCORE CAPTAIN NAMED VADAKAYIL<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/me-crankcase-oil-mist-detector-alarm-on.html<br />\n<br />\nKOI SHAKH ?<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>SOMETIMES WHEN I GO FOR A LONG WALK WITH MY\nWIFE , I LOVE TO TELL HER THIS<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>YOURS TRULY --&nbsp; \u201cI AM GONNA SAY SOMETHING NOW\u2014 CAN YOU GUESS\nIT ?\u201c<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">Me WIFE WOULD REPLY&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\u201c AFTER 4 DECADES AT SEA,&nbsp; I AM STILL IN ONE\nPIECE \u201c</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The bitcoin network is a peer-to-peer payment\nnetwork that operates on a cryptographic protocol. Users send and receive bitcoins,\nthe units of currency, by broadcasting digitally signed messages to the network\nusing bitcoin cryptocurrency wallet software. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Transactions are recorded into a distributed,\nreplicated public database known as the blockchain, with consensus achieved by\na proof-of-work system called mining.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; \n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">To form a distributed timestamp server as a\npeer-to-peer network, bitcoin uses a proof-of-work system. This work is often\ncalled bitcoin mining. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The signature is discovered rather than\nprovided by knowledge. This process is energy intensive. &nbsp;Electricity can consume more than 90% of\noperating costs for miners. Requiring a proof of work to provide the signature\nfor the blockchain was a key innovation. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Some malware can steal private keys for\nbitcoin wallets allowing the bitcoins themselves to be stolen. The most common\ntype searches computers for cryptocurrency wallets to upload to a remote server\nwhere they can be cracked and their coins stolen. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Many of these also log keystrokes to record\npasswords, often avoiding the need to crack the keys. A different approach\ndetects when a bitcoin address is copied to a clipboard and quickly replaces it\nwith a different address, tricking people into sending bitcoins to the wrong\naddress. This method is effective because bitcoin transactions are irreversible..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;One\nvirus, spread through the Pony botnet, was reported in February 2014 to have\nstolen up to $220,000 in cryptocurrencies including bitcoins from 85 wallets. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Authorities, including the European Banking\nAuthority&nbsp; the FBI, and the Financial\nAction Task Force of the G7 have expressed concerns that bitcoin may be used\nfor money laundering. In early 2014, an operator of a U.S. bitcoin exchange,\nCharlie Shrem, was arrested for money laundering<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In a Ponzi scheme that utilized bitcoins, The\nBitcoin Savings and Trust promised investors up to 7 percent weekly interest,\nand raised at least 700,000 bitcoins from 2011 to 2012. In July 2013 the U.S.\nSecurities and Exchange Commission charged the company and its founder in 2013\n\"with defrauding investors in a Ponzi scheme involving bitcoin\". &nbsp;In September 2014 the judge fined Bitcoin\nSavings &amp; Trust and its owner $40 million for operating a bitcoin Ponzi\nscheme.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Theft &nbsp;occurs at sites where bitcoins are used to\npurchase illicit goods. In late November 2013, an estimated $100 million in\nbitcoins were allegedly stolen from the online illicit goods marketplace Sheep\nMarketplace, which immediately closed<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A major bitcoin exchange, Bitfinex, was\nhacked and nearly 120,000 bitcoins (around $60m) was stolen in 2016. Bitfinex\nwas forced to suspend its trading. The theft is the second largest bitcoin heist\never, dwarfed only by Mt. Gox theft in 2014.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Mt. Gox was a bitcoin exchange based in\nShibuya, Tokyo, Japan. Launched in July 2010, by 2013 and into 2014 it was\nhandling over 70% of all bitcoin transactions worldwide, as the largest bitcoin\nintermediary and the world's leading bitcoin exchange.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Mt. Gox announced that approximately 850,000\nbitcoins belonging to customers and the company were missing and likely stolen,\nan amount valued at more than $450 million at the time. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Almost from the beginning, Mt Gox's accounts\nwere leaking money, and as the currency grew in value, the leak turned into one\nof the largest bank heists ever \u2014 more than 1 out of every 20 bitcoins in the\nworld vanished without a trace.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Hackers are using virus-infected consumer\ncomputers to generate bitcoin, according to news from The Wall Street Journal.\nUnknowing users may be having their processing power commandeered to mine the\nvirtual currency.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"https://www.pymnts.com/news/bitcoin-tracker/2017/hackers-use-malware-to-mine-bitcoin/\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://www.pymnts.com/news/bitcoin-tracker/2017/hackers-use-malware-to-mine-bitcoin/</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Currently smart contracts can only make\npayments in cryptocurrencies (BTC, ETH, etc), and other balances stored on\nblockchains, sometimes called coins or tokens. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Bitcoin\u2019s contracts can make BTC payments.\nEthereum smart contracts can make ETH payments, or move around coin/token\nbalances which are recorded on Ethereum.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Ethereum utilises blockchain technology and\ncryptography similar to Bitcoin, but is unique in its inherent properties.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Ethereum is an open-ended and decentralised platform for blockchain applications\n(like android or iOS for their respective apps). It was created with the\nintention of making it simpler to create and host these applications.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Ether is used inside the Ethereum platform as\na token to run these applications and monetize the work.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Ether, is the token of value used for\nmonetizing work in the Ethereum platform and it is traded just like Bitcoin and\nother cryptocurrencies.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Ether is a form of payment that is different\nfrom Bitcoin, since it is made by the clients using the Ethereum platform to\nexecute smart contracts and distributed applications developed within the\nplatform.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It is traded as a digital currency on\nexchanges, just like Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Smart contracts cannot make payments\ndenominated in fiat currencies (GBP, SGD, USD, etc), because digital fiat\ncurrencies, in general, reside in bank accounts, and bank accounts are\ncurrently recorded on private ledgers \u2013 not distributed ledgers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Although both Bitcoin and Ethereum are\nblockchains that utilize cryptography, the two differ in several ways<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">1. The primary purpose of the Ether, the\nEthereum token, is not to establish itself as a payment alternative (unlike\nBitcoin) but to facilitate and monetize the working of Ethereum platform to\nenable developers to build and run distributed applications.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">2. The time taken to verify a transaction\n(block time) is in seconds for Ether transactions on the Ethereum blockchain\nwhereas it can go to minutes for Bitcoin transactions on the Bitcoin\nblockchain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">3. The programming language used by Ethereum\nis called \u2018Solidity\u2019 which is Turing complete i.e. you can write programs\n(smart contracts) that can solve any reasonable computational problem; whereas,\nBitcoin is not yet Turing-ready. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Ether is a global currency that is traded for\nthe Dollar, Euro, Yen, and other currencies in real-time, 24 hours a day. Like\nany commodity, stocks or property, the value of Ether is determined by buying\nand selling in the open market. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The price fluctuation in Ether is real-time\nand based on the number of people who want to buy or sell it at any given\nmoment. It follows the laws of economics where the value of a stock or property\ncan go up or down based on supply and demand. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Ether value can be volatile compared to\ntraditional currencies such as the USD because it is still an emerging\ntechnology.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2017/06/22/ethereum-price-crash-10-cents-gdax-exchange-after-multimillion-dollar-trade.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://www.cnbc.com/2017/06/22/ethereum-price-crash-10-cents-gdax-exchange-after-multimillion-dollar-trade.html</a><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/0UBk1e5qnr4/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/0UBk1e5qnr4?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Ethereum is NOT a digital currency. It is a\nblockchain-based platform with many aspects. It features smart contracts, the\nEthereum Virtual Machine (EVM) and it uses its currency called ether for\npeer-to-peer contracts.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Ethereum\u2019s smart contracts use blockchain stored applications\nfor contract negotiation and facilitation. The benefit of these contracts is\nthat the blockchain provides a decentralized way to verify and enforce them.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The decentralized aspect makes it incredibly difficult for fraud or censorship.\nEthereum\u2019s smart contracts aim to provide greater security than traditional\ncontracts and bring down the associated costs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The smart contract applications are powered\nby ether, Ethereum\u2019s blockchain based cryptocurrency. Ether, as well as other\ncrypto-assets, are held in the Ethereum Wallet, which allows you to create and\nuse smart contracts.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Bitcoin\u2019s average block time is about 10 minutes, while\nEthereum\u2019s aims to be 12 seconds. This quick time is enabled by Ethereum\u2019s\nGHOST protocol. A faster block time means that confirmations are quicker.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Ethereum features its own Turing complete\ninternal code, which means that anything can be calculated with enough\ncomputing power and enough time. Bitcoin does not have this capability.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">While\nthere are certainly advantages to the Turing-complete, its complexity also\nbrings security complications, which contributed to the DAO attack in June.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Bitcoin has emerged as a relatively stable\ndigital currency, while Ethereum aims to encompass more, with ether just a\ncomponent of its smart contract applications.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/eeZ4V2Ka40Y/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/eeZ4V2Ka40Y?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In the Bitcoin blockchain, a small subset of\npeople with access, called \u201cMiners,\u201d compete to be the first to decrypt and\nverify new blocks successfully and they are literally rewarded with bitcoin for\ntheir efforts.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The entire blockchain then reaches consensus\nwithin a few minutes on the authenticity of a new block before making it\nimmutably part of the chain.&nbsp; Old\ntransactions are permanently preserved on each computer on the network, and new\ntransactions are irreversibly added.&nbsp; All\nof this prevents tampering. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In mathematics and computer science, an\nalgorithm is an unambiguous specification of how to solve a class of problems.\nAlgorithms can perform calculation, data processing and automated reasoning\ntasks. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/6hfOvs8pY1k/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/6hfOvs8pY1k?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">An algorithm is a procedure or formula for\nsolving a problem, based on conducting &nbsp;a\nsequence of specified actions. &nbsp;A\ncomputer program can be viewed as an elaborate algorithm. &nbsp;In mathematics and computer science, an\nalgorithm usually means a small procedure that solves a recurrent problem.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;A\nsearch engine algorithm, for example, takes search strings of keywords and\noperators as input, searches its associated database for relevant web pages,\nand returns results.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">An encryption algorithm transforms data\naccording to specified actions to protect it. A secret key algorithm such as\nthe U.S. Department of Defense's Data Encryption Standard (DES), for example,\nuses the same key to encrypt and decrypt data. As long as the algorithm is\nsufficiently sophisticated, no one lacking the key can decrypt the data.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The COMMIES have given away Algebra and\nAlgorithms to a DUMBO Arab mathematician, Mohammed ibn-Musa al-Khwarizmi.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Muhammad_ibn_Musa_al-Khwarizmi\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Muhammad_ibn_Musa_al-Khwarizmi</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The truth is that this Persian fellow bought\nhis entire knowledge for gold from Kodungallur University owned by the Calicut\nking.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THIS PLANET MUST KNOW THAT ALGORITHMS WERE\nFIRST INVENTED BY INDIANS&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">IT WAS STOLEN BY EUCLID WHO STUDIED IN\nKODUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY AND PATENTED IN HIS OWN NAME.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">LATER KODUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY SOLD MATH TO\nARABS FOR ENORMOUS AMOUNTS&nbsp; OF GOLD<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://magicalmethods.com/FREE/applications_in_sw/VM_in_digital_signal_processing.pdf\">http://magicalmethods.com/FREE/applications_in_sw/VM_in_digital_signal_processing.pdf</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://www.caeaccess.org/archives/volume5/number1/gaikwad-2016-cae-652140.pdf\">http://www.caeaccess.org/archives/volume5/number1/gaikwad-2016-cae-652140.pdf</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: lime;\">&nbsp;<a href=\"https://www.academia.edu/2349528/A_Digital_Multiplier_Architecture_using_Urdhva_Tiryakbhyam_Sutra_of_Vedic_Mathematics?auto=download\">https://www.academia.edu/2349528/A_Digital_Multiplier_Architecture_using_Urdhva_Tiryakbhyam_Sutra_of_Vedic_Mathematics?auto=download</a></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">FATHER OF ALGEBRA&nbsp; MUHAMMAD IBN MUSA AL-KHWARIZMI BOUGHT HIS\nREADY MADE TRANSLATED INTO ARABIC ALGEBRA FROM THE KERALA SCHOOL OF MATH FOR\nGOLD . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif;\">HE STUDIED IN THE SAME UNIVERSITY&nbsp;AND WAS\nKICKED OUT FOR BEING NOT GOOD ENOUGH TO BE A STUDENT </span></b></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">If Kerala Namboodiris created RIGHT to LEFT\nHebrew, then who created Arabic?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The answer is the same Kerala Namboodiris !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Pythagoras and Plato studied in Kodungallur\nUniversity of Kerala. &nbsp;&nbsp;Same way several\nPersian scholars studied Math in Kerala<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Arabic language was created by Kerala\nNamboodiris. Their numerals are called Hindu-Arabic even today.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>This is why 786 becomes OM<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>MUSLIMS DONT KNOW WHY 786 IS PRINTED ON THEIR KORAN COVERS&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><b>SHOW OM SYMBOL TO MIRROR AND READ FROM RIGHT TO LEFT -&nbsp; &nbsp;YOU GET 786</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/SNraVirlP8U/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/SNraVirlP8U?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Muslims substitute 786 for the phrase </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\u0628\u0633\u0645</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"> </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\u0627\u0644\u0644\u0647</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"> </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\u0627\u0644\u0631\u062d\u0645\u0646</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"> </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\u0627\u0644\u0631\u062d\u064a\u0645</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"> bism ill\u0101h\nir-ra\u1e25m\u0101n ir-ra\u1e25\u012bm (\"in the name of Allah, the compassionate, the\nmerciful\").</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">ALGEBRA is derived from Al-Jabr, one of the\ntwo operations he used to solve quadratic equations. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Algorism and algorithm stem from Algoritmi,\nthe Latin form of his name (Mohammed ibn-Musa al-Khwarizmi)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>Zakir Naik can stop boasting that Arab\nMuslims\u2014<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>AL HULL BURRR invented Math<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>AL KULL HURRR invented astronomy<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot;
