, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">--and get faalthu wahabi awards from the\nCRYPTO JEW Al Saud Dynasty.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Mind you\nthis man Zakir Naik is giving away his motherlands discoveries to an alien\nMuslim nations ruled by crypto Jew bloodlines installed by Rothschild.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The entire Math , astronomy , science in\nArabic was sold in gold by Kerala Kings.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/mansa-musa-king-of-mali-and-sri.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/mansa-musa-king-of-mali-and-sri.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">KERALA&nbsp;\nTEMPLE GOLD MADE JEW ROTHSCHILD THE RICHEST MAN ON THE PLANET<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/10/tipu-sultan-unmasked-capt-ajit.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/10/tipu-sultan-unmasked-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Smart contracts are digital contracts,\nwritten in code, whose clauses are enforced automatically Without human\nadjudication, we are left with hoping that code-authors in the payroll of\nKOSHER BIGBROTHER will be able to \u201cget it right\u201d with the code in our smart\ncontracts. But precise, safe, smart-contract coding is a challenge, and its\ndifficulty comes with real consequences. Consider the DAO, a DELIBERATELY&nbsp; mis-coded Ethereum smart contract mutual fund\nthat resulted in the theft of millions of dollars in 2016. As blockchain\ntechnologies mature from mathematical curiosities to practical applications,\nsmart contracts will need to mature as well.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\">INDIA MUST INCORPORATE THE \u201c<span style=\"color: red;\">PARAMOUNT CLAUS</span>E\n\u201c IN EVERY SMART CONTRACT WITH FOREIGN NATIONS AND KOSHER ORGS IN FUTURE&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\">EVERY\nAGREEMENT MUST BE SIGNED ONLY AFTER GLEANING THE DOCUMENT AND IF IT CONTAINS\n<span style=\"color: red;\">SHALL/ SHOULD TYPE OF CHICANERY</span> ( USED AT WTO NAIROBI ), THEN A \"PARAMOUNT\nCLAUSE \" MUST BE INSERTED , THAT BY SIGNING INDIA <span style=\"color: blue;\">\"SHALL\" NOT\nSURRENDER HER NATIONAL SOVEREIGNTY.</span></span></b><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Solidity is a high level language for public\nEthereum blockchain and all the Ethereum based applications are written in this\nlanguage.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">Nevertheless, it is very similar to the\npre-existing JavaScript.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Solidity is kind of an Object Oriented (OO)\nlanguage just like C++ and C#, whereas Javascript is based on HTML. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Solidity is designed specifically for\nEthereum applications and it runs only on the Ethereum blockchain whereas\nJavaScript is a universal language for the web and is being used in a large\nnumber of applications. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In case of solidity, the final result is\navailable on every node within the blockchain network. In contrast to this, the\nresult is only available on a single node in case of JavaScript.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Javascript, runs locally on your browser,\nSolidity runs on the ethereum blockchain. The great difference? The result is\navailable to any node on the ethereum blockchain, but with javascript, the\nresult is only on your device.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Java is a general purpose programming\nlanguage designed with one mantra in mind\u2014\u201dwrite once, run anywhere.\u201d Java\napplications are compiled into bytecode that can run on implementations of the\nJava Virtual Machine (JVM). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">JVM helps bridge the gap between source code\nand the 1s and 0s that the computer understands. Any machine that has the JVM\ninstalled can run Java. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In web development, Java features most\nprominently as a server-side language and the programming language of choice\nfor mobile apps on the Android platform.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Alongside HTML and CSS, JavaScript\n(standardized as ECMAScript) is considered one of the big three core components\nof the web. Employed by a majority of websites, JavaScript is a scripting\nlanguage that typically runs in the browser and makes web pages dynamic and\ninteractive.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Solidity is more similar to Java than\nJavascript.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Java and JavaScript were developed to serve\nentirely different purposes. Java was designed as a general purpose programming\nlanguage for building standalone applications, whereas JavaScript is a\nscripting language built specifically to interface with web technologies,\nnamely HTML.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Java is considered a compiled programming\nlanguage. JavaScript is considered an interpreted scripting language. The\ndifference is in the implementation: Java is compiled into bytecode and run on\na virtual machine, whereas JavaScript can be interpreted directly by a browser\nin the syntax it is written (although it is usually minified in practice).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Java follows class based inheritance\u2014a top\ndown, hierarchical, class-based relationship whereby properties are defined in\na class and inherited by an instance of that class (one of its members). &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In JavaScript, inheritance is prototypal\u2014all\nobjects can inherit directly from other objects. Hierarchy is accomplished in\nJavaScript by assigning an object as a prototype with a constructor function.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">JavaScript is&nbsp;\nweb technology, whereas Java is a general purpose language that can\nbuild anything.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">You should consider Java if your project\ninvolves\u2026</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Android Apps<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Enterprise Software<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Scientific Computing<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Big Data Analytics<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">General Purpose Programming of Hardware<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Server-Side Technologies like Apache, JBoss,\nGeronimo, GlassFish, etc.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">You should consider JavaScript if your\nproject involves\u2026</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Dynamic single page applications (SPAs)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Front-End technologies like jQuery,\nAngularJS, Backbone.js, Ember.js, ReactJS etc.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Server-Side technologies like Node.js,\nMongoDB, Express.js, etc.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Mobile App Development through PhoneGap,\nReact Native, etc.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">With\nthe internal model, the code element of the smart contract becomes an\ninextricable part of the legal contract. There is no possibility of difference\nbetween the code and the relevant part of the written contract because they are\none and the same.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">However,\nthere are two other potential areas of difference (or translation error) that\nare normally raised as potential issues:---<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;The first is illustrated by the question: \u201chow\ndo I know the code as written in the contract reflects my intentions if I\ncannot read it?\u201d &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This is really no more\nthan a reprise of the concern that the code, as written in the contract, might\nnot be as readily understandable to an average reader as natural human language\nis today.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">One way of resolving this is for the lawyer to have learnt the relevant\nlanguage used to write the code.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">To\nexecute automatically, smart contracts need to be able to interface with data\nin the wider world.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">For\nexample, a piece of conditional logic that depends on whether a particular\nstock price has reached a certain level would require the smart contract to be\nable to ascertain that stock price.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">To do\nthis, it can look up the stock price from a separate data source, typically\nknown in the distributed ledger community as an \u2018oracle\u2019.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">When a\ntransaction is entered into, it would be time stamped. This would mean that\nwhen the compiler prepares a compiled long-form transaction confirmation for\nthat transaction, it would use the version of each modular definition that was\ncurrent at that time stamp.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Such a\nsystem would allow the ISDA library to be updated on an ongoing basis rather\nthan requiring periodic updates of definitional booklets or the publication of\nannexes containing often disparate updates to certain definitions. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">If\nelements of the ISDA definitional booklets are coded to facilitate smart legal\ncontract implementation, this would lend itself to the idea that each\ndefinition could be viewed as a distinct module and could be kept in a\nuniversal repository.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">If\nthere are to be smart legal contract standards and technologies that can viably\nbe used for derivatives products, it is important that ISDA and the global\nderivatives industry play a key role in the development of these standards and\nwork closely with utilities and service providers in their development of the\napplicable technologies.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">ISDA\u2019s\nMarket Infrastructure and Technology Oversight Committee (MITOC) intends to\nfacilitate&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">this\ninvolvement, with smart contracts forming one part of the wider work</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nindustry needs to agree on common objectives, whether that be short-term\nsolutions to current infrastructure challenges or longer-term objectives\nassociated with process redesign, --this effort will be led by ISDA\u2019s Market\nInfrastructure and Technology Oversight Committee (MITOC).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Working\ngroups have been set up by ISDA to coordinate the various legal/documentation,\nregulatory, technological and reporting workstreams in order to futureproof standard\ndocumentation and align data standards. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Leave\nswindlers with fuck all -&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">Smart\ncontracts, which are, actually, a self-executing code on blockchain that\nautomatically implements the terms of an agreement between parties, can be used\nwhenever there is a clear cause-consequence logic.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">Imagine this: you want to\norder some goods from a new business partner, but there is always a trap of\nmistrust\u200a\u2014\u200ayou don\u2019t want to pay before getting your goods, and your partner\ndoesn\u2019t want to ship it until getting prepayment.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">What if it\u2019s a cheat? With\nsmart contracts, it\u2019s possible to sign an automatically performed and\nunbreakable agreement with certain predefined terms: as soon as you receive the\ndelivery, your counterparty gets the funds.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">As simple as that. No more fraud,\nmassive amounts of paperwork, and also intermediaries like banks, lawyers,\nbrokers, and notaries, which are usually associated with significant costs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">You\ndon\u2019t need to pay banks anymore--</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">Since\nthe core feature of smart contracts is automatization, it is also possible to\nautomate regular payments, which your company make to other parties. These\ninclude taxes and fees, mobile communication and Internet provider services,\nrental fee, utilities and any other services with a fixed amount and date of\npayment.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Although many banks already provide automatic bill payment service to\ntheir clients, they act as intermediaries here, earning their profits by\ncharging a fee. Smart contracts enable direct payments between companies and\nindividuals, with no middlemen involved. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Forget\nabout broker fees--</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">Another\nissue, which is even more costly and time-consuming for business than contracts\ndrafting and payments to other companies, is international trade and\nsettlements. According to McKinsey report, published at the beginning of 2017,\ncross-border B2B payments on blockchain could save financial institutions about\n$50\u201360 billion by 2021.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Regular companies will benefit by eliminating of\nbrokers to verify the transactions, which usually take a 2% to 5% fee, and\nspeeding up of delivery. While regular international payments usually take\nbetween 3 days and 2 weeks, depending on scope, smart contracts enable\nreal-time settlements, which would reduce liquidity and operational costs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Regular\nquestions like where to allocate funds, what contractor is better to work with,\nand how to prioritize your plans and goals may cause a lot of friction. Smart\ncontracts offer a perfect solution here: you can use a blockchain structure to\nmanage all these things by direct, decentralized voting of managers and\nshareholders, whose voting rights are represented in corporate tokens (the DAO\nconcept). Upon the decision is made, a smart contract automatically carries it\ninto action.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Notably, smart contracts almost exclude the possibility of voting\nfraud, which seems to be a major problem: according to a recent study made by\nStockholm School of Economics, called \u201cAre Shareholder Votes Rigged?\u201d\n(published in May 2017), about 11% of shareholder proposals were rejected\nduring the voting process in U.S. companies from 2003 to 2016 because of vote\nrigging by managers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Automatization\nof labor agreements. You can set up a labor smart contract, which will\nautomatically transfer to your employee a certain amount on a particular day,\nor, when using hourly wages, pay him/her per time actually spent at work.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">That\nwill save you from costs related to and also eliminate human factor errors,\nwhich are always very painful when it comes to paying wages. Moreover,\nautomatization of payments will significantly raise the company\u2019s reliability\nin the eyes of your current and potential employees.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">If\nyour business is built on production or distribution of some intellectual\nproperty, smart contracts can open up entirely new horizons. A wide range of\ncreative industries, including music, media, literature, science, photography,\nart, fashion, design and many many others, will benefit by a digital registry\nof artworks with certificates of their authenticity, condition, and ownership.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Say, if your business is a digital design agency, you will be able to set up\nsmart contracts in such a way, that the illegal use of your fonts,\nillustrations, or logos will be technically impossible. That is also very\napplicable to software development and film industries, where the annual losses\nin commercial revenue caused by piracy amount to $ 54billion USD&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Smart\ncontracts take care of your goods--</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">Supply\nchain, which is all entities and processes involved in getting an item from raw\nmaterials to final product, is sometimes extremely opaque and difficult to\ntrack. There are always numerous individuals, companies, and environments,\nwhich interact with a product as it moves to its customer, and the potential\nimpact of blockchain technology is multifold here.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">With the help of smart\ncontracts, you can track, for example, transportation and storage conditions of\nsome environmentally sensitive products (such as agricultural or medical\ngoods)\u200a\u2014\u200alike if the temperature in the truck carrying medicines is below or\nhigher the required degree, the smart contract will just not pay the carrier.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This application could be especially useful to decrease food losses and waste:,\napproximately a third of all produced food is either wasted or lost on the way\nto the customer\u2019s table, which costs the global economy&nbsp; more than one trillion USD&nbsp; a year.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">While\nnow it becomes obvious that smart contracts can generate significant value\nacross industries and eliminate most of the troubles related to human factor\nerrors, lack of trust or trackability in some fields, their mass adoption is\nstill constrained by many factors.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Probably, the most significant ones are\nexpensiveness and technological complexity of smart contracts development,\nwhich requires many working hours of a qualified blockchain developer&nbsp; with an <span style=\"background-color: white;\">average annual salary three times\nwhat a senior software developer gets in USA in a premium gold standard company in Manhattan&nbsp;</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">YES\nSMART CONTRACT SOFTWARE DEVELOPERS CAN MINT MOOLAH IF THEY ARE SMART</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">But\nthe good news is, as we learn from the history, every expensive and\nhard-to-reach technology eventually and inevitably becomes mainstream\u200a\u2014\u200ajust\nremember what a luxury it used to be to own a car, a cell phone, a computer..\nSmart contracts will become an ordinary thing for every small business sooner\nthan later <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Smart\ncontracts are becoming one of the most popular innovations on the Blockchain.\nIt\u2019s finding adoption in almost every sector and is being implemented by both\nsmall and large organisations.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">However, no matter how interesting the concept\nappears, with the automation of processes and execution, the need for\narbitration arises during disputes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In\ntraditional systems, when business relationships are challenged or fail,\nparties may seek justice and protection of their interests in courts of\narbitration and private settlements.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This\nnecessitates the development and implementation of judicial processes which\ninterpret contract terms and find ways to resolve such disputes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nrate of technological development has rendered traditional judicial systems too\nslow and most often inadequate in solving many issues, especially as smart\ncontracts are becoming prominent.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Disadvantages such as high cost of service,\nelongated duration of proceedings, delayed execution of judgement, among other\nsetbacks, make these traditional processes incompatible with today\u2019s systems.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">To\nsolve these problems, Jury.Online is creating a protocol for interaction\nbetween judges and the parties to deal, as well as a transparent, secure and\nconvenient platform for making deals using Blockchain and modern cryptographic\nsystems.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: x-large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: x-large;\">Jury.Online\nis a new service where any kind of small dispute can be resolved via its\nplatform by EXPERT jurors who SPECIALISE in different sectors.&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: x-large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-qB1UYNhILjQ/WfZI1dzm_lI/AAAAAAABWas/UeWHqLxgFXsIIN-XVtYxdV-ktJlI1Pa_wCLcBGAs/s1600/d7ownload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"234\" data-original-width=\"215\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-qB1UYNhILjQ/WfZI1dzm_lI/AAAAAAABWas/UeWHqLxgFXsIIN-XVtYxdV-ktJlI1Pa_wCLcBGAs/s400/d7ownload.jpg\" width=\"367\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Moreover, it\nwants to abolish the high prices that professional legal services charge for\nminor cases. What makes Jury.Online interesting is the manner in which it\nfunctions.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Deals are executed in the form of smart contracts via blockchain\nSmart contracts are executed with predetermined conditions by parties and\nblockchain data cannot be modified or altered, making the process safe and\nsecure.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;IT IS HIGH TIME WE DID AWAY WITH BOTTOM CEREBRAL BARREL DREGS LAWYERS\nAND JUDGES\u2014WHO DON\u2019T KNOW ASSHOLE FROM ELBOW , OR IF THEY ARE COMING OR\nGOING&nbsp; </span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Jury.Online\nis founded by Alexander Shevtsov, a mathematician and high-qualified specialist\nin cryptography, with a background in abstract and theoretical areas of\nmathematics.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Alexander is the author of several educational articles such\nas&nbsp; \u201cAdvanced encryption standard\u201d and\n\u201cHash Algorithms\u201d.&nbsp; A Blockchain\ndeveloper and enthusiast, Shevtsov also writes smart contracts on Ethereum.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Alexander\nShevtsov\u2019s idea is to digitalize some spheres of life which were not intended\nto be digitized. This has earned him the reputation of a \u201cromantic\nmathematician who sees the world in zeroes and ones\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Konstantin\nKudriavtsev is the project\u2019s CTO, and has a degree in technical cybernetics. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In\ngeneral, all the technologies separately (p2p Protocol, encryption, etc.) were\nknown. By combining them together, the technical world has received Blockchain\ntechnology as a breakthrough which no one can afford to miss.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Konstantin\nKudriavtsev is popularly described as a Blockchain enthusiast who wants to\ndevelop current solutions so they can be applied to Blockchain standards.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Secure\nand transparent arbitration--</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">Jury.Online\nis providing a platform for deals reinvention where disputes can be resolved\nvery quickly with minimal hassles.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Built\non the Blockchain, every information on the platform is open and accessible by\nany computer connected to the network, therefore contract and arbitration\nproceedings are transparent, secure and immutable.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nJury.Online platform creates workplaces where arbiters from around the world\ncan join and provide the price for which they are willing to work.\nCounterparties would make their choice of arbiters on an established cost of\nservice, and the jury\u2019s decision settles the dispute.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-_C-ihTHpz5Q/WfZIfNnP_GI/AAAAAAABWao/m1WuikabqQkY0PzasLycVIlQBJ11Z4bhgCLcBGAs/s1600/dodwnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nplatform is a decentralized arbiters market where anyone can apply to be an\narbiter within or without a pool to Jury.Online project, with a background and\nexperience description, and get a chance to become a professional arbiter.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-XrhfUuHhr2s/WfZLAtNaL-I/AAAAAAABWa4/FuTbRyAuRlAEWBJSBfb_Ypf1JHs2S7oAQCLcBGAs/s1600/Ju3ry-1-1200x628.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em;
