, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">FOR\nEXAMPLE\u2014&nbsp; WHO COULD BE A BETTER EXPERT ON MARITIME DISPUTES THAN CAPT AJIT\nVADAKAYIL..&nbsp; &nbsp; WHICH SHIT ASS LAWYER , JUDGE OR MARINE ADJUDICATOR CAN BE BETTER ?</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/S_WAy0KObW8/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/S_WAy0KObW8?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Oracle Blockchain Cloud Service can help\ncompanies reduce friction in business-to-business transactions by eliminating\nthe need for third-party intermediaries..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Oracle Blockchain Cloud Service\nprovides preassembled blockchain code that\u2019s optimized for many standard\nbusiness processes, including ERP transactions that traditionally require\nthird-party validation.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain addresses the problem of trust between\norganizations by providing independent validation through a tamper-resistant,\npeer-distributed ledger, thus eliminating the need for offline reconciliation.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain\ncan remove the need for intermediaries and replace it with cryptographically\nsecure protocols.. It will help companies extend the boundaries of their\nenterprises<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/cHtiuw5FK78/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/cHtiuw5FK78?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A type of guarantee crucial for creating\ntrust between new business clients,&nbsp;\nletters are being encoded on a blockchain as part of the trial with the\nhelp of Microsoft Azure's blockchain-as-a-service sandbox.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In essence, instead of letters being manually\nsent between multiple parties, they are being translated into smart contracts\non a private version of Ethereum blockchain.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Ethereum is a platform that is\nspecifically designed to make it possible for users to create their own\npermissioned blockchains (that is, blockchains with various degrees of\naccessibility). Microsoft Azure positions itself as a cloud platform\nspecifically designed for developers to create their own apps with the wide\nrange of tools the company provides.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A blockchain built within Azure needn\u2019t\nrun within it. It can simply be connected to Azure but work independently.\nThus, outside the system an Azure blockchain can be used for a risk service,\nwhile the general environment remains safe.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">As an open, flexible, and scalable\nplatform, Azure supports a rapidly growing number of distributed ledger\ntechnologies that address specific business and technical requirements for\nsecurity, performance, and operational processes. Microsoft initially launched\nAzure Blockchain-as-a-Service in November 2015.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In 2016, Microsoft took the\nwraps off version 1 of its Project Bletchley blockchain template/middleware,\nwhich was meant to help customers and partners create private consortium\nEthereum networks.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A consortium of India-based banking firms including State\nBank of India, ICICI Bank and DCB Bank has formally selected Microsoft Azure as\ntheir exclusive cloud partner.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Chinese WanCloud is unique as an ecosystem in\nthat it allows users to work with open-source blockchains more easily and in\none place. Unlike traditional Blockchain-as-a-Service (BaaS) providers that\nhave private networks or build on top of one public chain.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WanCloud provides an ecosystem for open-source\nblockchain protocols to be localized and made easily accessible to the Chinese\ndevelopment community and enterprise users.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WanCloud is essentially a bridge\nbetween the global blockchain development community and China.. WanCloud joins\na burgeoning group of blockchain subsidiaries for Wanxiang Group under Wanxiang\nBlockchain Corporation<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Oracle\u2019s Blockchain service is a high level\nof integration with Oracle Cloud through REST API.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; REST enables easy communication between\ndifferent applications on the basis of a certain architectural principle.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nmain takeaway here is the fact that Oracle\u2019s Blockchain service will use a\nwell-known, standardized integrating principle, which should enable easy and\nlow-cost implementation of blockchain applications.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Moreover, this is likely to\nincrease the attractiveness of Oracle Cloud platform, as REST API will make it\neasy to build or scale blockchain applications on a basis of Oracle\u2019s platform.\nRepresentational state transfer (REST) or RESTful web services is a way of\nproviding interoperability between computer systems on the Internet.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">REST-compliant Web services allow requesting systems to access and manipulate\ntextual representations of Web resources using a uniform and predefined set of\nstateless operations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/LooL6_chvN4/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/LooL6_chvN4?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">LET ME LET OUT A SECRET<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">MY CHANGE MANAGEMENT AT SEA INVOLVED MY OWN\nSYSTEM BLOCKCHAIN SMART CONTRACTS\u2014AS MY SYSTEM WAS \u201cDOMINO \u201cBASED\u2014USING MY\nLITTLE PINKY FINGER TO START AND STOP<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/04/domino-effect-in-change-management-capt.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/04/domino-effect-in-change-management-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">One can imagine a smart contract as a\ndatabase, in which the most diverse events are predefined and aligned. A review\nof whether a particular event has occurred, enabling the next \u201cdomino\u201d to fall\nis takes place in the network in a decentralized manner. This is commonly\nreferred to as the \u201cSmart Contract Due Diligence\u201d (SCDD) process.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Smart contracts are a series of instructions,\nwritten using the programming language \u201csolidity\u201d, which work on the basis of\nthe IFTTT logic aka the IF-THIS-THEN-THAT logic.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Basically, if the first set of\ninstructions are done then execute the next function and after that the next and\nkeep on repeating until you reach the end of the contract.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Suppose you just bought something from a\nvending machine in the Ethereum network, how will the steps look like then?</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Step 1: You give the vending machine some\nmoney and this gets recorded by all the nodes in the Ethereum network and the\ntransaction gets updated in the ledger.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Step 2: You punch in the button corresponding\nto the item that you want and record of that gets updated in the Ethereum\nnetwork and ledger.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Step 3: The item comes out and you collect it\nand this gets recorded by all the nodes and the ledger.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Every transaction that you do through the\nsmart contracts will get recorded and updated by the network. What this does is\nthat it keeps everyone involved with the contract accountable for their\nactions. It takes away human malice by making every action taken visible to the\nentire network.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">But, having said that, what mainly incentivizes these people to\nfulfill their end of the bargain anyway? What are they getting by helping out\nthe requestors? This is where Ether comes in.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Every single step in a smart contract is a\ntransaction or a complex computation and would have a cost that is measured in\n\u201cgas\u201d. The price of this gas is paid by the requester in \u201cEther\u201d.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Ether is the\ncurrency with which everything runs in the Ethereum. When people talk about ETH\nand ETC they are actually talking about the value of the Ether in their\nrespective blockchain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Every command has a specific gas limit which\nensures that a buggy piece of code doesn\u2019t end up depleting your entire ether\nwallet. So basically, the main reason why people fulfill their end of the\nbargain in a contract is that they are incentivized to collect Ether.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">What happens when your ether supply gets\ndepleted in the middle of the contract? If you do not have the ether required\nfor all the gas payments, then all the transactions that have already taken\nplace during the course will go back to the original state.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">But, your ether\nwallet will still reflect the change in balance since all transactions made in\nthe blockchain are irreversible.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Going forward it is very important that you\nhave two things absolutely clear:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Smart contracts are how things get done in\nEthereum.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">Ether is the currency that is used in the\nEthereum network to do anything.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The primary difference between Ethereum and\nany other cryptocurrency is that it\u2019s not just a currency, it\u2019s an environment.\nHere anyone can take advantage of the blockchain technology to build their own\nprojects and DAPPS (decentralized applications) through smart contracts.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This\nis a very important distinction because this very thing shows you the true\nscope of what is possible in Ethereum.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">With smart contracts, it is &nbsp;easy to map complex network decisions \u2013 an\nadvantage that should not be underestimated. Due to the decentralized storage\nof the blockchain, the decision processes is largely guarded from unauthorised\nmanipulation.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Smart Contracts are unchangeable , and hence\nthis distinguishes them from the general rule of civil law that treaties have\nto be subject to an evaluative consideration. There is an infinite number of\nreasons why a contract or a business action to fulfil a contractual obligation\ncan be void, suspended or contestable.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It is important to assess whether actual\nexchanged material or monetary values \u200b\u200bmust be returned. This cannot usually\nbe achieved by an automated software code. It is just not possible to consider\nand program all eventualities in advance.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">For this, \u201cartificial intelligence\u201d\n(AI) would be required. Even if the development of smart contracts goes in this\ndirection \u2013 as it must \u2013 one must accept the fact that smart contracts do not\ncurrently have this intelligence.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;From a legal point of view, the discussion\nabout the use of so-called \u201chard-forks\u201d is of particular interest. Hard forks\nare retrospective interventions in the existing protocol of a blockchain. The\nprinciple of invariability is thus broken.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This, on the one hand, means a\ndeparture from the basic principle of each blockchain, but on the other hand,\nit permits the representation of a legally caused disturbance in the\nperformance relation. If smart solutions are developed here, the range of\napplications of smart contracts will be inevitably widened.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Smart contracts have\nconsiderable potential for simplifying the digital handling of mass\ntransactions, but they are not yet an autonomous \u201cstand-alone\u201d solution.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/BnMVpNzQrUA/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/BnMVpNzQrUA?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Unlike the term \u201ccontract\u201c, a smart contract\nis not a contract in the civil law sense. It is a software code, more\nprecisely, a very specific expression of a blockchain. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Automatic machines \u2013 that are able to grasp\nthe insertion of a coin and the selection of a brand of confectionery, enabling\nthe desired product to land in the dispenser \u2013 can be considered predecessors\nof the smart contracts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Modern smart contracts are designed to define\nwhat should happen when a certain predefined event occurs (if-then-logic)\nbetween two or more contract partners in one network in a decentralized manner.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">If, for example, a previously agreed payment is made, the delivery of goods\nordered on the Internet can be triggered via the smart contract. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">On the other hand, actions such as payment or\ninvestment can also be triggered by the fact that a certain number of\nparticipants declare their agreement. With smart contracts, it is also easy to\nmap complex network decisions \u2013 an advantage that should not be underestimated.\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Due to the decentralized storage of the\nblockchain, the decision processes is largely guarded from unauthorised manipulation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3935471966844634504\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; ONE OF MY RELATIVES WAS HIS COLLEGE CLASS MATE.. WE KNOW VIJAYAN..<br />\n<br />\nPinarayi Vijayan eventually joined the Communist Party of India (Marxist). He really does NOT know that JEW Rothschild created communism and that JEW Karl Marx is a Rothschild blood relative.<br />\n<br />\nKERALA COMMIES ARE VERY FOND OF RUNNING DOWN THEIR OWN LANGUAGE MALAYALAM AND GIVING IT AWAY TO GERMAN JEW HERMANN GUNDERT<br />\n<br />\nMALAYALAM IS THE SECOND MOST OLDEST LANGUAGE ON THIS PLANET.<br />\n<br />\nI STUDIED OLD MALAYALAM IN SCHOOL. MY SONS STUDIED NEW MALAYALAM.<br />\n<br />\nNEW MALAYALAM IS A LIFE BLOOD DRAINED VERSION OF OF MALAYALAM--CREATED BY CHRISTIAN AND COMMIE PRESS- SO THAT PRINTING WOULD BE MORE CONVENIENT .<br />\n<br />\nI STILL DONT KNOW HOW TO WRITE IN NEW MALAYALAM--WHILE MY SONS DO NOT KNOW HOW TO WRITE IN OLD MALAYALAM<br />\n<br />\nTHE TRIPLE INTERSECTIONS OF SRI YANTRA ARE THE 54 ALPHABETS IN MALAYALAM AND SANSKRIT<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/03/theory-of-everything-consciousness-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\nIN THE POST ABOVE I HAVE SHOWN THE 54 MALAYALAM ALPHABETS ..<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE STUDIED BOTH OLD MALAYALAM AND SANSKRIT IN SCHOOL. HIGH LITERATURE MALAYALAM IS 80% SANSKRIT. text-decoration-line: none;\">October 30, 2017 at 8:31 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_112MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nSADGURU JAGGI VASUDEV EVEN WENT TO THE EXTENT OF SAYING THAT SHIVA WAS LIKE SACHIN TENDULKAR --WHO IS GOD OF CRICKET<br />\n<br />\nHAVE NOT HINDU GODS BEEN ABUSED BY ALL RELIGIONS ?<br />\n<br />\nWHAT DID MEDIA AND JNU HERO UR ANANTHAMURTHY DO ?<br />\n<br />\nHE PISSED ON A VISHNU IDOL ( WHICH WAS BEING WORSHIPED ) AND SAID \" HINDU IDOLS CANT HIT BACK\"<br />\n<br />\nWHY DID HE NOT TRY THIS WITH STATUES OF JESUS, MARY, BUDDHA, MAHAVIRA , BASAVA , SHIRDI SAI BABA ---<br />\n<br />\nOR GURU GRANTH SAHIB ( WHICH ROTHSCHILD SAID IS THE 11TH AND FINAL LIVING GURU ) ?<br />\n<br />\nDID NOT THE JUDICIARY, ANTI-HINDU POLITICIANS , BENAMI MEDIA , COMMIE, LIRERARY FEST DROHIS ALL PRAISE UR ANANTHAMURTHY FOR KICKING HINDU SUPERSTITION BY A SINGLE DARING PRAISEWORTHY ACT OF PISSING ON A VISHNU IDOL<br />\n<br />\nI AM 100% SURE ZAKIR NAIK WILL NEVER PISS ON A VISHNU IDOL.. 100% SURE .<br />\n<br />\nWHY DID PM MODI AND CM OF KARNATAKA PRAISE UR ANANTHAMURTHY WHEN HE DIED?<br />\n<br />\nWHY ARE WE LOSING PERSPECTIVE ?<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br />IF SOMEONE BOMBS MY WIFE AND TWO SONS TO DEATH-- WHO DO YOU THING CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL WILL BE AFTER MY PERIOD OF MOURNING IS OVER?&nbsp; THE WHOLE AUDIENCE WOULD LAUGH WITH EXTREME SARCASM<br />\n<br />\nTHE SAME TRICK WAS USED BY ROTHSCHILD FOR TENTH GURU GURU GOBIND SINGH AND HIS HORSE.<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/07/unknown-history-of-sikhs-and-sikhism.html</span><br />\n<br />\nBUT HEY-- IMMACULATE CONCEPTION AND WALKING ON WATER IS PASSE ?<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS THE FALSE FUCKIN' WORLD WE LIVE IN<br />\n<br />\nTHIS BLOGSITE ATTEMPTS TO MAKE READERS THINK FOR THEMSELVES --THE WAY SANGEETHA HAS DONE --ATTAGIRL SANGEETHA<br />\n<br />\nENOUGH OF BULLSHIT HAS GONE ON ON THIS PLANET<br />\n<br />\nNOBODY EVEN KNOWS THAT ROTHSCHILD RULED INDIA TILL I REVEALED IT .<br />\n<br />\nIF ROTHSCHILDs EMAILS WERE NOT FOUND IN HILLARYs PRIVATE SERVER NOBODY WOULD HAVE EVEN KNOWN THAT THERE IS A SHADOW GOVT IN USA .<br />\n<br />\nNOBODY KNOWS THAT HITLER, EISENHOWER, STALIN, CHURCHILL , ROOSEVELT WERE ALL JEWS.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/10/if-zionist-jews-created-isis-who.html</span><br />\n<br />\nMY TECHNICAL POSTS ON SHIPS ARE ALL ABOUT THIS-- FIRE TRIANGLE GIVES STEP MOTHERLY TREATMENT TO BOILER FURNACE WHILE IT GIVE MOTHERLY TREATMENT TO THE MAIN ENGINE CRANK CASE<br />\n<br />\nIT REQUIRES PERCEPTION--AND THE BALLS TO POINT OUT THE ELEPHANT IN THE ROOM<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-b51dao-UjP8/WfYUGUXobkI/AAAAAAABWaY/nHczCzKax4Qe5UeRYKp09oBTQW_uciUhACLcBGAs/s1600/DRRRNT3pI-WsAA37QV.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"710\" data-original-width=\"1024\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-b51dao-UjP8/WfYUGUXobkI/AAAAAAABWaY/nHczCzKax4Qe5UeRYKp09oBTQW_uciUhACLcBGAs/s1600/DRRRNT3pI-WsAA37QV.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">THIS POST IS NOW CONTINUED TO PART 7 ,BELOW--</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/10/blockchain-smart-contracts-part-8-capt.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/10/blockchain-smart-contracts-part-8-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-jBAA9lzGDDc/WfOTIwtD_AI/AAAAAAABWXc/VhUbvaw6eyMLdwX7whbvztYNXTc_Fh1NwCLcBGAs/s1600/IMG-20171005-WA0012.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "256", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/4870110314697435921/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "3946180011923804903", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2017-10-25T18:37:00+05:30", "updated": "2017-12-09T16:31:14+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxNTEyODE3Mjc0MjE1Cm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/10/blockchain-smart-contracts-part-6-capt.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/3946180011923804903", "title": "BLOCKCHAIN, SMART CONTRACTS , PART 6 - CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">THIS POST IS CONTINUED FROM PART 5, BELOW--</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/10/blockchain-smart-contracts-part-5-capt.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/10/blockchain-smart-contracts-part-5-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/i9nUMvpT2rM/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/i9nUMvpT2rM?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3106700980988906400\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_0M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/10/blockchain-smart-contracts-part-6-capt.html?showComment=1508937705777#c3106700980988906400\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">October 25, 2017 at 6:51 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_0MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/wont-link-my-mobile-phone-number-with-aadhar-mamata-banerjee/articleshow/61224558.cms</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large; font-weight: bold;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b>OTP COMING INTO MOBILE PHONES MUST BE AADHAR LINKED</b></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Government has initiated measures, including reverification at subscribers\u2019 doorstep and OTP-based authentication of existing users.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Nearly 50 crore mobile numbers are already registered in Aadhaar database, and the OTP can be leveraged for reverification in all of these cases</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A one-time password (OTP) is a password that is valid for only one login session or transaction, on a computer system or mobile phone. The most important advantage that is addressed by OTPs is that, in contrast to static passwords, they are not vulnerable to replay attacks.This means that a potential intruder who manages to record an OTP that was already used to log into a service or to conduct a transaction will not be able to abuse it, since it will no longer be valid. A second major advantage is that a user who uses the same (or similar) password for multiple systems, is not made vulnerable on all of them, if the password for one of these is gained by an attacker.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IF I SIGN OUT OF MY EMAIL--I HAVE TO USE OTP COMING ON MY MOBILE TO SIGN IN AGAIN. ENTERING MY PASSWORD IS NOT ENOUGH</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">OTPs is an ENHANCER to traditional passwords. Based on time-synchronization between the authentication server and the client providing the password (OTPs are valid only for a short period of time)</span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: large; font-weight: bold;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">INDIA CANNOT MOVE INTO BLOCKCHAIN TECHNOLOGY WITHOUT THIS&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">DO YOU THINK THAT STUPID PMS LADEN BONG WOMAN WILL UNDERSTAND ALL THIS .. HER SOLE AIM IN LIFE IS TO GIVE PIN PRICKS TO MODI</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">..</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Decentralized smart contracts have a number\nof advantages that can benefit criminals:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">They enable fair exchange between mutually\ndistrustful parties based on contract rules, removing the need for physical\nrendezvous, third-party intermediaries, and reputation systems.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The minimal interaction makes it harder for\nlaw enforcement \u2013 a criminal can set up a contract and walk away allowing it to\nexecute autonomously with no further interaction.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The ability to introduce external state into\ntransactions through an oracle service (e.g., Oraclize) broadens the scope of\npossible CSCs to include calling-card based physical crimes.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Even before smart contracts, just the\npseudonymity offered by cryptocurrencies has been happily embraced by\ncriminals, so there\u2019s every reason to think the same path might be taken with\nsmart contracts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">When autonomous smart contracts are combined\nwith anonymous cryptocurrency, they provide opportunities to handle money in\ncomplicated ways that hackers can exploit.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\">Twice, money has been stolen from\nEthereum contracts in heists that each involved more money than the largest\nbank robbery in the United States. The identities of the thieves remain\nunknown.</span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In the future, \u201ccriminal smart contracts\u201d may\nemerge. These might be programmed to make automatic payments when specific\nsecrets are stolen, when particular websites are hacked and defaced, or even\nfor physical crimes ranging from vandalism to terrorism.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A person who wanted a\nparticular crime to be committed could post a smart contract reward to be paid\nout to the criminal who actually does the deed.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Someone seeking to claim the\nreward would, before committing the crime, add an encoded message to the smart\ncontract containing specific details only the criminal would know beforehand \u2013\nsuch as a unique phrase or long string of numbers to be posted on a hacked\nwebsite.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">When the crime is committed, the person who\ndid the deed would decode the added message, revealing the details that had\nbeen specified in advance.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The smart contract could then check the actual\ndetails of the crime and, if they matched, pay out the reward. The anonymity of\nthe underlying cryptocurrency would hide the criminal\u2019s identity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Today, smart contracts cannot easily obtain\ntrustworthy data from the internet about crimes like vandalism in a form that\ncomputer programs can easily understand.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">So criminal smart contracts have not\nyet come about. But advances in crime driven by smart contracts will eventually\nemerge, aided by continuing improvements in anonymity technologies.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A smart contract is not really \u201csmart,\u201d and\nis not really a \u201ccontract.\u201d&nbsp; &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">Smart contract</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">is a bit of a misnomer.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">It is more of an</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">\u201cautomated blockchain transaction\u201d.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp; &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">The smart contract carries out what it is\nprogrammed to do, and that\u2019s it.&nbsp; It doesn\u2019t think independently, nor does it\nprovide any reasoned analysis.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Smart contracts suffer from what is termed\nthe \u201coracle problem.\u201d This refers to the fact it is extraordinarily difficult\nto take human reasoning out of the equation. At some point, someone (an\n\u201coracle\u201d) is going to have to step in and say whether the terms of the contract\nwere fulfilled or not.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">For example, if payment Y is released when shipment X is\ndelivered, how is the smart contract going to know that shipment X was exactly\nwhat was specified in the contract? (And that they were delivered undamaged,\netc.) Somebody needs to look inside the box and say, \u201cYep, those are the\nwidgets we\u2019re looking for.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Also, there\u2019s a limit to what can be\nautomated. Reps and warranties, third-party beneficiaries, how to address\nmistakes, the list of topics that can\u2019t be automated is endless<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A blockchain can be defined as a\ncryptographically-secured, distributed transaction ledger. The blockchain\nenables trustless peer-to-peer transactions by eliminating the need to rely on\na centralized authority, like a bank or clearinghouse.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The blockchain\neliminates the need to trust third parties by distributing a copy of the ledger\nmemorializing all transactions to all (or substantially all) market\nparticipants. This feature, combined with the requirement that a majority of\nthese participants agree on the validity of a new transaction before it can be\nadded to the ledger, makes the technology incredibly secure.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Using the same\ncomplex cryptography and mathematics, the blockchain requires that market\nparticipants agree on which version of the ledger is correct. As such, absent\nthe consensus of the participants in the protocol, past transactions cannot be\nmodified.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">As blockchain technology has matured, users\nhave started to employ distributed ledgers to store and run smart contracts.\nSmart contracts, which are self-executing computer programs that exist on the\nblockchain, monitor and validate a condition to automatically determine whether\nthe asset involved in that contract should be sent to one or more parties.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Smart contracts, like peer-to-peer transactions, generally cannot be modified,\nrepaired, stopped, or removed once they are deployed onto the blockchain,\nabsent extreme circumstances such as a \"hard fork,\" which is a permanent\ndivergence from the blockchain's previous version.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A hard fork &nbsp;is a radical change to the protocol that makes\npreviously invalid blocks/transactions valid (or vice-versa), and as such\nrequires all nodes or users to upgrade to the latest version of the protocol\nsoftware.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A soft fork is a fork where updated versions of the protocol are\nbackwards compatible with previous versions.. When a soft fork change is made,\nall nodes (whether upgraded or not) will continue to recognize new blocks and\nmaintain consensus on the Blockchain.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The biggest risk in executing a hard fork\nis a situation where nodes running the new software are separated from the\nprevious version, resulting in a fork of the Blockchain.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">If half of the nodes\nare running the latest version and mining blocks, and the other half are\nrunning the older version and mining a different set of blocks, then you would\nhave two different chains resulting in a fork of the Blockchain (which is\ndifferent from a fork of the software).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A soft fork is a change to the software\nprotocol where only previously valid blocks/transactions are made invalid.\nSince old nodes will recognize the new blocks as valid, a softfork is\nbackward-compatible.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Hard forks is a permanent divergence in the\nthe block chain, commonly occurs when non-upgraded nodes can\u2019t validate blocks\ncreated by upgraded nodes that follow newer consensus rules.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Hard forks, are not compatible with legacy\nsoftware versions, so the blockchain will split into two different paths if\nsome node operators do not upgrade to the latest version.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This can potentially\ncreate a new cryptocurrency, which is what happened in 2016 when a minority\ngroup within the Ethereum community refused to follow the hard fork that\nreturned funds stolen during the DAO hack.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Soft forks is a temporary divergence in the\nblock chain caused by non-upgraded nodes not following new consensus rules.&nbsp; Soft forks are usually used to accomplish\nsomething useful like an upgrade to the system<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Bitcoin is intrinsically a currency. It isn\u2019t\nsupported by any central bank or government, and it doesn\u2019t have the same level\nof government backed assurance in the same way as the USD, GBP or EUR, for\nexample.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It certainly has value because of its limited supply and underlying utility,\nbut this is where the \u2018currency\u2019 aspect of it stops.&nbsp; Bitcoin is a decentralised consensus network.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The most important thing to remember is a\nhard fork isn\u2019t the same as a stock split. When a company performs a stock\nsplit it is specifically breaking up the business (and therefore the business\nvalue) into two forms of shares.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This splits liquid and illiquid assets of a\nbusiness, as well as things such as revenue stream and projected earnings over\ntwo separate companies or listed shares.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A blockchain fork wouldn\u2019t fall under\nthe same rules. Value from cryptocurrencies comes from a speculative\nexpectation of utility and wider adoption at some point in the future, so when\nthere is a split you can\u2019t expect each chains price action to neutralise the\nprice.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In today's traditional banking system, a\ncourt might order a bank to freeze at-risk funds before a would-be thief has\nthe chance to abscond with them. In the blockchain's completely trustless\nworld, there is no such authority to implement the court's protective measures.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Similarly, banks can often unwind or alter fraudulent transactions, such as\nthose initiated by the victim of a scam. When settling a transaction on a\nblockchain, there is comparatively little that can be done once the transaction\nis broadcast to the network.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Short of convincing a substantial majority of\nusers to coordinate a hard fork and change prior entries to the ledger to\nreturn the stolen funds, victims are out of luck.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The ineffectiveness of legal remedies is only\nthe tip of the proverbial iceberg when it comes to the legal uncertainties\nassociated with using blockchain technology.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Courts will soon have to grapple\nwith the jurisdictional implications of assets that exist solely in the cloud,\non hundreds of identical copies of a digital ledger, and are stored on\ncomputers throughout the globe.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">For these and other reasons, anyone curious\nabout the blockchain and its disruptive potential should consider the effect\nthat existing, somewhat-incompatible laws could have on society's ability to\nregulate this emerging technology<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-xQnnbgYbRzk/WfEfsxOzl5I/AAAAAAABWWQ/DgMfBRwyLXQkdYjcqz1-f0SVU9XNo9bYwCLcBGAs/s1600/ethereum-fromJ-there-to-here-and-ownards-yonder-16-638.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"359\" data-original-width=\"638\" height=\"360\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-xQnnbgYbRzk/WfEfsxOzl5I/AAAAAAABWWQ/DgMfBRwyLXQkdYjcqz1-f0SVU9XNo9bYwCLcBGAs/s640/ethereum-fromJ-there-to-here-and-ownards-yonder-16-638.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: 18pt;\">I WILL MAKE A CRITICAL REVELATION\u2014WHICH WILL\nTAKE IT TO &nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">51.85% </span><span style=\"font-size: 18pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 18pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 18pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">NOBODY HAS EVER ASKED ME \u2013&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;CAPTAIN WHY DO YOU\nSAY&nbsp; \" </span><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">4D VADAKAYIL BINDU THINKING</span></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">\"<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 18pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 18pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>THIS IS THE ULTIMATE FORM OF THINKING<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 18pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 18pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>GO TO THE ONION CORE SIT AT THE BINDU SEAT\nAND LOOK OUTWARDS ALL AROUND, UP DOWN .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 18pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 18pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">NEVER FORGET THE AXIS OF TIME</span></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 18pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 18pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">TIME HAS RAPED INNOCENT PEOPLE</span></b></span><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 18pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 18pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>BIG FISH IN IPL RAPED SMALL FISH WITH TIME\nAND GOT AWAY<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 18pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 18.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><b>TAKE THE CASE OF SREESHANT </b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 18.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 18.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/06/travesty-of-justice-sreesanth-and.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/06/travesty-of-justice-sreesanth-and.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-_d-uQVriU4I/WfEfax4L5hI/AAAAAAABWWI/Cv305Ls-XDMr9sUq61MB-_w0znR8hzuxQCLcBGAs/s1600/Screen-Shot-2015H-06-15-at-5.38.59-AM.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em;
