In such case, there would be no consideration.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">But what if the code is\nmodified so it now automatically moves a pre-defined amount of an asset from B\nto A on the date the code is initialised? This effectively represents the\namount B is paying to receive the benefit of the software agent\u2019s actions when\nit moves an asset from A if certain conditions are met.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">In such a two-way case,\nconsideration would be present as both parties derive value.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">In that instance,\nthe offer from A would need to be recast as: \u201cI offer to you that I will\ninitialise this software agent and the actions of the software agent in moving\nassets from my account represent my legal obligations to you, provided that you\nagree that the actions of the software agent in moving assets from your account\nrepresent your legal obligations to me. Do you agree?\u201d&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">If B agrees to this, a\nlegal contract would have been formed. There has been offer and acceptance,\nthere is consideration, there</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">is a clear\nintention to create legal relations, and the code would give certainty of\nterms.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">At this point, the smart contract code also becomes a smart legal\ncontract</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-2UHGT6SGdRw/WfI8PPt4KTI/AAAAAAABWXE/at8Wvjb8aYwZMcmpWwqtA5h1tfDY3FsEACLcBGAs/s1600/catw_lawyer.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"393\" data-original-width=\"300\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-2UHGT6SGdRw/WfI8PPt4KTI/AAAAAAABWXE/at8Wvjb8aYwZMcmpWwqtA5h1tfDY3FsEACLcBGAs/s640/catw_lawyer.jpg\" width=\"488\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8797219194357677475\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_162M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; text-decoration-line: none;\">October 27, 2017 at 7:57 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_191MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">BLOCK CHAIN HAS BEEN BRANDED AS \u201cANTI-ESTABLISHMENT \u201c BY WHITE JEWS WHO ARE THE ESTABLISHMENT \u2013 SO CLEVER NAH ?</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">BUT BEWARE</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ROTHSCHILD THE INVENTOR OF HEGELIAN DIALECTIC , HAS ALWAYS CONVERTED SUNSET TO SUNRISE</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; text-align: left;\">\n<b style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\">COMMUNISM IN INDIA WAS ALL ABOUT GRABBING LAND, DISTRIBUTING IT IN SMALL PIECES AND THEN GRABBING IT BACK \u2013DONE BY TOP COMMIE LEADERS.&nbsp;</b></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Read all 8 parts of the post below---</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE MAOISTS/ NAXALS WERE USED TO BURN LAND REGISTRY OFFICES AND KILL THE GOVT REGISTRARS PRESENT AND RETIRED.&nbsp; &nbsp;SAME THING HAPPENED IN KERALA AND BENGAL.</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/04/razakers-of-mim-operation-polo-to-annex.html</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Read all 6 parts of this unfinished post below \u2013it is only 30% complete .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/10/blockchain-for-land-registry-voter.html</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">PUT THIS COMMENT IN PMO, PM MODI, CM NAIDU, LAW MINISTER, CJI, SUPREME COURT BAR COUNCIL, CM PINARAYI VIJAYAN, CM K CHANDRASEKHAR RAO, HOME MINISTER, DEFENCE MINISTER, I&amp;B MINISTER , YOGI ADITYANATH, SWAMY, GURUMURTHY, AND WEBSITES OF DESH BHAKTS .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 16pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b>A blockchain would allow someone to upload\nland title documentation to the network, which other users ( <span style=\"color: red;\">SAY WHITE JEWS </span>) can\nrecord and verify if needed.&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; This would provide proof that this person is\nthe first owner of the documents, and decentralised network verification would\nprevent forgery. &nbsp; &nbsp; When it\u2019s time to\ntransfer title, the document simply requires \u2018rehashing\u2019 (encrypting) by the\nowner to prove he is in possession of the document.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/12/sox-and-nox-emissions-from-ships.html?showComment=1512816568589#c9018482608740373716\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">December 9, 2017 at 4:19 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_85MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEONE ASKED ME--WHY DO YOU SAY THAT THE SUDDEN SURGE IN VALUE OF BITCOIN IS A CONJOB<br /><br />WELL FOR THIS YOU MUST UNDERSTAND HOW A BITCOIN MINING / BLOCKCHAIN SYSTEM WORKS<br /><br />YOU CANT HAVE BITCOIN JUMPING FROM 6500 USD ( WHEN I FIRST WROTE PART ONE OF THIS SERIES ) TO 17000 USD ( WHILE ON PART 14 OF THIS SERIES ) IN A VERY SHORT TIME JUST LIKE THAT<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/11/blockchain-proof-of-elapsed-time-intel.html<br /><br />Bitcoins grow in value when enough people possess them. This makes other people wanting Bitcoins-- making Bitcoins grow in value even more-- making even more people wanting Bitcoins-- making them grow in value even more-- and so on.<br /><br />IGNORANT PEOPLE ARE DUMBFOUNDED AND DONT KNOW WHAT THE FUCK IS HAPPENING --THEY PRETEND TO KNOW THE SYSTEM--SO THAT THEY CAN SHINE IN FRONT OF OTHERS .<br /><br />NOBODY DARES TO POINT OUT THE ELEPHANT IN THE ROOM. THEY DONT HAVE THE BALLS OR THE KNOWLEDGE<br /><br />BLOCKCHAIN IS NO ROCKET SCIENCE-- EVEN CUNTS CAN UNDERSTAND IT<br /><br />###########<br /><br />LISTEN UP AND LISTEN GOOD<br /><br />In todays systems we depend on individual third-parties to establish trust between ourselves.The problem is that they are singular in number and if a chaos has to be injected in the society, all it requires is ONE person/organization to go corrupt, intentionally or unintentionally.<br /><br />Blockchain is a method to maintain that register among TWO parties cutting out the middleman.<br /><br />The requirement of this method is that there must be enough people who would like not to depend on a third-party and only then these people can maintain the register on their own.<br /><br />How many people is enough? Three at least. We will assume ten individuals want to give up on banks or any third-party for our example. They have details of each other\u2019s accounts all the time upon mutual agreement, but they don\u2019t know the other\u2019s identity.<br /><br />Everyone contains an empty folder with themselves to start with and all these ten individuals will keep adding pages to their currently empty folders. And the register that tracks the transactions will be formed from this collection of pages.<br /><br />Everyone in the network sits with a pen and a blank page and in their hands and they are all ready to write any transaction that happens within the system.<br /><br />For example, #2 wants to transfer $10 to #9.<br /><br />To make the transaction, #2 shouts and tells everyone, \u201cI want to send $10 to #9, so, everyone, please make a note of it on your pages.\u201d<br /><br />Everyone checks if #2 has enough balance to send $10 to #9 and everyone then makes a note of the transaction on their blank pages if she has enough balance.<br /><br />We consider this transaction to be complete now.<br /><br />More people in the network feel the need to transfer money to others as the time passes. Whenever they want to make a transaction, they announce it to everyone else and as soon as a person listens to the announcement, (s)he writes it on his/her page.<br /><br />This exercise continues until everyone runs out of space on the current page and assuming a page has space to record ten transactions, everybody runs out of the space as soon as the tenth transaction is made.<br /><br />It\u2019s time to put the page away in the folder and bring out a new page. After that, repeat the process from the step 2 above.<br /><br />We need to seal the page with a unique key that everyone in the network agrees upon before we put it away in our folders. By sealing it, we will make sure that no one can make any changes to it once its copies have been put away in everyone\u2019s folder. Once in the folder, it will always stay in the folder\u200a\u2014\u200asealed, and moreover everyone trusts the contents of the page if everyone trusts the seal. The sealing of the page is the crux of this method.<br /><br />It is called MINING on the page to secure it. However, we\u2019ll keep calling it \u2018sealing for the simplicity of it.<br /><br />The middleman/third-party gave us the trust earlier that whatever they have written in the register will never be changed. This seal will provide the trust instead in a distributed and decentralized system like ours.<br /><br />https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MAgA43WEKwA<br /><br /><br /><br />CONTINUED TO 2</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_85BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; color: black; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_85b+seedB3CmD\" kind=\"d\"><div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_83T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_83TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_83TN\"><div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_83TD\">\n<span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></div>\n</span></span><ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_83TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_83B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px; text-indent: 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; max-width: 36px; padding: 5px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c9182682596686722911\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_83M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/12/sox-and-nox-emissions-from-ships.html?showComment=1512816769952#c9182682596686722911\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">December 9, 2017 at 4:22 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_83MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br /><br />Imagine a machine surrounded by thick walls and if you send a box with something inside it from the left, it will spit out a box containing something else.<br /><br />This machine is called \u2018Hash Function,\u2019<br /><br />Suppose, you send the number 4 inside it from the left. We\u2019d find that it spat out the following word on its right: \u2018dcbea.\u2019<br /><br />No one knows how it converted the number 4 to this word, but it is an irreversible process. Given the word, \u2018dcbea,\u2019 it is impossible to tell what the machine was fed on the left, but the machine will always spit out the same word, \u2018dcbea\u2019 every time you\u2019d feed the number 4 to it.<br /><br />Let\u2019s try sending in a different number, for example 26.<br /><br />Interesting! This time we got \u201894c8e\u2019, which means that the words can contain the numbers too.<br /><br />What if I ask you the following question now:<br /><br />\u201eWhat should I send from the left side of the machine such to get a word that begins with three leading zeroes from the right side of it, e.g. 000fa, or 00098, or 000ab, anything among the others.\u201c<br /><br />It was extremely difficult to calculate the input given the output, but at the same time, it will always be incredibly easy to verify if the predicted input yields the required output. The machine spits out the same word for a number every time.<br /><br />If I give you a number, say 72533, and ask you the question: \u201eWhen you feed the number into the machine, does it yield a word that begins with three leading zeroes?\u201d how difficult do you think the answer is?<br /><br />Just throw the number in the machine and see what did you get on the right side of it and that\u2019s it.<br /><br />The most important property of such machines is that\u200a\u2014\u200a\u201cGiven an output, it is extremely difficult to calculate the input. However, given the input and the output, it is pretty simple to verify if the input leads to the output.\u201d<br /><br />How to Seal a Page Using These Machines?<br /><br />We\u2019ll use this magic machine to generate a seal for our page and we\u2019ll start with an imaginary situation, like always.<br /><br />Imagine you get two boxes from me and the first box contains the number 20893. After that, I ask you: \u201eCan you calculate a number that, when added to the number in the first box and fed to the machine, will give us a word that begins with three leading zeroes?\u201d<br /><br />This is a similar situation as we had previously. We have learned that by trying every number available in the whole universe is the only way to figure out such a number.<br /><br />We\u2019ll stumble upon a number, say 21191, after several thousand attempts. This number, when added to 20893 (i.e. 21191 + 20893 = 42084) and fed to the machine, will yield a word that satisfies our requirements.<br /><br />This number, 21191 becomes the seal for the number 20893 in such a case. Suppose there is a page that contains the number 20893 written on it. We will put a badge labelled \u201821191\u2019 on top of it to seal that page (i.e. no one can change the contents of it). The page is sealed once the sealing number (i.e. 21191) is stuck on it.<br /><br />The sealing number is called \u2018Proof Of Work.\u2019 This means that this number is the proof that efforts had been made to calculate it. But for our purposes, we are good with calling it \u2018sealing number.\u2019<br /><br />All that you need to do to verify whether the page was altered is to add the contents of the page with the sealing number and feed to the magic machine. The contents were untouched if the machine gives out a word with three leading zeroes. We can throw away the page if the word that comes out doesn\u2019t meet our requirements because its contents were compromised, and are of no use.<br /><br />We\u2019ll seal all our pages using a similar sealing mechanism and eventually arrange them in our respective folders.<br /><br />We\u2019ll need to figure out a number that when appended to the list of transactions and fed to the machine, we get a word that begins with three leading zeroes on the right to seal our page that contains the transactions of the network.<br /><br />CONTINUED TO 3</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_83MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_83BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_83B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_84B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px; text-indent: 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; max-width: 36px; padding: 5px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1789611015576152831\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_84M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/12/sox-and-nox-emissions-from-ships.html?showComment=1512816831043#c1789611015576152831\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">December 9, 2017 at 4:23 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_84MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2-<br /><br />Note: The phrase \u2018word starting with three leading zeroes\u2019 is used only as an example. It illustrates how Hashing Functions work, but the real challenges are much more complicated than this.<br /><br />Once that number is figured out after spending time and electricity on the machine, the page is sealed with that number. The sealing number will allow anyone to verify the integrity of the page if someone tries to change the contents of the page.<br /><br />Now it\u2019s time to go back to the time when we had finished writing the tenth transaction on the page, and we ran out of space to write more.<br /><br />As soon as everyone runs out of the page to write further transactions, everyone in the network indulge in calculating the sealing number for the page so that it can be tucked away in the folder and the first one in the network to figure out the sealing number announces it to everyone else.<br /><br />Instantly, on hearing the sealing number, everyone verifies if it yields the required output or not and, if it does, everyone labels their pages with this number and put it away in their folders.<br /><br />But what if the sealing number that was announced doesn\u2019t yield the required output for someone, say #7. Such cases are not unusual and the possible reasons for this could be:<br /><br />The transactions that were announced in the network might have been miswritten.<br />The transactions that were announced in the network might have been misheard.<br />When writing transactions he might have tried to cheat or be dishonest, either to favor himself or someone else in the network.<br />#7 has only one choice\u200a\u2014\u200ato discard his page and copy it from someone else so that he too can put it in the folder. He cannot continue writing further transactions unless he doesn\u2019t put his page in the folder. This means that he is no longer part of the network.<br /><br />Then why not sit idle and wait for the announcement and why does everyone spend resources doing the calculation when they know that someone else will calculate and announce it to them?<br /><br />Interesting question because this is where the incentives come in the picture. Everyone who is the part of the Blockchain is eligible for rewards and the first one to calculate the sealing number gets rewarded with free money for his efforts (i.e. expended CPU power and electricity).<br /><br />Simply imagine, #5 gets rewarded with some free money, say $1 if he calculates the sealing number of a page. The money gets minted out of thin air, which means the account balance of #5 gets incremented with $1 without decreasing anyone else\u2019s account balance.<br /><br />That\u2019s how Bitcoin got into existence, because it was the first currency to be transacted on a Blockchain. And in return, people were awarded Bitcoins to keep the efforts going on in the network.<br /><br />capt ajit vadakayil<br />..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n</div>\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5264110010797351615\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/07/difference-between-buddha-and-mahavira.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/07/difference-between-buddha-and-mahavira.html</a><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">MAHAVIRA, THE 24TH THIRHANKARA WAS BORN 6500 YEARS AGO ( 4500 BC )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">THERE WAS NO SIKHISM BEFORE THE DEATH OF TENTH GURU GURU GOBIND SINGH 309 YEARS AGO.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">THERE ARE HUNDREDS OF PROOFS WHY HINDUSIM IS 400 CENTURIES OLD<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">IN THE POST BELOW, THE NARASIMHA IDOL IS CARBON DATED BY MODERN METHODS TO 32,000 BC<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Everybody knows this.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/mother-of-all-civilisations-saraswati.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/mother-of-all-civilisations-saraswati.html</a><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">EVERYBODY KNOWS THAT MAHABHARATA WAS FOUGHT IN 4000 BC, AND THE FINAL BATTLE BETWEEN DURYODHANA AND BHIMA WAS FOUGHT IN AN ISOLATED POOL OF THE DEAD SARASWATI RIVER..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">BALARAMA WITNESSED THIS FIGHT -- HE HAS JUST COME BACK AFTER DIVERTING THE TRAPPED SARAWATI TO GANGES RIVER, USING HIS PLOUGH. SARASWATI RIVERs GLACIAL MOUTH WAS LOCKED BY A TECTONIC SHIFT , CAUSING THE RIVER TO BE NON-PERENIAL<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">THE WHITE MAN DID NOT WANT ANY INDIAN HISTORY TO BE EARLIER THAN 4004 BC -- AS THE COOKED UP BIBLE BY THE FIRST POPE AT 325 AD FIRST COUNCIL OF NICEA PUT THE BIG BANG AT 4004 BC--AT 9 AM , 23RD OCT.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">THE ROMAN EMPEROR AND THE POPE SACKED ROME SEVERAL TIMES-TO GET RIG OF ALL TRACES OF THE KERALA SAGE APOLLONIUM OF TYANA .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">JESUS CHRIST WAS MODELLED AFTER APOLLONIUS AND HIS SIDE KICK DAMISA WHOSE WIFE WAS MARY MAGDELENE A NAMBOODIRI WOMAN .&nbsp; &nbsp;THE PROFESSORS IN KODUNGALLUR UNIVERISTY GAVE THE COSMIC ALLEGORIES OF THE BIBLE . JESUS CHRIST NEVER EXISTED<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "220", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/3946180011923804903/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "5375366183281810753", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2017-10-23T05:13:00+05:30", "updated": "2017-10-25T18:39:53+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxNTA4OTM2OTkzMDU0Cm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/10/blockchain-smart-contracts-part-5-capt.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/5375366183281810753", "title": "BLOCKCHAIN, SMART CONTRACTS , PART 5 - CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"background-color: lime; color: red;\">THIS POST IS CONTINUED FROM PART 4, BELOW--</span></b><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/10/blockchain-smart-contracts-part-4-capt.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/10/blockchain-smart-contracts-part-4-capt.html</a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">DLT , Distributed ledger technology (\nBLOCKCHAIN ) can help prevent duplicate insurance claims.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Probably, one of the potentially more\npowerful applications in financial services is in customer verification, the\nso-called \"know-your-customer\" or KYC process.&nbsp;&nbsp; In India we can arrest illegal aliens who\nhave multiple Aadhar and PAN cards<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Banks spend an inordinate amount of time and\nmoney on KYC, and yet struggle to effectively detect and deter money\nlaundering, tax evasion, and other forms of illicit finance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">DLT brings about opportunities for a shared\nindustry-wide KYC utility that can verify customers and transactions in a more\nefficient and robust manner.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The \"killer app\" for DLT is really\nin cross-border transactions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">When multiple entities across different\njurisdictions are involved, there is no natural trusted central party.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">DLT allows the possibility of various parties\nworking directly with one another to make cross-border transactions cheaper,\nfaster, and safer.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Cross-border trade is a good example.&nbsp; In we are explore two specific applications -\ntrade finance and trade documentation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In trade finance, &nbsp;DLT can be used to prevent the problem of\nduplicate invoicing while preserving client confidentiality.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The logistics industry is ripe for a major\nchange, as there are several layers involved in the process. From drivers,\ncarriers and haulers, to shippers and forwarders and more -- the interactions\nand overall shipping procedure could be downsized to be more efficient with\nblockchain technology.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Cases wherein the same piece of land has been\nregistered or sold to multiple people are very common, especially in cities\nwith booming real estate markets. Often, the turbidity in titles and documents\nis created to make for a situation where greasing palms is the easiest way out.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Now, imagine if all land were digitised into\ntokens and put on a blockchain where each token represents a particular piece\nof land and the person who owns the land will own the token.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Being on the\nblockchain every transaction or change of hand the property went through would\nhave been logged in the blockchain. Being on the blockchain also ensures that\nthe logs cannot be tampered with.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">BLOCKCHAIN CAN KILL MAFIA..&nbsp; &nbsp; MAFIA IN CITIES HAVE A NEXUS WITH REAL ESTATE\nDEVELOPERS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;IN\nMUMBAI THERE IS HARDLY ANY UNDISPUTED LAND<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">IN HINDU LAW, THE ANCESTRAL PROPERTY (\nINHERITED ) CANNT BE WILLED .&nbsp; IT HAS TO\nBE DISTRIBUTED EQUALLY AMONG CHILDREN<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">There cannot be a duplicate token on the\nblockchain ensuring that every land has only one title. Also if a token was\nstolen, i.e a title deed has been stolen, the proper owner of the token can be\nidentified and also verify if the transfer of token was legit.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Further, if a\nproperty is sold to multiple properties or inherited by siblings, the old token\ncould be updated with new details or a new token issued for the split part of\nthe property.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Any transformation which helps small\nbusinesses compete with giants will have major global effects.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Consider the problem that small manufacturers\nhave dealing with giants like Wal-Mart. To keep transaction costs and the costs\nof carrying each product line down, large companies generally only buy from\ncompanies that can service a substantial percentage of their customers.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">But if\nthe cost of carrying a new product was tiny, a much larger number of small\nmanufacturers might be included in the value network.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Amazon carries this\napproach a long way, with enormous numbers of small vendors selling through the\nsame platform, but the idea carried to its limit is eBay and Craigslist, which\nbring business right down to the individual level.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">While it\u2019s hard to imagine a\nWal-Mart with the diversity of products offered by Amazon or even eBay, that is\nthe kind of future we are moving into.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain\u2019s ability to prevent double\nspending could, in theory, remove the problem of double bookings in the\nindustry<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">With blockchain, once a payment has been\nmade, typically you can\u2019t reverse it. And this mechanism will make fraudulent\ncases easier to spot and less likely to occur.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain uses a shared, secure ledger to\ntrack and approve each component, or block, within a transaction. Each step in\nthe transaction is represented by a block.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The blocks are connected within a\nsecure chain as a transactional record. And each block in the chain has a\ntimestamp and other identifying data to prove who did what and when.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The multiple layers of approval and review\nare eliminated with blockchain, packaging the transaction in a single linear\nchain of request and approval. This process creates a complete record of any\ntype of asset transfer.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Think of\nbanking, payment processing, contracts management, wills and real estate, money\ntransfers, and medical records\u2014all can be better protected with blockchain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Protection from identity theft and fraud is a\nconstant challenge for everyone involved in buying and selling. Merchants,\nconsumers, issuers, and acquirers know there are vulnerabilities in how\npayments and data are secured.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">With each innovation in security technology,\nhackers and fraudsters learn how to outsmart the technology and breach these\nnetworks.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain van enhance structural security of\nIoT devices. Devices in such network settings can recognize and interact with\neach other in a peer-to-peer manner, without the need for a third-party\nauthority.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Accompanied with two-factor authentication, this offers\nunprecedented security to the network structure and makes it impossible to\nforge digital security certificates.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Internet of things (IoT) is the\nnetwork of physical devices, vehicles, and other items embedded with\nelectronics, software, sensors, actuators, and network connectivity which\nenable these objects to collect and exchange data.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Internal communications are often prone to\ndata leaks and cyber espionage. End-to-end encryption fails to cover the\nmetadata, which can lead to leakage of sensitive information. In\nblockchain-based systems, the metadata used for communications is scattered in\nthe distributed ledger and cannot be collected at one centralized point. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Messenger services today encompass a large\namount of Internet usage across the globe, especially with apps such as\nFacebook Messenger,WhatsApp tec already being used for payments and to engage\nusers through chatbots.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">With the count of a billion-plus users with these apps,\nthere is an inherent danger of social engineering, hacks, and other security\nvulnerabilities. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain-decentralized network, cannot be\ncensored or controlled by any single source. In addition, communications\nmeta-data is scattered throughout the distributed ledger, reducing the risk of\nsurveillance through such digital fingerprints. Users need not link to their\nemail addresses or telephone numbers, thereby increasing privacy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchains can increase security on three\nfronts:---</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Prevention of identity theft<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Protection against data tampering<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Protection of critical infrastructure<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">By eliminating human error, facilitating\nautomatic detection of fraud, and creating a virtual impenetrable fence around\ndata, identities, and transactions, blockchain technology has laid the\nfoundation for a future of smart contracts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Smart contracts (also known as digital\ncontracts) help you exchange money, property, shares, or anything of value in a\ntransparent, conflict-free way while avoiding the services of a middleman.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">These self-executing contracts are treaties with\nthe terms of the agreement between buyer and seller being directly written into\nlines of code. The code and the agreements contained therein exist across a\ndistributed, decentralized blockchain network..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain relies on 51%\napproval of those involved in the transaction. Third-party approval is not\nrequired or permitted. Only those in the chain can access and approve.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Paper is replaced with digital data. Proof of\npurchase, approval records, receipt of items, and other payment data is stored\nin the blockchain. The merchant, issuer, acquirer, and customer all have access\nto the same secure data\u2014saving time and money in the event of a chargeback\nrepresentment<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Error and complexity are thwarted. Fake data,\nerrors in approval, double purchases, etc. are prevented within the linked\nblockchain process. Fraudulent data cannot be inserted into the blockchain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This secure chain of data approval and\ntransfer can change the way information is exchanged. The pressures and\ninsecurities of customers, merchants, issuers, and acquirers can be alleviated\nwithin this new level of communication and data storage.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">By removing the\nexpectations on each participant in a purchase, risk is eliminated\u2014providing\neveryone with a more secure way of doing business.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b>BEWARE\n\u2013THE WHITE JEWS WANT TO USE BLOCKCHAIN AND REGULARISE THEIR GRABBED LANDS \u2013&nbsp;&nbsp; BEING THE EARLY BIRDS WHO WILL MONOPOLISE AND EAT ALL THE\nWORMS.. &nbsp;</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>IN GEORGIA AND UKRAINE WHITE JEWS ARE MERRILY DOING THIS WITH NOBODY TO STOP THEM</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/yuhxFPWokcQ/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/yuhxFPWokcQ?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>A few\nmonths ago, the Bitfury Group has announced its land titling partnership with\nthe government of Ukraine</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\">WHITE JEWS ARE THRILLED -&nbsp; &nbsp;THEY ARE SURE NOBODY GOT THE WHIFF OF TREMENDOUS FRAUD&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">ATLANT,&nbsp; a\nblockchain platform, is challenging the business model of Airbnb and Expedia by\noffering peer-to-peer rental on the blockchain&nbsp;\n. On ATLANT, there\u2019s no intermediary to process payments and take a cut.\nMoreover, the history of every property owner and renter is transparently\navailable on the blockchain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nATLANT platform, set for launch in March 2018, offers the most efficient\nsolution for buying &amp; selling tokenized property units, eliminating high\nbarriers of entry, expensive attorneys, and also aims to disrupt Airbnb and\nBooking with their inflated rental intermediary fees and <b style=\"background-color: white;\">fake reviews.</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Airbnb\nis an online marketplace and hospitality service, enabling people to lease or\nrent short-term lodging including vacation rentals, apartment rentals,\nhomestays, hostel beds, or hotel rooms.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The company does not own any lodging;\nit is merely a broker and receives percentage service fees (commissions) from\nboth guests and hosts in conjunction with every booking.&nbsp; &nbsp;It has\nover 3,000,000 lodging listings in 65,000 cities and 191 countries,and the cost\nof lodging is set by the host.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\">\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><b><br /></b></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">BLOCKCHAIN MUST GET RID OF LAWYERS FROM\nHANDLING PETTY MATTERS AND CHARGING EXHORBITANT FEES<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">WHY DO WE NEED LAWYERS TO SETTLE PETTY CLAIMS\nAND EGO RELATED CASES?<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">WE NEED A JURY SYSTEM IN BLOCKCHAIN\u2014JURY WHO\nHAS THE SPECIAL EXPERTISE TO DECIDE ON MATTERS BEYOND THE CEREBRAL CAPABILITIES\nOF THE LAWYER AND LOSER LAWYER TUENED JUDGE\u2014BOTH BOTTOM DREGS OF THE SCHOOL\nCEREBRAL BARREL<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\">IN INDIA ONCE WE EMBRACE BLOCKCHAIN WE NEED\nTO TOTALLY REVAMP THE JUDICIARY. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;THIS\nPILLAR IS ROTTEN TO THE CORE</span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n<b><br /></b></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Fraud is a major\nproblem across all forms of insurance. It drives up the cost for both insurers\nand policy holders. The Coalition Against Insurance Fraud estimates that over\n$80 billion a year is lost to fraud.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Health insurance fraud\ncan come in multiple forms\u2014ranging \u201cfrom providers submitting claims for\nservices never rendered to up-coding services to receive higher payments.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Fraud may be committed\nby different parties involved in insurance transactions: applicants for\ninsurance, policyholders, third-party claimants and professionals who provide\nservices and equipment to claimants.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Common frauds include \u201cpadding,\u201d or\ninflating actual claims; misrepresenting facts on an insurance application;\nsubmitting claims for injuries or damage that never occurred, services never\nrendered or equipment never delivered; and \u201cstaging\u201d accidents.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;Fraud may come up at the very early\nstages\u2014during the application process\u2014in case one glosses over a critical\nmedical diagnosis on his record. A person can also commit fraud by withholding\ninformation about being on some other insurance plans (that can potentially\ncover the services used). Or, by filling a claim on behalf of ineligible\nmembers/dependents (e.g., using a mutual insurance plan after divorce).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain can minimize\ncounterfeiting, double booking, document, or contract alterations. The\ntechnology may enable insurers to create receipts at any stage of the claims\nprocess, while ensuring an immutable and auditable record of all the claims\nactivities. Thus, all the participants can get a \u201cdistributed, single view of\nthe entire exposure data chain.\u201d&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Using blockchain, healthcare organizations can\nsafely share data to create a comprehensive electronic healthcare record for\nall patients. Patients and other authorized users can then provide private keys\nto give access to physicians and insurers to ensure data security.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In addition\nto improving security while data sharing, blockchain can play its role in\nautomating and streamlining insurance processes. Typically, insurers operate\nwithin a single territory. This is because of the complexity involved in having\nto comply with the laws and regulations of multiple countries.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain-powered\ntravel insurance app can allow for getting an instant, automated payout in case\nyour flight was delayed or cancelled-- by DIP\u2014a decentralized insurance\nplatform. Blockchain technology has the power to simplify&nbsp; insurance claims process, alleviate high\npremiums, help insurers create niche coverage and, most importantly, benefit\nthose who live in catastrophe regions.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain is powerful because of its\nsecure platform connecting capabilities. New distribution methods like\npeer-to-peer insurance (P2P) could end up restructuring the entire market. P2P\ninsurance empowers policyholders to a greater portion of the premiums rather\nthan the individual private wealth managers working to produce returns for\ninsurance companies..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">If an earthquake were\nto occur in a given region above a magnitude of 5, the smart contract would\nautomatically pay 20 percent of the insurance claim to policy holders.\nContracts require mutually trusted third-party administrators (TPAs) to\nadjust.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain implementation will\nmean that insurance companies will have to change their underwriting process,\nthe structure of the policy, as well as risk underwriting.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain allows\nfor cheaper, more consumer-oriented products to be developed that could chip\naway at the premiums collected by large insurance companies. An ideal scenario\nwould be the cooperation between Blockchain startups, carriers, brokers,\nreinsurers, etc.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Etherisc, an Insurtech\nstartup based in the Munich , has won the Blockchain Oscar for Most Innovative\nBlockchain Startup.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Etherisc aims to make\nthe purchase and sale of insurance more efficient, enable lower operational\ncosts, provide greater transparency to the insurance industry, and democratize\naccess to reinsurance investments.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The company co-founders have deep\nbackgrounds in mathematics, research, the banking and finance sectors, and\nenterprise IT. Etherisc focused on writing individual policies for flight\ndelays with its winning submission.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The insurance industry\ngenerates more than US$4.6 trillion in annual revenue, about 6.5 % of the\nentire global economy<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Insurance system is\nhighly asymmetric: insurance customers are in a very weak position against\ninsurance companies and rely on their reaction when they most need\nsupport.&nbsp; Insurance companies have a\nclear conflict of interest: paying out customer claims reduces their profits.\nThe processes to implement regulatory limits inevitably create expensive\nadditional overhead\u200a\u2014\u200aand that cost is passed onto customers through elevated\npremiums.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Etherisc provides a viable alternative precisely because smart\ncontracts are ideal for insurance: They can remove the need to trust one\ncentral authority. They can align the interests of global crowds of\nindividuals, offer automated systems, bring vast improvements in efficiency and\nfacilitate risk-sharing. Given the current frustration in persuading insurance\ncompanies to compensate customers, smart contracts remove the need to submit\npaperwork.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Payouts can be automated and the embedded conditions cannot be\nmodified. This works especially well with \u201cparametric\u201d insurance: highly\nautomated processes, underwriting and payouts based solely on data, and\nalgorithms triggered when certain parameters are met. This creates highly\npredictable and provably fair insurance products.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">An estimated 11 % of\nhealthcare costs are fraudulent, resulting from excessive billing or billing\nfor non-performed services. In USA alone, Medicare fraud caused around $35\nmillion in losses a year. Blockchain-based systems can provide realistic\nsolutions for minimizing these medical billing-related frauds.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">By automating\nthe majority of claim adjudication and payment processing activities,\nblockchain systems could help to eliminate the need for intermediaries and\nreduce the administrative costs and time for providers and payers. Blockchain\ncould also have significant ramifications for improving some of the huge logistical\ninformation tracking hurdles of reliability-centered maintenance (RCM)\nfunctions.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Reliability-centered maintenance (RCM) is a process to ensure that\nsystems continue to do what their users require in their present operating\ncontext. It is generally used to achieve improvements in fields such as the\nestablishment of safe minimum levels of maintenance.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Reliability Centered\nMaintenance (RCM) analysis provides a structured framework for analyzing the\nfunctions and potential failures for a physical asset (such as a ship,&nbsp; airplane, a manufacturing production line,\netc.) with a focus on preserving system functions, rather than preserving\nequipment.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">RCM is used to develop scheduled maintenance plans that will provide\nan acceptable level of operability, with an acceptable level of risk, in an\nefficient and cost-effective manner.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;
