text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ztQUR1Cbjto/WfBjkRXSrfI/AAAAAAABWVQ/SimarqxQUYk2U5q14XvpYzmZ3FRJ_w0zACLcBGAs/s1600/imaKges.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"162\" data-original-width=\"311\" height=\"332\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ztQUR1Cbjto/WfBjkRXSrfI/AAAAAAABWVQ/SimarqxQUYk2U5q14XvpYzmZ3FRJ_w0zACLcBGAs/s640/imaKges.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-4p7B9UE_RfM/WfBjrW1jl2I/AAAAAAABWVU/UGabkeaBT2A-9AJpr4ksXqPcL3MG3vwMACLcBGAs/s1600/draKin.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"300\" data-original-width=\"800\" height=\"240\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-4p7B9UE_RfM/WfBjrW1jl2I/AAAAAAABWVU/UGabkeaBT2A-9AJpr4ksXqPcL3MG3vwMACLcBGAs/s640/draKin.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/02/black-is-black-white-is-white-capt-ajit.html\"><span style=\"background-color: lime; font-size: large;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/02/black-is-black-white-is-white-capt-ajit.html</span></a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">There\nwere two main issues that made this possible: the fact that when the DAO smart\ncontract was created the coders did not take into account the possibility of a\nrecursive call and the fact that the smart contract first sent the ETH funds\nand then updated the internal token balance.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The code written for The DAO had\nmultiple bugs, and the recursive call exploit was one of them. Another way to\nlook at this situation is to compare Ethereum to the Internet and any\napplication based on Ethereum to a website - If a website is not working, it\ndoesn't mean that the Internet is not working, it simply means that one website\nhas a problem.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The hacker stopped draining The DAO for unknown reasons, even\nthough he could have continued to do so<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A decentralized autonomous organization\n(DAO), sometimes labeled a decentralized autonomous corporation (DAC), is an\norganization that is run through rules encoded as computer programs called\nsmart contracts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A DAO's financial transaction record and\nprogram rules are maintained on a blockchain. the conceptual essence of a\ndecentralized autonomous organization has been typified as the ability of\nblockchain technology to provide a secure digital ledger that tracks financial\ninteractions across the internet, hardened against forgery by trusted\ntimestamping and by dissemination of a distributed database.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;This\napproach eliminates the need to involve a bilaterally accepted trusted third\nparty in a financial transaction, thus simplifying the sequence. The costs of a\nblockchain enabled transaction and of making available the associated data may\nbe substantially lessened by the elimination of both the trusted third party\nand of the need for repetitious recording of contract exchanges in different\nrecords: for example, the blockchain data could in principle, if regulatory\nstructures permitted, replace public documents such as deeds and titles.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In theory, a blockchain approach allows\nmultiple cloud computing users to enter a loosely coupled peer-to-peer smart\ncontract collaboration. In 2016, a specific DAO, \u201cThe DAO\u201d, set a record for\nthe largest crowdfunding campaign to date. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">However, researchers pointed out multiple\nissues in the code of The DAO. The operational procedure for The DAO allows\ninvestors to withdraw at will any money that has not yet been committed to a\nproject; the funds could thus deplete quickly. Although safeguards aim to\nprevent gaming the voting of shareholders to win investments, there were a\n\"number of security vulnerabilities\". <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">These enabled an attempted large withdrawal\nof funds from The DAO that was initiated in mid-June 2016.&nbsp; &nbsp;However, after much\ndebate, on the 20th July 2016, the Ethereum community arrived at a consensus\ndecision to hard fork the Ethereum blockchain to bailout the original contract.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<b><br /><br /><br /><br /><br /><br /><br /><br /><br /><br /><br /><br /><br /><br /><br /><br /><br /><br /><br /><br /><br /><br /><br /><br /><br /><br /><br /><br /><br /><br /><br /><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><a href=\"https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/lucknow/waqf-min-claims-receiving-suggestions-on-shia-sunni-waqf-board-merger-seeks-legal-advice/articleshow/61174915.cms\">https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/lucknow/waqf-min-claims-receiving-suggestions-on-shia-sunni-waqf-board-merger-seeks-legal-advice/articleshow/61174915.cms</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"></span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">JEW ROTHSCHILD CREATED\nPROTESTANT CHRISTIANS..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">JEW ROTHSCHILD CREATED\nSUNNIS..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHY ARE SHIAS AND\nSUNNIS KILLING EACH OTHER ?..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE REASON IS THE\nPEOPLE WHO CONTROL YOU MUSLIMS READ FROM RIGHT TO LEFT\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">HEBREW AND ARABIC ARE\nREAD FROM RIGHT TO LEFT\u2026..&nbsp; BOTH\nLANGUAGES WERE CREATED BY DISGRACED KERALA NAMBOODIRIS ( WHO WERE HOMOSEXUALS\nAND LEFT HANDED ) -- KEPT ISOLATED AT MINICOY ISLAND..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">MY REVELATIONS JUMP TO\n</span><span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>51.80 %...</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">PEOPLE IN KERALA IN\nANCIENT TIME WERE BROADLY DIVIDED INTO TWO --MALAYARS ( BLUNT FACED MOUNTAIN\nDENIZENS --.TODAY CALLED EZHAVAS / ADIVASIS ) AND THIRAYYARS ( SEA SHORE\nDWELLERS--TODAY CALLED THIYYAS&nbsp; )\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIRA -MEANS --SEA WAVE\u2026\nWE WERE THE MOST ANCIENT NAVIGATORS WHO USED COCONUT SEXTANT &nbsp;AND SEAWORTHY SHIPS ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THERAM -MEANS --SHORE \u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIYYAS PATRON GURU IS\nRISHI THERAYAR-THE FIRST DISCIPLE OF MAHARISHIS AGASTYA..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIYYAS ARE THE ONES\nKILLING EACH OTHER AT KANNUR..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">RSS IS HINDU --GOD\nFEARING..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">COMMIE IS ALSO HINDU--\nBUT ATHEISTS CREATED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">EVERY VESTIGE OF ANCIENT\nKNOWLEDGE CAME FROM THIYYAS WHO WERE RULERS ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">NAMBOODIRIPADS ARE\nSANSKRIT PROFICIENT CREAM OF THIYYAS ..THEY KNEW VEDAS ON ORAL ROUTE ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">BHATTATHIRIPADS ARE\nMATH PROFICIENT CREAM OF NAMBOODIRIS.. ARYAN BHATTATHIRIPAD IS ARYABHATTA \u2013A VISITING\nPROFESSOR AT NALANDA UNIVERSITY ..<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/08/chanakya-taxila-university-professor.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/08/chanakya-taxila-university-professor.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">NAMBOODIRIS WERE BY\nPROFESSORS BY PROFESSION AT KODUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY ( OWNED BY CALICUT THIYYAS\nKING ) -- WHO WERE VISITING LECTURERES&nbsp; IN\nANCIENT UNIVESITIES LIKE TAXILA/ NALANDA/ SARASWATI DHAR\u2014AYURVEDA/ ASTRONOMY/\nMATHS/ SCIENCE ETC <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">NOBODY HEARD OF RULING\nCLASS KERALA VARMAS TILL THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA. .. ROTHSCHILD DEMOTED\nANCIENT RULING CLASS THIYYAS TO COCONUT TREE TODDY TAPPERS ( BASICALLY KINGS\nCONVERTED TO HEATHEN MONKEY )..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIYYAS WERE DANAVAS (\nASURAS )..&nbsp; IN ANCIENT PERSIA ASURAS ARE\nGODS ( AHURA )--THEY CANNOT PRONOUNCE ALPHABET &nbsp;\u201c S \u201c .. &nbsp;ASURAS HAD SHUKRACHARYA AS MENTOR.&nbsp; THE REST HAD BRIHASPATI AS MENTOR<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE WHOLE PLANET BEFORE\n7000 BC WAS DIVIDED INTO TWO --FOLLOWERS OF SHUKRACHARYA AND FOLLOWERS OF\nBRIHASPATI ( MENTOR OF DEVAS ) .&nbsp; ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">BOTH THESE MAHARISHIS\nWERE BITTER ENEMIES . ..REASON WAS BOTH WERE CLASSMATES IN THE SAME GURUKUL\nWHERE BRIHASPATIs FATHER MAHARISHIS ANGIRASA WAS GURU. .. AND THOUGH\nSHUKRACHARYA WAS BETTER THAN BRIHASPATI&nbsp; EVERY\nWHICH WAY THERE WAS NEPOTISM.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHEN DEVAS WANTED A\nGURU MAHARISHI ANGIRASA SUGGESTED HIS SON BRIHASPATIs NAME <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">DEKECTED AND AGRY\nSHUKRACHARYA WENT AND OFFERED HIS SERVICES TO KERALA DANAVA KING MAHABALI<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">SHUKRACHARYAs DAUGHTHER\nTHE BEAUTIFUL DEVYANI WAS TRAPPED IN \u201cLOVE JIHAD \u201c BY KACHCHA , SON OF\nBRIHASPATI..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">SHUKRACHARYA ASKED KING\nMAHABALI TO PROCLAIM HIMSELF EMPEROR AND CONDUCT THE ASHWAMEDHA YAGNA ( A\nBLOODLESS SACRIFICE -A VOTE OF CONFIDENCE ) \u2013TO SPITE BRIHASPATI..<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/09/ashwamedha-yagam-bloodless-sacrifice.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/09/ashwamedha-yagam-bloodless-sacrifice.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS GOT THE RIVAL\nDEVAS TERRIBLY UPSET AND THEN HAPPENED THE EPISODE -- WHIC CREATED A FESTIVAL\nCALLED ONAM - -CELEBRATED ONLY IN KERALA-- WITH GREAT GUSTO--BY EVEN MUSLIMS\nAND CHRISTIANS TODAY<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/09/why-kerala-does-not-celebrate-diwali-or.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/09/why-kerala-does-not-celebrate-diwali-or.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">MAHABALIS FATHER\nVIROCHANA RULED THE WHOLE WORLD \u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">MAHABALI WAS KICKED\nINTO PATALA ( PERU ) BY VAMANA AVATAR OF VISHNU..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/07/maya-inca-aztec-civilizations-decoded.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/07/maya-inca-aztec-civilizations-decoded.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">KORAN WAS EDITED AT\nCHERAMAN PERUMAL MOSQUE . .. CHERAMAN PERUMAL WAS KING OF CALICUT --CALLED BY\nARABS EVEN TODAY A THIYYAJUDDIN. ( RULER OF THIYYAS )..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">CHERAMAN PERUMALs BODY\nIS BURIED AT SALALAH ( STATE OF DHOFAR --CURRENT DAY SOUTH OMAN/ NORTH YEMEN &nbsp;) . ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">DHOFAR KINGDOM WAS\nOWNED BY THE CALICUT KING FOR THOUSANDS OF YEARS --SO WAS MECCA OASIS, MADEIN\nSALEH , PETRA, AND PALESTINE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">JUDAISM WAS CREATED BY\nDISGRACED NAMBOODIRIS ... EVERY TIME THE ANCIENT JEWS GOT PERSECUTED THEY CAME\nRUNNING BACK TO KERALA CRYING MOMMMIIEEEEEE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/bar-kokhba-in-fight-to-finish-over.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/bar-kokhba-in-fight-to-finish-over.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">KING SOLOMONs ( HERO &nbsp;OF JEWS ) &nbsp;MOTHER BATH SHEBA WAS A NAMBOODIRI WOMAN<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">KING SOLOMONs WIFE\nQUEEN OF SHEBA WAS A NAMBOODIRI WOMAN. SOLOMONs SEAL WAS IN MALAYALAM SCRIPT..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">LAND OF SHEBA WAS ALSO\nKNOWN AS PUNT/ OPHIR .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">MECCA OASIS IS NOW DEAD....\nONLY A WELL REMAINS WHICH GIVES ZAM ZAM HOLY WATER..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE SHIVA TEMPLE WAS AT\nTHE EDGE OF THIS MECCA OASIS--THE SPOT IS NOW OCCUPIED BY KAABA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">WHERE THE SHIVA LINGAM\nGOT SUBMERGED BY WATER IN A FLOOD , &nbsp;THE\nNAMBOODIRI PRIESTS YOUNGER BROTHERs SON (MOHAMMAD ) UPROOTED THE SHIVA LINGAM\nBLACK STONE AND FIXED IT ABOVE WATER 5 FEET ABOVE THE\nGROUND--HORIZONTALLY AT THE SE CORNER .&nbsp; </span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS ACT KICK STARTED\nTHE BEGINNINGS OF A NEW RELIGION NAMED ISLAM.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">EVEN TODAY KAABA GETS\nFLOODED .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; THE\nYOUNGER BROTHERS CAN ONLY DO SAMBANDHAM ( BRIEF SEXUAL LIAISON ) DISCARDING THEIR\nOFF SPRINGS ( NAIRS ) <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/10/worst-racists-on-planet-earth-capt-ajit.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/10/worst-racists-on-planet-earth-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">MOHAMMAD CREATED A NEW\nRELIGION WHERE EVEN THE YOUNGER BROTHER COULD MARRY 4 TIMES -- &nbsp;RATHER THAN DO MERE SEXUAL SAMBANDHAM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS 4 WIVES THINGY WAS\nA GREAT ATTRACTION AND LOCAL HINDU PEOPLE CONVERTED LIKE WILD FIRE\u2026. INSTANT\nTRIPLE TALAQ IS NOT MENTIONED IN KORAN<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE ELDEST BROTHER\nNAMBOODIRI PRIEST WHO WAS IN THE SALARY ROLL OF THE KING OF CALICUT CHERAMAN\nPERUMAL --SEND A FALCON ( FAX ) AND ASKED HIM TO RUSH TO MECCA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Below: Secret photo of Kaaba interior--note ancient Shiva Lingam copper pots are still hanging&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 20px !important; padding: 0px; width: 652px;\">\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"></span><br />\n<div id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3471\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; padding-top: 20px;\">\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">Sombhai Modi, 75, was on the dais at a function organised by an NGO in Pune in 2015 when the compere let slip that he was Prime Minister&nbsp;<a data-saferedirecturl=\"https://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://indiatoday.intoday.in/people/narendra-modi/17737.html&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1508857410067000&amp;usg=AFQjCNE-f0q-UZb6OuuUskqdtHWdfFAQww\" href=\"http://indiatoday.intoday.in/people/narendra-modi/17737.html\" id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3472\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; color: #193984; font-size: 14px; outline-style: initial; outline-width: 0px; text-decoration-line: none !important;\" target=\"_blank\">Narendra Modi</a>'s eldest brother. There was some excitement in the audience until Sombhai, who runs an eldercare facility in Modi's ancestral town Vadnagar, stepped up to clarify. \"There is a screen between me and Prime Minister Modi,\" he said. \"I can see that screen, but to you it is invisible. I am the brother of Narendra Modi, and not the prime minister. For Prime Minister Modi, I am only one of the 125 crore people of India who are his brothers and sisters.\"</span></div>\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3473\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; padding-top: 20px;\">\n</div>\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3474\" style=\"border: 0px solid rgb(215, 215, 215); box-sizing: initial !important; float: left; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; width: 652px;\">\n<div id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3475\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; width: 652px;\">\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\nThe PM's eldest brother Sombhai, 75, with residents of the old-age home he runs in Vadnagar</span></h2>\n</div>\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\n<div id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3481\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\n<div id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3482\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3486\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; padding-top: 20px;\">\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">This wasn't mere hyperbole. Sombhai hasn't met his younger brother in the past two-and-a-half years. The brothers have only spoken on the phone. His younger sibling, Pankaj, an officer in the Gujarat information department, has been luckier. He got to meet his famous brother because their mother, Heeraben, stays with him at his modest three-room house in Gandhinagar. (The prime minister met his mother Heeraben twice in the state capital in the past six months and hosted her at his Delhi residence for a week this May.)</span></div>\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3487\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; padding-top: 20px;\">\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">India's prime ministers have traditionally been family men. Nehru lived with Indira, his successor Lal Bahadur Shastri moved into 1 Motilal Nehru Place with the extended Shastri clan, including children and grandchildren. Indira Gandhi's children Sanjay and Rajiv and their families stayed with her. Even bachelor prime minister A.B. Vajpayee had company. When he moved into 7 Race Course Road in 1998, his adopted foster family, Namita Bhattacharya and her husband Ranjan, moved in with him.</span></div>\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3488\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; padding-top: 20px;\">\n</div>\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3489\" style=\"border: 0px solid rgb(215, 215, 215); box-sizing: initial !important; float: left; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; width: 652px;\">\n<div id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3490\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; width: 652px;\">\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3494\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; padding-top: 20px;\">\n</div>\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3495\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; padding-top: 20px;\">\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">Prime Minister Modi, the third of six children, born to a tea stall owner, Damodardas Mulchand Modi, and his homemaker wife Heeraben, wears his familial detachment on his sleeve. It's a useful foil to remind people of his 'selfless' image. As recently as&nbsp;<span class=\"aBn\" data-term=\"goog_1594120616\" style=\"border-bottom: 1px dashed rgb(204, 204, 204); position: relative; top: -2px; z-index: 0;\" tabindex=\"0\"><span class=\"aQJ\" style=\"position: relative; top: 2px; z-index: -1;\">November 14</span></span>, barely a week after announcing the demonestisation move, Modi hit an emotional note at a public function in Goa. \"I was not born to assume a chair of high office. Whatever I had, my family, my home...I left it for the nation...\" he said, holding back tears. Arguably, Modi's detachment has helped to blunt any personal allegations against him in the debate on demonetisation.</span></div>\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3496\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; padding-top: 20px;\">\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">Just how far behind he has left his family is evident from a visit to Gujarat. The Modi clan continues to live the life of middle-class obscurity they did when their famous family member first became chief minister in 2001. Another of the PM's elder brothers, Amrutbhai, 72, retired as fitter for a private company, drawing a salary of less than Rs 10,000 a month in 2005. He leads a quiet, retired life in his four-room middle class dwelling in Ahmedabad's Ghatlodia locality with son, Sanjay, 47, a small entrepreneur, and his wife and two children. Sanjay's son Nirav and daughter Nirali are both engineering students. An ITI certificate holder, Sanjay fashions small engineering spare parts at his lathe machine shop and makes a modest living. The family car, bought in 2009, is parked outside the house, covered. It is sparingly used as the family mostly travels by two-wheeler.</span><br />\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3497\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; padding-top: 20px;\">\n</div>\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3498\" style=\"border: 0px solid rgb(215, 215, 215); box-sizing: initial !important; float: left; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; width: 652px;\">\n<div id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3499\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; width: 652px;\">\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><img align=\"left\" alt=\"\" class=\"m_-6608482998464461926img-overlay-selected CToWUd a6T\" id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3500\" src=\"https://ci6.googleusercontent.com/proxy/EEd3FwgPT2w1njMRyt2ch-fAovKVm5ial9Eh2MODXD8tf_Qcg5X8vIxjHjO6gjM168KoCjgt4vHPz2LB26WtrrzqHKqgBwg5likuBS7mJdUodwkuV5BydFm_ptH3sIahR15c9o4U3o8dBAevH0UstmVUrw=s0-d-e1-ft#http://media2.intoday.in/indiatoday/images/stories//2016December/modifamily3_123016010929.jpg\" style=\"border-color: rgb(215, 215, 215); border-style: solid; border-width: 1px; box-sizing: initial !important; cursor: pointer; margin: 2px 0px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; width: 652px;\" tabindex=\"0\" title=\"\" /></span></div>\n<h2 id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3501\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); border-radius: 0px 0px 4px 4px; box-sizing: initial !important; font-size: 13px; font-weight: 400; line-height: 20px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-align: center; width: 652px;\">\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\nElder brother Amrut Modi, 72, with the iron used by the PM while staying with him in Ahmedabad from 1969-1971</span></h2>\n</div>\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3502\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; padding-top: 20px;\">\n</div>\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3503\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; padding-top: 20px;\">\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">Sanjay's family, who confess they are yet to see the inside of a passenger plane, have met Modi only twice-once in 2003 when, as CM, he hosted a family gathering at his Gandhinagar home, and then on May 16, 2014, the day the BJP fashioned that historic Lok Sabha victory (again at his Gandhinagar residence ). Everyone in the Sattadhar tenement society where they stay knows Amrutbhai is the prime minister's brother. But as a local anecdote goes, officials at the bank where Sanjay has an account, don't know this. His son Priyank was recently spotted in a long queue to withdraw money.</span></div>\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3504\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; padding-top: 20px;\">\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">Sanjay's most cherished possession is a memento that recalls his uncle's early obsession with wearing well-ironed clothes. Modi apparently used the iron while he lived with Amrutbhai in Ahmedabad between 1969 and 1971. Sanjay says he stopped his parents from selling it for scrap in 1984 (indeed, he seems to be one of the earliest believers in his uncle's greatness). \"If Kaka ( Modi ) sees this iron today, he might feel the same way a Titanic survivor would...after seeing the personal effects retrieved from the sunken vessel.\" The house also has another exhibit which might serve well for a future museum for their famous uncle: a Cinni brand table fan that Modi used to beat Ahmedabad's summers.</span></div>\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3505\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; padding-top: 20px;\">\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">In keeping with the RSS ideal, which requires a pracharak to maintain a distance from family members, Narendra Modi started cutting himself off in 1971, focussing more on his work with the Sangh and leading a celibate life. And over the years, this is how things remained as he began his ascent up the political ladder. His relatives, nevertheless, regard him with some pride. The sentiment is reciprocated by the prime minister, evidently relieved as he is at not being besieged by relatives seeking favours. \"It is indeed to the credit of my brothers and cousins that they have continued to live a simple life and never pestered me for anything. In today's world, it is an extremely difficult thing,\" Prime Minister Modi says.</span></div>\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3506\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; padding-top: 20px;\">\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">Some of the family members, though, maintain a distance from Modi's youngest brother, Prahlad Modi, a fair price shop owner and president of the Gujarat State Fair Price Owner's Association. Prahlad was a vocal critic of his elder brother's drive for transparency in the PDS system when he was CM, holding public demonstrations against the 'raid raj' on shop owners.</span></div>\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3507\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; padding-top: 20px;\">\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">Stories of the rest of the Modi clan-the PM's brothers, nephews and nieces or his first cousins-are of simplicity and struggle. In fact, some of them struggle to make ends meet. Modi's first cousin Ashokbhai (son of Modi's late uncle Narsinhdas) used to sell kites, crackers and snacks on a four-wheeled push cart in Vadnagar's Gheekanta bazaar. He now rents out a tiny 8x4 ft shop for Rs 1,500 a month to sell the same articles. The shop earns him about Rs 4,000. With wife Veena, he earns another Rs 3,000 working at a weekly free food outlet for the poor run by local Jain businessmen. Ashokbhai cooks khichdi and kadhi and his wife washes the utensils at the outlet. They live in a ramshackle three-room house in town.</span></div>\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3508\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; padding-top: 20px;\">\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">His elder brother, Bharatbhai, 55, leads an equally tough existence. He works as a petrol pump attendant, earning Rs 6,000 a month, at Lalawada village near Palanpur, over 60 kms from Vadnagar. He comes home every 10 days or so. In Vadnagar, his wife Ramilaben sells eatables, grocery and miscellaneous items from their small home in old Bhojak sheri, earning some Rs 3,000 a month. A third brother, Chandrakantbhai, 48, works as a helper at a charitable gaushala in Ahmedabad.</span><br />\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3509\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; padding-top: 20px;\">\n</div>\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\n</span>\n<div id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3510\" style=\"border: 0px solid rgb(215, 215, 215); box-sizing: initial !important; float: left; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; width: 652px;\">\n<div id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3511\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; width: 652px;\">\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><img align=\"left\" alt=\"\" class=\"CToWUd a6T\" id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3512\" src=\"https://ci5.googleusercontent.com/proxy/Z5_Amq4VIiZRNElPIZsknqkj1Q20Ffarwq2UPqSl44u_CQpxNHaZjCwPdQdMc5NOP6t2k1pK2jCyFod6AymReJsDWRRiKywg4YANdhtaDMxI_76POJ5dA4yGa5KIW2sjS12T-g0gFgPImW2R6f9VtvudXA=s0-d-e1-ft#http://media2.intoday.in/indiatoday/images/stories//2016December/modifamily4_123016010929.jpg\" style=\"border-color: rgb(215, 215, 215); border-style: solid; border-width: 1px; box-sizing: initial !important; cursor: pointer; margin: 2px 0px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; width: 652px;\" tabindex=\"0\" title=\"\" /></span></div>\n<h2 id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3513\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); border-radius: 0px 0px 4px 4px; box-sizing: initial !important; font-size: 13px; font-weight: 400; line-height: 20px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-align: center; width: 652px;\">\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\nAll for scraps: PM Modi's first cousin Arvindbhai, 64, makes around 9,000 a month collecting used oil tins, boxes and other waste material by going house-to-house and then selling them to big scrap dealers</span></h2>\n</div>\n<span id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3470\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\n<div id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3514\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; padding-top: 20px;\">\n</div>\n<div id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3515\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; padding-top: 20px;\">\nArvindbhai, 61, the fourth brother of Ashokbhai and Bharatbhai, is a scrap dealer who collects old oil tins, corrugated boxes and other waste items, going house-to-house in Vadnagar and nearby villages and transporting them by auto-rickshaw or state transport bus. He makes Rs 6,000-7,000 a month, which he says is enough to sustain him and wife Ranjanben (the couple do not have children. Bharatbhai is the highest earner amongst the offspring of Narsinhdas. He and Ramilaben sometimes manage to earn as much as Rs 10,000 a month.</div>\n<div id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3516\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; padding-top: 20px;\">\nThe eldest son of Narsinhdas, Bhogibhai, 67, also has a grocery shop in Vadnagar. Incidently, none of Narsinhdas' five sons studied beyond matriculation. Like his brother Damodardas, Narsinhdas too ran a tea stall near Vadnagar railway station. Damodardas had four brothers apart from Narsinhdas-Narottamdas and Jagjivandas, both of whom have passed away, and Kantilal and Jayantilal, both retired teachers. Jayantilal is now retired and settled in Gandhinagar, while his daughter Leena is married to a bus conductor in Visnagar town near Vadnagar. Says Bharatbhai Modi, an RSS worker in Vadnagar who belongs to the PM's caste, \"No one in Vadnagar or Ahmedabad has ever seen any of Narendrabhai's relatives throwing their weight around ever. This is a unique thing in today's world.\"<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3517\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; padding-top: 20px;\">\n</div>\n<div id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3518\" style=\"border: 0px solid rgb(215, 215, 215); box-sizing: initial !important; float: left; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; width: 652px;\">\n<div id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3519\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; width: 652px;\">\n<img align=\"left\" alt=\"\" class=\"CToWUd a6T\" id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3520\" src=\"https://ci3.googleusercontent.com/proxy/UwFVRAruTS9os-sE8lE-16iD81hAMf1h3QVzMhVp8xF4OjHzwTjk85fuqZ_7H0c04VvXmm8LfjZjNWQzTK4RdfI78qQlZDnJqrg8TMFWObD6b4v4-YjV6UHP689PRBDzxhcDvSwOsIn_Gt2aBUYiereY7Q=s0-d-e1-ft#http://media2.intoday.in/indiatoday/images/stories//2016December/modifamily6_123016012656.jpg\" style=\"border-color: rgb(215, 215, 215); border-style: solid; border-width: 1px; box-sizing: initial !important; cursor: pointer; margin: 2px 0px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; width: 652px;\" tabindex=\"0\" title=\"\" /></div>\n</div>\n&nbsp;<div id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3521\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; padding-top: 20px;\">\n</div>\n<div id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3522\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; padding-top: 20px;\">\nAmrutbhai has very fond memories of Narendra Modi's \"evolution\". In 1969, he used to run a canteen at the Gujarat State Road Transport headquarters near Geeta Mandir in Ahmedabad when Modi started working alongside him. The canteen contract actually belonged to their mother's brother Babubhai Modi. As Amrutbhai remembers, \"Since my one-room house near the canteen was very small, Narendrabhai used to sleep in the canteen. He would finish the day's work and in the evening go to the state RSS headquarters to serve the elder pracharaks in any way he could. He would come back very late to the canteen, eat the dinner sent from our home in a tiffin before making his bed on a canteen table.\"</div>\n<div id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3523\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; padding-top: 20px;\">\nAmrutbhai gets nostalgic while recalling how Narendrabhai met him for the last time in February, 1971, before leaving for the mountains on a spiritual quest. \"When he told me he was now leaving family life forever, I was moved to tears by the prospect of losing him. But he himself was calm and stoic.\"<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3524\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; padding-top: 20px;\">\n</div>\n<div id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3525\" style=\"border: 0px solid rgb(215, 215, 215); box-sizing: initial !important; float: left; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; width: 652px;\">\n<div id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3526\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; width: 652px;\">\n<img align=\"left\" alt=\"\" class=\"CToWUd a6T\" id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3527\" src=\"https://ci4.googleusercontent.com/proxy/bHC7u5D3lZGvqNG28Cbvj8Px58Zbqh1C26cQwkABOyc1ckbvyYdeXv6TbLkdB5Hllyjz2QAj86H9QWU63htbEuX_5HWn6ZDVM_onJtWTl3cudgLbTyqAiMBgpnM19ohxQGioT1BlgATYLbgTHlsOtOLfsw=s0-d-e1-ft#http://media2.intoday.in/indiatoday/images/stories//2016December/modifamily7_123016010940.jpg\" style=\"border-color: rgb(215, 215, 215); border-style: solid; border-width: 1px; margin: 2px 0px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px;\" tabindex=\"0\" title=\"\" /></div>\n<h2 id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3528\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); border-radius: 0px 0px 4px 4px; box-sizing: initial !important; font-size: 13px; font-weight: 400; line-height: 20px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-top: 0px; text-align: center; width: 652px;\">\nHalf tank please: Cousin Bharatbhai Modi, 55, is a petrol pump attendant at a gas station in Lalawada village, some 60 kms from his home in Vadnagar</h2>\n</div>\n<div id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3529\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; padding-top: 20px;\">\n</div>\n<div id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3530\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; padding-top: 20px;\">\nThere are people who believe the prime minister is too harsh on his relatives. \"Narendrabhai should have had a family gathering after becoming PM like he did when he was CM in 2003,\" says a political analyst who has known him for many years. But the PM clearly believes that any truck with power would only corrupt their innocence. There's also the matter of his own projection as an incorruptible, nepotism-free leader. Perhaps another reason he believes the family must be kept at a distance.</div>\n<div id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3531\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; padding-top: 20px;\">\n<i id=\"m_-6608482998464461926yui_3_16_0_ym19_1_1508770841409_3532\" style=\"box-sizing: initial !important; text-decoration-line: none;\">October 24, 2017 at 8:53 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_74MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN THE WEBSITES OF JOHN BRITTAS, CM PINARAYI VIJAYAN, SRI SRI RAVISHANKAR, SADGURU JAGGI VASUDEV, ARNAB GOSWAMI , PMO, PM MODI, CJI, SUPREME COURT BAR COUNCIL, ATORNEY GENERAL, LAW MINISTER, HOME MINISTER, DEFENCE MINISTER, EDUCATION MINISTER, I&amp;B MINISTER, FINANCE MINISTER AND WEBSITES OF DESH BHAKT LEADERS</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n</div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_75b+seedLfNSD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<div style=\"background-color: white; color: #737373;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; color: black; float: left; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2593408531691666189\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; color: black; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_170M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/17485138677255845701\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">nami</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/10/blockchain-smart-contracts-part-5-capt.html?showComment=1508900332555#c2593408531691666189\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">October 25, 2017 at 8:28 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_170MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nThe Delhi High Court has issued notice to the Union of India on a public interest litigation for removal of loudspeakers from all religious structures on the ground that their use is an encroachment on a person\u2019s \u201cright to be left alone and spatial control\u201d and thus violates the newly recognised fundamental right to privacy.<br />\n<br />\nA bench headed by Acting Chief Justice Gita Mittal issued the notice on the PIL filed by social activist Sanjjiiv Kkumaar.<br />\n<br />\nLoudspeakers not intrinsic to any religion<br />\n<br />\nSanjjiiv, in his PIL, traced the advent of all religions in India to say, \u201cHinduism is 4,000 years old, Jainism is 2,600 years old, Buddhism is 2,500 years old, Christianity is 2,000 years old, Islam is 1,400 years old, Sikhism is 500 years old and on another hand, Moving coil current loudspeakers are not even 100 years old. Thus, it\u2019s beyond doubt, and as facts and truth speaks for itself per se, loudspeakers were never a part of any religion\u201d.<br />\n<br />\n\u201cAs loudspeakers is not part of/intrinsic to any of the religions as all religions are 4,000 to 500 years old whereas loudspeaker came into existence in 1924, that is less than 100 years and hence, banning them will not violate Article 25 or 26 of the Constitution of India,\u201d he said.<br />\n<br />\nThe petition also quoted from the Supreme Court\u2019s verdict in&nbsp;Forum, Prevention of Envn. and Sound Pollution&nbsp;as:&nbsp;\u201cNo religion ever says to force the unwilling to listen to expressions of religious beliefs.\u201d<br />\n<br />\n\u201cThis observation of Hon\u2019ble Apex Court is of utmost importance as what Supreme Court says, Loudspeakers do exactly opposite of the same and hence violate fundamental rights of citizens of India,\u201d the PIL said.<br />\n<br />\nMan\u2019s house is his castle, loudspeakers breach right to be left alone.<br />\n<br />\nThe petitioner relied heavily on the privacy judgment of the Supreme Court to say that its use is breach of privacy.<br />\n<br />\n\u201cEvery democratic country sanctifies domestic life; it is expected to give him rest, physical happiness, peace of mind and security. In the last resort, a person's house, where he lives with his family, is his \u201ccastle\u201d; it is his rampart against encroachment on his personal liberty,\u201d it said.<br />\n<br />\nIt quoted an observation made by Justice DY Chandrachud in the privacy judgment that \u201cone\u2019s house is like a castle to him. If loudspeakers are encroaching one\u2019s right of spatial control (one\u2019s home), one\u2019s right to left alone, then what\u2019s the meaning of fundamental rights? It will be just on paper. Hence to protect and uphold the fundamental rights of one\u2019s \u201cleft alone\u201d, \u201cpersonhood (physical and mental peace), spatial control - Loudspeakers need to go\u201d.<br />\n<br />\nThe petitioner said that use of loudspeakers certainly takes away the right of the citizens to speak with others, their right to read or think or the right to sleep.<br />\n<br />\n\u201cThere may be heart patients or patients suffering from nervous disorder may be compelled to bear this serious impact of sound pollution which has had an adverse effect on them. Toddlers, kids are equally affected,\u201d he added.</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_170BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_170b+seedjcjD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_168T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_170b+seedjcjD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_168TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"color: black; cursor: pointer; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Each and every criminal case could be logged\nand amended using blockchain technology.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nWhen a record is legitimately updated, for example, changes are\nreflected automatically across multiple copies \u2013 in a matter of seconds<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchains are regulated by technical code\nwhich is programmed into the software itself. Whereas breach of legal or\nregulatory rules results only in the potential for some form of punishment to\nbe dealt, breach of technical codes causes an error to be returned and no\nactivity to occur.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Because the law can\u2019t keep up with\ninnovation.&nbsp;&nbsp; To move forward, we must\nnecessarily break the past.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Institute for Development and Research in\nBanking Technology (IDRBT), an arm of the Reserve Bank of India (RBI), is\ndeveloping a model platform for blockchain technology.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">They don\u2019t have the\ncerebral wherewithal.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Institute for Development &amp; Research\nin Banking Technology (IDRBT) is a unique institution exclusively focused on\nBanking Technology. Established by the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) in 1996, the\nInstitution works at the intersection of Banking and Technology. &nbsp;It is located in Hyderabad, India.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; While Blockchains can help us\nverify, execute and record. AI helps in decision making, assessment,\nunderstanding and recognizing.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">While the machine learning methods that are a\npart of AI help us find opportunity and improve decision making, smart\ncontracts and blockchains can automate verification of the transactional parts\nof the process..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The AI sub-field called \u201cArtificial General Intelligence\u201d\n(AGI) is most relevant as AGI can be modeled as a feedback control system..</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">AI is\ndeveloped \u201cby the people, for the people\u201d in an inclusive sense.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This leads to\nthe concept of a decentralized, self-organizing AI economy \u2014 a network of AIs\nthat exchange information and value among each other freely and rapidly, with\nparticipation open to anyone who creates an AI and inserts it into the network.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Such a network also opens new frontiers in social good, via issuance of value\ntokens that specifically direct AI effort toward tasks democratically\ndetermined to provide broad social benefit.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Until now, A.I. and blockchain have remained\nseparate, however now they are joining forces to accelerate the development of\nrobotic intelligence.</span>&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Machine learning makes use of algorithms that learn how to perform\ntasks such as prediction or classification without explicitly being programmed\nto do so. In essence, the algorithms learn from data rather than being\npre-specified.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/5Tr13l0O1Ws/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/5Tr13l0O1Ws?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain with AI is already being offered\nas a service by major cloud providers including IBM and Microsoft. In the\nfuture, almost every transaction could be running on blockchain technology.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Smart\ncontracts help companies benefit from a more streamlined approach while\ncreating unbreakable agreements--reducing the presence of costly KOSHER\nmiddlemen and legalese.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A smart contract represents an impartial third party\nthat is designed to advance both parties\u2019 interests without the need for a broker.\nIn Indian cities thousands of people earn a living by being brokers for flats.\nThey collect their brokerage even when the 11 monthy renewal comes ( Mumbai ).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">If you dont pay a fixed percentage as bribe at land registry govt offices, you stand to lose your own land.. The document writer collects this money and everybody gets their share. This is a mafia system.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">As a\nlogic-based system, a smart contract is intended to cover every aspect of a\ntransaction from start to finish. It could be imagined as a very elongated\n\u201cif/then\u201d function that covers every inevitability that could arise from an\nagreement. Once established, a smart contract governs every interaction between\nthe two parties, automatically responding to inputs from either party and\nexecuting the agreement as programmed.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The basic assumption of these blockchain\nmechanisms is that a large amount of nodes participate in the system, making it\nalmost impossible for one to have the capability to control more than half of\nthe nodes in the system.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In general, the more companies are involved\nin the network, the harder it is for one or a few to take over the blockchain\nsystem. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In reality, however, and especially in the\nadoption stage of a new technology, it is difficult to motivate a large number\nof enterprises to participate. Therefore, blockchain is more likely to be\ndeployed and used among a limited number of pilot entities, which could collude\nto create fraudulent transactions. The kosher underworld is already drooling\nover this .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">To mitigate the collusion risk, different\npriorities could be granted to different parties for transaction verification\nbased upon their roles. For example, a bank could have the priority to verify a\ncash transaction, or regulators or auditors could be given the authority to\nhold a transaction with high risk of fraud before it is confirmed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain provides the potential opportunity\nto prevent fraud in advance or detect fraud shortly after it occurs. By\nbringing various outside parties, such as business partners, creditors, and\ninvestors, into the loop, blockchain could enable a real-time alerting schema\nfor fraud prevention.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It must be noted that the process of mapping the\ndouble-entry accounting system onto a blockchain infrastructure, and using it\nto deter corporate frauds, is still in its infancy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>INDIA MUST NOT JUMP OFF THE DEEP END WITHOUT EXTENSIVE\nVERIFICATION.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-KU9nbVdl1V4/WenFHiJsfsI/AAAAAAABWSE/kv-kz6-VCgg7eIa00jlfAaxTmjIsIIYDgCLcBGAs/s1600/bElock3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"590\" data-original-width=\"600\" height=\"628\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-KU9nbVdl1V4/WenFHiJsfsI/AAAAAAABWSE/kv-kz6-VCgg7eIa00jlfAaxTmjIsIIYDgCLcBGAs/s640/bElock3.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b>TELUGU CM CHANDRA BABU NAIDU IS ALREADY\nPALPITATING\u2014&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot;
