, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b>HE WANTS ANDHRA TO BE THE\nFIRST TO ADOPT BLOCKCHAIN-ULU ( OR IS IT BLOCKCHAIN-UDU ?) AND ENGRAVE HIS OWN NAME\nON THE ROCK OF POSTERITY&nbsp;</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-vZcQtj1F8dI/WenFcOzPZfI/AAAAAAABWSI/N1XuJN1mRY4M9xIe4m8_P5hwOEkgdsKogCLcBGAs/s1600/1879965.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"350\" data-original-width=\"640\" height=\"350\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-vZcQtj1F8dI/WenFcOzPZfI/AAAAAAABWSI/N1XuJN1mRY4M9xIe4m8_P5hwOEkgdsKogCLcBGAs/s640/1879965.JPG\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Despite the AML controls that must be\ncomplied with and exemplary punishments, global money laundering flows are\nestimated to be as high as 6% of the world\u2019s GDP \u2013&nbsp; over $2.2&nbsp;\ntrillion.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Currently, banks spend about US$11 billion\nper year on AML ( anti-money-laundering )&nbsp;&nbsp;\nmeasures, yet money laundering continues to take place on a vast scale.\nThe goal of laundering money is to \u201cwash\u201d illegally obtained money (e.g.\nthrough corruption) into \u201cclean\u201d money, making the origins of the money\nuntraceable. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain technologies have five features\nthat could make AML efforts both more effective and less costly:----<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Consensus: Due to blockchain\u2019s distributed\nledger technology, everyone (or at least everyone involved) is able to see the\nsame information on a transaction instantly. Rather than having databases that\ncommunicate with each other and update individually, blockchain updates happen\nsimultaneously. In other words, banks can be sure that \u201cI see what you see,\u201d \u201cI\nknow that you know that I know,\u201d and so on. This is essential for trust and has\nthe potential to cut out the middlemen in transactions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Validity: Blockchain technology provides\ncertainty that every update in the system is valid, because the technology\nensures that there is a common agreement on the rules of transactions. This\nmakes it harder to game the system, for example by claiming database errors.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Uniqueness: It is impossible to create two\nconflicting entries into a blockchain system, making it impossible to pretend\nto source the money legally while actually sourcing it illegally.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Immutability: Because blockchain records are\ndistributed over the whole network in a distributed ledger system, rather than\na central database, blockchain transactions that were recorded are practically\n\u201cimmutable.\u201d The data of past transactions cannot be changed, but only updated,\nand the data on previous transactions remains permanently available. Thus, once\nthe data of a transaction have been recorded (including the previous owner of\nmoney, the new owner, and the basis for the transaction), these data are not\nfalsifiable.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Authentication: Every transaction is associated\nwith at least two private keys, while the concept of a \u201cmaster key\u201d is not part\nof a blockchain. This is very different from current database systems where an\nadministrator or \u201csuper-user\u201d could alter the database single-handedly, which\nis clearly risky from a security perspective.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In sum, transferring money with blockchain\ntechnology makes it possible to trace the historic and current ownership of\nevery penny in the system.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It is akin to being able to look at the serial number\non every dollar bill and identify every person who has ever held that dollar,\nas well as when, where and why it changed hands.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The most pressing challenge to move forward\nwith blockchain technology in the financial industry \u2013 as noted by regulators\nand banks alike \u2013 is the standardization of the blockchain protocol.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Currently,\nthere are multiple cryptocurrencies, blockchain networks, and protocols\navailable, with hundreds of financial technology players fragmenting the\nmarket.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Without standardization, most benefits of blockchain will be\nunachievable, as the different networks will not be able to communicate with\neach other simultaneously.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Also, without a sound understanding of the\ntechnology, it will be hard for users \u2013 both in the public and the professional\nsphere \u2013 to find trust in the technology. And trust is the most crucial element\nfor financial transactions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain&nbsp;\nintegrates \u201clegal prose\u201d in agreement to allow for disputes to be\nresolved transparently and quickly;&nbsp; It\nallows business logic to be written into the existing code.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain could make it possible to view a\ncustomer's payment history in real time and thus judge eligibility for loans.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain&nbsp;\ncan help in social welfare objectives by eliminating the need for credit\ncards or bank accounts to disburse funds to those who are unbanked.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Building proper oracles to ensure execution\nof smart contracts is crucial.&nbsp; All\ncryptographic key material must be properly stored and handled.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The entire blockchain security rests on the\nassumption that cryptographic keys will be secured properly.&nbsp; Since most consensus algorithms are latency\nsensitive, it is also very important to have the most stable and lowest latency\nnetwork connections possible.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">If network interference increases latency, the\nmaximum transaction throughput drops. &nbsp;One potential denial of service is to prevent\nconsensus from occurring by disrupting the lines of communication.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">With\nblockchains, extra care of network connections is needed or things go PHUTTT .</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">For blockchain technology to reach its full\npotential, it must &nbsp;exceed\u2014accepted\nsecurity standards. Currently, many security-conscious institutions rely on\nhardware security modules (HSMs) to safeguard and manage their digital keys,\nprotecting potential access points in virtually any application that requires\nsecure, verified digital signatures.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">A hardware security module (HSM) is a\nphysical computing device that safeguards and manages digital keys for strong\nauthentication and provides cryptoprocessing.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">These modules traditionally come\nin the form of a plug-in card or an external device that attaches directly to a\ncomputer or network server.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;HSMs\nhoused in bank data centers verify PIN numbers every time a customer withdraws cash\nfrom an ATM and validate transaction cryptograms when customers purchase goods\nat a merchant POS terminal.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In both cases, only the HSMs under a bank\u2019s control\nhave access to the correct keys to perform the secure processing. Leaving\ncryptographic keys in software sitting on a computer is the equivalent of\nleaving your house keys under the door mat.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">An HSM is a cryptoprocessor that\nsecurely generates, protects, and stores keys.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">The keys always live inside the secure, certified\nHSM boundary, rather than in software or on a hard drive, where they are\nvulnerable to attacks.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">HSMs use a certified, cryptographically secure\nrandom number generator to create keys that are of superior quality to those\ngenerated by a typical computer system</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">There are two main concerns that surround the\ntechnology; one is scalability and the other is security.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The security issue comes into play because in\ncertain blockchain implementation, such as financial services use cases,\ndigital wallets will be required. The digital wallet technology has not always\nbeen well protected and there have been instances where it has been hacked.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">First created for use with Bitcoin, the most\npopular cryptocurrency, blockchain is a distributed-trust public ledger\nsystem.&nbsp; Blockchain depends on volunteer\nusers or \u201cnodes\u201d to track, verify, and add transactions to a continuously\nupdated ledger using encryption.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Within\ncryptocurrencies, blockchains are maintained by nodes within the P2P blockchain\nnetwork who use their own hardware resources to perform a process known as\n\u201cmining\u201d.&nbsp; Mining is the process of\nverifying transactions and adding them to the blockchain using encryption.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain provides an inexpensive and\nefficient way to record data by mass collaboration among users on a network.\nWith all the peers on a network working in concert to verify and add data using\nencryption to a continuous data record or chain, the result is a fully trusted\ndata source that is easy to maintain and unalterable.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">As the nodes approve transactions, they are\ngrouped together into blocks and added to the chain. Every block is coded with\na specific cryptographic hash that subsequent blocks on the chain will share,\nwhich ensures the blocks will remain linked.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In addition to the hashes, Blockchain relies on cryptography and public\nkey infrastructure to function.&nbsp; All data\nentered into the chain is encrypted, and every user on the network is assigned\ntheir own private key. Though the blockchain is publicly available, it is\nprotected with encryption throughout the process.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain is built upon the principles of\ncollective interest and mutual trust. Every user has access to the most recent\nversion of the blockchain. Once a node completes a new block, it is added to\nthe chain and the updated version of the blockchain is broadcasted to all other\nnodes.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">There is no official version of the blockchain and no one version is more\ntrusted than another. In addition to speed and efficiency, the decentralized\nstructure of blockchain creates a difficult target for hackers. With no\ncentralized structure, there is no primary target or single point of failure\nfor attackers to exploit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">There is an old adage in computer science\nthat goes: even if we design and build the perfect computer system, if you put\ngarbage into it, you will get garbage out.&nbsp;\nBlockchains don\u2019t change that at all.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">People and computer-human interfaces are still the dominant factor in\nthe overall security of a blockchain network. It all boils down to the fact\nthat blockchains are distributed systems made up of computers that need to be\nsecured by humans.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">With permissioned\nblockchains, humans are responsible for managing the membership of users and\ntheir capabilities.&nbsp; They are also\nresponsible for deploying the chaincode/smart contracts and also manage the\ncryptographic key material.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The cryptography\nand algorithmic design of blockchains is sound and if something goes wrong it\nis most likely because some HUMAN&nbsp; made a\nmistake ( DELIBERATELY )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The blockchain API performs the initial\nvalidation of the transaction and verifies that the proper credentials have\nbeen presented by the transaction proposer.&nbsp;\nThe transaction then gets forwarded to a peer for validation and\nendorsement.&nbsp;&nbsp; To continue the analogy,\nthink of the blockchain peer as being like the web application server, because\nit also handles executing smart contracts.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Once the transaction is endorsed and the smart contract executed, the transaction\nmoves on to being ordered and recorded in the next block in the\nblockchain.&nbsp; That is very similar to how\nweb application state is recorded in a back-end database cluster.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The point of this analogy is to show that\nblockchains don\u2019t have drastically different security requirements.&nbsp; The one area that does require some extra\nattention is around the protection of the cryptographic key materials.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Special care must also be taken to ensure\nthat the consensus part of the distributed ledger operates on network\nconnections with the lowest latency and highest quality of service as\npossible.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This is because many of the\nconsensus algorithms are latency sensitive and the upper bound on their\ntransaction rate is tied to the overall system latency.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">We will never drive criminals entirely off\nthe blockchain,.&nbsp; But we can explore\ninnovations that would make the blockchain safer for legitimate commerce but\ninhospitable for bad actors, and that would allow law enforcement to focus its\nresources just on those parts of the network where criminals are able to\noperate despite our best efforts.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">We all have a shared interest in making sure\nthat those who seek to use the blockchain for criminal purposes do think\ntwice.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">WAIVING FARMER LOANS HAS NOW BECOME A VOTE\nMILKING MACHINE</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Farm loan waivers across states could hurt\nthe finances of states and make them throw good money after bad, and stoke\ninflation.&nbsp; Debt waiver packages, even if\nlimited to a few states, will likely prove to be counter-productive and offer\nlittle gains to farmers over the long run. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">MPs AND MLAs WANT TO GET REELECTED <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">&nbsp;YOUNG\nJ SCINDIA CALLS FARMERS \u201cANNA DHATA \u201c WHILE HE SPEAKS IN LOK SABHA\u2014LIKE A\nBHARATNATYAM DANCER USING HIS TENDER HANDS AND BODY SWAYS</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">SORRY-&nbsp;&nbsp;\nANNA DHATA IS GOD.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;A LOT OF OUR FARMERS ARE DESH DROHI MAOISTS\nAND NAXALS </b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Three major states\u2014Uttar Pradesh (UP), Punjab\nand Maharashtra\u2014have announced large-scale farm debt waivers. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The debt waiver packages of UP and Punjab\nwere aimed to fulfil poll promises made by the Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) and\nthe Congress party, respectively, in these two states. The cumulative debt\nrelief announced by the three states amounts to around&nbsp; Rs77,500 crore or 0.6% of India\u2019s 2016-17\nGDP.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>WE DEMAND THAT FARMER LOANS AND FLOOD RELIEFS\nSHOULD NOW BE ON BLOCKCHAIN</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">EVERY YEARS THE SAME PEOPLE CLAIM FLOOD\nRELIEF .. THEY HAVE TWO HOMES\u2014ONE IN A FLOOD PRONE AREA BUILT ON GOVT LAND ( A\nSHED WITHOUT VALUABLE &nbsp;)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain can be used to \"reduce fraud,\ncorruption, error and the cost of paper-intensive processes. UK government has\nused blockchain to disburse student loan grants and track welfare checks.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">British welfare claimants use an app to receive and spend their welfare checks.\nThis enables the government to track the claimants' spending digitally.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"https://www.bloombergquint.com/politics/2017/06/15/india-faces-dollar491-billion-farm-loan-waivers-thats-16-times-2017-budget-for-rural-roads\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://www.bloombergquint.com/politics/2017/06/15/india-faces-dollar491-billion-farm-loan-waivers-thats-16-times-2017-budget-for-rural-roads</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: red; font-size: large;\">Below: Foreign funded NGO controlled farmer agitation</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-IP4QuHhqKOQ/WeoEL3QIwVI/AAAAAAABWSY/tNqkEkxYzbMgMoHO4uKwH1Rm-xzvKo94gCLcBGAs/s1600/C-EB51S7WAAUX9sy.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"576\" data-original-width=\"720\" height=\"512\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-IP4QuHhqKOQ/WeoEL3QIwVI/AAAAAAABWSY/tNqkEkxYzbMgMoHO4uKwH1Rm-xzvKo94gCLcBGAs/s640/C-EB51S7WAAUX9sy.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">LOANS AND WAIVERS &nbsp;MUST BE TIED TO AADHAR <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">IN INDIA LTTE TERRORISTS TOOK LOANS FROM I\nGOVT BANKS TO FUND THEIR MOVEMENT <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A credit score is a numerical expression\nbased on a level analysis of a person's credit files, to represent the\ncreditworthiness of an individual. A credit score is primarily based on a\ncredit report information typically sourced from credit bureaus.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Lenders, such as banks and credit card\ncompanies, use credit scores to evaluate the potential risk posed by lending\nmoney to consumers and to mitigate losses due to bad debt.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Lenders use credit\nscores to determine who qualifies for a loan, at what interest rate, and what\ncredit limits. Lenders also use credit scores to determine which customers are\nlikely to bring in the most revenue.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The use of credit or identity scoring\nprior to authorizing access or granting credit is an implementation of a\ntrusted system.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A credit rating is an evaluation of the\ncredit risk of a prospective debtor (an individual, a business, company or a\ngovernment), predicting their ability to pay back the debt, and an implicit\nforecast of the likelihood of the debtor defaulting.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The credit rating represents an evaluation of\na credit rating agency of the qualitative and quantitative information for the\nprospective debtor, including information provided by the prospective debtor\nand other non-public information obtained by the credit rating agency's\nanalysts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A credit history is a record of a borrower's\nresponsible repayment of debts.&nbsp; &nbsp;A credit report is a record of the borrower's\ncredit history from a number of sources, including banks, credit card\ncompanies, collection agencies, and governments.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A\nborrower's credit score is the result of a mathematical algorithm applied to a\ncredit report and other sources of information to predict future delinquency.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In many countries, when a customer fills out\nan application for credit from a bank, credit card company, or a store, their\ninformation is forwarded to a credit bureau. The credit bureau matches the\nname, address and other identifying information on the credit applicant with\ninformation retained by the bureau in its files.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;The gathered records are then\nused by lenders to determine an individual's credit worthiness; that is,\ndetermining an individual's ability and track record of repaying a debt. The\nwillingness to repay a debt is indicated by how timely past payments have been\nmade to other lenders.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Lenders like to see consumer debt obligations paid\nregularly and on time, and therefore focus particularly on missed payments and\nmay not, for example, consider an overpayment as an offset for a missed\npayment.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">To establish a real decentralized lending\nsystem on the Blockchain, that for now consists only of pseudo-anonymous users,\nwe need to introduce a fully Decentralized Credit Rating (DCR) system, that\nobtains it\u2019s data from the Blockchain directly.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This way, the risk profile\nrelated to collateral free lending might become tangible, since addresses will\nhave reputation, as we have it with centralized credit scores.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In the west many startups have blockchain-based\ninitiative to build a decentralized credit platform.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">These startups are NOT lenders, but rather, a\nplatform to facilitate lending between lenders and borrowers.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In the wake of the Equifax hack, which\nexposed the private information of more than 140 million people, we\u2019ve all\nbecome painfully aware of the flaws and limitations of today\u2019s credit system\u200a<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/UWuXBd5--mI/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/UWuXBd5--mI?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"https://techcrunch.com/2017/10/03/former-equifax-ceo-says-breach-boiled-down-to-one-person-not-doing-their-job/\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://techcrunch.com/2017/10/03/former-equifax-ceo-says-breach-boiled-down-to-one-person-not-doing-their-job/</a><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-9GbWotMc8q4/WeoM-cY7QbI/AAAAAAABWSs/0Fhm32sdjJ4MJ2349nwuHkO1FGti-vdhwCLcBGAs/s1600/U5drq7duDZWbbEpF8TMxP31MjTDNfXCD_1680x8400.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"319\" data-original-width=\"580\" height=\"352\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-9GbWotMc8q4/WeoM-cY7QbI/AAAAAAABWSs/0Fhm32sdjJ4MJ2349nwuHkO1FGti-vdhwCLcBGAs/s640/U5drq7duDZWbbEpF8TMxP31MjTDNfXCD_1680x8400.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Even today, there are two billion people in\nthe world (including 40 million Americans), who cannot access credit and remain\n\u201ctrapped\u201d for reasons out of their control\u200a\u2014\u200athe systematic under-banking of\ncertain regions, lack of family credit history, or even algorithmic\ndiscrimination.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This could be a true opportunity to demonstrate the value of\ndecentralization\u200a\u2014\u200athe first real \u201ckiller app\u201d for the blockchain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Smart contracts and the blockchain makes this\nprocess easier<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Blockchain is a global, open and in real\ntime available ledger of financial transactions, that can be analysed using\nautomated algorithms and prediction markets. &nbsp;&nbsp;Credit scoring will now call the shots.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">As the Equifax data breach shows, no one\u2019s\ncredit information is secure. It\u2019s estimated that 143 million Americans and as\nmany as 400,000 Brits may have been affected by the breach.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Since the breach\nhas been reported, there has been a run on credit monitoring products. And none\nof the credit bureaus can guarantee that hackers won\u2019t gain access to their\ndata. In fact, its getting increasingly more difficult for any company using\nthe Web for database storage to insure the data they keep is 100% secure.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Using the Global Credit Profile, users will\nbe able to:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Monitor and control their own financial data\nin real time<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Dispute errors and omissions<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Link credit accounts so that more data is\nincluded in their profile<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Port their data anywhere they want to\nglobally to ensure they have access to the best credit products in any country\nthey live or travel to<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Control who gains access to the data and get\npaid for that access<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A Global Credit Profile will work by\nleveraging the inherent decentralization of the blockchain as a distributed\nledger allowing each credit transaction to be approved using the same or\nsimilar processes used to record cryptocurrency transactions in real time\ntoday.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Any information currently collected by the credit bureaus can be kept in\na consumer\u2019s self-controlled file including rent and mortgage payments, utility\nbill payments, lines of credit, and more. Plus, the credit profile can include\nsocial data gathered from user\u2019s social media accounts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Each user gets an IP address and a key to\nenable the application. The user can access all of their financial information\nin one location.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Alternative data will become the norm in\ncredit profiling in the future. That will include machine learning algorithms,\nsocial data, and utility payments for many of the world\u2019s unbanked and\nunderbanked<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Internet is a centralized system\ninvolving many actors, with no unified consensus mechanism. As a result, there\nare many different systems and components that do not communicate.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The basic structure of the blockchain is its\naddress or public key: the very mechanism that allows users to transfer funds\nand work with digital agreements called smart contracts.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Similarly, the\nInternet runs on a server with a public IP address. Since no public information\nabout this address exists, it is merely a point to which one can connect and\nexecute certain actions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The main area in which blockchain and the\nInternet differ is in the number of services they require to operate. For\ninstance, a web site needs a domain name, which is then assigned to the DNS and\nindexed in a search engine; an SSL certificate for the security of users; and\nfunctional content that is used directly.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">On the blockchain, any person or company with\na profile rating reflecting some digital essence of trust, including the\nhistory of the transactions of the user \u2014 similar to a Google search history\nlog<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Each profile, as a smart contract, will be\nable to contain all user information in one economic unit, make deals with\nother profiles, arbitrage and be arbitraged, and most importantly, connect to\ndifferent rating networks.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Rating networks will be a blockchain representation\nof an organization unit where we have some score based on different factors,\nincluding job and academic performance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Simply put, all users in the network will be\nable to see how successful you are.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain is in its early stages of\ndevelopment. As much as it\u2019s been compared to the Internet, one of its primary\nadvantages is that it represents an opportunity to start from scratch: to\ndesign anything we want and develop our own standards.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">By letting users work on\ntheir profiles within the blockchain network, it gives them the chance to\ncreate a full-fledged economic unit, or \u201cdigital passport.\u201d Each user, whether\nthis is a company or an individual, will now be able to carry out transactions\nbetween other individuals.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In addition, the rating and history of their\nprofile will be much more informative and more trusted, but also immutable.\nThis final rating will be more reliable than a work reference, tax filing, or\ncredit history, chiefly because it will be impossible to forge.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This will offer\nnew projects the ability to forge the path of their own destiny in the age of\nthe digital economy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">While the advent of the Internet offered the\npossibility of increased connectivity, blockchain has the potential to take\nthis to the next step by providing the world with a way to become fully\ndigital.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">When transactions and marketplaces have become completely digitized,\nthe creation of fully decentralized and trustless societies becomes a very real\npossibility.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-xoZXDyjNXqo/WeoMweRoW3I/AAAAAAABWSo/LITTDeK4Aq0hTE0VtpFJ73zMjl8j5dzOACLcBGAs/s1600/525721-blockchainw-2017-predictions.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"456\" data-original-width=\"810\" height=\"360\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-xoZXDyjNXqo/WeoMweRoW3I/AAAAAAABWSo/LITTDeK4Aq0hTE0VtpFJ73zMjl8j5dzOACLcBGAs/s640/525721-blockchainw-2017-predictions.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">ILLEGAL IMMIGRATION CAN BE CONTROLLED BY\nBLOCKCHAIN<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Finland has said it has \u201csolved\u201d the problem\nof refugee identity, using the Blockchain to record data of new residents.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Finland\nis providing arrivals with a prepaid debit card instead of cash, and linking\nthe identity of cardholders to the Blockchain. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In issuing them, Finnish authorities are able\nto track both spending and identity with the added benefit that the Blockchain\ndata is immutable.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Finland wants immigration. Their men are\nunable to get their pricks up and women want&nbsp;\ntight twat to keep their sexual market value high.&nbsp; Let truth be told&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Population is\ndwindling.&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Immigration is an increasingly important driver of population\ngrowth in Finland.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Immigration accounted for 81 % of the\npopulation growth as the number of births have been decreasing&nbsp; year after year<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain, a technology that has more compute\npower behind it on a decentralized basis than any open source project in\nhistory, could fundamentally reinvent the banking system.&nbsp;&nbsp; Very few bankers understand it. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">First, there was the view that bitcoin is\npurely for payments. No. Bitcoin, the protocol, and other cryptocurrencies are\nfor the recording of digital value exchanges that can take any form from a\npayment to a marriage vow.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Bitcoin blockchain is of interest, but not\nthe currency. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In simple words, Blockchain is nothing but an\nopen, anonymous, permanent online ledger connected to a centralized network. It\nuses a new data structure to simplify the process and eliminate the need for\nthird parties.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Hence, it brings down that erstwhile dependence on people for\nverification of transactions. Being a distributed database, Blockchain captures\ninputs and places them into a block and then each block is connected or\n\u2018chain\u2019-ed to the next block through a cryptographic signature.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It is a ledger\nthat is easy to make, is open and accessible by anyone as long as permissions\nare set. Blockchain, as a continuously growing list of records i.e. blocks,\nthat are linked and secured using cryptography, allow an application developer\nto create a distributed database that can be read by anyone, but can only be\nwritten to by consensus.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It\u2019s anonymous, so it can protect the\nidentities of users and allow entities and people to carry out transactions at\nnever-before levels of privacy, security and non-intrusion.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It\u2019s permanent and digital, so that\ntranslates into putting in any number of transactions and records and\nchronicling them so well that the whole thread or equation accomplishes degrees\nof transparency and credibility that even the best of regulators can still\nmerely dream of.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It\u2019s open, distributed and can also be\nprogrammed so transactions can be triggered automatically, contracts can become\nset in digital code and safe from tampering or deletion ever. Every agreement\nbetween parties can, easily and non-physically, get converted into a digital\nrecord \u2013 properly identified, validated, stored, and shared. This wipes away\nthe role, effort and expense of intermediaries, brokers, as algorithms enable\nfast and free interactions devoid of previous friction and oversight.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">So yes, this is possible \u2013 two entities may\nnot know each other and still agree and assign verity to something without the\npresence or involvement of a third party. Blockchains can also function as&nbsp; \u2018permissioned\u2019 ledgers so that everyone in\nthe process is pre-selected, or as \u2018unpermissioned\u2019 ones that are open to all.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">They can be used as a single source of\ninformation and hence, for money transfers, record keeping and other back-end\nfunctions being the easy, digital, open, decentralised ledgers they are. For\ninstance, most Banks need to maintain reserves with multiple counterparties at\nonce and it would help immensely if they can settle transactions point-to-point\nas a straight-through process. This will mean a world that is easier, cheaper,\nand faster for banks and customers alike since the complex, superfluous and\nexpensive list-keeping can finally be done away with. Now direct transactions\nare possible \u2013 immediate and irrevocable ones at that. So real-time settlements\ncan finally happen. Also holding accounts with correspondent banks and managing\nlifting fees can now be a thing of the past<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The quality and speed of data becomes so\nhigh, consistent, precise and so real-time that new revenue streams can also be\ntapped while offering customers seamless and actually-nimble experiences. Plus,\ntheir special quality of being non-alterable, as immutable ledgers in real\ntime, can help to track documentation and authenticate ownership of assets\ndigitally. Business models like asset servicing, and smart contracts can\nflourish amazingly for many banks easily.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">They can reduce human intervention and make\nit possible for banks to execute and verify transactions with improved accuracy\nand efficiency.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Since transactions are continuously kept as\n\u2018blocks\u2019 of records, they are secure, scalable and durable- also making the\nentire process far simpler and fluid than it ever was. They do not just cut\npaper and costs but also revitalize the ingredient of trust that is\nquintessential in financial information.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Disintermediation takes off both the risk and\nexpense of counterparties and enables more empowerment for users to control\ntheir information.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Possibility of failure or intrusion is almost\nnegligible with these ledgers and hence process integrity as well as\ntransparency goes to a new realm here. These are almost immutable and hence\nfind ready use in areas like exchanges, smart contracts and Payments.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Financial entities can reap many more rewards\nwhenthe clutter and complications of multiple ledgers is taken off and lower\ntransaction costs can be tapped successfully. Endless days for clearing and\nfinal settlement can now be a thing of the past as transaction times become\nreal-time and available all the time.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">For banks where keeping records of\ntransactions made a major part of function and reconciling transactions across\nindividual and private ledgers took so much time, paper and error \u2013 a Blockchain\nis almost a boon.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/8XmYT89fBKg/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/8XmYT89fBKg?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/ea3miXs_P6Y/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/ea3miXs_P6Y?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/qdoUpGg_DpQ/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/qdoUpGg_DpQ?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/xsi3NHHAlus/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/xsi3NHHAlus?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In computer programming, an application\nprogramming interface (API) is a set of subroutine definitions, protocols, and\ntools for building application software. In general terms, it is a set of\nclearly defined methods of communication between various software components.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A\ngood API makes it easier to develop a computer program by providing all the building\nblocks, which are then put together by the programmer.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;An API may be for a\nweb-based system, operating system, database system, computer hardware or\nsoftware library.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">An API specification can take many forms, but often includes\nspecifications for routines, data structures, object classes, variables or\nremote calls.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Mastercard is to open up access to its\ninhouse blockchain technology platform via an API which will be made available\nto developers at banks and retailers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Smart contracts can interact with data living\nin the blockchain but it is impossible to get informations from the web.
