Additionally, Ethereum planned three\nupgrade forks: Homestead (which launched in March 2016), Metropolis and\nSerenity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Soft\nforks and hard forks are becoming an accepted way of life for blockchains, and\nthat is dangerous.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Any fork has the potential to become controversial, and\nthose controversies can weaken a network and stall future growth, just as with\nthe post-DAO fork in Ethereum and the seemingly endless Bitcoin block size\ndebate.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Future blockchains need built-in\ngovernance systems. Whenever possible, decisions should happen on chain, not on Twitter or some off-site polling tool.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">And, as part of that\ngovernance system, blockchains also need a testnet, so stakeholders can review\nprotocol changes before implementing them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">But\nwhether upgrades happen on the blockchain or off, the decision-making process\nneeds to be clear, accountable and decentralized. The fact that the post-DAO\nfork was none of these is what will cost Ethereum dear&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">According to 2017 Identity Fraud Study by\nJavelin Strategy &amp; Research, 15.4 million consumers were victims of fraud\nor identify theft in 2016. This is an increase in 16% from 2015.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">According to\nthis report, CNP fraud numbers for 2016 increased 40% from 2015, account\ntakeover fraud increased 31%, and new account fraud was up 20%. These increases\nin fraud numbers accounted for theft of $16 billion in 2016.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The question that lingers is how to stop this\nrising tide in fraud. Blockchain banking, while not a panacea, could be a\nmarked improvement in how data is created, approved, transferred, and stored.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">With its single ledger system, blockchain\nbanking can work to eliminate the layers of multiplicity and data transfer that\nhappens within one single transaction. The more layers, the more room for\nerror; the more time delays, the more risk and vulnerability.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">When done right,\nblockchain can eliminate these vulnerabilities:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain&nbsp;\nis nothing but an ever-growing list of records. These are called blocks.\nWith the use of cryptography, these records are kept linked and secured. There\nis a hash pointer in each block serving as a link to the previous block. There\nis a timestamp and transaction data with each link too.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Real-time monitoring. Timestamps fix a\ntraceable timeline, featuring the how, who, when, and where of accountability.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Trusted timestamping is the process of\nsecurely keeping track of the creation and modification time of a document.\nSecurity here means that no one - not even the owner of the document - should\nbe able to change it once it has been recorded provided that the timestamper's\nintegrity is never compromised.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The administrative aspect involves setting up\na publicly available, trusted timestamp management infrastructure to collect,\nprocess and renew timestamps.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Digital data can be hashed and the hash can\nbe incorporated into a transaction stored in the blockchain, which serves as a\nsecure proof of the exact time at which that data existed.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The proof is due to a tremendous amount of\ncomputational effort performed after the hash was submitted to the blockchain.\nTampering with the timestamp would also lead to breaking the integrity of the\nentire digital currency, and this would result in the digital currency\ndevaluing to zero<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The decentralized timestamping approach using\nthe Blockchain has also found applications in other areas, such as in dashboard\ncameras, to secure the integrity of video files at the time of their\nrecording&nbsp;&nbsp; or to prove priority for\ncreative content and ideas shared on social media platforms<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Current EU regulations for time stamping of\nstock trades require that all trading venues and market participants coordinate\ntheir clocks to UTC (Coordinated Universal Time) and that transactions be\nstamped in milliseconds.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">However, regulations set to come into effect\nas of Jan. 3, 2018 require timestamps to be more accurate, traceable and\ntransparent for greater consumer protection.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The National Physical Laboratory, the Toronto Stock Exchange (TMX), and\nUK-based consultancy Z/Yen have come together to bring atomic clock timestamp\nprecision to trades over a Blockchain database.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The database, called \u2018Atomic\nLedger\u2019 timestamps trades within nanoseconds and is completely transparent. It\nalso records time on the atomic clock, providing highly accurate time stamping.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The group tested the new technology on the\nToronto exchange with great success. The application of precise, traceable and\ncertified timestamps, as applied to the knots of a distributed ledger system,\nwill enable a trusted treatment to the transactions as having existed at that\npoint in time, across all platforms..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Using NPL\u2019s atomic clocks is a major step\nforward in adding authority to distributed ledgers for time-stamping-- trillion\ntransactions per day is in view commercially<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain is a chain of blocks. To make\nthings as simple as possible, but not simpler, every block includes the most\nnecessary: index, timestamp, data, hash and previous hash. And each new block\nwhich is about to be added to a chain should be validated as well.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">From IT point of view, blockchain is\ntransparent and immutable distributed high available database with crypto\nenabled data consistency validation, smart contracts and atomic transactions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">From business perspective, blockchain is all\nabout operational efficiency (cost efficiency, time efficiency, additional\ntrust for multiparty collaboration) and new operational models, new ways of\ndoing business (assets digitization).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain technology can be used to identify\napplications in areas such as digital identities, passports, e-residency, birth\ncertificates, wedding certificates, and other IDs. Blockchain Technology could\nbe used as a Cybersecurity shield.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The key to blockchain\u2019s security is that any\nchanges made to the database are immediately sent to all users to create a\nsecure, established record. With copies of the data in all users\u2019 hands, the\noverall database remains safe even if some users are hacked. Many cutting-edge\nfinance firms, for instance, have used blockchain to expedite processes and cut\ncosts without compromising security.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Data manipulation can be spotted with the\nhelp of blockchain technology enabling banks to go beyond asymmetric encryption\nand caching in public keys. The deployment of blockchain enables authentication\nof users and devices without password protection.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The decentralization of the\nnetwork helps in generating consensus between different parties for\nverification through blockchain-based SSL certificates. The distributed and\ndecentralized nature of the network that verifies the integrity of the\ntransactions and associated account balances makes a successful attack\nmathematically impossible.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;With&nbsp;\nblockchain, businesses can authenticate users and devices without the\nneed for a password. This eliminates the human factor from the authentication\nprocess, therefore preventing it from becoming a potential attack vector.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The use of simple logins and a centralized\narchitecture are a big weakness of traditional systems. \u201cNo matter how much\nmoney a company spends on security, all these efforts are in vain, if customers\nand employees use passwords that are easy to crack or steal.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain takes\nthe responsibility for strong authentication, resolving the single point of\nattack at the same time. In addition, the decentralized network helps us to\nprovide consensus between parties for their identification.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A decentralized system is better than a\ncentralized one, which is vulnerable to attacks. Consider, for example, the\nnumerous attacks on centralized password manager LastPass, which have left\nmillions of accounts potentially vulnerable to theft.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A password manager will\ngenerate a unique strong password for every account and application, without requiring\nyou to memorize or write down these random strings of characters.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">These strong\npasswords help shield against traditional password attacks such as dictionary,\nrainbow tables, or brute-force attacks. Some top password managers store your\ncredentials locally, while others rely on cloud services for storage and\nsynchronization, and still others take a hybrid approach.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">LastPass Premium\naccount costs all of $1 per month, making it an extremely compelling option.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;But Dashlane takes password security a few steps further, most notably by\nlimiting its web app to a read-only version of your password vault, and only\ndecrypting your data within your local browser session, not on the server. In a\nnutshell, go with LastPass for maximum ease and features at the lowest price;\ngo with Dashlane for maximum password security.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Hacked passwords cause 96% of\ndata breaches today.. It is estimated that by 2019, over 82% of organizations\nwill use access management software or services to avoid such cybersecurity\nissues using blockchain.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Few months ago&nbsp;\nthe WannaCry virus attack hit the British National Health Service NHS,\nwith software that targeted Microsoft\u2019s widely used Windows operating\nsystem..&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">REMME won the first place at\nat the recently held Microsoft Blockchain Intensive hackathon.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The company\npartnered with Infopulse to come up with a traffic collision awareness solution\nusing REMME authentication technology.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">REMME leverages a distributed public key\ninfrastructure to authenticate users and devices. Instead of a password, REMME\ngives each device a specific SSL certificate.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The certificate data is managed\non the Blockchain, which makes it virtually impossible for malicious hackers to\nuse fake certificates. The platform also uses two-factor authentication to\nfurther enhance security for its users.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">SSL Certificates provide secure,\nencrypted communications between a website and an internet browser. SSL stands\nfor Secure Sockets Layer, the protocol which provides the encryption.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">SSL\nCertificates are typically installed on pages that require end-users to submit\nsensitive information over the internet like credit card details or passwords.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Example pages include payment pages, online forms and login pages.. Data\ntransferred in plain-text form or in non-encrypted format can be intercepted,\neavesdropped, compromised and stolen.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Transactions performed online may involve\nsubmitting personal information such as credit card information, social\nsecurity numbers, usernames and passwords. Cybercriminals who intercept\nunencrypted communications will gain full access to this data and can use it\nfor fraudulent purchases and activities.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Trust and security are what make people\nconfident enough to provide private, sensitive information online. SSL\ncertificates are what make a website trusted. Organizations must use an SSL\ncertificate to secure their site if they wish to take online payments or expect\ntheir visitors to submit confidential information.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Apart from building\nessential trust and security into your website, SSL certificates also help with\nSEO efforts now that Google is providing a rankings boost for pages that are\nserved over https. The blockchain addresses the fundamental flaws of security\nby taking away the human factor from the equation, which is usually the weakest\nlink.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">By leveraging a distributed ledger and taking away the risk of a single\npoint of failure, blockchain technology provides end-to-end privacy and\nencryption while still ensuring convenience for users.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain technologies are here to\nstay.&nbsp;&nbsp; Pentagon wants to use blockchain\ntechnology&nbsp; as a cybersecurity shield.\nBlockchain technology is potentially useful for protecting military technology,\ncommunications, and purchases.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It is well-designed to help increase the\nsecurity of the entire US military, across all departments and units.\nBlockchain couldl prevent hackers and terrorists from attacking military\nnetworks, including connected vehicles, aircraft and satellites.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The engineers\nof the Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency (DARPA) are currently\nexperimenting with Blockchain to create a messaging service that is secure and\nimpenetrable to foreign attacks. This service will be tested internally first,\nbut if it holds up, may find its way onto the battlefield soon.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">DARPA seeks to create code that is impossible\nto hack, preventing hackers from breaking into secure databases<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;DARPA\nmust do BRAINSTRORMING before they jump off the deep end into KOSHER waters.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Couple of weeks ago the US Senate passed a $7\nbillion defence bill requesting a report on blockchain applications for the\ncybersecurity industry<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In 2016 alone there were 3.1 billion data\nbreaches.. the mode of such hacks is varied; cybercriminals may embed malware\nin email attachments, pose as customer support to obtain user log in details,\nspoof employee identities, and so on.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">But the basis of their strategy is often\nsimilar: exploiting weak points in centralised systems.&nbsp;&nbsp; Blockchain can be applied to safeguard vital\nexternal infrastructure too, such as domain name services (DNS) for company\nwebsites.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">As shown by the attack that took down major brands like Twitter and\nSpotify last year, current DNS practice of keeping the access key on one server\n\u2014 and relying on caching \u2014 can leave services vulnerable.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A blockchain-based\nserver,&nbsp; can minimise the risk: creating\na wider network of keys and splitting control of domain records between\nmultiple parties to make websites impenetrable.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Theft isn\u2019t the only focus for\ntoday\u2019s cybercriminals. With data now an essential resource for\ndecision-making, investment, and analysis, cybercriminals are also attempting\nto undermine businesses through information sabotage; be that by altering\ninformation and demanding a ransom for its restoration, or entering fake data\nto cause system failure. Yet, once more, this is a cybersecurity problem that\ncan be effectively addressed by blockchain technology.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Information,&nbsp; is not only decentralised; it is also\nsequentially hashed and encrypted. So, it is almost impossible for intruders to\neither gain access to databases or make sense of information.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In other words,\nwith blockchain, hackers\u2019 chances of unilaterally making changes to important\ndata stores are slim to none and data integrity remains intact.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WhatsApp,&nbsp; uses end-to-end encryption to protect message\ncontent, but also collects metadata (information about who users contact), and\nmost services require personal authentication details, such as an email\naddress.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">With such information frequently stored in single systems, there is a\nsignificant risk it could be accessed by hackers. Start-up businesses such as\nObsidian messenger, are keeping data private and protecting users by\ndecentralising the network itself and dividing up metadata \u2014 thereby making\nsure it can\u2019t be gathered in one place and used to survey or hack individual\naccounts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>IN INDIA WE WILL NOT ALLOW LOSER LAWYERS\nTURNED&nbsp; ( BOTTOM OF THE CEREBRAL BARREL&nbsp; ) MELORD JUDGES TO DECIDE ON HOW TO\nPROTECT BHARATMATA \u2013</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">MODI BE WARNED .. DO YOUR JOB AS PM.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: x-large;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b>APCO Modi-- you and your sidekick Law minister Ravishankar Prasad&nbsp; are guilty of allowing Collegium Judges to make laws and play god.</b></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Russian\ncarrier S7 is now using blockchain to issue tickets. Employing blockchain in\nthe recordkeeping process could completely change the way in which airlines\nverify, track, and secure their operations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Luggage\nis handed-off by many different parties during air transit, and it\u2019s not\nuncommon for something to get misplaced from time to time. Using a blockchain\nto log the movement of each item enables carriers and their customers to\nbenefit from a better workflow.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Millions\nof bags are mishandled by airlines each year, at a cost to the industry of\nhundreds of millions of dollars and upset customers. Additionally, the International\nAir Transport Association (IATA)\u2014the trade association for 250 airlines\nworldwide\u2014is mandating improved baggage handling systems by June 2018 through\nits Resolution 753. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nIATA resolution says they should be implemented when bags are loaded, when they\narrive, and in cases where they\u2019re are transferred.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;Passengers must be able&nbsp; to track their bags at any point throughout\nthe journey using their smart phones .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Delivering a passenger\u2019s bag on time to\nthe appointed place improves customer satisfaction and impacts an airline\u2019s\nbottom line. Radio-frequency identification (RFID) is an underlying approach to\nimproving existing baggage-handling services and providing new services.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nIATA is&nbsp; calling for the use of the RFID\ntechnologies in baggage handling. The organization has participated in RFID\ntrials, developed an industry standard for smart baggage tags and produced a\nbusiness case for its airline members.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Numerous\ntypes of trials around the world show that RFID tags\u2014when coupled with management\nreporting systems\u2014help to improve baggage performance.. Informed passengers\nalways know where to go, the location of his/her bag, and what to do if\nsomething goes wrong.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/pdqzq5MIZss/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/pdqzq5MIZss?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain payments are not reversible in the\nsame way as ACH payments.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">They\u2019re not eligible for chargebacks without the\nblockchain\u2019s consensus. As great as that sounds, remember: payments are not the\nonly application here. Blockchain can fill a valuable role in mitigating ACH\npayment chargebacks, too. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Automated Clearing House (ACH) is an\nelectronic network for financial transactions. ACH processes large volumes of\ncredit and debit transactions in batches. ACH credit transfers include direct\ndeposit, payroll and vendor payments.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">ACH direct debit transfers include\nconsumer payments on insurance premiums, mortgage loans, and other kinds of\nbills. Debit transfers also include new applications such as the\npoint-of-purchase (POP) check conversion pilot program sponsored by the\nNational Automated Clearing House Association (NACHA).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Both the government and\nthe commercial sectors use ACH payments. Businesses increasingly use ACH online\nto have customers pay, rather than via credit or debit cards.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">ACH is a computer-based clearing and\nsettlement facility established to process the exchange of electronic\ntransactions between participating depository institutions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">ACH payments are electronic payments that are\ncreated when the customer gives an originating institution, corporation, or\nother customer (originator) authorization to debit directly from the customer's\nchecking or saving account for the purpose of bill payment. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">ACH payments are&nbsp; made through the Automated Clearing House\n(ACH) Network. They are a popular alternative to paper checks and credit card\npayments because of the benefits to merchants and consumers: everybody involved\ngets to save a little money and automate payments (which means fewer errors and\nless hassle).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">ACH payments are electronic payments that pull funds directly\nfrom your checking account. Instead of writing a check or paying with a card\n(like a credit or debit card), the money moves automatically. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">While ACH debit is an excellent choice for\nsome of your most important bills, there are a few drawbacks:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">You hand over access to (and information\nabout) your bank account, including your account number<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A biller error may accidentally lead to you\npaying more than you should (and&nbsp; a large\nerror could drain your account, causing you to bounce other payments and rack\nup fees)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">You might overdraw your account if you don\u2019t\nkeep enough money available in checking \u2013 you might have the money, but it\u2019s\njust in the wrong place<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">You may forget what you\u2019re paying for if you\ndon\u2019t actually see the bills come through, and you might keep paying for\nservices that you no longer use<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In exchange for the convenience you get with\nACH debit programs, you have to give up some control.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Compelling evidence is the backbone of a\nwinning dispute case. Unfortunately, the complicated process of tracking,\nidentifying, and presenting necessary evidence makes chargebacks very hard to\nfight. Organizing and cementing all that information in the blockchain, though,\nwould make it much easier.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Tracking pertinent transaction data can be\nachieved more efficiently.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">There\u2019s a great deal of uncertainty\nsurrounding new developments like the EU\u2019s General Data Protection Regulation,\nand how that will impact the tracking of transaction data. With a blockchain,\nthe raw data may still be tokenized and kept for data profiling even if\ncustomers act on their \u201cright to be forgotten.\u201d&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The General Data Protection\nRegulation (GDPR)&nbsp; is a regulation by\nwhich the European Parliament, the Council of the European Union and the\nEuropean Commission intend to strengthen and unify data protection for all\nindividuals within the European Union (EU).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Supply chain has become complicated. Some\nwould say cumbersome. It takes days to make a payment between a manufacturer\nand a supplier, or a customer and a vendor.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Contracts must be handled by lawyers\nand bankers, which means extra cost and delay. Products and parts are often\nhard to trace back to suppliers, making defects difficult to eliminate. Whether\nfor industrial equipment, consumer goods, food products, or digital offerings,\nsupply chains have headaches a-plenty.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Friction in supply chain is a big problem.\nThere are too many go-betweens. There is too much to-ing and fro-ing. The rise\nin uncertainty stops supply chains from working well. Suppliers, providers and\nclients must deal via central third-party entities, instead of directly with\neach other. What should be simple transactions turn into lengthy procedures\nwith many steps.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain can be used for any kind of\nexchange, agreements or tracking. In a supply chain, it can apply to anything\nfrom self-executing supply contracts to automated cold chain management.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain allows the transfer of funds anywhere in the world. Traditional\nbanking methods are not needed. Transfer is direct between payer and payee. It\nis also secure and rapid \u2013 in minutes, compared to days for automated clearing\nhouse payments..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Smart contracts can help eliminate costly delays and waste\ncurrently due to manual handling of paperwork.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bitcoin mining is the\nvalidation of transactions that take place on each Bitcoin block.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\ndecentralized nature of Bitcoin means that transactions are broadcasted to the\npeer-to-peer network and once broadcasted, needs to be verified, confirming\nthat the transaction is valid and then having the transaction recorded on the\npublic transaction database, which is known as the Bitcoin blockchain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Miners basically are\nthe people involved in the processing and verifying transactions before then\nrecording the transactions on the Bitcoin blockchain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Miners will then\nreceive transaction fees in the form of newly created Bitcoins<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/nQryTXfoNJ0/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/nQryTXfoNJ0?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Computers are used to\ninclude new transactions onto the Bitcoin exchange and while computers will\nfind it relatively easy to complete the verification process, the process\nbecomes more difficult as computer capability becomes more sophisticated with\nfaster processing speeds. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Bitcoin network is\nself-evolving, to ensure that the time taken for a miner to win a block is\nsteady at approximately 10 minutes. The speed of processing power in Bitcoin\nmining is referred to as the hash rate and the processing power is referred to\nas the hash power of the hardware.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To get slightly more\ntechnical and introduce some of the more common terms used in the Cryptoworld,\nthe mining process is where Bitcoin mining hardware runs a cryptographic\nhashing function on a block header.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/qFOeFXwCuLw/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/qFOeFXwCuLw?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For each new hash\nattempted, the mining software will use different numbers as the random\nelement, the number referred to as the nonce.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once a proof of work is\nproduced, through the random calculation of nonces until the correct nonce is\ndiscovered, a new block is essentially discovered, which is then verified and\nagreed upon by the peer-to-peer network.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At this stage the miner\nis rewarded with a certain number of Bitcoins, currently set at 12.5 coins,\nthough will halve every 210,000 blocks. In addition to the Bitcoins received,\nthe minor will also be awarded the transaction fees paid by users within the\nsuccessfully mined block, which is of far greater incentive for miners as the\nnumber of Bitcoins per block continues to decline.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bitcoin cloud mining\nprovides a medium to receive newly mined Bitcoins, without the need to own\nBitcoin mining hardware or even have any mining \u2018knowhow\u2019, allowing the mining\nworld to not only attract the technically minded but a far wider audience, who\nlack the technical knowledge needed to get into Bitcoin mining.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/K8kua5B5K3I/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/K8kua5B5K3I?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>BELOW:&nbsp; &nbsp;BITCOIN MINING KARNA MAANGTHA ?</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/heiPMY9gOWg/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/heiPMY9gOWg?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>PHIR KYA MAANGHTA ?</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span><span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>JULIE JULIE ?</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span><span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>YAA -- SANDRA FROM BANDRA ?</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span><span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>BOLOH TOH -&nbsp; &nbsp;AKKAL WAALI&nbsp; PIG SORPOTEL ?</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/xLrsx9PQDzA/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/xLrsx9PQDzA?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8791674910833967772\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_8M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/10/blockchain-smart-contracts-part-4-capt.html?showComment=1508463086596#c8791674910833967772\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">October 20, 2017 at 7:01 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_8MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br />\nSOMEONE ASKED ME<br />\n<br />\nIF THE TOP GUN OF THE SHIPPING COMPANY ASKS YOU AS CAPTAIN TO WRITE ENGINEERING TRAINING STUFF --<br />\n<br />\nTHEN THERE MUST BE A REASON WHY THEY TRUST YOU SO MUCH-- OVER THE HUNDREDS OF CHIEF ENGINEERS ( ASHORE AND AFLOAT ) IN THE COMPANY<br />\n<br />\nINDEED<br />\n<br />\nSEE-- WHAT I AM ABOUT TO DISCLOSE , I AM BEING FORCED TO NOW<br />\n<br />\nBE PREPARED FOR AN A ABSOLUTE SHOCKER -- THOUSANDS OF ENGINEERS READ MY BLOGS<br />\n########################<br />\nI HAVE NOT YET SEEN AN ENGINEER WHO CAN START A ENCLOSED LIFEBOAT ENGINE-- THIS IS THE PITS-- I HAVE BEEN CAPTAIN FOR 30 YEARS<br />\n<br />\nIN THE POST BELOW-- I QUOTE A REAL MESSSAGE TO MY COMPANY-- WHERE I SAY THE PASS PERCENTAGE IS CLASSIFIED.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">THE TRUTH IS ZERO PERCENTAGE</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/naive-sailor-starting-life-boat-engine.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS LIKE YOU NOT KNOWING HOW TO START YOUR OWN CAR<br />\n<br />\nYOU START THE CAR ENGINE WITH THE GEAR ENGAGED AND THE CAR JUMPS AS SOON AS YOU TURN THE ENGINE WITH THE BATTERY \u2013BECAUSE YOU ARE A CUNT . IN THE WATER PROPELLER SLIPS\u2014SO THE BOAT JUST NOT JUMP LIKE A FROG . BUT THE BATTERY DRAINS OUT .<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE ADMINISTERED THE FAMOUUS VADAKAYIL KALARI TAP ON THE NOSE ( BEHIND CLOSED DOORS ) WHERE BLOOD POURS OUT LIKE A FAUCET-- WHEN DESPITE PROPER TRAINING AND BRIEFING MY ME-- THE SENIOR OFFICER/ ENGINEER IN THE LIFEBOAT SCREWED IT UP , NEARLY CAUSING LOSS OF LIFE<br />\n<br />\nONCE MY SHIP WAS FULLY LOADED WITH PETROL FROM EUROPE.<br />\n<br />\nI HAD TO UNLOAD IT AT HOLYROOD NEW FOUNDLAND<br />\n<br />\nTHE WHOLE BAY WAS FROZEN THICK WITH ICE AND PACKED HUGE BERGY BITS FLOATING IN BY SOUTHERLY LABRADOR CURRENT \u2013THE HOLYROOD BAY IS LIKE THE OPEN MOUTH OF A CROCODILE.<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.tide-forecast.com/locations/Holyrood-Newfoundland</span><br />\n<br />\nMY SHIP WAS NON ICE CLASS AND I WENT TO THE ENTRANCE - -GOT TO SEE THE PACK ICE LADEN BAY ON TV LIVE-- WHERE A LOCAL CROSS BAY ICE CLASS FERRY WAS STUCK FOR DAYS .<br />\n<br />\nTHEN I WENT TO A NEARLY PROTECTED BAY NAMED \"COME BY CHANGE \" ON THE OTHER SIDE AND ANCHORED THERE UNANNOUNCED --SO THAT I CAN WATCH LOCAL HOLYROOD TV<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.gorgeousgirl.org/single-post/2016/05/17/Newfoundland-1</span><br />\n<br />\nALL THREATENED TO BITE MY HEAD OFF -- I SAID \"FUCK OFF\"<br />\n<br />\nAT THIS ANCHORAGE I WAS THERE FOR TWO WEEKS -- WITH ALL AND SUNDRY , INCLUDING ECAREG AND CANADA COAST GUARD THREATENDEDNEDNEDING TO BITE MY HEAD OFF EVERY 3 HOURS -- AND EVEN LOSS OF CANADIAN VISA FOR LIFE. ( NO THEY DID NOT THRETEN TO THROW ACID ON MY FACE LIKE THE IRANIANS )<br />\n<br />\nECAREG means the Eastern Canada Vessel Traffic Services Zone and they are in charge of safety of ships in ice and ice reports<br />\n<br />\nAfter ten days ( this is HUGE loss of money ) ECAREG and CANADIAN COAST GUARD joined hands and said-- it is now safe to come into Holyrood. We have decidETH.<br />\n<br />\nI REPLIED-- INDEED , BUT I NEED TO MAKE SURE THAT AFTER UNLOADING MY SHIP CAN COME OUT TOO-- AS MY SHIP WILL BE ON LIGHT DRAFT EXPOSING MY SHIPS PROPELLER<br />\n<br />\nI WAS AN EXPERT IN ICE NAVIGATION IN CANADA AND NEW FOUNDLAND --ON SHIPS NOT STRENGTHENED FOR ICE .. HAD DONE MIRACLES IN THE PAST<br />\n<br />\nIN THE POST BELOW I TALK ABOUT MY NEWLY MARRIED WIFE ASKING ME HOW I EARN MY WAGES--AS I DO NOTHING ON BOARD --ALL I DO IS SLEEP, DRINK BEER, PLAY TEEN PATTHI / TT ETC, WATCH MOVIES , HAVE APRTY, ATTEND BULLSHIT SESSSION ETC<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/freezing-weather-precautions-on.html</span><br />\n<br />\nDURING THIS STAY ON THE 8TH DAY I LOWERED MY LIFEBOAT AT \"COME BY CHANCE\"- A DRILL<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_8BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/10/blockchain-smart-contracts-part-4-capt.html?showComment=1508463117277#c5971825041190374477\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">October 20, 2017 at 7:01 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_7MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nBEFORE LOWERING THE LIFEBOAT I CALLED A CREW MUSTER AND TRAINED MY CHIEF OFFICER AND SECOND ENGINEER HOW TO START THE LIFEBOAT ENGINE<br />\n<br />\nAS USUAL THEY FUCKED IT UP<br />\n<br />\nTHERE WAS A CURRENT AND THE BOAT STARTED DRIFTING-- THE WATERS WERE FREEZING BUT PLACID<br />\n<br />\nSUDDENLY FOG THREATENED TO SWAMP THE AREA. WHEN THIS HAPPENS THE FOG LIFTS AFTER MANY DAYS-- MAYBE THREE DAYS OR EVEN A WEEK<br />\n<br />\nI HAD TO WAKE UP THE SECOND MATE AND LOWER THE OTHER LIFEBOAT TO TOW THE DRIFTING BOAT BACK , AS THERE WAS STRONG CURRENTS AND YOU CANT ROW AN ENCLOSED LIFEBOARD AGAINST A STRONG TIDAL CURENT \u2013<br />\n<br />\nWITH ALMOST ALL MY CREW IN TE BOATS --I HAD A SKELETON CREW ON BOARD<br />\n<br />\nWELL WE TOWED BACK THE DRIFTING BOAT -- WITHING 5 MINUTES OF SECURING THE BOATD, DENSE FOG ENGULFED THE SHIP AND IT LIFTED ONLY AFTER THREE DAYS.<br />\n<br />\nIF MY RESCUE ATTEMPT WAS NOT SUCCESSFUL ALL MY OFFICERS AND CREW IN THE DRIFTING BOAT WOULD HAVE BEEN FORZEN TO DEATH\u2014A VERY PAINFUL DEATH<br />\n<br />\nAS SOON AN BOTH LIFEBOATS CREW WERE MUSTERED ON BRIDGE ( WITH ENTIRE CREW / OFFICERS ) I SLAPPED MY THREE STRIPERS IN THE BOAT WHICH WENT ADRIFT.<br />\n<br />\nTHERE WAS NO DRAWING BLOOD- BUT THE ENTIRE CREW SAW WITNESSED THE TIGHT SLAPS ON THE FACE , WITH CHIEF ENGINEER IMPLORING \"CAPTAIN DONT SLAP OUR SENIOR OFFICERS\"<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THIS IS WHY I DONT WRITE MY BOOK \"GAMES CAPTAIN PLAYED \"--THIS IS JUST ONE INCIDENT AMONG HUNDREDS.</span></b><br />\n<br />\nTO CUT A LONG STORT , THERE WAS A MASSIVE SHOWDOWN AFTER 2 WEEKS --WHEN THE CANADIANS HOLYROOD PORT CONTROL, THE CHARTERERS, THE SHIPPERS , THE CONSIGNEES, MY OWN BOSSES, MY OWNERS , ECAREG, COASTGUARD --AL JOINED HANDS AND HISSED AT ME \"CAPTAIN, WHEN DO YO THING YOU WILL ENTER HOLYROOD ?\"<br />\n<br />\nI SAID \"I DONT KNOW\"<br />\n<br />\nTHEN THEY SEND ME TO A CANADIAN PORT ST JOHNS IN THE MAIN LAND.-- TWO WEEKS OF HIRE WERE LOST-- BUT THEN \"CAPTAIN WAS RIGHT\" .<br />\n<br />\nCAPTAIN HAS A SPINE ( UNLIKE MODI )<br />\n<br />\nI SEND A STINKER TO ECAREG AND CANADIAN COAST GUARD - -COPIED TO ALL--&nbsp; <b><span style=\"color: red;\">YOU BASTARDS ARE INTERESTED ONLY IN FOSTERING CANADIAN TRADE. LET US NOT FOOL EACH OTHER --YOU DO NOT EXIST FOR \"SAFETY OF LIEF AT SEA</span></b>\"<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS WHY I TELL MY FAWNING OFFICERS \" I AM A POOR ROLE MODEL \". IF YOU HAVE TO EMULATE ME-- BE THE BEST IN THE PROFESSION .<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_8b+seedC1TuD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_8b+seedC1TuD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-gLV5cyfUSq4/Wej4JaC9bDI/AAAAAAABWR0/yfVibc_cepQn7cUwLYoNUMJHQOw3kbbagCLcBGAs/s1600/yogi-adityaKnath-m_1912743_835x547-m.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"547\" data-original-width=\"835\" height=\"418\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-gLV5cyfUSq4/Wej4JaC9bDI/AAAAAAABWR0/yfVibc_cepQn7cUwLYoNUMJHQOw3kbbagCLcBGAs/s640/yogi-adityaKnath-m_1912743_835x547-m.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8206040263869430858\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_0M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. FARMERS MUST CONTINUE BURNING CROP STUBBLE TO PRODUCE BIOCHAR</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">DO NOT ALLOW FOREIGN FUNDED NGOs, COLLEGIUM JUDGES, NGT INTERFERE WITH FARMERS PRODUCE OF FOOD\u2026. , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THIS IS THE ONLY INTELLIGENT WAY TO PREVENT FARMER SUICIDES...The desh drohi GREEN REVOLUTION has caused our holy topsoil to lose 80% of their original soil organic carbon (SOC) pool...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; HERE HE IS PLAYING WITH A CLEVER DOG OF HIS COLLEAGUE,&nbsp; INSIDE THE OFFICE...</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">THERE IS NO FIXED TIMING -- YET THE COMPANY PROVIDES BREAKFAST, LUNCH AND DINNER ( CLASSY ) TO MAKE PEOPLE COME TO OFFICE DURING EARTHLY HOURS--&nbsp;</b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOG_video_class\" contentid=\"9b0c47c8637577c9\" height=\"266\" id=\"BLOG_video-9b0c47c8637577c9\" width=\"320\"></object></div>\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">THIS POST IS NOW CONTINUED TO PART 5--</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/10/blockchain-smart-contracts-part-5-capt.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/10/blockchain-smart-contracts-part-5-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-zcKvraL6NjE/Wej2fb1XwcI/AAAAAAABWRg/w6WsMBx9TgohbA5-yuOJRybSdL7YN9AzwCLcBGAs/s1600/AJIT%2B1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em;
