The\ndistributed, interconnected nature of the blocks is what enables the data to\nform an immutable chain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A block could represent transactions and data\nof many types \u2014 currency, digital rights, intellectual property, identity, or\nproperty titles, to name a few.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain technology is not only a safety\nmeasure, it\u2019s a cost-saving, TIME saving and error-reducing opportunity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Again, the blockchain database is not stored\nin one location, meaning that records are truly public and can be verified\neasily. With no centralised version of this information, a hacker can\u2019t corrupt\nit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Greater use of automation could improve the\nspeed and quality of completing tasks such as auditing casework, and in the\nfuture could even help to address issues such as subjective bias in judicial\ndecision-making.&nbsp; Since 1947, 80% of our\njudgements are wrong !&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">We had Rothschild\u2019s JUSTICE IS BLIND system ,\nwhich did not care for PERIMETER OF CONTEXT and NATURAL JUSTICE .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Like in the Aarushi Talwar case our judiciary\ndoes not have the cerebral wherewithal to glean CIRCUMSTANTIAL EVIDENCE &nbsp;.&nbsp; &nbsp;The pathetic judges &nbsp;rely on DIRECT EVIDENCE .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">WHAT THE FUCK IS ALL THIS \u2013READ THE POST\nBELOW\u2014 CHOOTIYAS !</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2008_Noida_double_murder_case\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2008_Noida_double_murder_case</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">After 20 years of TAAREQ PEH TAREEQ PAH\nTAREEEQ &nbsp;, which truthful witness will\nremember anything ?&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Today almost all direct witnesses &nbsp;are bribed and produced out of thin air\u2014to give\nfalse evidence in court.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain technologies presents &nbsp;a unique opportunity to increase accuracy and\ntransparency through secure, auditable distributed recordS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Data that uses blockchain have full\ntransparency and traceable background, making it almost impossible to change\ndata after network\u2019s confirmation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Middlemen (PARASITES )&nbsp; fee that chopped big part of deal, now only\nneed to pay network\u2019s computational fee<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">An OUTIDE JOB&nbsp;\nhacker can't get at it because there is no single point of\nvulnerability; this is because the ledger exists on millions of computers and\nto break it open the hacker would have to breach it on each one of them.&nbsp; This is why the distributed ledger with lot\nof users is impenetrable.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">If the bank account details,AADHAR&nbsp; unique identification number and registered\nmobile information of every Indian were put on blockchain, it would pave the\nway for a completely safe digital environment...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Banks to MUST conduct KYC ( Aadhar )&nbsp; and other investigations to identify and\napprove all users beforehand.&nbsp;&nbsp; With\nthat, every transaction can be traced to the last mile if necessary. What's\nmore, a digital identity, once established on blockchain, cannot be changed\nunless the entire network approves it. Digital identity management is hence one\nof the primary use cases of DLT, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This blockchair system can reduce sale and\nauction of FAKE artwork .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue;\">Below:&nbsp; &nbsp;This is the\n</span><span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue;\"><b>HORRIBLE negative vibe emanating </b></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue;\">painting which sold for 4 million USD.&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; It was bought by Tina Ambani in 2008&nbsp; to show that this</span><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"> STARLET has\n\u201carrived\u201d--&nbsp; </span><span style=\"color: red;\">APUN BHI ELITE </span><span style=\"color: blue;\">.</span></b></span></span><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-NBpBSR01hD8/WeiCxezJJtI/AAAAAAABWRA/6v-erzWPWeUX6-pqLgkHkVS9C5ni7rBkQCLcBGAs/s1600/imat3ges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"169\" data-original-width=\"298\" height=\"362\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-NBpBSR01hD8/WeiCxezJJtI/AAAAAAABWRA/6v-erzWPWeUX6-pqLgkHkVS9C5ni7rBkQCLcBGAs/s640/imat3ges.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In art\nauctions it is difficult to establish genuineness where shit is sold as gold\nand viceversa \u2013all controlled by KOSHER big brother<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/modern-abstract-art-and-picasso-capt.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/modern-abstract-art-and-picasso-capt.html</a></span>\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/09/francis-newton-souza-birth-painting.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/09/francis-newton-souza-birth-painting.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">If a community of experts, who dont get impressed by the <b style=\"background-color: white;\">NAKED EMPEROR&nbsp; </b>were to join up on\nblockchain to confirm the credentials of artwork, it would facilitate buying\nand selling. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-zqrFIEO48zs/WeiCe8HNK-I/AAAAAAABWQ8/xzAV-GGiV64Ph_H34eMdige2T5zXna92ACLcBGAs/s1600/digneyfigWnus5.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"200\" data-original-width=\"200\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-zqrFIEO48zs/WeiCe8HNK-I/AAAAAAABWQ8/xzAV-GGiV64Ph_H34eMdige2T5zXna92ACLcBGAs/s400/digneyfigWnus5.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">What's more, those only\ninterested in art as an investment could buy a \"share\" of a painting\nand sell it once it appreciated, on blockchain itself.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In a blockchain ledger, you have an\nup-to-date, immutable historical record, so auditing in the blockchain\nenvironment requires a very different mindset and approach.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The technology itself exists as a file that\nmaintains a continuously growing list of ordered records called blocks.&nbsp;&nbsp; Each block contains a timestamp and a link\nto a previous block using a \u201cfingerprint\u201d.&nbsp;\nBlockchains are resistant to modification of data and cannot be altered\nretroactively.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain acts as an indispensable ledger \u2014\na central point of truth.&nbsp; Instead of\ncompanies keeping and reconciling records of the same transaction in their\nseparate, privately managed databases, or ledgers, both sides of the transaction\nare recorded simultaneously in a shared ledger.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Because of this capability, as\nwell as its ability to record transactions in real-time, blockchain is poised\nto up-end traditional methods of invoicing, documentation, contracts, and\npayment processing for businesses and industries both large and small.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In the future, virtually every function in\nthe world of Financial Services will be displaced, disintermediated and\ndecentralized.&nbsp; The internet gave us a\npowerful way to share and access information. Blockchain now gives us a powerful\nway to share and access value.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Accounting records are not alterable once\ncommitted under blockchain, even by the owners of the accounting system.\nBecause every transaction is recorded and verified, the integrity of financial\nrecords is guaranteed.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">While impressive, this technology has the potential to\ngreatly REDUCE &nbsp;eliminate the need for\nauditing resources\u2014potentially disrupting the accounting profession as a whole.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain\u2019s rise doesn\u2019t mean the end of the\nfinance or audit team\u2014till the system is TRIED AND TESTED</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Real-time\nauditing and reporting by blockchain system will release CFOs and their teams\nfrom certain routine, mundane, time-consuming tasks so that they can play more\nstrategic, creative roles \u2013 and focus on new ways to deliver future business\nvalue, rather than keeping track of past costs.&nbsp;&nbsp; And human interpretation of data and\ntransaction patterns will still be needed to generate the new insights that can\nlead to business growth.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Cross-industry\ncollaboration is key to establishing blockchain, because blockchain\u2019s benefits\nderive from its network effects: the technology becomes exponentially more\npowerful the MORE organizations or individuals use it.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Financial service providers&nbsp; need to work with regulators and central\nbanks to ensure the innovation and regulation works in harmony with existing\nlegal and regulatory frameworks \u2013 not least because blockchain, like the\ninternet, transcends regulatory jurisdictions and national borders.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain has the power to revolutionize the\nway we audit a company today.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The financial audit that we know is far from\nbeing an easy job both for the audited company and for the auditor.&nbsp; From the data collection to the multiple\nreconciliations to an understanding of the accounts it is a long, manual,\nfallible, and expensive process.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Built\non the Blockchain, Request Network introduces the concept of smart audit with\nalgorithms that verify transactions in real-time, detect irregularities,\nconsolidate accounts, and raise potential mistakes by providing the algorithm\nwith your verification key.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Request is a layer built upon Ethereum which\ndisintermediates payment requests.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Every time you receive an invoice, a receipt,\nor make a payment online, a third party is used to generate and share this\nrequest. This third party is usually any accounting software.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In the near future, instead of using a third\nparty, you\u2019ll create your request directly on the blockchain which will enable\na seamless payment experience.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This process carries a number of benefits:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It will be cheaper<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It will be more secure because you won\u2019t\nshare your financial information<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It will be easier to pay, thanks to the\nblockchain interoperability between the payee app and the payer app<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Request is a decentralized network which\nallows anyone to request a payment (a Request invoice) where the recipient is\nable to pay in a secure way and all the information is stored in a\ndecentralized authentic ledger. This results in a cheaper, easier and more\nsecure payments and allows a wide range of automation possibilities on top of\nit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The network consists of 3 layers. The core\nlayer includes the most fundamental smart contracts used to create and detect\npayment requests. The extensions layer adds taxation and business rules.\nFinally, the application layer allows financial organizations to access\ninvoices and facilitate payments.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">An invoice isn\u2019t recorded anymore in two\nindependent accounting systems but in one universal ledger verified by\neveryone. Imagine the impact of such a system on the management of intercompany\ntransactions of an international group.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The government doesn\u2019t need to wait until the\nend of the year to collect taxes because the system sends the information in\nreal-time as soon as the invoice is validated by every party. Taxes being\nautomatically returned each time an invoice is issued completely changes the\nway we do our accounting today.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Apart from that, smart audit provides correct\nand current information about a company\u2019s financial health. While today\u2019s\ncredit analysis is a painful task because of non-transparent and outdated\nfinancials (more than a 6-month lag), Request makes all transactions instantly\navailable on a shared database to be audited.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The credit score of a company can\nthen be updated regularly. We can elaborate on this and add a reputation system\nfor good and bad payers allowing a company to improve its credit score by\npaying its invoices on time. This would result in an easier access to\ninvestment and financing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Wherever people, processes, businesses,\ngovernment, or the social good requires proof of identity, of ownership, of\ntransactions, or of contractual commitments, blockchain technologies promise to\nmeet those needs with a degree of trust and integrity never before possible.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Those computers together verify transactions\nbased on certain prespecified rules (controls) that have been embedded in the\nsystem. To avoid a single point of failure, the transaction verification\nprocess is controlled by all the computers, rather than managed centrally.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\ncomputers jointly supervise system operation and prevent the information in the\nledger from being tampered with. Because of this feature, blockchain can\neffectively prevent one or several individuals in collusion from overriding\ncontrols, or illicitly changing or deleting official accounting records.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Moreover, as the embedded rules are automatically followed without much human\nintervention, it can enforce the operation of controls. By incorporating\nblockchain technology to their accounting information systems and cyber\nsecurity strategy, companies could reduce cyber fraud risk by maintaining a\nclean, secure database and a strengthened control system.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Tamper-resistant\u2014once a transaction is posted\non the blockchain, it becomes unchangeable and irreversible.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This prevents accounting records or related\nelectronic documents from being altered or deleted. In addition, sharing\naccounting information with many parties (e.g., business partners,\nstakeholders, managers, auditors) allows all of them to participate in\nperforming independent examination of transactions and delivering real-time\nassurance <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Assets that once were only transferred as\npaper documents are routinely issued digitally today.. One of the hallmarks of\nblockchain is that once records are created they cannot be altered.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">For decades, reconciling cross-border\npayments was a highly-manual, paper intensive undertaking. Blockchain makes\nthis process more transparent, more digital and more automated.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In all these domains, the goal is to reduce\nfriction \u2013 the time, cost and number of intermediaries involved in a\ntransaction \u2013 and to accelerate the velocity of transaction settlement.\nReducing friction offers another benefit \u2013 both for banks and for society. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain can provide economies of scale,\ngiving smaller firms similar advantages to larger ones. It lessens the\nrequirement for sizable administrative staffs to pour through copious documents\nto reconcile massive, complicated transactions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8668166373921046913\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; OUTSIDE MY SHIP-- MEANING -- THE SAMPLE COCK OUTSIDE THE SHUT MANIFOLD VALVES--BEFORE IT EVEN ENTERED THE SHIPS PIPELINE<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/sampling-procedures-chemical-tankers.html</span><br />\n<br />\nONCE AT A PORT IN IRAN, I WAS THREATENED WITH PHYSICAL INJURY AND JAIL.<br />\n<br />\nMY SHIP WENT TO A QUAY WHICH WAS OPERATING FOR THE FIRST TIME AFTER IRAN/ IRAQ WAR<br />\n<br />\nMY SHIP WAS TO LOAD 99.99% SULPHURIC ACID<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/06/pipeline-cleaning-and-blowing-on.html</span><br />\n<br />\nINSTEAD OF SULPURIC ACID-- I GOT PHOSPHORIC ACID IN MY SAMPLE BOTTLE<br />\n<br />\nI KNOW JUST BY SIGHT AND SMELL \u2013 EXPERIENCE RULES<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/phosphoric-acid-on-chemical-tankers.html</span><br />\n<br />\nI DECLARED--UNLESS I GET SULPHURIC ACID AT MY MANIFOLD VALVE COCK , I WILL NOT OPEN THE VALVE TO LET CARGO INTO THE TANK<br />\n<br />\nTHE ENTIRE IRANIAN FORCES FROM SHORE, CAME ON BOARD TO CONVINCE ME THAT I WAS WRONG-- THEY WERE ALL IRANIANS FIRST ( SEE- THIS IS EFFECT OF WAR BONDING )<br />\n<br />\nTHEY DELETED \"SAINT\" NAME ( BRITISH FLAG SHIP ) AND PAINTED \" SHAITAN \"--AND MY CREW AND OFFICERS ( ALL EUROPEANS ) GOT TERRIBLY AFRAID . I WAS THE ONLY INDIAN.<br />\n<br />\nVERBALLY I WAS THREATENED WITH PHYSICAL INJURY ( BREAKING BONES ) -- THEY CALLED UP MY OWNERS ( ROTHSCHILDs AGENT ) IN LONDON , AND CHARTERERS IN FRANCE ( ROTHSCHILDs AGENT ) --AND EVEN THEY ORDERED ME TO LOAD.<br />\n<br />\nSEE THE COSY RELATIONSHIP BETWEEN JEWS AND HARDCORE MUSLIMS . THIS JEW OWNER ( AGENT OF ROTHSCHILD ) VACATED THE WORLD TRADE CENTRE A WEEK EBFORE IT CAME DOWN.<br />\n<br />\nSORRY, IF I LOAD A MIX OF PHOSPHORIC ACID AND SULPHURIC ACID-- MY SHIP WILL DEVELOP A HOLE AND SINK AT SEA<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/05/stainless-steel-chemicaltankers.html</span><br />\n<br />\nALL WERE TRYING TO CONVINCE ME ( MY SHORE BOSSES ) THAT IT IS OK-- BUT THEN THEY HAVE SHIT FOR BRAINS<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/04/passivation-on-stainless-steel-chemical.html</span><br />\n<br />\nI CALLED MY P&amp;I CLUB FROM LONDON -- AFTER A TWO DAY DELAY--I DID A MELTING POINT TEST ( USING MY CABIN FRIDGE ) UNDER VIDEO CAMERA , AND PROVED THAT THE IRANIAN SAMPLE TEST CERTIFICATE WAS BULLSHIT<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/09/high-melting-point-cargoes-on-chemical.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTODAY I DECLARE -- THIS BLOGSITE IS THE MOST PRICELESS INTERNET SITE-- PAST , PRESENT AND FUTURE .. PERCEPTION , INTELLIGENCE AND BALLS / SPINE IS REQUIRED</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SO GOOGLE CAN CONTINUE BEING THE SLAVE OF JEW ROTHSCHILD AND BURY MY POSTS USING ALGORITHMS-- NO PROBLEMS.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">TO CUT A LONG STORY AT IRAN SHORT-- DOZENS OF TRUCKS WERE USED TO REMOVE PHOSPHORIC ACID AT THE SHORE VALVE --NEXT TO MY SHIPs MANIFOLD.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">FINALLY WHEN I GOT SULPURIC ACID IN MY SAMPLE BOTTLE --I LET THE CARGO INTO MAY TANKS</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AFTER DISCHARGE IN FRANCE, EACH OF MY CARGO TANKS HAD SEVRAL TONNES OF LOOSE RUST. REASON? SULPHURIC ACID MIXED WITH PHOSPHORIC ACID CAN BORE A HOLE THROUGH STAINLESS STEEL ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHAT IS SHIPs STAINLESS STELL- -IT IS JUST ORDINARY STEEL HAVING A MICROFILM VENEER -- THIS TOUGH MICRO LAYER OF CHROMIC OXIDE PATINA IS WHAT PROTECTS&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">WHO INVENTED STAINLESS STEEL?<br /><br />WE INDIANS</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CHECK OUT THE FIRST SENTENCE IN THE POST BELOW</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/05/stainless-steel-chemicaltankers.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHEN I WROTE MY COMPANYs CHEMICAL MANUAL-- WHITE JEWS ( POWERS THAT BE FROM ROTHSCHILDs SHELL COMPANY ) REJECTED IT FLAT-- THE REASON WAS \" </span><b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">SHIVA LINGAM</span></b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"> \" MENTIONED IN THE POST BELOW</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; SERIES\" BECAUSE I DID NOT WANT TO REVEAL WHAT A BUNCH OF MINDLESS CUNTS MAN SHIPS-- AND MANAGE THE FORTUNES OF SAILORS AT LAW MAKING IMO<br />\n<br />\nONCE MY 8 YEAR OLD ELDER SON ASKED ME \"DADDY , WHY ARE SAILORS SO STUPID?\"<br />\n<br />\nTHE INCIDENT ABOUT \"FALLING RAT GUARDS\" IS NARRATED IN THE POST BELOW<br />\n<br THEM TO TELL ME THE DIRECTION OF WIND/ SEA AND SWELL<br />\n<br />\n100% HAS NOT BEEN ABLE TO TELL .<br />\n<br />\nI AM TALKING ABOUT HUNDREDS OF NAVIGATING OFFICERS<br />\n<br />\nYOU CANT PREVENT DAMAGE TO SHIP , IF YOU DONT KNOW THIS<br />\n<br />\nFOR EXAMPLE \" WHEN YOU ARE NEARBY A HURRICANE , WHEN YOU FACE THE WIND-- THE STORM EYE ( FROM WHERE SWELL COMES ) IS 90 DEGREES TO THE RIGHT IN THE NORTHERN HEMISPHERE WHEN THE HURRICANE IS CLOSE AND 135 DEG TO THE RIGHT WHEN THE STORM IS FAR AWAY.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS CALLED BUY BALLOTS LAW<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/super-typhoon-bart-perfect-storm-capt.html<br />\n<br />\nYOU CANT EVEN CREATE LEE FOR THE PILOTS BOAT OR SHIELD YOUR SAILORS ON DECK FROM SHIPPING GREEN SEAS ( CHEMICAL TANKERS HAVE VERY LOW FREEBOARD ) IF YOU DONT KNOW WHERE SWELL IS COMING FROM<br />\n<br />\nBBB-- IN MY FIRST MEETING I ASK MY OFFICERS AND CREW A QUESTION--I SHOW THEM THE VOICE MEGAPHONE ( A SIMPLE CONE )--WHAT IS THE USE OF THIS ON THE BRIDGE --IT IS A COMPULSORY ITEM ON THE WHEELHOUSE<br />\n<br />\n100% TILL TODAY REPLIED--TO SHOUT AND GIVE ORDERS<br />\n<br />\nI CORRECT-- SORRY, IT IS TO BE APPLIED TO EAR-NOT MOUTH-- TO FIND THE DIRECTION OF A SHIP IN FOG WHICH BLOWS FOG HORN -- OR A NARROW PORT ENTRY SHIP CHANNEL WHICH GIVE ( BELL/ GONG / WHISTLE ) SIGNALS FROM BUOYS ON EITHER SIDE<br />\n<br />\nIMMEDIATELY ONE SAILOR IS BOUND TO SAY--SORRY THIS IS NOT POSSIBLE<br />\n<br />\nIMMEDIATELY I BLINDFOLD THE SAME SAILOR ( THIS BLINDFOLD IS KEPT READY )-- I ASK THAT HE BE TURNED AROUND -<br />\n<br />\nI GIVE A FOG SIGNAL USING MY MOUTH--- HOOOOOOOOOO-- AND ASK HIM TO IDENTIFY THE DITRECTION BY USING HIS FINGER<br />\n<br />\nAFTER THREE SUCH EXERCISES WITH THREE DIFFERENT SAILORS--ALL ARE CONVINCED<br />\n<br />\nAT SEA IF YOU DONT KNOW FOG SIGNALS--YOU FAIL IN EXAMS<br />\n<br />\nhttp://www.aztecsailing.co.uk/newaztec/theory/ch4/Colreg4s3.html<br Chief officer made it....<br />\n<br />\nSecond and third officer trapped in bridge, rescued people with head injuries...10 crew still missing it seems but with life jackets....<br />\n<br />\nAccording to survivors testimonies, EMERALD STAR developed port side list prior to disaster, which couldn\u2019t be put under control<br />\n<br />\n\" As per the information received from two survivors separately, Chief Engineer Shyam Singh Rajput made announcement on PA system and alerted all crew. They mustered on ship\u2019s deck. So we have strong belief that all crew member were prepared for abandoning the Ship. , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">TODAY I CONGRATULATE MYSELF --FOR PUTTING MY NECK ON THE CHOPPING BLOCK AND DARING THE POWERS THAT BE TO GO AHEAD AND DROP THE GUILLOTINE&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I WROTE TO SEVERAL P&amp;I CLUBS --</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I HAD A SIMILAR RUNNING BATTLE WITH HYPOCHLORITE CONTAINERS.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/11/auto-ignition-dangers-on-chemical.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I WOULD SHIFT THE CONTAINERS TO THE OUTBOARD UPPER LAYER . IT COSTS MONEY TO SHIFT. THEY THREATENDENDENDENDENED TO SACK ME --NAY--BITE MY HEAD OFF -- I DARED THEM TO SACK ME&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Nickel ore is mainly exported from Indonesia,the Philippines and New Caledonia. Unlike concentrates, these are simply dug out of the ground in open-cast mines in mineral-rich, and often remote, locations and are presented for ocean transport with little or no processing.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Nickel ore does NOT have a specific listing in the IMSBC Code and thus it is not immediately obvious from consulting the Code that these are indeed</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">cargoes that may liquefy.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Bastard shippers do NOT acknowledge that the Nickle ore has a liquefaction hazard by supplying a DOCTORED moisture and TML certificate--when asked for ( those days )&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">At the unloading prt we struggle-as Nickle ore is very sticky like chocolate --wasting everybodys time-- and then in USA i asked for teflon coating of the grabs..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE YANKS WOULD STONE WALL-- AND THEN I WOULD ASK FOR P&amp;I CLUB AND CHARTERES TO SEND THEIR SUPERCARGOES --I ALWAYS WON .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I JUST TOLD THEM ON THEIR FACES--CUNTS--LEARN FROM AN INTELLIGENT INDIAN CAPTAIN. ALL THIS IS BEYOND YOU&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">TO ARM TWIST I WOULD USE MASTERs AUTHORITY ( AN UNKNOWN CONCEPT THOSE DAYS ) AND REFUSE TO LOAD .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I WOULD JUST SEND A MESSAGE \" I HAVE UNLEASHED THE SWORD OF MASTERs AUTHORITY, IT WANTS BLOOD --HEADS MUST ROLL \"</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THEY WOULD HAVE THEIR BALLS IN THEIR THROATS&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: x-large; font-weight: bold;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: x-large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: x-large;\"><b>Dubai-based Stellar Ocean Transport owns this sunk ship Emerald star.&nbsp; &nbsp;We demand that Indians who lost their lives get suitable compensation .</b></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\">DOLPHINS AND WHALES GET MORE ATTENTION FROM BASTARDS IN IMO.</b></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; I asked him BEATING AROUND THE BUSH ? He stopped after that.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">..</span></div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_26b+seed09RD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_26b+seed09RD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-2juD-T5b5Mg/WejL3l0DAhI/AAAAAAABWRQ/078DcTLycNox6pJdqAMUMHC3V2PXSY6ZwCLcBGAs/s1600/DGyzenxjV0AAuU1Y.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"719\" data-original-width=\"900\" height=\"510\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-2juD-T5b5Mg/WejL3l0DAhI/AAAAAAABWRQ/078DcTLycNox6pJdqAMUMHC3V2PXSY6ZwCLcBGAs/s640/DGyzenxjV0AAuU1Y.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_210M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/10/time-has-come-to-save-watan-time-is-now.html?showComment=1508165208336#c4189286497869622242\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">October 16, 2017 at 8:16 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_91MC\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttp://www.financialexpress.com/india-news/indias-2nd-vijay-mallya-arms-dealer-sanjay-bhandari-flees-india-seeks-asylum-in-london/559103/<br />\n<br />\nOUR GOVT DOES NOT EVEN HAVE A LIST OF ARMS DEALS WHO OPERATE SHELL COMPANIES\u2014AFTER ALL THESE POLITICIANS GET KICKBACKS AND THEY TOO OPERATE SHELL COMPANIES<br />\n<br />\nThe IT dept had seized huge quantity of Panama\u2019s bearer shares from Sanjay Bhandari\u2019s premises in Delhi during the raid in April 2016.<br />\n<br />\nI had explained about BEARER SHARES in part 1 of my SHELL COMPANNIES post , at the end ..<br />\n<br />\nPanama\u2019s bearer shares are untraceable certificates of ownership and a mode to stash away black money in the tax haven. Such bearer shares ensure anonymity of the owner. Bhandari baby operated dozens of SHELL companies<br />\n<br />\nBhandari was not on radar till the I-T officials raided a Delhi-based hawala operator, Deepak Agarwal, in a case related to funding Aam Aadmi Party in July 2015. During the raid, I-T officials recovered a number of bogus bills, worth Rs 100 crore, in the name of Sanjay Bhandari.<br />\n<br />\nThis led to a separate tax survey for Bhandari\u2019s 20 shell companies. This is when I-T officials found some suspicious entries and defence ministry\u2019s documents. His phone was put on surveillance and then emerged his nexus with politicians, senior journalists and defence officials.<br />\n<br />\nI-T department has focussed on Bhandari\u2019s three main companies and his foreign accounts. These include his Delhi-based flagship company Offset India Solutions Pvt Ltd, which was floated in 2008 with paid-up capital of just Rs one lakh; Micromet Ati India Pvt Ltd, which had subscribed to Panama bearer shares; and Ayaana Software and Services Pvt Ltd, which was allegedly used for money laundering.<br />\n<br />\nSHELL COMPANIES SHOULD HAVE BEEN CRUSHED MUCH BEFORE INDIA DEMONETIZED<br />\n<br />\nWE DID NOT EVEN HAVE THE BALLS TO PREVENT MALLYA OR BHANDARI ESCAPING FROM INDIA- BOTH ARE HAVING A BLAST IN LONDON --OPEN DEFIANCE<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">LET GUJJU NO 2 CONTINUE PRAYING TO AMBEDKAR, GANDHI SHRIDI SAIBABA, BASAVA ETC AND GIVE STUPID TALK ON TWITTER AND MANN KE BAATH</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">MOST INDIAN MONEY LAUNDERERS, TAX EVADERS AND JAUNT PARTY ( EVIL PHARMA / ROTHSCHILD / BILDERBERG AGENCIES ) HAVE BEEN VERY CARELESS WHEN THEY WENT ABROAD</span></b><br />\n<br />\nNOT A SINGLE BIG FISH IS IN JAIL<br />\n<br />\nMODIs TERM IS GETTING OVER<br />\n<br />\nKASHMIRI PANDIT SCHOOL GIRLS ARE STILL DEFECATING IN THE OPEN<br />\n<br />\nMODI KOH VOTE MAANGTHA HAI --BASSSSSS<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/10/time-has-come-to-save-watan-time-is-now.html?showComment=1508157200873#c2320084546700134565\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">October 16, 2017 at 6:03 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_78MC\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEONE ASKED ME\u2014<br />\n<br />\nJUST BECAUSE BRITISH STONENEHENGE HAS 27 PORTALS HOW CAN IT BE A HINDU STRUCTURE ?<br />\n<br />\nLISTEN--- 27 PORTALS IS FOR 27 NAKSHATRAS<br />\n<br />\nEach of the 27 Nakshatra is divided into four Pada = 4 quarters. 27 x 4 = 108= digital value of OM<br />\n<br />\n108 IS A DIVINE NUMBER --<br />\n<br />\nNOBODY CAN STEAL THIS NUMBER AND GIVE IT TO ANY OTHER LAND OTHER THAN INDIA , OR RELIGION OTHER THAN SANATANA DHARMA.<br />\n<br />\nNakshatra ( Asterism ) is the general term, referring to any identified pattern of stars.<br />\n<br />\nThe ecliptic is divided into each of the nakshatras eastwards starting from this first point of Aries<br />\n<br />\nFirst point of Aries is the spot where equinoctial cuts the ecliptic.. The First Point of Aries, is current at PISCES and is a mismomer . It just show the Greeks lifted from Kerala astrology-- It, defines the zero-point for Right Ascension.<br />\n<br />\nBEFORE THE \u201c INTERSECTION OF EQUINOCTIAL AND ECLIPTIC \u201c WAS AT ARIES \u2014 ONLY KODUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY OWNED BY THE CALICUT KING KNEW ASTRONOMY<br />\n<br />\nRISHABHAM- TAURUS (4300 BC ) / MEDAM- ARIES (2150 BC ) / MENAM- PISCES ( 1 AD ) / KUMBHAM - AQUARIUS (2150 AD )<br />\n<br />\nThe First Point of Aries is not a fixed point in space: it moves along the Ecliptic at a rate of roughly one degree every seventy years. When the Equinox was first observed, thousands of years ago, the First Point actually lay in the constellation of Aries.<br />\n<br />\nWhen the Sun reaches the First Point of Aries, as it does once each year, an equinox occurs.<br />\n<br />\nBecause the First Point of Aries is the zero-point for calculating coordinates on the Celestial Sphere, its own coordinates are always fixed, regardless of its motion. They are, of course, zero hours Right Ascension and zero degrees Declination.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nKERALA SAGES FROM KODUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY GAVE THE COSMIC ALLEGORIES FOR THE BIBLE IN 325 AD AT THE FIRST COUNCIL OF NICEA TO THE ROMAN EMPEROR .<br />\n<br />\nJESUS CHRIST NEVER EXISTED<br />\n<br />\nJESUS WAS A CLEVER COMBINATION OF COSMIC ALLEGORY/ APPOLONIUS OF TYANA , A KERALA SAGE AND HIS SIDE KICK DAMISA ( WHO MARRIED MARY OF MAGDALENE \u2013A NAMBOODIRI WOMAN )<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/03/st-patrick-genocide-of-druids-pope-leo_22.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/03/st-patrick-genocide-of-druids-pope-leo_22.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/the-huge-statue-of-colossus-of-rome-at.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/the-huge-statue-of-colossus-of-rome-at.html</a><o:p></o:p><br />\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/108-numerical-equivalent-of-hindu-king.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/108-numerical-equivalent-of-hindu-king.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONTINUED FROM 1--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">A time crystal is a\nstate of matter--which will take the western world another 500 years to come to\nterms with.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">It has an atomic\nstructure which stretches atoms apart while still allowing them to interact\nwith each other.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">This assymetric\nstructure still repeats itself in space\u2014and also in TIME .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The assymetric\nvibrations repeat themselves, perpetually. This fractures the symmetry of time.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS 4D CRYSTAL DIAMOND\nWORKS BEHIND THE QUANTUM SCREEN OF MAYA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The laws of physics are\nnot only symmetrical in space but also in time.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Temporal\nsymmetry-breaking would manifest itself in this repeating motion in time, just\nas spatial symmetry-breaking manifests itself as repeating patterns in space<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">BRAHMAs EYE WOULD TURN\nFROM BLUE IN DAYLIGHT TO BRIGHT BLOOD RED IN PITCH DARKNESS . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">IT HELD A CURSE FOR\nPEOPLE WITH CRIMINAL DNA . THE THIEVES CUT THE DIAMOND AND IT BECAME BLACK. THE\nELECTRONS FLIPPED 180 DEGREES ANALOGOUS TO WHAT HAPPENS DURING MRI TO HUMAN\nBODY NUCLEI.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Atoms of TIME crystals\noperate in a sort of time-array, as opposed to a physical array. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Time crystals are\nclosely related to concepts of ZPF and dynamical Casimir effect--as I have\nexplained in many of my posts. The universe is made up of matter fields whose\nquanta are fermions (i.e. leptons and quarks) and force fields, whose quanta\nare bosons (e.g. photons and gluons). All these fields have zero-point energy<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE SRI YANTRA GEOMETRY\nCONTAINS THE THEORY OF EVERYTHING<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shah Jahan named Jama\nMasjid ( INDIAs LARGEST MOSQUE ) as The Masjid-i Jah\u0101n-Num\u0101 or Jahan Numa\n(World-reflecting Mosque)-- he got an imam from Bukhara, present-day\nUzbekistan. &nbsp;In ancient days India ruled\nthis place.&nbsp; The mosque was completed in\n1656 AD with three great gates, four towers and two 40 m high minarets\nconstructed of strips of red sandstone and white marble. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Badshahi Masjid,\nbuilt by Shah Jahan's son Aurangzeb at Lahore, was also a Hindu temple. The\nJama Masjid of Agra was also a Hindu temple.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shah Jahan also built\nthe Taj Mahal, at Agra and the Red Fort in New Delhi, which stands opposite the\nJama Masjid. Taj mahal was a Hindu temple cum palace. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Babri Masjid was a\nHindu temple at Ayodhya<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/11/babri-masjid-demolition-mughal-emperor.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/11/babri-masjid-demolition-mughal-emperor.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">LIES WONT WORK ANY\nMORE.. In mid-July each year, Bohemian Grove hosts a two-week, three-weekend encampment of some of the most prominent men in the world<br />\n<br />\nFemales cannot attend this ritual and the current US President cannot attend.<br />\n<br />\nThe tradition of a summer encampment was established six years after the Bohemian Club was formed in 1872<br />\n<br />\nThe Grove is particularly famous for a Manhattan Project planning meeting that took place there in September 1942, which subsequently led to the atomic bomb.<br />\n<br />\nRichard Nixon said : \"The Bohemian Grove (an elite, secrecy-filled gathering outside San Francisco), which I attend from time to time. It is the most faggy goddamned thing you could ever imagine\u201d<br />\n<br />\nORAL AND ANALS SEX GOES ON BETWEEN JEWS HERE --THEY BRING THEIR MALE GAY GUESTS.<br />\n<br />\nSince the founding of the club, the Bohemian Grove's giant mascot has been an OWL, symbolizing knowledge.<br />\n<br />\nBALLS IT IS AN OWL\u2014IT IS THOTH ( GARUDA ).<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/09/garuda-vimana-of-vishnu-and-garuda.html<br />\n<br />\nTHESE CUNTS DON\u2019T EVEN KNOW<br />\n<br />\nhttp://humansarefree.com/2017/06/new-house-of-cards-features-mock-human.html<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/dirty-secrets-of-boston-tea-party-capt.html<br />\n<br />\nAfter Apollonius of Tyana visited India a second time with Damisa, he was given a list of Hindu temples to visit in Egypt.<br />\n<br />\nHe spent a long time there inspecting the vaastu of pyramids and every single ancient monument related to Imhotep.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/imhotep-patron-saint-of-freemasons-capt.html<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_177BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; The layers of meaning in the Emerald Tablet have been associated with the creation of the philosopher's stone, laboratory experimentation, phase transition, the alchemical magnum opus, the ancient, classical, element system, and the correspondence between macrocosm and microcosm. The Emerald Tablet is said to be a tablet of emerald or green stone inscribed with the secrets of the universe. - text describes seven stages of alchemical transformation \u2013 calcination, dissolution, separation, conjunction, fermentation, distillation and coagulation\u201d<br />\n<br />\nImhotep ( Lord Ayyappa ) the 9th avatar of Vishnu is represented as Vishnu carrier GARUDA -- the divine builder of the Great Pyramid of Giza - Thoth as eagle Garuda<br />\nThoth resembles Garuda in some respects: Thoth was the god associated with writing, knowledge , Pharoah\u2019s funeral rites for passage to the divine world.<br />\n<br />\nThoth is said to preside over scribes and scholars. In India Garuda is the vehicle of Lord Vishnu and is also the lord of knowledge<br />\nGaruda Purana is a conversation between Lord Vishnu and Garuda and it deals with funeral rites and the metaphysics of reincarnation, which set ablaze the imagination of every Pharoah.<br />\n<br />\nGaruda Purana lies in the fact that it is the only sacred text that talks about the life after death, the journey of the soul, death and its aftermath, rebirth or reincarnation.<br />\n<br />\nEven the modern science could not break the mystery of death and after; whereas, Garuda Purana has spelled out these realities ages before.<br />\n<br />\nIn India for Shraddh the priest recites Sanskrit verses from Garuda Purana.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/11/pitru-paksha-shraadh-pitru-tharpanam.html<br />\n<br />\nArabic scholar to J\u00e1bir ibn Hayy\u00e1n (722-815 AD) attributes Sirr al-Khal\u00edqa (The Secret of Creation)<br />\nto Apollonius . It ranges from explaining the metaphysical origin of the universe to considerations on the ontological categories of the world and the nature of the human soul.<br />\n<br />\nIn Sirr al-Khal\u00edqa, Apollonius ( Bal\u00edn\u00fas ) discovered both the Emerald Tablet of Thoth while exploring a crypt beneath a statue of Thoth ( Hermes)<br />\n<br />\nApollonius of Tyana is a sage from Kerala on whose life Jesus Christ was modeled at the First Council of Nice in 325 AD, by the Roman Emperor. Tamas creates Rajas, and Rajas activates/ excites Tamas. Sattva preserves and mediates .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">7000 year old Vedas say that the only constant in the cosmos is change, everything is in a state of flux, nothing is static-- everything is vibratory. This is what guarantees growth and evolution. It is a cosmic spiraling dance of separate opposing forces, which sustains this universe<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">One cannot exist without the other and they are dependant . No phenomenon in this universe is completely devoid of its opposite. They consume each other yet support each other.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">CONTINUED TO 2-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">CONTINUED FROM 1-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">If the restraining balance or equilibrium is lost by the mediator ( Vishnu ) , the universe will spiral out of control and end. This is why Lord Vishnu is called the PRESERVER god. And only Vishnu can have mortal avatars.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">As for the opposing forces TAMAS/ RAJAS ( Brahma/ Shiva ) it really does NOT matter as who is who, like in AC electricity-where you can plug into the socket both ways.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">These two opposing forces are natural and transform each other , in perfect harmony. Harmony can never be stagnant . Lessening of Tamas always results in increase of Rajas and vice versa.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Balance can never be permanent\u2014 Tamas and Rajas continiously devour each other \u2013 and life flows on. This universe cannot exist without vibrations between two poles.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">THE THIRD TEMPLATE IS SAMKHYA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">This is about the male and female joint TEAM effort. This is NOT a dance of opposites. In Hinduism we call the MALE- purusha and FEMALE- prakriti.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">In the Tantric cosmology, the whole universe is perceived as being created, penetrated and sustained by two fundamental forces, which are permanently in a perfect, indestructible UNION. These forces or universal aspects are called Shiva ( Purusha ) and Shakti (Prakriti ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Each of the trinity gods are powerless without their consorts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Purusha and Pragati is expressed as Shiva and Shakti in the same body 50:50 \u2013 this is NOT a she boy or a transgender . It is a mindboggling, intelligent concept.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;
