It is perceived in its effects.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The eternal and indestructible union between Shiva and Shakti gives birth to the whole Macrocosm, in its stable, static aspect as well as in its dynamic one. Not only is Shakti responsible for creation, it is also the agent of all change<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Shakti is manifested by Shiva only during creation and is withdrawn into himself at the end of creation. This is for the perceptive.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Modern science repeats from our Vedas that matter and energy are interchangeable. So does consciousness and energy .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Samkhya as you can see was a masterpiece of modeling the ways of the inner universe.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; A girl like goddess born to humans. 'There was none on earth to match her loveliness. Gods, anti-gods, and yakshas yearned for such celestial beauty.' (169:45-47, Adi Parva, Mahabharata)<br />\n<br />\nDraupadi\u2019s biological parents were Agni and Swaha . She was adopted by Drupad, King of Panchala, which is why her name was changed from Agni Jyotsna to Princess of Panchala to Drupad Kanya to Draupadi. The sages called her Yajna Seni as she was born from the sacrificial fire.<br />\n<br />\nShe was a fully grown woman, dressed in the best of sSilk, unusually rare jewelry. A dark complexioned maiden, so dark, that when her hair brushed over her face, the black raven like hair, looked golden brown, so dark was her complexion.<br />\n<br />\nVoluptuous with a slender waist. She had a naturally aromatic odor that could be sensed a \u2018yojana\u2019 away (a measurement for distance).<br />\n<br />\nDraupadi as Kundalini has five human chakras she has to cross before she finds refuge in the topmost Sahasrara chakra ..<br />\n<br />\nTHE BASTARD WHITE INVADER MADE DRAUPADI A DAUGHTER (NALAYANI ) OF NALA AND DAMAYANTI IN HER PREVIOUS BIRTH .. ROTHSCHILD GOT THIS FAKE STORY ADAPTED INTO KERALA KATHAKALI..<br />\n<br />\nTHE WHITE BASTARDS WROTE A BULLSHIT BOOK ON COOKERY ( PAKADARPANAM-- WITH BEEF ) AND TOLD THAT NALA , AN EXCELLENT COOK WROTE IT. ROTHSCHILD GOT THE CRYPTO JEW KARALA PRINCE RAVI VARMA TO PAINT NALA AND DAMAYANTI.<br />\n<br />\nTHE BHAKTi MOVEMENT AND ITS HEROES WERE CREATED AND BACKDATED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD.. The moon appears full when the Earth is between the moon and the sun. In both cases, the gravitational pull of the sun is \"added\" to the gravitational pull of the moon on Earth, causing the oceans to bulge a bit more than usual. This means that high tides are a little higher and low tides are a little lower than average.<br />\n<br />\nSpring tides, has nothing to do with the season of spring. Rather, the term is derived from the concept of the tide \"springing forth.\" ..<br />\n<br />\nSpring tides occur twice each lunar month all year long, without regard to the season\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://tides.mobilegeographics.com/calendar/month/547.html<br />\n<br />\nIN THE LINK ABOVE YOU CAN SEE THAT FULL MOON IS ON 3RD DEC 2017..<br />\n<br />\nTHREE DAYS LATER THE DATE IS 6TH DEC..<br />\n<br />\nTHE HIGH TIDE ( SPRING ) IS 12.5 METRES --THE HIGHEST..<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD TOOK AWAY INDIANS TO WORK AS INDENTURED LABOUR.. When the body is not cleansing properly, this process is impaired and instead you wake up tired and lethargic . There is a higher sodium content in the cell, therefore a higher hydrogen (acidifying) content, and as water follows sodium in the body, the water content of the cell starts to swell. ..<br />\n<br />\nSo the cell is under pressure from high acidity \u2013 so it pulls in more calcium, which displaces more magnesium causing an imbalance\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThe moon-pull is much gentler than the sun-push. Only if conditions are right within the body can the moon pull the sodium back across the cell membrane, thus making way for the Magnesium to exert a gentle push with the potassium, so that they go back to their rightful position, which is inside the cell\u2026<br />\n<br />\nWhat is lymph? Ayurveda knew it 6000 years ago, while modern science knew about it just 60 years back\u2026<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/08/yoga-and-ayurvedic-massage-for-draining.html<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/01/lymph-nodes-vs-endocrine-exocrine.html<br />\n<br />\n6200 YEAR OLD Ayurveda was the first to write about AUTOPHAGY.. literally SELF EATING -- it\u2019s the body\u2019s system of cleaning house: Your cells create membranes that hunt out scraps of dead, diseased, or worn-out cells; gobble them up; strip them for parts; and use the resulting molecules for energy or to make new cell parts.<br />\n<br />\nAutophagy makes us more efficient machines to get rid of faulty parts, stop cancerous growths, and stop metabolic dysfunction like obesity and diabetes.. the process plays a hand in controlling inflammation and immunity.<br />\n<br />\nTHE MOST IMPORTANT EFFECT IS THAT THE BRAIN GETS SHARPENED AND THE AGEING PROCESS SLOWS DOWN<br />\n<br />\nhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=10jNZleNH9w<br />\n<br />\nFROM NOW ON HINDUS WILL CREATE THEIR OWN DESTINY--WE DONT CARE FOR THE WHITE MEN WHO FOOLED US USING AGENTS LIKE GANDHI AND BR AMBEDKAR\u2026<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_139MN\" kind=\"m\"></span></div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_139B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium;\">\nCapt. and when his body was later disinterred during the French Revolution to be relocated, he was wearing a FORGED medallion on which the exact date of the disinterment was engraved\u2026</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; First she interpreted references to Moammar Qaddafi, and later changed them to the Ayatollah Khomeini, and later changed them again to Saddam Hussein..</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium;\">\nNEW YORK NEVER EXISTED DURING TIMES OF NOSTRADAMUS .. Since the merchant buys monkey @ 1000 each, there is a 300 profit for each monkey.\ud83d\ude2c<br /><br />The next day, villagers made a queue near the monkey cage.\ud83d\udc12\ud83d\udc12\ud83d\udc12\ud83d\udc12\ud83d\udc12\ud83d\udc12\ud83d\udc35\ud83d\udc12\ud83e\udd11\ud83e\udd11\ud83e\udd11\ud83e\udd11\ud83e\udd11\ud83e\udd11\ud83e\udd11\ud83e\udd11\ud83e\udd11\ud83e\udd11<br /><br />The employee sold all the monkeys at 700 each. The rich bought monkeys in big lots. HERE REACTION RULES, NOT THE ACTION..<br /><br />A GOOD TRADER GETS THE WHIFF OF MARKET FUCKIN' FORCES AND SUPPLIES THE DEMAND--SUPPY MUST ALWAYS SMELL THE FART OF DEMAND..<br /><br />YOU KNOW WHY FAALTHU ADVISE IS CHEAP ?--BECAUSE SUPPLY ALWAYS EXCEEDS DEMAND ..<br /><br />THE ARM WRESTING BETWEEN SUPPLY AND DEMAND IS CONTROLLED BY KOSHER BIG BROTHER..<br /><br />WHEN DEMAND IS DOWN AND SUPPLY IS UP-- PRICES CRASH\u2026<br /><br />COST OF PRODUCTION GOVERNS OSCILLATIONS ..<br /><br />MERIT ? BALLS TO MERIT ! HOW DID ROTHSCHILDs TULIPS SELL IN HOLLAND ? ..<br /><br />OUR REACTION TO A SITUATION HAS THE POWER TO CHANGE THE SITUATION..<br /><br />WHAT I WROTE IS THE COMMANDMENTS OF ECONOMICS--- HOW MANY ECONOMISTS IN INDIA CAN EVEN UNDERSTAND IT ? ..<br /><br />THIS IS WHY I SAY-- 95% OF ECONOMICS PROFESSORS IN ELITE BUSINESS SCHOOLS NEED TO BE SACKED.. ..<br /><br />A LIFE OF \"KNEE JERK\" REACTION IS A LIFE OF SLAVERY.. PEOPLE ALWAYS SELL IN PANIC. ..<br /><br />WHAT DO THESE ROTHSCHILDs AGENCIES LIKE MOODYs, S&amp;P, FITCH ETC DO ?..<br /><br />THEY ARE IN THE CHAKRAVYUH OF USELESS COMMANDMENTS . THEY DONT KNOW IF THEY ARE COMING OR GOING-- CANT DIFFERENTIATE BETWEEN ASSHOLE AND ELBOW\u2026<br /><br />TWO STORIES BELOW--<br />########<br />A city traveller was driving through a shanty town in Alabama. .<br /><br />He feels he needs to go for a crap , and so he stops at the best motel in town\u2026<br /><br />He tells the motel owner at the reception that he needs to stay overnight, but he has to check out the best room first, and only if it suits his standards, only then , he will stay overnight. ..<br /><br />The owner agrees, takes 100 dollars from him as a refundable depost, and the traveller goes up to check out his room. ..<br /><br />Meanwhile the motel owner races to the town\u2019s resident whore and returns the 100 dollars he owes her. The whore rushes to the tailor and return 100 dollars she owes him. The tailor rushes to the butcher, the butcher rushes to the tavern owner etc etc\u2014this 100 dollar changes hands several times , before the 100 dollar bill comes back to the motel owner via the local blacksmith who had used the motel several times. ..<br /><br />The traveller meanwhile declares that the motel room is below his standards, ( but he used the toilet for a nice crap quietly ) collects his 100 dollars back from the motel owner , gets into his car and drives away\u2026<br /><br />Now\u2014<br /><br />Every body has benefitted\u2014the traveller had his free crap at leisure, the entire town have repayed their debts in a MERRY GO ROUND WAY , and is looking forwards to a better future with renewed confidence\u2026<br /><br />This is how the American system works\u2026<br /><br />#####<br /><br />CONTINUED TO 2-</span></div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_89MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"background-color: white; They are worse than lawyers in the cerebral dept\u2026<br />#############<br />Experienced economist and not so experienced economist are walking down Oxford street.<br /><br />They get across shit lying on the asphalt\u2026<br /><br />Experienced economist: \"If you eat it I'll give you $20,000!\"..<br /><br />Not so experienced economist runs his optimization program on his I7 procesor laptop and figures out he's better off eating it so he does and collects money\u2026<br /><br />Continuing along the same road they almost step into yet another pice of turd.<br /><br />The not so experienced economist: \"Now, if YOU eat this shit I'll give YOU $20,000.\"<br /><br />After evaluating the proposal , our experienced economist eats shit and pockets the moolah.<br /><br />They go on.<br /><br />The not so experienced economist starts thinking aloud : \"Listen, we both have the same amount of money we had before, but we both ate shit. I don't see us being better off.\"..<br /><br />Experienced economist: \"Well, that's true, but you overlooked the fact that we've been just involved in $40,000 of fucking trade.\"<br /><br />##########<br /><br />\u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026. class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_73M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_10.html?showComment=1525996869030#c3498136755581129753\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 11, 2018 at 5:31 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_73MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\"><b>IMPORTANT\u2014IMPORTANT\u2014IMPORTANT\u2026\u2026\u2026.</b></span><br />\nI AM PENNING THIS MOST CRITICAL POST FOR THE BLIND MEN OF HINDOOSTAN WHO ARE FIGHTING OVER THE QUINTESSENTIAL ELEPHANT..<br />\n<br />\nWE HAVE BOTTOM OF THE SCHOOL CEREBRAL BARREL LAWYERS TURNED JUDGES, THE IGNORANT ISI, THE FOOLISH THINK TANKS , THE PEABRAINED BENAMI MEDIA ETC , ARGUING ABOUT WHY TAJ MAHAL IS DIRTY FROM OUTSIDE AND INSIDE..<br />\n<br />\nONLY ONE MAN ON THIS PLANET CAN GIVE YOU THIS ANSWER--HIS NAME IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL ( IF I AM BOASTING, SO BE IT !) -- HENCE LISTEN UP..<br />\n<br />\nPure white marble used in building Taj Mahal is the result of metamorphism of a very pure (silicate-poor) limestone or dolomite protolith\u2026<br />\n<br />\nMost of the exterior marble slabs you see on Taj Mahal is ripped off from inside rooms of an older palace which stood there several centuries before JEW Shah Jahan and his JEWESS wife Mumtaj Mahal existed ..<br />\n<br />\nThis is an areas where ancient Nuclear explosions took place --and hence carbon dating will show later dates... This science is so sure that if you do carbon dating in a place where a fresh nuclear explosion took place like Bikini Atoll in Pacific--the carbon dating will show several centuries into the FUTURE ( instead of past )..<br />\n<br />\nTHERE WAS A CONSPIRACY TO SHUT DOWN MATHURAL OIL REFINERY-- BY DESH DROHIS IN THE PAYROLL OF THE WHITE MAN -- STATING THAT THE REFINERYs CHIMNEY EMISSIONS MAKE THE TAJ MAHAL DIRTY..<br />\n<br />\nOIL PUMPED INTO THE VADINAR ( GUJARAT ) DEEP SEA SBM TERMINAL FROM HUGE TANKERS GO ALL THE WAY TO MATHURA REFINERY BY PIPELINE WITH BOOSTER PUMPS ENROUTE.. THE SHIP WHICH I SERVED AS SECOND MATE WAS THE FIRST TO PUMP 280,000 TONNED OF RASTANURA CRUDE OIL INTO VADINAR..<br />\n<br />\nTHE DISTANCE FROM MATHURA OIL REFINERY TO TAJ MAHAL ( TO THE SOUTH EAST ) IS JUST 48 KM.. THIS PIPELINE FROM VADINAR DEEP SEA TERMINAL TO MATHURA REFINERY IS ABOUT 1800 KM LONG.. A MASSIVE INVESTMENT FOR THE PROSPERITY OF BHARATATA ..<br />\n<br />\nAT THAT TIME I WAS A YOUNG OFFICER ( 1977 ) AND I SAID BULLSHIT -- WHEN I HEARD THE TOP IOC OFFICIALS TALKING ABOUT SHUTTING DOWN MATHURA REFINERY TO SAVE TAJ MAHAL - I CALLED THEM CUNTS !<br />\n<br />\nNow --<br />\n<br />\nI have carried huge 30 to 35 ton marble blocks from Sicily Italy ( Reggio Calabria ) to Kuwait , for making statues for the Kuwait Emir's palace. These marble blocks were unpolished and you would think it was a huge block of white chalk or limestone.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS WAS THE YEAR 1981 , AND I WAS 37 YEARS YOUNGER.. A BACHELOR..<br />\n<br />\nWE HAD HEAVY DERRICKS FROM 40 TONNES VALLES TO 125 TONNES JUMBOS ..<br />\n<br />\nDIGRESSION : ON THE SAME SHIP I LOADED A NUCLEAR PLANT FOR SADDAM HUSSAIN ( ITALY ) AND LANDED IT DIRECTLY INTO TRUCKS AT AL-KUWAIT PORT\u2026<br />\n<br />\nTHE SHIP HAD TWEEN DECKS ( UPPER AND LOWER ) INSIDE THE HOLD-- WHICH MEANT DOZENS OF HUGE HYDRAULIC CYLINDERS TO LIFT THE HATCH COVERS AND TWIN DECK COVERS..<br />\n<br />\nMY CAPTAIN WAS A MALAYALI IDIOT ( WE CALLED HIM FUCK-KNOWS-STEPHANOS ) WHO CAME UP FROM THE RANKS-- AND SO WHEN IT CAME TO USING BRAINS , I AS A THREE STRIPER CHIEF OFFICER HAD TO USE IT TO SAVE THE VENTURE--EVERY TIME.. MY CREW / COMPANY ( SCI ) LOOKED UP TO ME..</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">BELOW-- WHAT I DESCRIBED AT HAMBURG DRY DOCK WAS WHAT EXACTLY HAPPENED TO THE INDIAN NAVY WARSHIP IN MUMBAI LOCKS WHICH CAPSIZED RECENTLY..&nbsp; &nbsp; READ A MOST CRITICAL COMMENT DATED 6TH DEC 2016..&nbsp; &nbsp; I HAD TO COMMENT BECAUSE OUR INDIAN NAVY IS FULL OF CUNTS SANS HONOUR ..</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/india-stands-tall-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\nI WANTED THE TOP LAYER OF THE MARBLE BLOCK TO BE COVERED WITH LARGE PLASTIC SHEATH WRAPPING.. THIS COSTED TIME AND MONEY---AND THE SHIPPERS WERE UNWILLING TO DO IT..<br />\n<br />\nAS THE CHIEF MATE I SAID I WILL NOT SIGN THE MATES RECEIPTS--THERE WAS A STAND OFF --AND FINALLY I WON..<br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\">WHAT I SAID WAS --\"ONE DROP OF HYDRAULIC OIL DRIPPING ON MARBLE DURING THE VOYAGE ( SQUIRTING PAST LEAKY SEALS IN HIGH TEMPERATURE / ROUGH SEAS ) WOULD BE SUCKED INTO THE MARBLE SLAB LIKE ABSORBANT BLOTTING PAPER RENDERING IT UNFIT FOR POLISHING..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_73BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; WHEN THIS HAPPENS DIRT AND OIL ENTERS THE MICRO PORES ..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS WHY , WHEN I MOVED INTO MY NEW HOME TWO DECADES AGO-- I SAW HUGE WHITE RAJASTANI MARBLE SLABS IN THE KITCHEN -- I GOT THEM RIPPED OFF AND CHANGED TO HIGHLY POLISHED SUPERIOR GRANITE WHOSE UNPOLISHED PORES WERE SMALLER ..<br />\n<br />\nALL CALLED ME CRAZY-- I SAID, I KNOW WHAT I AM DOING...THESE SURFACES WOULD BE CONSTANTLY COVERED BY OIL AND HARSH DETERGENTS..AND WOULD BE A DIRTY YELLOW EYE SORE SOONER THAN LATER ..<br />\n<br />\nWISDOM: WHEN YOU USE WHITE MARBLE SLABS--ENSURE THAT THE SURFACE IF HIGHLY POLISHED ..THIS IS EASIER DONE ON HORIZONTAL SURFACE WITHOUT GROOVES--AND ALMOST IMPOSSIBLE TO DO ON CURVED DOMES...<br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<b style=\"color: magenta; font-size: x-large;\">A COARSE UNPOLISHED MARBLE SURFACE HAS PITS WHICH HOLDS FOREIGN MATERIAL..</b></div>\n<div>\n<br /></div>\nI WAS THE FIRST TO INTRODUCE \"PASSIVATION\" ON STAINLESS STEEL CHEMICAL TANKERS USING NITRIC ACID-- TO BUILD UP AN ANGSTROM THIN VENEER OF CHROMIUM OXIDE.. I HAD A RUNNING BATTLE WITH THE WHITE POWERS WHO RULED THE SEAS.. I WON..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/05/stainless-steel-chemicaltankers.html</span><br />\n<br />\nON CHEMICAL TANKERS WE CARRY TOXINS LIKE MDI ( WHICH KILLED IN BHOPAL ), CARINOGENS LIKE BENZENE, STRONG ACIDS LIKE SULFURIC ACID, STRONG ALKALIES LIKE CAUSTIC POTASH , WHITE WINE, POTABLE RUM, ORANGE JUICE ETC..<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/04/passivation-on-stainless-steel-chemical.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHIS POST ( ON TRUCKS ) IS FOR INDIAS FOOD AND TRANSPORT MINISTERIES.. ONE OVER SMART MALAYALI PUJARI USED STRONG AMWAY DETERGENT ON A BLACK GREASY VISHNU IDOL-- AND THE IDOL SUDDENLY STARTED SHINING LIKE GOLD..<br />\n<br />\nNOW ABOUT FLYING BROWN ALGAE..WHICH MADE THE BOTTOM OF THE CEREBRAL BARREL MELORDS GO INTO A TIZZY..<br />\n<br />\nWHITE TAJ MAHAL DOMES CAN BE DARKENED BY NANO CARBON EMISSIONS FROM CNG CARS, NANO CARBON EMISSIONS FROM LPG COOKING CYLINDERS, DIESEL EXHAUSTS OF TRUCKS, DUST STORMS EMANATING FROM PAKISTAN SIDE, ACID RAIN WHOSE FOUNTAIN HEAD IS OIL REFINERIES IN THE SAUDI ARABIAN DESERT OR POLLUTION EVEN FURTHER AWAY..<br />\n<br />\nCALIFORNIAN WINE IS SHIT - BECAUSE&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">POLLUTION FROM CHINA TRAVELS ACROSS THE PACIFIC OCEAN IN 3 DAYS FLAT LIKE A HIGH ALTITUDE BALLOON</span></b>&nbsp;AND RAINS DOWN ON THE WEST COAST OF USA.. INSTEAD OF UNDERSTANDING THIS THE CUNTS IN USA ASKED ASKED SHIPS TO REDUCE SPEED AND USE LIGHT DIESEL OIL INSTEAD OF HEAVY FUEL OIL..<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE WRITTEN ABOUT IT 7 YEARS AGO.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_10.html?showComment=1526060471074#c2685797842938331508\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 11, 2018 at 11:11 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_181MC\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttps://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/sc-collegium-agrees-in-principle-to-reitereate-justice-josephs-name-for-elevation-to-top-court/articleshow/64123835.cms<br />\n<br />\nTHE ACCOUNTABLE ELECTED EXECUTIVE CAN REJECT JUDGE KM JOSEPHs ELEVATION TO SUPREME COURT --WITHOUT ASSIGNING REASONS..<br />\n<br />\nONCE KM JOSEPHs NAME IS REJECTED--IT IS FINAL.. THERE IS NO NEED FOR THE ELECTED EXECUTIVE TO GIVE REASON--ESPECIALLY IF IT IS TO BE PUBLISHED IN THE MEDIA..<br />\n<br />\nIF UNACCOUNTABLE ( TO WE THE PEOPLE ) SUPREME COURT COLLEGIUM SENDS BACK THE SAME NAME AGAIN -- IT IS INDISCIPLINE ..<br />\n<br />\nAND NOW IT IS THE PLEASURE OF THE ELECTED EXECUTIVE TO PUNISH ( LOSS OF PROMOTION - LOSS OF SALARY RISE ) THE RECALCITRANT JUDGES...<br />\n<br />\nDO NOT REDUCE THE SANCTITY OF THE JUDICIAL SYSTEM...<br />\n<br />\nIN THE FIRST PLACE-- OUR CONSTITUTION DOES NOT ALLOW A COLLEGIUM SYSTEM..INDIA IS THE ONLY NATION ON THIS PLANET WHERE JUDGES ELECT JUDGES..<br />\n<br />\nWHO ARE THESE JUDGES ?<br />\n<br />\nARE THEY SOME GOLDEN KNIGHTS ?<br />\n<br />\nSORRY--THESE ARE BOTTOM OF THE SCHOOL CEREBRAL BARREL LAWYERS .. OUT OF THE POOL OF LAWYERS THE LOSER FOOT SLOGGING LAWYERS BECAME JUDGES TO COCK A NOOK AT THEIR SUCCESSFUL RICH LAWYER COLLEAGUES ..<br />\n<br />\nTHE EX-CJI KG BALAKRISHNAN WAS NOT EVEN QUALIFIED TO BE SUPREME COURT JUDGE--LEAVE ALONE CJI... HE WAS A CHRISTIAN MASQUERADING AS A DALIT HINDU...HIS FATHER WAS A CHRISTIAN.<br />\n<br />\nThe Constitution confers the power of appointment of judges on the President of India i.e. the Government of India to be made in consultation with the Chief Justice of India and other judges of the Supreme Court. How then did a collegium of judges of the Supreme Court come to exist and come to possess this UNIQUE power?<br />\n<br />\nThe Supreme Court rewrote the provisions of the Constitution for appointment of judges and appropriated the power to appoint judges by the judges-- when this is amazing Judicial over reach .<br />\n<br />\nThe collegium method was created as a result of two judgments of the Supreme Court, first in 1993 (Supreme Court Advocate-on-Record Association case) and by a follow-up President\u2019s Reference to the Court in 1998<br />\n<br />\nBy the first case the power was vested in the Chief Justice of India in whom it was held the primacy lay in appointments assisted by two judges of the Supreme Court. In the second case the court took away the primacy of the Chief Justice of India and vested the power in a collegium of the Chief Justice of India and four senior-most judges of the Supreme Court.<br />\n<br />\nThe clear intention of the Constitution makers in the Constituent Assembly debates of not making the Chief Justice of India the final authority was disregarded.&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_181MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_181MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\">Inversing the constitutional provisions, the Chief Justice of India and the collegium became the initiator and appointer of judges, and the President of India was illegally and unconstiutionally REDUCED to be a NAPUNSAK formal approver in the process. Foreign forces were involved in this humongous subversion..</span></div>\n<br />\n.Indeed, in the second judgment of 1998 the Court went to the extent of extracting a statement from the government that it was not seeking a reconsideration of its earlier judgment of 1993, and DEEP STATE controlled government would also accept and binding the judgment it was delivering.<br />\n<br />\nThe essential features of this judicially created system of appointments is that the collegium selects judges on their own assessment of the merits of a person and the government is bound to appoint the selected person except in a rare case of the collegium having overlooked some aspect of the incumbent not being a suitable judge.<br />\n<br />\nBUT HEY-- LO AND BEHOLD - THE ELECTED EXECUTIVEs VIEW CAN BE KICKED INTO THE DUSTBIN BY THE COLLEGIUM MELORDS AND THEY COULD RESSERT THEIR CHOICE ( AS IS HAPPENING WITH KM JOSEPH NOW )<br />\n<br />\nThe executive has thus ZILCH role in the appointment of judges as a result.<br />\n<br />\nOUR CONSTITUTION DOES NOT ALLOW COLLEGIUM JUDGES TO PLAY GOD.<br />\n<br />\nIt is EASY to comprehend that there is FOREIGN HAND in the new hijacked system of kicking the Constitution\u2019s prescription.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_181BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_10.html?showComment=1526060535018#c8186360616079631025\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 11, 2018 at 11:12 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_180MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\">JUDICIARY CANNOT MAKE LAWS .. THIS IS THE PREROGATIVE OF THE LEGISTLATURE. JUDICIARY CAN ONLY INTERPET LAWS--AND THAT TOO WHEN ASKED FOR IT ( NOT BY VESTED PIL )..</span></div>\n<br />\nIn prescribing the appointment to judges of the Supreme Court and the High Courts by the collegium, the Supreme Court did not realise the burden it was imposing on the collegium of selecting judges for the Supreme Court and High Courts and transferring them from one High Court to another.<br />\n<br />\nAt any given time there are two to three vacancies in the Supreme Court, and 200 in the 22 High Courts and the transfer of a number of judges to be made. An administrative task of this magnitude must necessarily detract the judges of the collegium from their principal judicial work of hearing and deciding cases.<br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-size: medium;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">The collegium neither has a secretariat to shoulder this burden nor an INTELLIGENCE BUREAU to make appropriate inquiries of the competence, character,&nbsp;</span><b><span style=\"color: red;\">loyalty to the watan</span></b><span style=\"color: blue;\">, and integrity of a proposed appointee.</span></span></div>\n<br />\nBEFORE 1947 ALMOST ALL SUPREME COURT JUDGES WERE IN THE PAYROLL OF JEW ROTHSCHILD..<br />\n<br />\nLacking this infrastructural backup the collegium resorts to ad hoc informal consultations with other judges in the Supreme Court who are expected to know the merits of a proposed appointee from a High Court or occasionally by sounding a member of the Bar.<br />\n<br />\nThese methods are poor substitutes for a full time intensive collection of data about an incumbent, his loyalty to the watan, his work, standing, merit, integrity and potential which requires to be made considerably in advance for filing in the vacancy.<br />\n<br />\nBesides, the collegium\u2019s deliberations are secret, the system is opaque and the choice of a judge is only known when his name is forwarded to the Government for formal appointment.<br />\n<br />\nIN THE RECENT PAST COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY SAVED SEVERAL TRAITORS WHO HAVE TRIED TO KILL BHARATMATA .<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">INDIA MUST DESTROY THE COLLEGIUM SYSTEM AND GO FOR NJAC..&nbsp; ONE STUP1D JUDGE HAD SLAPPED BOTH \"SEDITION\" AND \"CONTEMPT OF COURT \" ON ARUN JAITLEY FOR SAYING CONSTITUTION DOES NOT SUPPORT \"COLLEGIUM SYSTEM\" BUT ONLY NJAC&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\nThe advantage of judicial commissions are that they are independent, broad based and they represent not only the views of the judiciary but also of the executive and other sections of society.<br />\n<br />\nIN 1993 A 9 BENCH ( SECOND JUDGES CASE ) ILLEGALLY CONVERTED \"CONSULTATION\" TO \"CONCURRANCE \"..<br />\n<br />\nTHE 9 BENCH ( THIRD JUDGES CASE ) THE REDUCED THE POWERS OF THE CJI TO A MERE \"RECOMMENDER\".. IF THE PRESIDENT REJECTS THE RECOMMENDATION, THEN THE MELORDS WILL SENT IT BACK-- AND THEN THE PRESIDENT IS DUTY BOUND TO ACCEPT THE NAME ..<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>APPIDIYAAAA ?</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">BALLS-- THESE ARE SLIMY LAWS / PROCEDURES MADE BY COLLEGIUM JUDGES NOT APPROVED BY THE ELECTED LAW MAKERS.</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; He was just a puppet of Rothschild.. His granddaughter is Gayatri Devi..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">During his minority he was brainwashed Sir Tanjore Madhava Rao - a Chitpavan Jew nay Brahmin. This fellow was not a DESHASTHA brahmin as was claimed. The Indian constitution is the longest written constitution of any sovereign country in the world..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">It imparts constitutional supremacy and not parliamentary supremacy, as it is not created by the Parliament but, by a constituent assembly, and adopted by its people, with a declaration in its preamble.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Parliament cannot override the constitution.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">When the Constitution of India came into force on 26 January 1950, it repealed the Indian Independence Act. India ceased to be a dominion of the British Crown and became a sovereign democratic republic.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHY DID JEW ROTHSCHILD KEEP THE BRITISH CONSTITION AS A BUNCH OF LOOSE PAPERS ?&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WELL HE COULD INSERT AND REMOVE LAWS AT WILL.&nbsp; &nbsp; THE BEST PART IS NOBODY BUT ROTHSCHILDs AGENTS (&nbsp; JUDGES / POLITICIANS) KNEW THE CONTENTS OF THE BRITISH CONSTITUTION..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The DEEP STATE of America too do not want citizens to know the US law ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">EXAMPLE : The State of Georgia has sued Malamud for providing the Official Code of Georgia Annotated on his website, describing it as \"a form of 'terrorism. If you publish Georgia\u2019s state laws, you\u2019ll get sued for copyright ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">https://www.theregister.co.uk/2015/07/25/georgia_sues_terrorist_for_publishing_its_own_laws/</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Carl Malamud is an America public domain advocate, known for his foundation Public.Resource.Org. He founded the Internet Multicasting Service. During his time with this group, he was responsible for developing the first Internet radio station, for putting the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission's EDGAR database on-lineand for creating the Internet 1996 World Exposition.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">For the past over 25 years, an amazingly dedicated man named Carl Malamud has taken it upon himself to singlehandedly publish for free on his website Public.Resouce.org every local, State and US Federal government law ever enacted\u2014a stupendous feat...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Mind you, as no one even knows how many US Federal laws there are, and the US code has become so big, neither the US Congressional Research Service or the American Bar Association have enough staff to adequately categorize every law this nation has on the books.( DELIBERATE )</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Human societies throughout the world, with all them having one single connection throughout all time\u2014people agreeing to live with each other based upon a set of mutually accepted norms, that are called \u201claws\u201d.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Law is a system of rules that are created and enforced through social or governmental institutions to regulate behavior, and from our most ancient times when small groups of nomadic peoples roamed the vastness of our Earth, to today\u2019s gargantuan nation states having populations in the hundreds-of-millions and billions, all were made possible by people agreeing with each other in how they would live with each other.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">From the most open and free societies one can imagine, to the cruelest and most despotic regimes the human mind could conceive, all have been governed by laws\u2014some being secular in nature (denoting attitudes, activities, or other things that have no religious or spiritual basis), with others being based upon religious beliefs.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">And in all of recorded history, the laws people choose to live by, or were forced to adhere to, were known by everyone who lived under them\u2014except for today!</span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_68M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_28.html?showComment=1530255695582#c848436323467207348\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 29, 2018 at 12:31 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_68MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttps://twitter.com/mkatju/status/1012424805239349249<br />\n<br />\nTHIS MORON IS BACK ON SOCIAL MEDIA AFTER A HIATUS..<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">5 HUMPED COWS IN ONE ACRE OF LAND CAUSED INDIAs TOP SOIL TO BECOME SIX FEET DEEP AND HOLY --PRODUCING FOOD WITH GOLDEN MEAN ( 1.618 ) INHERENT..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nWITH GREEN REVLUTION OF DESH DROHI MS SWAMINATHAN AND RAMPANT USES OF ARTIFICIAL FERTLISERS --NOW OUR TOP SOIL IS JUST A FEW INCHES THICK--IT IS THIRST FOR WATER AND PRODUCED FOOD WHICH CAUSES DISEASES.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">90% OF HUMAN DISEASES ORIGINATE IN THE HUMAN GUT AS PER 6200 YEAR OLD AYURVEDA TEXT CHARAKA SAMHITA..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nThink of humus as being a big sponge that can hold up to 90% of it\u2019s weight in water. \u2026\u2026</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\">This water holding capacity of humus is why humus rich soil will remain moist for weeks longer than soil without humus\u2026\u2026.</span><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\nHumus is the most important thing in soil: more important that dew worms, and organic matter..<br />\n<br />\nCOMPOST IS NOT HUMUS\u2026<br />\n<br />\nWhen organic matter starts to decompose these molecules are broken down into smaller and smaller molecules by the micro-organisms in the soil (mostly bacteria and fungi)\u2026\u2026..<br />\n<br />\nDuring the humification process, microbes secrete sticky gum-like mucilages; these contribute to the crumb structure (tilth) of the soil by holding particles together, and allowing greater aeration of the soil\u2026<br />\n<br />\nToxic substances such as heavy metals, as well as excess nutrients, can be chelated (that is, bound to the complex organic molecules of humus) and so prevented from entering the wider ecosystem\u2026<br />\n<br />\nToday humus rich snake groves have been decimated by vested people calling it superstition\u2026\u2026 200 years ago Kerala had more than 80,000 snake groves, the most abundant source of Humic acid rich soil. Today we have just around 4500 snake groves and they are disappearing fast. \u2026.<br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">Snakes keep away animals and rodents whose excreta degrades the humus \u2026 Priceless snake grove soil was the BANK FOR AYURVEDIC HERBS ..</span></div>\n<div>\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/07/king-cobra-and-snake-temples-of-kerala.html</span><br />\n<br />\nIn humus, carbon frequently outweighs nitrogen by 10 to one\u2026\u2026.. Humpless western cow dung has too much nitrogen\u2026\u2026<br />\n<br />\nHumic acid increases water retention, retains nutrients and enhances microbiological activity, enzymes in soil, etc\u2026\u2026. The organic matter on biodegradation is converted in to humus, which contains humic and fulvic substances. \u2026..<br />\n<br />\nAt some point, all of the good stuff in the organic matter is used up and some molecules remain that can\u2019t be used by micro-organisms or plants\u2026. This remaining material is called humus. \u2026It consists mostly of carbon and so it is still organic, but micro-organisms just can decompose it any further\u2026\u2026 Humus is so stable that it can persist in the soil for hundreds of years.<br />\n<br />\nHumus has a negative charge which means that many of the nutrients plants require stick to humus, including ammonium (source of nitrogen), calcium, magnesium and phosphorous to name a few\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThe humus sponge holds onto these nutrients and prevents rain from washing them away. \u2026.. When a plant root comes in contact with it, the plant root is able to remove the nutrients from the humus sponge. \u2026<br />\n<br />\nThe process is a bit more complicated than this, but you can think of humus as being a slow release source of fertilizer for your plants\u2026..<br />\n<br />\nThe most important reason for having humus is that it is responsible for aggregation. \u2026\u2026 Aggregation is what makes soil loose and very friable, improving the structure of soil\u2026..<br />\n<br />\nBetter soil structure found in humus rich soil makes it easier for plant roots to grow by providing them with better access to nutrients, water and most importantly oxygen\u2026\u2026 Humus is a colloidal substance, and increases the soil's cation exchange capacity, hence its ability to store nutrients by chelation. \u2026.<br />\n<br />\nWhile these nutrient cations are accessible to plants, they are held in the soil safe from being leached by rain or irrigation..Humus can hold the equivalent of 90 % of its weight in moisture, and therefore increases the soil's capacity to withstand drought condition\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_68BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_28.html?showComment=1530255759317#c1413190284692248433\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 29, 2018 at 12:32 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_66MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nThe biochemical structure of humus enables it to moderate \u2013 or buffer \u2013 excessive acid or alkaline soil conditions\u2026<br />\n<br />\nHUMUS IS DECIMATED BY CHEMICAL FERTILISERS. \u2026<br />\n<br />\nMOST OF THE FARMER SUICIDES IN INDIA IS 100% DUE TO LOSS OF HUMUS IN THE SOIL. \u2026.<br />\n<br />\nAPCO MODI IS TOO BUSY ANGLING FOR A NOBEL PRIZE FROM ZIONIST JEWS TO UNDERSTAND ALL THIS. .<br />\n<br />\nTAMIL NADU MUST UNDERSTAND THIS INSTEAD OF CRYING LIKE RETARDED BABIES FOR CAUVERY WATER\u2026<br />\n<br />\nRECENTLY OUR LOSER LAWYER TURNED COLLEGIUM JUDGES ( BOTTOM DREGS OF THE SCHOOL CEREBRAL BARREL ) BANNED BURNING OF CROP STUBBLE ( WHICH PRODUCES BIOCHAR ) BECAUSE OF DELHI SMOG\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIF THIS IS THE CASE SHIFT THE CAPITAL OF INDIA TO A PLACE WHERE THERE IS NO TEMPERATURE INVERSION\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nBiochar has the ability to sequester carbon out of the atmosphere and back into the ground ..<br />\n<br />\nTall grasses burn quick and hot, however, close to the ground where the roots start, air is excluded so the base of the grasses will pyrolyze and not burn\u2026<br />\n<br />\nCarbon is the most essential element of soil fertility. When organic matter is added to agricultural soils to increase carbon levels, most of it rapidly decomposes to carbon dioxide and escapes to the atmosphere...<br />\n<br />\nOnly a very small percentage eventually becomes stable humic matter... Humification takes decades to centuries..The process creates a fine-grained, highly porous charcoal that helps soils retain nutrients and water\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nBiochar serves as an electron buffer for redox reactions and helps bacteria swap electrons among themselves, improving their metabolic efficiency as a microbial community.. ..<br />\n<br />\nWith its pores and its electrical charges, biochar is capable of both aBsorption and aDsorption.. ..<br />\n<br />\nThe surfaces of biochar, both internal and external, aDsorb materials by electro-chemical bonds, working like an electric sponge...<br />\n<br />\nBiochar surfaces adsorb carbon and retain it in compounds with minerals, supporting at the same time a large microbial community that potentially makes more efficient use of organic debris containing carbon and other nutrients...<br />\n<br />\nUnlike biochar, compost is quickly broken down by microbial action in soil over months to at most, decades, depending primarily on climate...<br />\n<br />\nBiochar lasts at least ten times longer in most soils.... Biochar is effective at retaining nitrogen in soils and there is NO need for CHEMICAL UREA...<br />\n<br />\nThe desh drohi GREEN REVOLUTION has left us with a rapidly deteriorating climate, and soils that are dying and eroding.... Biochar, as a form of recalcitrant carbon, is the medicine that DELIBERATELY degraded and unproductive Indian top soils need....<br />\n<br />\nIndia was blessed with HUMUS laden topsoil with healthy microbes and earthworms for millions of years....<br />\n<br />\nJust 55 years of desh drohi GREEN REVOLUTION has decimated our holy topsoil...<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS THE ONLY INTELLIGENT WAY TO PREVENT FARMER SUICIDES...<br />\n<br />\nThe desh drohi GREEN REVOLUTION has caused our holy topsoil to lose 80% of their original soil organic carbon (SOC) pool...<br />\n<br />\n90% of our lakes have disappeared due to artificial nitro fertIliser overuse. ..<br />\n<br />\nALL ABOVE HAS BEEN SENT TO MODI AND HIS MINISTERS MORE THAN 30 TIMES..<br />\n<br />\nWHO CARES ?..<br />\n<br />\nMODI GIVES US MORE AND MORE JAANKARI ABOUT GANDHI AND BR AMBEKDAR ..<br />\n<br />\nYESTERDAY MODI WAS RECITING SOME KABIRDAS SHLOKA (&nbsp;<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\"><b>HOY KOY SHIT</b></span>&nbsp;) ..<br />\n<br />\nKABIRDAS NEVER EXISTED..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/05/nitrate-water-pollution-chemical.html</span><br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil ..</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_66MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_66BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Al-Biruni was a Sanskrit scholar who learnt Math and astronomy in from Namboodiri professors adept in Sanskrit and Arabic .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Let me quote Wikipedia -<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">QUOTE: Al-Biruni wrote an encyclopedic work on India called \u201cTarikh Al-Hind\u201d (History of India) in which he explored nearly every aspect of Indian life, including religion, history, geography, geology, science, and mathematics. My book is nothing but a simple historic record of facts. I shall place before the reader the theories of the Hindus exactly as they are, and I shall mention in connection with them similar theories of the Greeks in order to show the relationship existing between them.(1910, Vol. 1, p. 7;1958, p. 5)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Hindus considered Muslims violent and impure, and did not want to share anything with him.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Over time, Al-Biruni won the welcome of Hindu scholars. Al-Biruni collected books and studied with these Hindu scholars to become fluent in Sanskrit, discover and translate into Arabic the mathematics, science, medicine, astronomy and other fields of arts as practiced in 11th century India. He was inspired by the arguments offered by Indian scholars who believed earth must be ellipsoid shape, with yet to be discovered continent at earth's south pole, and earth's rotation around the sun is the only way to fully explain the difference in daylight hours by latitude, seasons and earth's relative positions with moon and stars.[36] Al-Biruni was also critical of Indian scribes who he believed carelessly corrupted Indian documents while making copies of older documents.[37] Al-Biruni's translations as well as his own original contributions reached Europe in 12th and 13th century, where they were actively sought.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">CONTINUED TO 2--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">CONTINUED FROM 1--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">While others were killing each other over religious differences, Al-Biruni had a remarkable ability to engage Hindus in peaceful dialogue. Mohammad Yasin puts this dramatically when he says, \u201cThe Indica is like a magic island of quiet, impartial research in the midst of a world of clashing swords, burning towns, and burned temples.\u201d (Indica is another name for Al-Biruni\u2019s history of India). (Yasin, 1975, p. 212). :UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Al-Biruni</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">############################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b>Ibn al-haytham<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Ibn fuckin\u2019 al-Haytham or Alhazen has been made out to be the first theoretical physicists, -- a system where a hypothesis must be proved by mathematical evidence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Alhazen\u2019s ( Ibn al-Haytham) science of optics is not his own. And ancient Greek knowledge suddenly dried up like water in the hot desert sands..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">##########################################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b>Muhammad ibn Zakariya al-Razi<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Muhammad fuckin\u2019 ibn Zakariya al-Razi studied in Kodungallur University in 886 AD. He left behind several translated to Arabic manuscripts on medicine and surgery ( Al Mansuri ) and astronomy. This knowledge of Susruta and Charaka was sold to him for gold . All the manuscripts he left behind were ready made translated knowledge from Kodungllur university ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">###############################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b>Nasir al-Din al-Tusi<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Nasir al-Din fuckin\u2019 al-Tusi studied in Kodungallur University in 1260 AD. He is called the father of Trigonometry This is nonsense . He was NOT a bright student and he was given translated Math knowledge ( Kit\u0101b al-Shakl al-qatt\u0101 ) from the Kerala school of Math in exchange for gold. Whatever he wrote on Astronomy about the Milky way ( Akash Ganga ) was bought for gold.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">############################################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-size: x-large;\">Ab\u016b K\u0101mil Shuj\u0101\u02bf ibn Aslam</span><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Ab\u016b K\u0101mil Shuj\u0101\u02bf ibn fuckin\u2019 Aslam studied in Kodungallur University in 889 AD. He was given ready made translated to Arabic knowledge of Math in exchange for vast amount of gold.. Fibonacci stumbled on his work in Bejaya and patented it in his own name.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/12/perfect-six-pack-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">################################################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">Ibn Zuhr</b></span><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Ibn fuckin\u2019 Zuhr is considered a great cat in Surgery.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">BALLS !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Ibn Zuhr was not a surgeon at all. He bought ready made translated to Arabic texts on surgery from the Cordoba library for gold.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">NOW I HAVE BAD NEWS FOR JEW , MUSLIMS AND CHRISTIANS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">IT IS ABOUT A KERALA MERCHANT IN THE CALICUT KINGs EMPLOYMENT \u2013 A THIYYA NAMED MAIMONIDES<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">THERE IS A STATUE OF HIM IN CORDOBA MADE BY THE JEWS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Jews call him Moshe ben Maimon. ( statue below in Cordoba )..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Muslims call him Abu Imran Musa bin Maimun .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Christians call him Maimonides.</span><span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">THE LIBRARY OF CORDOBA IN SPAIN WAS RUN BY THE CALICUT KING. WESTERN UNIVERSITIES WERE STARTED BY LIFTING KNOWLEDGE FROM HERE . AND OF COURSE THEY HAD THE LIFTED AND PATENTED GREEK KNOWLEDGE TOO .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">################################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-size: x-large;\"><b>Muhammad ibn Musa al-Khwarizmi</b></span><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Mathematician Muhammad ibn fuckin\u2019 Musa al-Khwarizmi studied in Kodungallur University in Kerala.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Fibonacci took his Arabic works to Italy from Bejaya , Algeria.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">ALGEBRA is derived from Al-Jabr, one of the two operations he used to solve quadratic equations. Algorism and algorithm stem from Algoritmi, the Latin form of his name.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Let me quote wikipedia:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">QUOTE- Ibn al-Nad\u012bm's Kit\u0101b al-Fihrist includes a short biography on al-Khw\u0101rizm\u012b together with a list of the books he wrote. Al-Khw\u0101rizm\u012b accomplished most of his work in the period between 813 and 833. After the Muslim conquest of Persia, Baghdad became the centre of scientific studies and trade, and many merchants and scientists from as far as China and India traveled to this city, as did al-Khw\u0101rizm\u012b. He worked in Baghdad as a scholar at the House of Wisdom established by Caliph al-Ma\u2019m\u016bn, where he studied the sciences and mathematics, which included the translation of Greek and Sanskrit scientific manuscripts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Al-Khw\u0101rizm\u012b's Z\u012bj al-Sindhind[11] (Arabic: \u0632\u064a\u062c \u0627\u0644\u0633\u0646\u062f \u0647\u0646\u062f\u200e, \"astronomical tables of Sindh and Hind\") is a work consisting of approximately 37 chapters on calendrical and astronomical calculations and 116 tables with calendrical, astronomical and astrological data, as well as a table of sine values. This is the first of many Arabic Zijes based on the Indian astronomical methods known as the sindhind.[22] The work contains tables for the movements of the sun, the moon and the five planets known at the time. This work marked the turning point in Islamic astronomy. Hitherto, Muslim astronomers had adopted a primarily research approach to the field, translating works of others and learning already discovered knowledge.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">-UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MAGELLAN FOUND THE ARGENTINIAN RIVER --SAME WAY--BY DRAWING BUCKETS OF SEA WATER AT RIO DE LA PLATE , AND TASTING IT IN 1520-- IT WAS A DARK NIGHT</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; text-decoration-line: none;\">October 15, 2017 at 9:47 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_203MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSWAMY WAS NOT LIKE THIS BEFORE<br />\n<br />\nHE WAS A GREAT CAT<br />\n<br />\nHE IS NOW GOING FAAAAAST DOWNHILL<br />\n<br />\nHE CANNOT THINK BEYOND THE \" COURT \" ..<br />\n<br />\nI THROW UP WHEN I HEAR THE WORLD \"JUDICIARY\"<br />\n<br />\nI USED TO THROW UP WHEN I HEAD THE WORD \"INSURANCE\" AT SEA<br />\n<br />\nBECAUSE OF THIS TERM-- WHEN AN ACCIDENT HAPPENED , TRUTH WAS THE FIRST CASUALITY-- BECAUSE THE SHORE BOSSES WOULD PUT ON THE \"INSURANCE SPECTACLES\"-- AND ALL INCIDENT REPORTS ( WITH PREVENTIVE LESSONS LEARNT )&nbsp; WOULD BE BULL<br />\n<br />\nAT SEA WHEN I WENT FOR SHORE COMPANY SEMINARS -- AS SOON AS THE MARINE INSURANCE SESSION STARTED , VADAKAYIL WOULD WALK OUT HIGH PROFILE<br />\n<br />\nNOBODY DARED TO STOP ME --AMONG HUNDREDS IN THE HALL.<br />\n<br />\nJOKE: ONCE A LAWYER WAS PROMOTED --AND HE BECAME JUDGE<br />\n<br />\nAFTER TWO WEEKS--HE RESIGNED<br />\n<br />\nALL WENT RUNNING TO HIM \"SIR-YOU DID EXTREMELY WELL IN THE FIRST TWO WEEKS --WHY ?\"<br />\n<br />\nHE REPLIED&nbsp; &nbsp;\" <b><span style=\"color: purple;\">I WOULD RATHER GIVE BULL MYSELF THROUGHOUT THE DAY--THAN LISTEN TO BULL</span></b>&nbsp; \"<br />\n<br />\nONCE MY JEW TOP GUN BOSS CAPT CHARLES ARTHUR JOSEPH VANDERPERRE VISITED MY SHIP..<br />\n<br />\nAT SEA ALL KNOW THIS BELGIAN JEW , ALSO CALLED \"THE FATHER OF SHIP MANAGEMENT\"<br />\n<br />\nHE WAS MY FAN.. MY SHIT DID NOT SMELL FOR HIM.. HE HAD A LARGE TABLE , AND THERE WAS A MAGAZINE WITH MY POEM ON IT .<br />\n<br />\nIF ANY OF HIS PRETTY CHINK FEMALE ASSISTANTS EVEN TOUCHED THAT MAGAZINE ( HE DID NOT WANT ITS PLACE ON THE TABLE TO CHANGE ) --HE WOULD FROTH FROM HIS MOUTH AND FIRE THE HELL OUT OF HER--&nbsp; ONE GORGEOUS CHINK GIRL WHO VISITED MY SHIP ,&nbsp; TOLD ME THIS HERSELF<br />\n<br />\nGETTING BACK-- WHY WAS HE MY FAN ?<br />\n<br />\nHE ONCE TOLD A COLLEAGUE OF MINE ( A SHORE BOSS WHO WAS MY FAN )--- <b><span style=\"color: red;\">CAPT VAJAKKAYEEL IS THE ONLY INDIAN WHO HAS A SPINE</span></b><br />\n<br />\nAND WHAT CONTRIBUTED TO THIS ?<br />\n<br />\nPRAY ?<br />\n<br />\nPRITHEE?<br />\n<br />\nONCE WHEN I KNEW HE WOULD VISIT MY SHIP ( MY WIFE ND ELDER SON WAS ON BOARD ) I MADE A STENCIL USING BIBLICAL ALPHABETS --&nbsp; &nbsp;IT TOOK ME A WEEK TO DO UP THIS LARGE 26 ALPHABETS , WITH MY WIFE ASSISTING ME WITH LUMINESCENT ORANGE PAINT<br />\n<br />\nI DID THIS ON TWO LARGE CHART PAPER--IT COVERED THE WHOLE WALL<br />\n<br />\n\"<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">ACTUALLY I GIVE A LOT OF BULL MYSELF-- BUT YOU GO AHEAD , I AM LISTENING</span></b> \"<br />\n<br />\nTHEN I MADE AN EXTREMELY SMALL STENCIL AT THE DOOR SWITCH<br />\n<br />\n\" <b><span style=\"color: red;\">THINGS LEFT UNSAID IN THIS CABIN--ALWAYS SPEAK MORE THAN WHAT IS SAID</span></b> \"<br />\n<br />\nTHIS GUY WHO WOULD SEND CHINESE MAFIA TO YOUR HOME TO BREAK YOUR BONES AS PER SOME CHINESE FORMULA ( IF YOU PISSED HIM OFF ) STOOD IN FRONT OF EACH POSTER --THE LARGE AND THE SMALL -- FIVE MINUTES EACH--PONDERING OVER THE WISDOM OF MY MESSAGE TO HIM.&nbsp; MIND YOU HE WAS COMING ON MY SHIP AFTER SACKING THE CAPTAINS OF THE PREVIOUS THREE SHIPS HE VISITED --FOR FLIMSY REASONS .<br />\n<br />\nONCE AN INDIAN BOSS CROSSED HIS PATH --HE RESIGNED AND JOINED A RIVAL COMPANY--HE HELD HUGE DARK COMPANY SECRETS --SUCKING MONEY FROM SHIPOWNERS IN A CLANDESTINE MANNER<br />\n<br />\nCAPT CAJ VANDERPEREE WARNED HIM --HE WHISPERED INTO HIS EAR JUST BEFORE HE LEFT THE OFFICE --<br />\n<br />\n\" REMEMBER YOUR WIFE IS ALONE AT HOME WHEN YOU WORK IN YOUR NEW OFFICE \" --&nbsp; WHEN HE WENT HOME HE FOUND THAT HE HAD SHAT IN HIS WHITE UNDIES<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc;
