, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain is ideal for informing business\ndecisions, guiding general meetings, polling, brain storming , censuses and\nmore. &nbsp;Human imagination is the limit<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain, is the new kid on the block --\nthe ultimate technology in the FinTech and computer Industry.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchains are cryptographically secure\nledgers that store every transaction made in a system across many different\ncomputers, protecting them from fraud. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Originally\ndesigned to support digital currencies, they promise to revolutionise far more\nthan monetary transactions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain is THE most awe-inspiring\ninnovations since the Internet came into existence.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain technology basically allows\neveryone to hold and make transactions as strangers but in a completely\ntransparent manner. There is no mediator in between two people making the\ntransaction, and the entire process becomes easier and cheaper.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The blockchain technology works by creating\npermanent, public \u201cledgers\u201d of all transactions, potentially replacing a mass\nof overlapping records with one simple database.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain technology has the potential to\nuniversally reshape the way business transacts across nearly every industry in\nthe global economy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain is a distributed ledger technology--\nmultiple people are verifying the authenticity of a transaction and they are\ndoing so relying on the history embedded in the recorded chain of prior\ntransactions. And once they have validated the title to date, they will confirm\nthis transaction.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Most banking systems around the world are\nbuilt on a centralized database that is more vulnerable to cyberattack because\nit has one point of failure rather than many\u2014once hackers breach the one system\nthey have full access.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In financial markets there\u2019s always a\nmechanism to correct an attack. In a blockchain there is no mechanism to\ncorrect it \u2014 people just have to accept it as true.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchains can eliminate&nbsp; systemic risk and financial fraud. They\nautomate processes that were previously time-consuming and done manually, such\nas the incorporation of businesses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain is a real game changer.&nbsp;&nbsp; By reducing transaction costs among all\nparticipants in the economy, blockchain supports models of peer-to-peer mass\ncollaboration that will make our existing organizational forms redundant.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">For the first time in human history, two or\nmore parties, be they businesses or individuals who may not even know each\nother, can forge agreements, make transactions, and build value without relying\non intermediaries (such as banks, rating agencies, and government bodies) to\nverify their identities, establish trust, or perform the critical business\nlogic \u2014 contracting, clearing, settling, and record-keeping tasks that are foundational\nto all forms of commerce.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Decentralized consensus\nis achieved with a blockchain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">When a transaction\noccurs, everyone on the network knows about it. It\u2019s tamper-proof and virtually\ninstantaneous.. Blockchain relies on peer-to-peer network principles whereby\neach encrypted block in the chain is linked to the next.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Every participant can see the data and verify\nor reject it using consensus algorithms. Approved data is entered into the\nledger as a collection of \u201cblocks\u201d and stored in a chronological \u201cchain\u201d that\ncannot be altered.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The blockchain is\nessentially a distributed ledger where each block contains a timestamp and\nholds batches of individual transactions with a link to a previous block. This\ntechnology would eliminate almost all the current crimes being perpetuated\nonline today against our financial institutions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A distributed ledger is\na database of transactions that is shared and synchronised across multiple\ncomputers and locations \u2013 without centralised control. Each party owns an\nidentical copy of the record, which is automatically updated as soon as any\nadditions are made.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain systems are\nuniquely able to ensure that contracting parties all have accurate and\nidentical records.&nbsp; Blockchain technology\nis a new way of maintaining an agreement in a decentralized manner. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A block is the\n\u201ccurrent\u201d part of a blockchain which records some or all of the recent\ntransactions, and once completed, goes into the blockchain as permanent\ndatabase. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Each time a block gets\ncompleted, a new block is generated. Blocks are linked to each other (like a\nchain) in proper linear, chronological order with every block containing a hash\nof the previous block. To use conventional banking as an analogy, the\nblockchain is like a full history of banking transactions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blocks, are like\nindividual bank statements. The full copy of the blockchain has records of\nevery transaction ever executed. As a public ledger system, blockchain records\nand validate each and every transaction made, which makes it secure and\nreliable.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">All the transactions\nmade are authorized by miners, which makes the transactions immutable and\nprevent it from the threat of hacking.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain technology\ndiscards the need of any third-party or central authority for peer-to-peer\ntransactions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain is a\ncontinuously growing list of records, called blocks, which are linked and\nsecured using cryptography.&nbsp;&nbsp; Each block\ntypically contains a hash pointer as a link to a previous block, a timestamp\nand transaction data.&nbsp; By design,\nblockchains are inherently resistant to modification of the data.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Hackers can shut down\nentire networks, tamper with data, lure unwary users into cybertraps, steal and\nspoof identities, and carry out other devious attacks by leveraging centralized\nrepositories and single points of failure.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The blockchain\u2019s\nalternative approach to storing and sharing information provides a way out of\nthis security mess.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The blockchain\nalternative to document signing replaces secrets with transparency,\ndistributing evidence across many blockchain nodes and making it practically\nimpossible to manipulate data without being caught.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Once recorded, the data\nin any given block cannot be altered retroactively without the alteration of\nall subsequent blocks, which needs a collusion of the network majority.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Bigger blockchain networks with more users\nhave an infinitely lower risk of getting attacked by hackers because of the\ncomplexity required to penetrate such a network.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain technology\nis designed in such a way that there is no central authority or storage\nlocation. Every user on the network plays a part in storing some or all of the\nblockchain. Everyone is responsible for verifying the data that is stored\nand/or shared to make sure false data cannot be added and existing data cannot\nbe removed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">By storing data across\nits network, the blockchain eliminates the risks that come with data being held\ncentrally<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain technology\nprovides THE best tools we currently have to protect data from hackers,\npreventing potential fraud and decreasing the chance of data being stolen or\ncompromised.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In order to destroy or\ncorrupt a blockchain, a hacker would have to destroy the data stored on every\nuser\u2019s computer in the global network. This could be millions of computers,\nwith each one storing a copy of some or all the data.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Unless the hacker could\nsimultaneously bring down an entire network (which is impossible), undamaged\ncomputers, also known as \u201cnodes\u201d, would continue running to verify and keep\nrecord of all the data on the network.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The impossibility of a task like taking\ndown a whole chain increases along with the amount of users on a network.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A blockchain is a\ndigital registry that can\u2019t be tampered with. It provides a mechanism for\nvarious parties to agree on a set of facts.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It prevents those parties from\nmaking false statements, since everyone else can check the facts; it also\nprevents statements from being changed after they\u2019ve been recorded, since all\nparties are alerted to these changes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Unlike a distributed\ndatabase, nodes of a distributed ledger cannot trust other nodes and so must\nindependently verify transactions before applying them.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Distributed ledgers are\ndivided into two broad classes: those that seek to minimize the role of trusted\nand identifiable third parties, and those that explicitly rely on identifiable\nthird parties for some subset of the system\u2019s properties.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue; font-size: x-large;\">Not all distributed\nledgers are blockchains, but all blockchains are distributed ledgers.</span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-OpO24FcWqt8/Wd-0gR67AuI/AAAAAAABWI0/vhYQEmO9kSw0W9UcXotDuLELIBfVpFATgCLcBGAs/s1600/blockEchain-the-invisible-technology-thats-changing-the-world_ym4g.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"456\" data-original-width=\"810\" height=\"360\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-OpO24FcWqt8/Wd-0gR67AuI/AAAAAAABWI0/vhYQEmO9kSw0W9UcXotDuLELIBfVpFATgCLcBGAs/s640/blockEchain-the-invisible-technology-thats-changing-the-world_ym4g.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In simple terms, the\ntechnology handles blocks\u2014uniquely identified, linked transaction records\u2014in a\nchain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">With the increasing\nfear of voting fraud,&nbsp; Blockchain\nprojects can now secure a digital ballot box or voting system based on\nBlockchain to prevent voter fraud during elections.&nbsp; Once cast, votes would be unalterable results\nand available for everyone to see.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Under a Blockchain\nsystem, voters are able to cast their votes from their mobile phones , which\nare then logged into an immutable Blockchain and utilized to reliably verify\nthe results of the election.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">We can use\nBlockchain for Aadhar&nbsp; ID systems&nbsp; to avoid identify frauds which are usually\nused to manipulate and cheat.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain allows\nonline voting . &nbsp;A blockchain-based\nvoting application does not concern itself with the security of its internet\nconnection, because any hacker with access to the terminal will not be able to\naffect other nodes. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Voters can effectively\nsubmit their vote without revealing their identity or political preferences to\nthe public. Officials can count votes with absolute certainty, knowing that\neach ID can be attributed to one vote, no fakes can be created, and that tampering\nis impossible.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The decentralized\nnature of Blockchain technology provides a potential solution to common voting\nproblems, such as double voting or people\u2019s inability to make it to the polls\non election day.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Voting on the\nBlockchain is traceable and transparent. its algorithms allows the vote count\nto be instantaneous and voters to remain anonymous.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">By casting votes as\ntransactions, we can create a blockchain which keeps track of the tallies of\nthe votes. This way, everyone can agree on the final count because they can\ncount the votes themselves. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Also,\nbecause of the blockchain audit trail, they can verify that no votes were\nchanged or removed. Also, illegitimate votes will be null.&nbsp; Humongous poll expenses are done away with.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It would be possible to\ncollect taxes, and provide risk management with blockchains.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain tech has an\ninherent connection to cybersecurity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A verified piece of\ndata forms a block which then has to be added to the chain. To do this,\nblockchain users have to use their respective keys and powerful computing\nsystems to run algorithms that solve very complex mathematical problems.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">When a\nproblem is solved, the block is added to the chain and the data it contains\nexists on the network forever, meaning that it cannot be altered or removed.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In\norder to make updates to a particular piece of data, the owner of that data\nmust add a new block on top of the previous block, creating a very specific\nchain of code.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">If anything, even something as small as a comma, gets altered\nfrom how it appears in a previous block, the entire chain across the network\nalso changes accordingly.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This means that every single alteration or change to\nany piece of data is tracked and absolutely no data is lost or deleted because\nusers can always look at previous versions of a block to identify what is\ndifferent in the latest version.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Using this thorough form of record-keeping\nmakes it easy for the system to detect blocks that have incorrect or false\ndata, preventing loss, damage, and corruption.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A blockchain is a\ncontinuously growing, distributed, shared ledger of such blocks, which are\nsealed cryptographically with a digital fingerprint generated by a hashing\nfunction.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Each block is \u201cchained\u201d to\nthe previous one by referring to its hash value.&nbsp; The computers, or nodes, that connect to the\nblockchain verify that a transaction is valid per the rules of the governing\nlogic\u2014namely, the smart contract.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\ndefining characteristic of many blockchain platforms is the confirmation\nprocess by which new records are added to the ledger.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Gyh371Fuc3Q/Wd-yf8EEI8I/AAAAAAABWIg/bh8mIpfR9A43S-SzbAgtGfZ7ubBAQV1YgCLcBGAs/s1600/blockchaieen-bitcoin-predictions.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"800\" data-original-width=\"1200\" height=\"426\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Gyh371Fuc3Q/Wd-yf8EEI8I/AAAAAAABWIg/bh8mIpfR9A43S-SzbAgtGfZ7ubBAQV1YgCLcBGAs/s640/blockchaieen-bitcoin-predictions.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Smart contracts enable\nanyone to define their own agreements within this larger agreement.&nbsp;&nbsp; Smart Contracts are self-executing\ncontractual states, stored on the blockchain, which nobody controls and\ntherefore everyone can trust. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">If you think about the\nblockchain as a distributed operating system of the future, then Smart\nContracts are its killer app.&nbsp; Smart\ncontracts are akin to a blockchain based vending machine. Just as a vending\nmachine takes in money as inputs and is configured to dispense your choice of\nsnack or drink\u200a\u2014\u200aSmart contracts are a virtual vending machine of sorts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Unlike a normal\ncontract, which is written in legalese and interpreted by the legal system, the\ncontent of the smart contract is written in computer code and interpreted by\ncomputers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Smart Contracts are\ncomputer programs that can be executed on a decentralized network of computers.\nA decentralized network means that many computers in a network work together to\ncomplete program function executions <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A smart contract on the\nother hand, is transparent and public, the very nature of it is that it cannot\nbe manipulated. Once a smart contract has been engaged to complete a\ntransaction, it will complete exactly how it was coded to and no parties can\ninterfere or change the result of it once it has been executed. This means we\ncan trust Smart Contracts even when we cannot trust our fellow citizens.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Smart contract\u200a \u200ais a\npiece of code which is stored in the blockchain network (on each participant\ndatabase).&nbsp;&nbsp; It defines the conditions to\nwhich all parties using contract agrees. So if required conditions are met\ncertain actions are executed.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">As the\nsmart contract is stored on every computer in the network, they all must\nexecute it and get to the same result . This way users can be sure, that\noutcome is correct. a smart contract does not have to be upheld by anyone, it\u2019s\na set of instructions that self-executes.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A smart contact does not have much\nprecedence in the \u2018real world\u2019. It is only able to send transactions to other accounts\non the blockchain, any other precedence must be acquired by creating a legal\nwrapper around the blockchain agreement.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Smart contracts are a\nset of instructions residing on a blockchain, written in computer code instead\nof building a new blockchain for every type of application, it is possible to\nadd several types of applications to one blockchain by using smart\ncontracts.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">You essentially have many\nblockchains on the same blockchain.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nSmart contracts also allow you to create smaller niche agreements, that\nwould never be feasible to create a whole new blockchain for.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-y5bmBw_7dsk/Wd-zRXN9D3I/AAAAAAABWIo/Qg7JMxI1RtA9bWD4PNkCtW2QbHMn6aalwCLcBGAs/s1600/imaEges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"173\" data-original-width=\"291\" height=\"380\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-y5bmBw_7dsk/Wd-zRXN9D3I/AAAAAAABWIo/Qg7JMxI1RtA9bWD4PNkCtW2QbHMn6aalwCLcBGAs/s640/imaEges.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain technology,\nare also known as distributed ledger technology (DLT), -- the underlying\nfoundation is &nbsp;that can create shared\ndigital databases of entries that are unchangeable.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Fintechs can use\nblockchain tech to offer services (such as remittances and international\npayments) at reduced costs, with greater speed, and with more user-friendly\ninterfaces than major banks.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">KYC ( Aadhar )\nregulations are intended to help reduce money laundering and terrorism\nactivities by having requirements for businesses to verify and identify their\nclients.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain would allow the\nindependent verification of one client by one organization to be accessed by\nother organizations so the KYC process wouldn\u2019t have to start over again. The\nreduction in administrative costs for compliance departments would be significant.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain ledgers can\ninclude land titles, loans, identities, logistics manifests \u2013 almost anything\nof value. The technology is still new, but the potential impact it can have on\nbusiness is exciting, and immense.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">India must map every\nsquare meter of land. Commie movement was basicallt to grab land, burn land\nregistry offices, kill the current and retired registrar , distribute land high\nprofile and then a commie leader takes&nbsp;\nit back low profile.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Read all 8 parts of the\npost below--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/08/communist-maoist-naxalite-movements-in.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/08/communist-maoist-naxalite-movements-in.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In Telengana, Kerala\nand Bengal too much land grabbing has taken place.&nbsp; Most people do NOT have the ADI AADHARAM (\noriginal base land deed). Abdul Karim Telgi produced FAKE stamp paper \u2013not to\nseel it and make moolah, but to regularize grabbed land<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/12/telgi-stamp-paper-scam-must-be-exhumed.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/12/telgi-stamp-paper-scam-must-be-exhumed.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The land registry is a\ngood candidate for blockchain as there is no way to verify titles .&nbsp; With blockchain there would be savings and\nefficiency, and there can be no fraud.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">IN MUMBAI MAFIA IS\nATTACHED TO REAL ESTATE \u2013AS THERE IS HARLDY ANY UNDISPUTED LAND <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">JEW ROTHSCHILD HANDED\nOVER HIS FIXED ASSETS TO HIS OPIUM DRUG RUNNING AGENTS AND FREEMASON POODLES IN\n1947.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Land records in most\nIndian states date back to the colonial era, and most land holdings have\nuncertain ownership. Fraud is rampant and disputes over titles often end up in\ncourt.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In India (as is true of\nmost common law countries), ownership rights to property are proved through\ntitle deeds\u2014a chain of documents that evidence the transfer of title from\nperson to person over the years all the way to the current owners.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The problem is that any one of these\nintermediate transactions is capable of being challenged under the principle of\nnemo dat quod non habet\u2014one cannot give that which he does not own.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;Fraud is rampant and disputes over titles\noften end up in court. Matters related to land and property make up about\ntwo-thirds of all civil cases in India. People are just sick and tired of our\njudiciary\u2014who take too long to settle a dispute ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">80% OF COURT DECISIONS\nARE UNFAIR <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It is very hard to\nconfirm whether a seller in India actually has title to the property he intends\nto sell. While the law requires transfers of title and interest in property to\nbe registered, this only provides limited assurance as transfers can be\nassailed in many ways\u2014from family members who claim title through inheritance\nto unknown third parties who try and assert their right to specific performance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In India everything to\ndo with transferring interest or title in real estate, be it something as\nsimple as leasing a flat or as complex as developing a commercial project\nacross multiple land parcels, is complicated and mired in intricacy and uncertainty.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Every entry will be\naccurately timestamped greatly reducing the chance for fraud. While transfers\ncan be recorded on a public blockchain to ensure transparency, it is possible\nto store them on a private blockchain by turning the record into a\ncryptographic hash which will make the data verifiable without anyone actually\nseeing the data itself.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Using Blockchain we can\nrecord property transfers on a blockchain ledger \u2013 we can have an immutable\nhistory of every property transaction that can be viewed by everyone and yet\ntampered by no-one.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain software\nbundles records of transactions into structures called blocks, where each block\ncontains a cryptographically secure fingerprint of the blocks that have come\nbefore it in a growing ledger.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The blocks are generally distributed to people\nacross the internet, and the digital fingerprints mean that anyone can catch\nattempts to tamper with data in previous records. And having the data stored\nacross multiple computers reduces the risk of losing information to disaster or\nsabotage.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The chain is constantly\ngrowing, because each completed \u201cblocks\u201d is added to the public ledger. There\nare an infinite number of blocks on the blockchain, because as soon as one\nblock gets completed, another is automatically generated. Each block though,\ncontains a \u201chash\u201d, which is a unique fingerprint of the previous code.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Once a land record or\nreal estate transactions is on blockchain, all the parties involved \u2014 banks,\ngovernment, brokers, buyers and sellers \u2014 can track the deal.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Poor documentation can\nmake it easier for corrupt officials to redistribute land to their political\nmasters <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Moving property\ntransactions onto a blockchain should speed up the process of conveyancing and\nexchanging of paper contracts.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; It also\nshould make transactions more transparent and properties easier to sell.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Corruption in land registry offices can be\neliminated. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;People can easily mortgage their lands&nbsp; and sell lands &nbsp;solely through the blockchain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">ANCIENT INDIANS USED A\nFORM OF CALCULUS TO IDENTIFY LAND DEEDS .</b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/isaac-newton-calculus-thief-capt-ajit.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/isaac-newton-calculus-thief-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Calana-Kala of the Kerala school of Math , was\nconverted to CALCULUS and the white skinned bastard patented it in his name</span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><span style=\"font-size: 14.0pt; HIS\nCHINESE SNIFFER DOGS ON SHIPS NOTWITHSTANDING<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>BALLS\nTO POONAWAALA PROTOTYPES <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>BELOW\nIS THE KINDERGARTEN STANDARD OF VEDIC MATH<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">THE\nDAYS OF ANTI-WATAN FOREIGN FUNDED AGENTS CALLING HINDUS HEATHEN SAVAGES IN NOW\nOVER !</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://delhi.gov.in/wps/wcm/connect/83422a0045839a73a995bbfb7dfc679d/FUNDAMENTAL+AND+VEDIC+MATHEMATICS+.pdf?MOD=AJPERES&amp;lmod=-\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://delhi.gov.in/wps/wcm/connect/83422a0045839a73a995bbfb7dfc679d/FUNDAMENTAL+AND+VEDIC+MATHEMATICS+.pdf?MOD=AJPERES&amp;lmod=-</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Meru was patented as PASCALs TRIANGLE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">SRUTIS OF VEDAS HAVE VEDIC MATH ( &nbsp;FIBONACCI SERIES, GOLDEN MEAN , PASCALS\nTRIANGLE , VALUE OF PI , SRI YANTRA GEOMENTRY, OM, &nbsp;108 &nbsp;etc\n) EMBEDDED IN THE VERSES.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">THIS IS NO RARE COINCIDENCE .&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">THIS IS THE ONLY REASON SRUTIS WENT ON ORAL\nROUTE FOR 330 CENTURIES BEFORE THEY WERE PENNED DOWN 70 CENTURIES AGO.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;THE\nVERSES ARE MATHEMATICALLY PERFECT \u2013 COSMIC TRUTHS VIA MATH AND IS EMBEDED IN\nTHE DNA.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>&nbsp;\"The\nVedas are a worthless set of books. There is no reason either to call them\nsacred or infallible ... The time has come when the Hindu mind must be freed\nfrom the hold which the silly ideas propagated by the Brahmans have on them. \"-\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<span style=\"color: blue;\">B.R. Ambedkar&nbsp;</span> ( educated by Rothschild at Columbia\nUniversity )</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-aX9hJV6hCr0/WeAa-xsBjVI/AAAAAAABWJo/e3PyYNFYNIQX-EMR5EfPRw7elAwgTsOCACLcBGAs/s1600/Rangoon%252C_1954._Babasaheb_AmbedAkar_with_Periyar_when_they_met_in_connection_with_a_Buddhist_conference_there.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"636\" data-original-width=\"509\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-aX9hJV6hCr0/WeAa-xsBjVI/AAAAAAABWJo/e3PyYNFYNIQX-EMR5EfPRw7elAwgTsOCACLcBGAs/s640/Rangoon%252C_1954._Babasaheb_AmbedAkar_with_Periyar_when_they_met_in_connection_with_a_Buddhist_conference_there.jpg\" width=\"512\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Both BR Ambedkar and EVR Periyar had written\nin their books and magazines dozens of times of various occasions that the\nBritish rule is better than self rule.&nbsp; &nbsp;Both of them did NOT spend a minute fighting\nfor India\u2019s freedom-- everybody knows this .&nbsp;&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">I am not saying this now.&nbsp; I said it the day \u2018indian independence\u2019 was\nannounced. The day the declaration of \u2018independence\u2019 was made public I said\nvery clearly in the editorial in Kudiarasu that \u2018this is a day of sorrow. It is\na day of shame for the nation and all of mankind\u2019. &nbsp;&nbsp;-- EVR PERIYAR<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">EVR Periyar got a Rothschild sponsored\ncitation awarded by the UNESCO described Periyar as \"the prophet of the\nnew age, the Socrates of South East Asia, father of social reform movement and\narch enemy of ignorance, Hindu superstitions, meaningless customs and base\nmanners. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This was as a reward for using violent and\nvulgar language in his writings against Hindu gods, the Vedas and past Indian\nculture and advising Hindus to convert to Christianity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Though EVR Periyar studied only to 5th\nstandard, Rothschild made him a Honorary Magistrateof Madras.&nbsp; Periyar wrote that&nbsp; \u201cthali\u201d ( mangalsutra ) is a symbol of\nslavery.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">EVR\u2019s made a huge faux paus once \u2013 he said \u201c\nTamil is a language of barbarians \u201c. After this Tamils screwed him&nbsp; badly.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Vedas must be burnt.&nbsp; A careful study of the Vedas, etc., proves beyond\ndoubt that they were written by the Aryans with a view to disgrace, enslave and\nexploit the Dravidians.----&nbsp;&nbsp; EVR Periyar<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">BELOW---&nbsp; RIG VEDA VERSES WHICH WAS PROPAGATED ON ORAL\nROUTE BY 330 CENTURIES BEFORE THEY WERE PENNED DOWN 70 CENTURIES AGO --&nbsp;</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">THE GREATEST FEAT OF THE HUMAN MIND&nbsp;</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">THESE ARE NOT SHEPHERDs VERSES&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These hymns take us to the loftiest heights\nof philosophy at a time when the rest of the world were doing GRUNT GRUNT for\nlanguage . &nbsp;&nbsp;It is doubtful whether the human mind will\never&nbsp; surpass these heights. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Bill of Lading system &nbsp;would be decentralized and \u201ctrustless,\u201d in\nthat no single party would validate a transaction.&nbsp; &nbsp;Rather, transactions would be validated by the\nModel Blockchain\u2019s members collectively.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">For example, each member would verify (via\ncomputer) basic facts about the transaction to protect against fraud or double\nspending.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">After validation, a transaction would be\nwritten into a block in the Model Blockchain. Data in a block would be encrypted\nsuch that it is nearly impossible to modify.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This decentralized verification system\u2014referred to as a distributed\nledger\u2014is the fundamental characteristic common to all blockchain systems.</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1088537461317110575\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_66M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/15832198380415015982\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Anish Bhandarkar</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/10/blockchain-for-land-registry-voter.html?showComment=1507904494395#c1088537461317110575\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">October 13, 2017 at 7:51 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_66MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nDear Captain,<br />\nThis post about block chain was amazing. I looked up and discussed this idea with my friends who work in such domains in Silicon Valley. I can't stop thinking about the possible usage of this tech especially in forensics and evidence related fields.<br />\n<br />\nSome drawbacks / pain points are as follows:<br />\n<br />\n1. Each new block in the chain has to be validated by many neighboring blocks to validate the transaction. So theoretically there is room for fraud or mischief when you're surrounded by a bunch of hostile neighbors especially when the network is small.<br />\n<br />\n2. To digitize Indian land records on the block chain tech we would have to start from scratch and upload details of every land holding in the system. But due Telgi stamp paper scam where genuine land deeds were replaced with fake ones, there will be a lot of records where multiple branches of ownership exist. This can derail the block chain implementation as this would need lengthy tareek pe tareek in court.<br />\n<br />\n3. This tech would enable ppl to trade land and other things among themselves reducing the need for govt to maintain the records. Even if a nominal tax is given to the govt although the govt doesn't maintain this record, this small amount would be less than the enormous money the govt makes in stamp paper revenue. It would end the ill gotten wealth the govt servants make owing to the inefficiency in processing requests and the resulting grease money. The govt WILL NOT give up this right easily.<br />\n<br />\nI have submitted many of your links on PMO and govt sites. Discussed a lot of your ideas with friends. But every time the concerned officer dismisses the case with no action taken. Other readers would agree.<br />\n<br />\nI would love to know your intention behind continuing to do this and how you plan to make deaf people hear.</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_66BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; , serif;\">SAME WAY BLOCKCHAIN WILL HEAL ITSELF --IT WILL POLICE , JUDGE AND SELF CORRECT ITS COURSE&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A smart contract is a computer code running on top of a blockchain containing a set of rules under which the parties to that smart contract agree to interact with each other. If and when the pre-defined rules are met, the agreement is automatically enforced. The smart contract code facilitates, verifies, and enforces the negotiation or performance of an agreement or transaction. It is the simplest form of decentralized automation.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">BLOCKCHAIN CAN BE CODED TO SELF DESTRUCT --AND PING THE CULPRIT.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">YES ,\nHIGH SALARIES COMES WITH HIGH ACCOUNTABILITY AND RESPONSIBILITY</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot;
