, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Like I said , Smart contract is just a phrase\nused to describe computer code that can facilitate the exchange of money,\ncontent, property, shares, or anything of value.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">When running on the blockchain\na smart contract becomes like a self-operating computer program that automatically\nexecutes when specific conditions are met.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Because smart contracts run on the\nblockchain, they run exactly as programmed without any possibility of\ncensorship, downtime, fraud or third party interference.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">LAWS MUST BE CREATED TO GIVE LONG TERM JAIL\nTO CRIMINALS USING BLOCKCHAIN FOR PONZI SCHEMES<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">There must be BRAINSTORMING done regularly to\ndetect FRAUD in blockchain system<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: magenta; font-size: large;\"><b>Corruption or bribery schemes are hard to\ndetect in both traditional accounting and blockchain accounting systems.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Ethereum is an open software platform based\non blockchain technology that enables developers to build and deploy\ndecentralized applications.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Ethereum is a spectacular public experiment\nthat is showing the value of smart contracts on a public blockchain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: x-large;\">Ethereum blockchain has incubated Ponzi\nschemes in the recent past</span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Like Bitcoin, Ethereum is a distributed\npublic blockchain network. Although there are some significant technical\ndifferences between the two, the most important distinction to note is that\nBitcoin and Ethereum differ substantially in purpose and capability.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Bitcoin\noffers one particular application of blockchain technology, a peer to peer\nelectronic cash system that enables online Bitcoin payments.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">While the Bitcoin\nblockchain is used to track ownership of digital currency (bitcoins), the\nEthereum blockchain focuses on running the programming code of any\ndecentralized application.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">In the Ethereum blockchain, instead of mining for\nbitcoin, miners work to earn ETHER, a type of CRYPTO TOKEN that fuels the\nnetwork. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Beyond a tradeable\ncryptocurrency, Ether is also used by application developers to pay for\ntransaction fees and services on the Ethereum network. While all blockchains\nhave the ability to process code, most are severely limited. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Ethereum is different. Rather than giving a\nset of limited operations, Ethereum allows developers to create whatever\noperations they want. This means developers can build thousands of different\napplications that go way beyond anything we have seen before.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Ethereum\u2019s core\ninnovation, the Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) is a Turing complete software that\nruns on the Ethereum network. It enables anyone to run any program, regardless\nof the programming language given enough time and memory.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Ethereum Virtual\nMachine makes the process of creating blockchain applications much easier and\nefficient than ever before. Instead of having to build an entirely original\nblockchain for each new application, Ethereum enables the development of\npotentially thousands of different applications all on one platform.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: orange; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>Because\nsmart contract code is written by humans, SMART CONTRACTS &nbsp;are only as good as the people who write them.\n&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: orange; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: orange; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>Code bugs or DELIBERATE oversights can\nlead to unintended adverse actions being taken. If a DELIBERATE mistake in the\ncode gets exploited, there is no efficient way in which an attack or\nexploitation can be stopped other than obtaining a network consensus and\nrewriting the underlying code.&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This goes against the essence of the blockchain\nwhich is meant to be immutable. Also, any action taken by a central party\nraises serious questions about the decentralized nature of an application.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">The Ethereum community voted and decided to\nretrieve the stolen funds by executing what\u2019s known as a HARD FORK or a change\nin code.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">The hard fork moved the stolen funds to a new smart contract designed\nto let the original owners withdraw their tokens. &nbsp;&nbsp;THIS WAS DONE BY CRIMINAL MINDS . The\nimplications of this decision are controversial</span></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Ethereum is based on blockchain technology\nwhere all transactions are meant to be irreversible and unchangeable.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">By\nexecuting a hard fork and rewriting the rules by which the blockchain executes,\nEthereum set a MOST DANGEROUS&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">PRECEDENT that goes against the very essence and\nSPIRIT OF BLOCKCHAIN.&nbsp;</span></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">If the blockchain is changed every time a large enough\namount of money is involved, or enough people get negatively impacted, the\nblockchain will lose its main value proposition \u2013 secure, anonymous, tamper\nproof&nbsp; and unchangeable.</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">The uniqueness of the SMART PONZI&nbsp; is its\ncapacity to protect the identity of the initiator but also its ability to\npersist even after being exposed. &nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Since\ncontracts are unmodifiable and thus unstoppable there is no central authority\nto terminate the execution of the scheme or force the initiator to refund\nvictims.&nbsp; &nbsp;The inability to shut it down means victims can be led to\nbelieve the scheme will last forever.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Not all the smart-contract based Ponzis are\neven public. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Many are \u201chidden\u201d and run\nby FLY BY NIGHT operators who hide the associated addresses \u2014 so what we\u2019re\nseeing may just be the tip of the iceberg.. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">However, they can also offer new\nopportunities to tax-evaders, criminals, and fraudsters, who can take advantage\nof their anonymity and decentralization.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Vitalik Buterin is the\ninventor of Ethereum, described as a \u201cdecentralised mining network and software\ndevelopment platform rolled into one\u201d that facilitates the creation of new\ncryptocurrencies and programs that share a single blockchain (a cryptographic\ntransaction ledger)</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Michael Riconosciuto was\na GENIUS computer programmer who took the rap for the Contra/ cocaine/ guns\nscam, in which </span><b><span style=\"color: red;\">3 US presidents </span></b><span style=\"color: purple;\">were involved.&nbsp; &nbsp; He was in jail from 1991 to 2017\u201426 years \u2013 the sacrificial GOAT</span></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Riconoscuito was a\ngifted child: When he was just 10 years old, Michael wired his parents'\nneighborhood with a working private telephone system that undercut Ma Bell; in\nthe eighth grade, he won a science fair with a model for a three-dimensional\nsonar system. By the time he was a teenager, he had won so many science fairs\nwith exhibits of laser technology that he was invited to be a summer research\nassistant at Stanford University. Dr. Arthur Schalow [sic], a Nobel laureate,\nremembers him\u2014\"You don't forget a 16-year-old youngster who shows up with\nhis own argon laser.\"&nbsp; \u2014\u2009Ridgeway\nand Vaughan, \"The Last Days of Danny Casolaro\"[6]<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">\n\n</span></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>WHEN JOURNALISTS RUSHED\nTO INTERVIEW HIM, &nbsp;THE WHITE HOUSE SHADOW\nGOVT PUT MICHAEL RICONOSCIUTO PROMPTLY BACK INTO JAIL ON A NEW CHARGE <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">HE IS THE SACRIFICIAL\nGOAT\u2014 REMEMBER ?</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-eROId2HTW9o/WeHl5sfRMMI/AAAAAAABWLo/YHtlDDoKR7YHpRh00NOhv1IJJDRyMvCqgCLcBGAs/s1600/ricoWnosciuto.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Smart contracts\ncannot be some technical jrogon understood by only high tech programmers .&nbsp; Anybody would like to read an &nbsp;insurance contract when you insure something..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Business\npartners must be &nbsp;involved in the\ndefinition of the rules, &nbsp;and negotiating\nthe terms. Therefore, smart contracts can\u2019t be code ( which flies over your\nhead ) , in the sense that developers think about code. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Smart contracts need to be expressed at a\nhigher level of abstraction, using business terms of the domain. &nbsp;&nbsp;They should be formal enough and not\nambiguous, but still understandable by normal people. That\u2019s exactly what\nbusiness rules are.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-0PmfBw6taqo/WeIACLX5VEI/AAAAAAABWL8/s6CLu8HoHC0FWM4bJ83duKRGVgL3QlNsgCLcBGAs/s1600/how-bo0lockchain-works.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">IF BLOCKCHAIN HAS TO SUCCEED THERE MUST BE A\nTRANSPARENT \u201cBRAINSTORMING \u201c,&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;\u201cDYNAMIC RISK ASSESSMENT \u201c&nbsp; GOVT CONTROLLED WEBSITE .&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">PEOPLE MUST NOT BE ABLE TO&nbsp; MAKE SUGGESTIONS / COMPLAINTS UNLESS THEY\nPUNCH IN THEIR AADHAR CARD NUMBER.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WHISTLEBLOWERS WHO MADE CRITICAL REVELATIONS\nABOUT SUSPECT OR FRAUDULENT SMART CONTRACTS MUST BE REWARDED..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/04/dynamic-risk-assessment-on-chemical.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/04/dynamic-risk-assessment-on-chemical.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n<br /></span></b><br />\n<div style=\"background-color: white;\">\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; color: black; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; max-width: 36px; padding: 5px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c9018482608740373716\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; color: black; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_85M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/12/sox-and-nox-emissions-from-ships.html?showComment=1512816568589#c9018482608740373716\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">December 9, 2017 at 4:19 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_85MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEONE ASKED ME--WHY DO YOU SAY THAT THE SUDDEN SURGE IN VALUE OF BITCOIN IS A CONJOB<br />\n<br />\nWELL FOR THIS YOU MUST UNDERSTAND HOW A BITCOIN MINING / BLOCKCHAIN SYSTEM WORKS<br />\n<br />\nYOU CANT HAVE BITCOIN JUMPING FROM 6500 USD ( WHEN I FIRST WROTE PART ONE OF THIS SERIES ) TO 17000 USD ( WHILE ON PART 14 OF THIS SERIES ) IN A VERY SHORT TIME JUST LIKE THAT<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/11/blockchain-proof-of-elapsed-time-intel.html<br />\n<br />\nBitcoins grow in value when enough people possess them. This makes other people wanting Bitcoins-- making Bitcoins grow in value even more-- making even more people wanting Bitcoins-- making them grow in value even more-- and so on.<br />\n<br />\nIGNORANT PEOPLE ARE DUMBFOUNDED AND DONT KNOW WHAT THE FUCK IS HAPPENING --THEY PRETEND TO KNOW THE SYSTEM--SO THAT THEY CAN SHINE IN FRONT OF OTHERS .<br />\n<br />\nNOBODY DARES TO POINT OUT THE ELEPHANT IN THE ROOM. THEY DONT HAVE THE BALLS OR THE KNOWLEDGE<br />\n<br />\nBLOCKCHAIN IS NO ROCKET SCIENCE-- EVEN CUNTS CAN UNDERSTAND IT<br />\n<br />\n###########<br />\n<br />\nLISTEN UP AND LISTEN GOOD<br />\n<br />\nIn todays systems we depend on individual third-parties to establish trust between ourselves.The problem is that they are singular in number and if a chaos has to be injected in the society, all it requires is ONE person/organization to go corrupt, intentionally or unintentionally.<br />\n<br />\nBlockchain is a method to maintain that register among TWO parties cutting out the middleman.<br />\n<br />\nThe requirement of this method is that there must be enough people who would like not to depend on a third-party and only then these people can maintain the register on their own.<br />\n<br />\nHow many people is enough? Three at least. We will assume ten individuals want to give up on banks or any third-party for our example. They have details of each other\u2019s accounts all the time upon mutual agreement, but they don\u2019t know the other\u2019s identity.<br />\n<br />\nEveryone contains an empty folder with themselves to start with and all these ten individuals will keep adding pages to their currently empty folders. And the register that tracks the transactions will be formed from this collection of pages.<br />\n<br />\nEveryone in the network sits with a pen and a blank page and in their hands and they are all ready to write any transaction that happens within the system.<br />\n<br />\nFor example, #2 wants to transfer $10 to #9.<br />\n<br />\nTo make the transaction, #2 shouts and tells everyone, \u201cI want to send $10 to #9, so, everyone, please make a note of it on your pages.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nEveryone checks if #2 has enough balance to send $10 to #9 and everyone then makes a note of the transaction on their blank pages if she has enough balance.<br />\n<br />\nWe consider this transaction to be complete now.<br />\n<br />\nMore people in the network feel the need to transfer money to others as the time passes. Whenever they want to make a transaction, they announce it to everyone else and as soon as a person listens to the announcement, (s)he writes it on his/her page.<br />\n<br />\nThis exercise continues until everyone runs out of space on the current page and assuming a page has space to record ten transactions, everybody runs out of the space as soon as the tenth transaction is made.<br />\n<br />\nIt\u2019s time to put the page away in the folder and bring out a new page. After that, repeat the process from the step 2 above.<br />\n<br />\nWe need to seal the page with a unique key that everyone in the network agrees upon before we put it away in our folders. By sealing it, we will make sure that no one can make any changes to it once its copies have been put away in everyone\u2019s folder. Once in the folder, it will always stay in the folder\u200a\u2014\u200asealed, and moreover everyone trusts the contents of the page if everyone trusts the seal. The sealing of the page is the crux of this method.<br />\n<br />\nIt is called MINING on the page to secure it. However, we\u2019ll keep calling it \u2018sealing for the simplicity of it.<br />\n<br />\nThe middleman/third-party gave us the trust earlier that whatever they have written in the register will never be changed. This seal will provide the trust instead in a distributed and decentralized system like ours.<br />\n<br />\nhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MAgA43WEKwA<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_85BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; color: black; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_85b+seedB3CmD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_83T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_85b+seedB3CmD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_83TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_83TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_83TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_85b+seedB3CmD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_83TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_83TN\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_85b+seedB3CmD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_83TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_83TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_83TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_83B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px; text-indent: 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; max-width: 36px; padding: 5px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c9182682596686722911\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_83M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/12/sox-and-nox-emissions-from-ships.html?showComment=1512816769952#c9182682596686722911\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">December 9, 2017 at 4:22 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_83MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nImagine a machine surrounded by thick walls and if you send a box with something inside it from the left, it will spit out a box containing something else.<br />\n<br />\nThis machine is called \u2018Hash Function,\u2019<br />\n<br />\nSuppose, you send the number 4 inside it from the left. We\u2019d find that it spat out the following word on its right: \u2018dcbea.\u2019<br />\n<br />\nNo one knows how it converted the number 4 to this word, but it is an irreversible process. Given the word, \u2018dcbea,\u2019 it is impossible to tell what the machine was fed on the left, but the machine will always spit out the same word, \u2018dcbea\u2019 every time you\u2019d feed the number 4 to it.<br />\n<br />\nLet\u2019s try sending in a different number, for example 26.<br />\n<br />\nInteresting! This time we got \u201894c8e\u2019, which means that the words can contain the numbers too.<br />\n<br />\nWhat if I ask you the following question now:<br />\n<br />\n\u201eWhat should I send from the left side of the machine such to get a word that begins with three leading zeroes from the right side of it, e.g. 000fa, or 00098, or 000ab, anything among the others.\u201c<br />\n<br />\nIt was extremely difficult to calculate the input given the output, but at the same time, it will always be incredibly easy to verify if the predicted input yields the required output. The machine spits out the same word for a number every time.<br />\n<br />\nIf I give you a number, say 72533, and ask you the question: \u201eWhen you feed the number into the machine, does it yield a word that begins with three leading zeroes?\u201d how difficult do you think the answer is?<br />\n<br />\nJust throw the number in the machine and see what did you get on the right side of it and that\u2019s it.<br />\n<br />\nThe most important property of such machines is that\u200a\u2014\u200a\u201cGiven an output, it is extremely difficult to calculate the input. However, given the input and the output, it is pretty simple to verify if the input leads to the output.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nHow to Seal a Page Using These Machines?<br />\n<br />\nWe\u2019ll use this magic machine to generate a seal for our page and we\u2019ll start with an imaginary situation, like always.<br />\n<br />\nImagine you get two boxes from me and the first box contains the number 20893. After that, I ask you: \u201eCan you calculate a number that, when added to the number in the first box and fed to the machine, will give us a word that begins with three leading zeroes?\u201d<br />\n<br />\nThis is a similar situation as we had previously. We have learned that by trying every number available in the whole universe is the only way to figure out such a number.<br />\n<br />\nWe\u2019ll stumble upon a number, say 21191, after several thousand attempts. This number, when added to 20893 (i.e. 21191 + 20893 = 42084) and fed to the machine, will yield a word that satisfies our requirements.<br />\n<br />\nThis number, 21191 becomes the seal for the number 20893 in such a case. Suppose there is a page that contains the number 20893 written on it. We will put a badge labelled \u201821191\u2019 on top of it to seal that page (i.e. no one can change the contents of it). The page is sealed once the sealing number (i.e. 21191) is stuck on it.<br />\n<br />\nThe sealing number is called \u2018Proof Of Work.\u2019 This means that this number is the proof that efforts had been made to calculate it. But for our purposes, we are good with calling it \u2018sealing number.\u2019<br />\n<br />\nAll that you need to do to verify whether the page was altered is to add the contents of the page with the sealing number and feed to the magic machine. The contents were untouched if the machine gives out a word with three leading zeroes. We can throw away the page if the word that comes out doesn\u2019t meet our requirements because its contents were compromised, and are of no use.<br />\n<br />\nWe\u2019ll seal all our pages using a similar sealing mechanism and eventually arrange them in our respective folders.<br />\n<br />\nWe\u2019ll need to figure out a number that when appended to the list of transactions and fed to the machine, we get a word that begins with three leading zeroes on the right to seal our page that contains the transactions of the network.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_83MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_83BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_83B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_84B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px; text-indent: 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; max-width: 36px; padding: 5px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1789611015576152831\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_84M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/12/sox-and-nox-emissions-from-ships.html?showComment=1512816831043#c1789611015576152831\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">December 9, 2017 at 4:23 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_84MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2-<br />\n<br />\nNote: The phrase \u2018word starting with three leading zeroes\u2019 is used only as an example. It illustrates how Hashing Functions work, but the real challenges are much more complicated than this.<br />\n<br />\nOnce that number is figured out after spending time and electricity on the machine, the page is sealed with that number. The sealing number will allow anyone to verify the integrity of the page if someone tries to change the contents of the page.<br />\n<br />\nNow it\u2019s time to go back to the time when we had finished writing the tenth transaction on the page, and we ran out of space to write more.<br />\n<br />\nAs soon as everyone runs out of the page to write further transactions, everyone in the network indulge in calculating the sealing number for the page so that it can be tucked away in the folder and the first one in the network to figure out the sealing number announces it to everyone else.<br />\n<br />\nInstantly, on hearing the sealing number, everyone verifies if it yields the required output or not and, if it does, everyone labels their pages with this number and put it away in their folders.<br />\n<br />\nBut what if the sealing number that was announced doesn\u2019t yield the required output for someone, say #7. Such cases are not unusual and the possible reasons for this could be:<br />\n<br />\nThe transactions that were announced in the network might have been miswritten.<br />\nThe transactions that were announced in the network might have been misheard.<br />\nWhen writing transactions he might have tried to cheat or be dishonest, either to favor himself or someone else in the network.<br />\n#7 has only one choice\u200a\u2014\u200ato discard his page and copy it from someone else so that he too can put it in the folder. He cannot continue writing further transactions unless he doesn\u2019t put his page in the folder. This means that he is no longer part of the network.<br />\n<br />\nThen why not sit idle and wait for the announcement and why does everyone spend resources doing the calculation when they know that someone else will calculate and announce it to them?<br />\n<br />\nInteresting question because this is where the incentives come in the picture. Everyone who is the part of the Blockchain is eligible for rewards and the first one to calculate the sealing number gets rewarded with free money for his efforts (i.e. expended CPU power and electricity).<br />\n<br />\nSimply imagine, #5 gets rewarded with some free money, say $1 if he calculates the sealing number of a page. The money gets minted out of thin air, which means the account balance of #5 gets incremented with $1 without decreasing anyone else\u2019s account balance.<br />\n<br />\nThat\u2019s how Bitcoin got into existence, because it was the first currency to be transacted on a Blockchain. And in return, people were awarded Bitcoins to keep the efforts going on in the network.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_85b+seedB3CmD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b style=\"background-color: #cccccc; color: red; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: x-large;\"></b><br /><br /></span></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_114b+seedC3eVD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_112T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_114b+seedC3eVD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_112TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_112TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_112TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_114b+seedC3eVD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_112TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_112TN\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_114b+seedC3eVD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_112TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_112TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_112TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_114b+seedC3eVD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_112B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8957890941002639940\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_112M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_155M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/10/blockchain-for-land-registry-voter.html?showComment=1507981336607#c3021964636587430408\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">October 14, 2017 at 5:12 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_155MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttp://www.deccanchronicle.com/lifestyle/health-and-wellbeing/120616/rare-harlequin-baby-born-in-nagpur.html<br />\n<br />\nInfants with this condition are born with very hard, thick skin covering most of their bodies. The skin forms large, diamond-shaped plates that are separated by deep cracks<br />\n<br />\nhttp://www.hindustantimes.com/india-news/cause-symptoms-and-cure-what-is-harlequin-ichthyosis/story-damec4iY0rRTg7Ssq7psGL.html<br />\n<br />\nIN INDIA THE GOTRA SYSTEM , WHICH PROTECTS THE Y CHROMOSOME PROTECTED US FROM SUCH GENETIC DISORDERS ( SIC )<br />\n<br />\nThe Y chromosome is one of the two sex chromosomes in humans (the other is the X chromosome). The sex chromosomes form one of the 23 pairs of human chromosomes in each cell. The Y chromosome spans more than 59 million building blocks of DNA (base pairs) and represents almost 2 percent of the total DNA in cells.<br />\n<br />\nEach person normally has one pair of sex chromosomes in each cell. The Y chromosome is present in males, who have one X and one Y chromosome, while females have two X chromosomes.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/11/gotra-system-khap-rules-y-chromosome.html</span><br />\n<br />\nThe Y chromosome likely contains 50 to 60 genes that provide instructions for making proteins. Because only males have the Y chromosome, the genes on this chromosome tend to be involved in male sex determination and development. Sex is determined by the SRY gene, which is responsible for the development of a fetus into a male. Other genes on the Y chromosome are important for male fertility<br />\n<br />\nWhen an egg and a sperm cell unite, the resulting fertilized egg cell receives DNA from both parents. If this DNA has a mutation, the child that grows from the fertilized egg will have the mutation in each of his or her cells.<br />\n<br />\nSHOVE A TAPED HEAD KING COBRA INTO A MENSTRUATING WOMANs VAGINA<br />\n<br />\nLET HER CONCEIVE AFTER THAT<br />\n<br />\nWATCH THE MONSTER BABY WHICH COMES OUT ON DELIVERY<br />\n<br />\nSHALL WE ASK TRUPTI DESAI TO DO IT AND DARE US HEATHEN SAVAGE HINDUS ?<br />\n<br />\nHER GURU IS A CHITPAVAN JEW -- GAGANGIRI MAHARAJ OF ROTHSCHILDs FAKE NATH MUTT AT BATTEES SHIRALA<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"></span></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b><br />\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_172M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. CLASSMATE OF THEIF JEW MARK ZUKERBERG WHO FOUNDED FACEBOOK.<br />\n<br />\nTHE IDEA OF FACEBOOK SPROUTED FROM DIVYA NARENDRAs BRAIN<br />\n<br />\nDivya Narenda is portrayed by Max Minghella in The Social Network (2010), a film directed by David Fincher about the founding of Facebook<br />\n<br />\nIn the movie the bastards show him as a WHITE MAN<br />\n<br />\nIn the movie they show the Winklevoss twins who were part of the Divya Narendra team.<br />\n<br />\nIn November 2003, Divya Narendra and the Winklevoss twins approached Mark Zuckerberg about writing code for the idea of Facebook.<br />\n<br />\nDivya Narendra emailed Zuckerberg saying, \u201cWe\u2019re very deep into developing a site which we would like you to be a part of and ... which we know will make some waves on campus.\u201d Within a couple of days, Mark Zuckerberg was talking to the HarvardConnection team<br />\n<br />\nOn the evening of November 25, 2003, the Divya Narendra and the Winklevosses met with Zuckerberg in the dining hall of Harvard's Kirkland House, where they explained to an enthusiastic Zuckerberg, the HarvardConnection website, the plan to expand to other schools after launch, the confidential nature of the project<br />\n<br />\nDuring the meeting, Mark Zuckerberg allegedly entered into an ORAL contract ( NEVER TRUST A WHITE JEW WITH ORAL CONTRACTS ) with Divya Narendra and the Winklevosses and became a WORKING partner in HarvardConnection.<br />\n<br />\nHe was given the private server location and password for the unfinished HarvardConnection website and code, with the understanding that he would finish the programming necessary for launch.<br />\n<br />\nMark Zuckerberg allegedly chose to be compensated in the form of sweat equity.( remember Shashi Tharoor and Sunanda Pushkar ? )<br />\n<br />\nOn December 17, 2003, JEW THIEF Mark Zuckerberg met with Divya Narendra and the Winklevosses in his dorm room, allegedly confirming his interest and assuring them that the site was almost complete.<br />\n<br />\nOn the whiteboard in his room, Zuckerberg allegedly had scrawled multiple lines of code under the heading \u201cHarvard Connection.\u201d However, this would be the only time they saw any of his work.<br />\n<br />\nOn January 11, 2004, Mark Zuckerberg HIJACKED the ship and registered the domain name thefacebook.com.<br />\n<br />\nJEW THIEF Zuckerberg met again with the HarvardConnection team. However, he allegedly never mentioned registering the domain name thefacebook.com nor a competing social networking website, rather he reported progress on HarvardConnection, told them he would continue to work on it, and would email the group later in the week.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_77BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; They also asked the Harvard administration to act on what they viewed as a violation of the university\u2019s honor code and student handbook.<br />\n<br />\nThey lodged a complaint with the Harvard Administrative Board and university president JEW Larry Summers; however, both viewed the matter to be outside the university's jurisdiction<br />\n<br />\nPresident Summers advised the HarvardConnection team to take their matter to the KOSHER KANGAROO courts<br />\n<br />\nIn 2004, ConnectU filed a lawsuit against Facebook alleging that creator Mark Mark Zuckerberg had broken an oral contract with them.<br />\n<br />\nThe law suit declared that Zuckerberg had copied their idea and illegally used source code intended for the website he was hired as a WORKER to create<br />\n<br />\nA settlement agreement for both cases was reached in February 2008, reportedly valued at LOW $65 million.<br />\n<br />\nIn 2013, the Winklevoss twins said they owned $11 million worth of Bitcoin--and today they are BILLIONAIRES<br />\n<br />\nBALLS TO WHITE JEWS WHO SAY MARK ZUCKERBERG IS A GENIUS --THIS BASTARD IS SHAMELESS THIEF<br />\n<br />\nBALLS TO JEW THIEF ALBERT EINSTEIN<br />\n<br />\nWE ASK PM MODI TO TREAT ROTHSCHILDs AGENT JEW MARK ZUCKERBERG AS A THIEF NEXT TIME HE COME TO INDIA.<br />\n<br />\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN THE WEBSITES OF PMO, PM MODI, LAW MINISTER, CJI, EDUCATION MINISTER, HOME MINISTER, DEFENCE MINISTER, FINANCE MINISTER, I&amp;B MINISTER, YOGI ADITYANATH , SWAMY, GURUMURTHY, AND WEBSITES OF DESH BHAKTS<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_77b+seedBlsoD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_77b+seedBlsoD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: red; &nbsp;\u201cANDHASYA PUTRA ANDAHAH \u201c&nbsp; \u2014 MEANING SON OF BLING PARENTS IS BLIND TOO<br />\n<br />\nTHIS INSULT WAS AIMED MORE AT HIS CHASTE BLINDFOLDED MOTHER GANDHARI \u2013 WOMAN TO WOMAN, THIS BITCHY INSULT WAS INTOLERABLE TO A GUEST KING<br />\n<br />\nDURYODHAN REPLIED CALMLY&nbsp; \u201c THIS INSULT WILL COST YOU DEAR , DRAUPADI\u201d \u2013&nbsp; THIS INCIDENT KICKSTARTED A WORLD WAR<br />\n<br />\nAS SOON AS RUMBLINGS OF WAR CAME TO GANDHARI\u2014&nbsp; SHE CRIED OUT IN GRIEF LOUDLY ( THE FIRST TIME SHE COMPLAINED OF HER SELF IMPOSED BLINDNESS )&nbsp; \u201cOH,&nbsp; I AM AS MUST AFRAID OF THIS WAR THAN THIS ENDLESS DARKNESS \u201c<br />\n<br />\nIN PANIC SHE RUSHED TO HER SWORD\u2014 BUT THEN REALIZED SHE CANT FIGHT WITH HER BLINDFOLD ON.<br />\n<br />\nAT THAT MOMENT SAKUNI SWORE AN OATH AND PLUNGED HIS DAGGER INTO HIS THIGH&nbsp; SORE , SHATTERING HIS BONE \u2013<br />\n<br />\nEVERY SINGLE DAY SINCE HIS SISTER GOT MARRIED , HE WOULD IMPLORE \u2013SISTER PLEASE REMOVE YOUR BLINFOLD\u2014&nbsp; AS SHE WAS AFRAID OF THE DARKNESS IN HER CHILDHOOD \u2013 ALWAYS SLEPT WITH A LAMP BY HER SIDE.<br />\n<br />\nAS THINGS WORLD TRANSPIRE \u2013 SAKUNI WOULD BE ONE OF THE LAST TO DIE ON THE KURUSHETRA BATTLE FIELD\u2014HE WATCHED BHISHMA LIE ON HIS BED OF ARROWS.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nIn his final battle with Sahadeva\u2014Sahadeva advised Shakuni that he should stop fighting, since he had already achieved what he wanted to \u2013the death of Bhishma . He asked him to go back to his kingdom, Gandhara, and rule, instead of participating in this meaningless violence and killing.<br />\n<br />\nAt that moment, Shakuni felt deep remorse and a genuine repentance.. He recounted to Sahadeva how his sister had died a million deaths everyday afraid of the dark\u2014 yet she never removed her blindfold and suffered in silence.<br />\n<br />\nSakuni told Sahadeva that the only thing left for him to do would be to sacrifice his life on this very battlefield.&nbsp; &nbsp;He further stated that it would be an honour for him to shed his mortal coil in a battlefield as great as blood soaked Kurukshetra..<br />\n<br />\nOnce he had finished saying all that he had to, Shakuni started attacking Sahadeva with arrows.&nbsp; He knew he had to die and so, was spurring on the latter to kill him. After a brief fight, Sahadeva cut off his head. He knew Sakuni wanted it\u2014as he was refusing to protect himself .<br />\n<br />\nShakuni had no real animosity toward the Pandavas. His only reason for targeting Bhishma was because of his sister\u2019s endless suffering.. he had his own Dharma.<br />\n<br />\nShakuni has a temple dedicated to his worship, in the state of Kerala.. No puja or ritual of any sort is performed at Shakuni's temple.&nbsp; There is another temple nearby, which is dedicated to Duryodhana.<br />\n<br />\nYuddhistra got pissed off when he reached Vaikunta \u2014 Duryodhana was already there \u2013 he had got MOKSHA too.<br />\n<br />\nSakuni got MOKSHA too ahead of the Pandava brothers \u2013 the temple in Kerala is built at the spot where Sakuni had once come for arrows ( missiles )<br />\n<br />\nIronically Sakuni had made a dice with his own father\u2019s thighbone \u2013which rolled in his favour always .<br />\n<br />\nGANDHARI font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The assymetric\nvibrations repeat themselves, perpetually. This fractures the symmetry of time.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS 4D CRYSTAL DIAMOND\nWORKS BEHIND THE QUANTUM SCREEN OF MAYA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The laws of physics are\nnot only symmetrical in space but also in time.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Temporal\nsymmetry-breaking would manifest itself in this repeating motion in time, just\nas spatial symmetry-breaking manifests itself as repeating patterns in space<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">BRAHMAs EYE WOULD TURN\nFROM BLUE IN DAYLIGHT TO BRIGHT BLOOD RED IN PITCH DARKNESS . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">IT HELD A CURSE FOR\nPEOPLE WITH CRIMINAL DNA . THE THIEVES CUT THE DIAMOND AND IT BECAME BLACK. THE\nELECTRONS FLIPPED 180 DEGREES ANALOGOUS TO WHAT HAPPENS DURING MRI TO HUMAN\nBODY NUCLEI.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Atoms of TIME crystals\noperate in a sort of time-array, as opposed to a physical array. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Time crystals are\nclosely related to concepts of ZPF and dynamical Casimir effect--as I have\nexplained in many of my posts. The universe is made up of matter fields whose\nquanta are fermions (i.e. leptons and quarks) and force fields, whose quanta\nare bosons (e.g. photons and gluons). All these fields have zero-point energy<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE SRI YANTRA GEOMETRY\nCONTAINS THE THEORY OF EVERYTHING<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shah Jahan named Jama\nMasjid ( INDIAs LARGEST MOSQUE ) as The Masjid-i Jah\u0101n-Num\u0101 or Jahan Numa\n(World-reflecting Mosque)-- he got an imam from Bukhara, present-day\nUzbekistan. In ancient days India ruled this place.The mosque was completed in\n1656 AD with three great gates, four towers and two 40 m high minarets\nconstructed of strips of red sandstone and white marble. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Badshahi Masjid,\nbuilt by Shah Jahan's son Aurangzeb at Lahore, was also a Hindu temple. The\nJama Masjid of Agra was also a Hindu temple.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shah Jahan also built\nthe Taj Mahal, at Agra and the Red Fort in New Delhi, which stands opposite the\nJama Masjid. THIS GOES AGAINST THE LAWS OF KARMA.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">HERE IS BULLSHIT IN WIKIPEDIA-</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">QUOTE: An ancient legend ascribes the occasion to on interesting story about the 16-year-old son of King Hima. His horoscope predicted his death by snake-bite on the fourth day of his marriage. On that particular day, his newly-wed wife did not allow him to sleep. She laid out all her ornaments and lots of gold and silver coins in a heap at the entrance of the sleeping chamber and lit lamps all over the place. Then she narrated stories and sang songs to keep her husband from falling asleep. The next day, when Yama, the god of Death, arrived at the prince\u2019s doorstep in the guise of a Serpent, his eyes were dazzled and blinded by the brilliance of the lamps and the jewellery. Yama could not enter the Prince's chamber, so he climbed on top of the heap of gold coins and sat there the entire night listening to the stories and songs. In the morning, he silently went away. Thus, the young prince was saved from the clutches of death by the cleverness of his new bride, and the day came to be celebrated as Dhanteras. The following day came to be called Naraka Chaturdashi ('Naraka' means hell and Chaturdashi means 14th). It is also known as \u2018Yamadeepdaan\u2019 as the ladies of the house light earthen lamps or \u2018deep\u2019 and these are kept burning throughout the night glorifying Yama, the God of Death. Since this is the night before Diwali, it is also called 'Chhoti Diwali' or Minor Diwali.[2]</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">According to another popular legend, when the Gods and demons churned the ocean for Amrita or nectar, Dhanvantari (the physician of the Gods and an incarnation of Vishnu) emerged carrying a jar of the elixir on the day of Dhanteras.[2] UNQUOTE</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">YAMA HAS BEEN INJECTED ALL OVER VEDAS / UPANISHADS BY JEW ROTHSCHILD TO SUSTAIN THE FALSE THEORY OF HELL IN HINDUISM.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">######################################</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">TRUTH : CREMATION FIRE ( AGNI ) IS YAMAs PRIEST AS PER VEDAS . FOR TRYING TO SAVE LIFE SEA .<br />\n<br />\nI JUST TOLD YOU ABOUT THE NICKEL ORE AND HYPOCHLORITE EPISODE --JUST TWO AMONG HUNDREDS OF INCIDENTS AT SEA--<br />\n<br />\nI WON ALL MY FIGHTS TILL NOW \u2013 SECRET\u2014I STICK TO MY RIGHTEOUS GUNS<br />\n<br />\nWHEN I LOOK BACK I AM PROUD OF ALL MY SCARS ( MENTAL )<br />\n<br />\nI INTRODUCED SAMPLING PROCEDURES AT SEA -ON CHEMICAL TANKERS<br />\n<br />\nI NEVER FOLLOWED THE RULES SET BY THE WHITE MAN -- I HAD MY OWN RULES \u2013BETTER ONES<br />\n<br />\nEVERYBODY SAMPLES CARGO ONCE IT ENTERED THE TANKS.<br />\n<br />\nI SAMPLED CARGO OUTSIDE MY SHIP-- MEANING -- THE SAMPLE COCK OUTSIDE THE SHUT MANIFOLD VALVES--BEFORE IT EVEN ENTERED THE SHIPS PIPELINE<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/sampling-procedures-chemical-tankers.html</span><br />\n<br />\nONCE AT A PORT IN IRAN, I WAS THREATENED WITH PHYSICAL INJURY AND JAIL.<br />\n<br />\nMY SHIP WENT TO A QUAY WHICH WAS OPERATING FOR THE FIRST TIME AFTER IRAN/ IRAQ WAR<br />\n<br />\nMY SHIP WAS TO LOAD 99.99% SULPHURIC ACID<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/06/sulphuric-acid-carriage-dangers-on.html</span><br />\n<br />\nI WAS WARY OF THE SHORE PIPELINE CONTENT-- A LARGE PIPELINE RUNNING SEVERAL KILOMETERS --WHICH DID NOT HAVE PIGGING FACILITIES<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/pigging-on-chemical-tankers-capt-ajit.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/06/pipeline-cleaning-and-blowing-on.html</span><br />\n<br />\nINSTEAD OF SULPURIC ACID-- I GOT PHOSPHORIC ACID IN MY SAMPLE BOTTLE<br />\n<br />\nI KNOW JUST BY SIGHT AND SMELL \u2013 EXPERIENCE RULES<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/phosphoric-acid-on-chemical-tankers.html</span><br />\n<br />\nI DECLARED--UNLESS I GET SULPHURIC ACID AT MY MANIFOLD VALVE COCK , I WILL NOT OPEN THE VALVE TO LET CARGO INTO THE TANK<br />\n<br />\nTHE ENTIRE IRANIAN FORCES FROM SHORE, CAME ON BOARD TO CONVINCE ME THAT I WAS WRONG-- THEY WERE ALL IRANIANS FIRST ( SEE- THIS IS EFFECT OF WAR BONDING )<br />\n<br />\nTHEY DELETED \"SAINT\" NAME ( BRITISH FLAG SHIP ) AND PAINTED \" SHAITAN \"--AND MY CREW AND OFFICERS ( ALL EUROPEANS ) GOT TERRIBLY AFRAID . I WAS THE ONLY INDIAN.<br />\n<br />\nVERBALLY I WAS THREATENED WITH PHYSICAL INJURY ( BREAKING BONES ) -- THEY CALLED UP MY OWNERS ( ROTHSCHILDs AGENT ) IN LONDON , AND CHARTERERS IN FRANCE ( ROTHSCHILDs AGENT ) --AND EVEN THEY ORDERED ME TO LOAD.<br />\n<br />\nSEE THE COSY RELATIONSHIP BETWEEN JEWS AND HARDCORE MUSLIMS . THIS JEW OWNER ( AGENT OF ROTHSCHILD ) VACATED THE WORLD TRADE CENTRE A WEEK EBFORE IT CAME DOWN.<br />\n<br />\nSORRY, IF I LOAD A MIX OF PHOSPHORIC ACID AND SULPHURIC ACID-- MY SHIP WILL DEVELOP A HOLE AND SINK AT SEA<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/05/stainless-steel-chemicaltankers.html</span><br />\n<br />\nALL WERE TRYING TO CONVINCE ME ( MY SHORE BOSSES ) THAT IT IS OK-- BUT THEN THEY HAVE SHIT FOR BRAINS<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/04/passivation-on-stainless-steel-chemical.html</span><br />\n<br />\nI CALLED MY P&amp;I CLUB FROM LONDON -- AFTER A TWO DAY DELAY--I DID A MELTING POINT TEST ( USING MY CABIN FRIDGE ) UNDER VIDEO CAMERA , AND PROVED THAT THE IRANIAN SAMPLE TEST CERTIFICATE WAS BULLSHIT<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/09/high-melting-point-cargoes-on-chemical.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTODAY I DECLARE -- THIS BLOGSITE IS THE MOST PRICELESS INTERNET SITE-- PAST , PRESENT AND FUTURE .. AND THERE WILL NEVER EVER BE A SHIPCAPTAIN LIKE VADAKAYIL- PAST PRESENT AND FUTURE<br />\n<br />\nAM I BOASTING ?--SO BE IT!<br />\n<br />\nHUMILITY HAS NEVER BEEN MY STRONG POINT.. I WOULD LIKE TO BE HUMBLE IF I DID NOT HAVE TO FIGHT WITH CUNTS DAY AFTER DAY --TO SAVE LIFE ON SHIP .. MY JOB AS SHIP CAPTAIN IS FIRST \"PROTECT LIFE ON BOARD\" .<br />\n<br />\nI NEVER LOST TRACK OF THIS WHILE IN THE CHAKRAVYUH OF ACTIVITY TRAPS ..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2009/07/real-work-and-activity-traps-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nIF THE BASTARDS IN GOOGLE WANT LET THEM SHUT MY BLOGSITE DOWN. THEY MUST KNOW MY REAL REVELATIONS HAVE NOT EVEN STARTED ..<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_117MN\" kind=\"m\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_117BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_117B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_118B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; max-width: 36px; padding: 5px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8379014683716808810\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_118M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://draft.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. In mid-July each year, Bohemian Grove hosts a two-week, three-weekend encampment of some of the most prominent men in the world<br />\n<br />\nFemales cannot attend this ritual and the current US President cannot attend.<br />\n<br />\nThe tradition of a summer encampment was established six years after the Bohemian Club was formed in 1872<br />\n<br />\nThe Grove is particularly famous for a Manhattan Project planning meeting that took place there in September 1942, which subsequently led to the atomic bomb.<br />\n<br />\nRichard Nixon said : \"The Bohemian Grove (an elite, secrecy-filled gathering outside San Francisco), which I attend from time to time. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/08/imhotep-patron-saint-of-freemasons-capt.html?showComment=1508469612291#c5764243621242375491\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">October 20, 2017 at 8:50 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_176MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nHe knew every entrance and crypt as if he had been there before.<br />\n<br />\nWhen he visited the statue of Thoth , he suddenly opened up a crypt vault seal, which nobody had noticed before.<br />\n<br />\nHe swiftly went under the statue and there existed a greater statue in a huge chamber \u2014the REAL one holding the priceless EMERALD TABLET OF IMHOTEP .<br />\n<br />\nThis tablet is now with the Freemasons who had given info to Isaac Newton to figure it out.<br />\n<br />\nThe Greeks and the Egyptians had written about this lost emerald green tablet with the 3D Sri Yantra inherent in it along with secret knowledge from GARUDA PURANA .<br />\n<br />\n\u201cThe Emerald Tablet, also known as the Smaragdine Table, or Tabula Smaragdina, is a compact and cryptic piece of Hermetica reputed to contain the secret of the prima materia and its transmutation. The layers of meaning in the Emerald Tablet have been associated with the creation of the philosopher's stone, laboratory experimentation, phase transition, the alchemical magnum opus, the ancient, classical, element system, and the correspondence between macrocosm and microcosm. The Emerald Tablet is said to be a tablet of emerald or green stone inscribed with the secrets of the universe. - text describes seven stages of alchemical transformation \u2013 calcination, dissolution, separation, conjunction, fermentation, distillation and coagulation\u201d<br />\n<br />\nImhotep ( Lord Ayyappa ) the 9th avatar of Vishnu is represented as Vishnu carrier GARUDA -- the divine builder of the Great Pyramid of Giza - Thoth as eagle Garuda<br />\nThoth resembles Garuda in some respects: Thoth was the god associated with writing, knowledge , Pharoah\u2019s funeral rites for passage to the divine world.<br />\n<br />\nThoth is said to preside over scribes and scholars. In India Garuda is the vehicle of Lord Vishnu and is also the lord of knowledge<br />\nGaruda Purana is a conversation between Lord Vishnu and Garuda and it deals with funeral rites and the metaphysics of reincarnation, which set ablaze the imagination of every Pharoah.<br />\n<br />\nGaruda Purana lies in the fact that it is the only sacred text that talks about the life after death, the journey of the soul, death and its aftermath, rebirth or reincarnation.<br />\n<br />\nEven the modern science could not break the mystery of death and after; whereas, Garuda Purana has spelled out these realities ages before.<br />\n<br />\nIn India for Shraddh the priest recites Sanskrit verses from Garuda Purana.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/11/pitru-paksha-shraadh-pitru-tharpanam.html<br />\n<br />\nArabic scholar to J\u00e1bir ibn Hayy\u00e1n (722-815 AD) attributes Sirr al-Khal\u00edqa (The Secret of Creation)<br />\nto Apollonius . It ranges from explaining the metaphysical origin of the universe to considerations on the ontological categories of the world and the nature of the human soul.<br />\n<br />\nIn Sirr al-Khal\u00edqa, Apollonius ( Bal\u00edn\u00fas ) discovered both the Emerald Tablet of Thoth while exploring a crypt beneath a statue of Thoth ( Hermes)<br />\n<br />\nApollonius of Tyana is a sage from Kerala on whose life Jesus Christ was modeled at the First Council of Nice in 325 AD, by the Roman Emperor. Christ was lifted from Krishna.<br />\n<br />\nPITY THE CUNTS AT BOHEMIAN GROVE WHO PISS ON EACH OTHERs FACES<br />\n<br />\nhttp://1.bp.blogspot.com/-iKyU3imVuAA/VmR6_PXizAI/AAAAAAAAW2s/fuU8oj73aZw/s1600/The%2BEmerald%2BTablets%2Bof%2BThoth%2Bthe%2BAtlantean%2BFull%2BText%2BPdf.jpg<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_177b+seedDEbtD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_177b+seedDEbtD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; A twopenny tram\nwill take you from the centre of Calcutta to the \"Kalighat\", from\nwhich some suppose that the city takes its name, where you may see, in the\nslimy, swarming precincts of the temple, the ground crimson with the blood of\nsacrifices, while in a filthy but very sacred backwater of the Hooghly men,\nwomen and children not only bathe in their hundreds, but drink the yellow ooze\nin which their bodies and their garments have been steeped. Hindusim professes\na superstitious respect for animal life, but it raises no finger to check the\nmost callous cruelty to animals. It is, in short, the great anachronism of the\nmodern world.\"-- \u2013 William Archer, \"India and the future\" (1917)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div
