ROTHSCHILD DEMOTED ANCIENT RULING CLASS THIYYAS TO COCONUT TREE TODDY TAPPERS ( BASICALLY KINGS CONVERTED TO HEATHEN MONKEY )..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">THIYYAS WERE DANAVAS ( ASURAS )..&nbsp; IN ANCIENT PERSIA ASURAS ARE GODS ( AHURA )--THEY CANNOT PRONOUNCE ALPHABET &nbsp;\u201c S \u201c .. &nbsp;ASURAS HAD SHUKRACHARYA AS MENTOR.&nbsp; THE REST HAD BRIHASPATI AS MENTOR<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">THE WHOLE PLANET BEFORE 7000 BC WAS DIVIDED INTO TWO --FOLLOWERS OF SHUKRACHARYA AND FOLLOWERS OF BRIHASPATI ( MENTOR OF DEVAS ) .&nbsp; ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">BOTH THESE MAHARISHIS WERE BITTER ENEMIES . ..REASON WAS BOTH WERE CLASSMATES IN THE SAME GURUKUL WHERE BRIHASPATIs FATHER MAHARISHIS ANGIRASA WAS GURU. .. AND THOUGH SHUKRACHARYA WAS BETTER THAN BRIHASPATI&nbsp; EVERY WHICH WAY THERE WAS NEPOTISM.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">WHEN DEVAS WANTED A GURU MAHARISHI ANGIRASA SUGGESTED HIS SON BRIHASPATIs NAME<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">DEKECTED AND AGRY SHUKRACHARYA WENT AND OFFERED HIS SERVICES TO KERALA DANAVA KING MAHABALI<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">SHUKRACHARYAs DAUGHTHER THE BEAUTIFUL DEVYANI WAS TRAPPED IN \u201cLOVE JIHAD \u201c BY KACHCHA , SON OF BRIHASPATI..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">SHUKRACHARYA ASKED KING MAHABALI TO PROCLAIM HIMSELF EMPEROR AND CONDUCT THE ASHWAMEDHA YAGNA ( A BLOODLESS SACRIFICE -A VOTE OF CONFIDENCE ) \u2013TO SPITE BRIHASPATI..<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/09/ashwamedha-yagam-bloodless-sacrifice.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/09/ashwamedha-yagam-bloodless-sacrifice.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">THIS GOT THE RIVAL DEVAS TERRIBLY UPSET AND THEN HAPPENED THE EPISODE -- WHIC CREATED A FESTIVAL CALLED ONAM - -CELEBRATED ONLY IN KERALA-- WITH GREAT GUSTO--BY EVEN MUSLIMS AND CHRISTIANS TODAY<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/09/why-kerala-does-not-celebrate-diwali-or.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/09/why-kerala-does-not-celebrate-diwali-or.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">MAHABALIS FATHER VIROCHANA RULED THE WHOLE WORLD \u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">MAHABALI WAS KICKED INTO PATALA ( PERU ) BY VAMANA AVATAR OF VISHNU..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/07/maya-inca-aztec-civilizations-decoded.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/07/maya-inca-aztec-civilizations-decoded.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">KORAN WAS EDITED AT CHERAMAN PERUMAL MOSQUE . .. CHERAMAN PERUMAL WAS KING OF CALICUT --CALLED BY ARABS EVEN TODAY A THIYYAJUDDIN. ( RULER OF THIYYAS )..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">CHERAMAN PERUMALs BODY IS BURIED AT SALALAH ( STATE OF DHOFAR --CURRENT DAY SOUTH OMAN/ NORTH YEMEN &nbsp;) . ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">DHOFAR KINGDOM WAS OWNED BY THE CALICUT KING FOR THOUSANDS OF YEARS --SO WAS MECCA OASIS, MADEIN SALEH , PETRA, AND PALESTINE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">JUDAISM WAS CREATED BY DISGRACED NAMBOODIRIS ... EVERY TIME THE ANCIENT JEWS GOT PERSECUTED THEY CAME RUNNING BACK TO KERALA CRYING MOMMMIIEEEEEE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/bar-kokhba-in-fight-to-finish-over.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/bar-kokhba-in-fight-to-finish-over.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">KING SOLOMONs ( HERO &nbsp;OF JEWS ) &nbsp;MOTHER BATH SHEBA WAS A NAMBOODIRI WOMAN<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">KING SOLOMONs WIFE QUEEN OF SHEBA WAS A NAMBOODIRI WOMAN. SOLOMONs SEAL WAS IN MALAYALAM SCRIPT..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">LAND OF SHEBA WAS ALSO KNOWN AS PUNT/ OPHIR .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">MECCA OASIS IS NOW DEAD.... ONLY A WELL REMAINS WHICH GIVES ZAM ZAM HOLY WATER..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">THE SHIVA TEMPLE WAS AT THE EDGE OF THIS MECCA OASIS--THE SPOT IS NOW OCCUPIED BY KAABA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/05/vishnu-avatar-narasimha-oldest.html</span><br style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IN THE POST BELOW THE VISHNU METAL IDOL KALPA VIGRAHA IS DATED TO 26450 BC..</span><br style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\" /><br style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/05/kalpa-vigraha-vishnu-idol-carbon-dated.html</span><br style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE RIG VEDA PENNED DOWN IN 5000 BC, TALKS ABOUT MIGHTY RIVER SARASWATI \u2013 MORE THAN 60 TIMES..</span><br style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\" /><br style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Rig veda was written in 5000 BC on the banks of the Saraswati. Everybody knows this.</span><br style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\" /><br style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/mother-of-all-civilisations-saraswati.html</span><br style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\" /><br style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">EVERYBODY KNOWS THAT MAHABHARATA WAS FOUGHT IN 4000 BC, AND THE FINAL BATTLE BETWEEN DURYODHANA AND BHIMA WAS FOUGHT IN AN ISOLATED POOL OF THE DEAD SARASWATI RIVER..</span><br style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\" /><br style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">BALARAMA WITNESSED THIS FIGHT -- HE HAS JUST COME BACK AFTER DIVERTING THE TRAPPED SARAWATI TO GANGES RIVER, USING HIS PLOUGH. SARASWATI RIVERs GLACIAL MOUTH WAS LOCKED BY A TECTONIC SHIFT , CAUSING THE RIVER TO BE NON-PERENIAL</span><br style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\" /><br style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE WHITE MAN DID NOT WANT ANY INDIAN HISTORY TO BE EARLIER THAN 4004 BC -- AS THE COOKED UP BIBLE BY THE FIRST POPE AT 325 AD FIRST COUNCIL OF NICEA PUT THE BIG BANG AT 4004 BC--AT 9 AM , 23RD OCT.</span><br style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\" /><br style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE ROMAN EMPEROR AND THE POPE SACKED ROME SEVERAL TIMES-TO GET RIG OF ALL TRACES OF THE KERALA SAGE APOLLONIUM OF TYANA .&nbsp;</span><br style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\" /><br style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">JESUS CHRIST WAS MODELLED AFTER APOLLONIUS AND HIS SIDE KICK DAMISA WHOSE WIFE WAS MARY MAGDELENE A NAMBOODIRI WOMAN . THE PROFESSORS IN KODUNGALLUR UNIVERISTY GAVE THE COSMIC ALLEGORIES OF THE BIBLE . JESUS CHRIST NEVER EXISTED</span><br style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\" /><br style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">the precession of planet earth has taken us from TAURUS to ARIES to PISCES --and soon it will be AQUARIUUS</span><br style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\" /><br style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">From 2150 BC is aries, ( indian medam / hamal )) the ram till 1 AD.</span><br style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">From 1 AD to 2150 AD it is the age of Pisces ( Indian Menam ) .</span><br style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">From 2150 AD it is Aquarius ( Indian Kumbam )-- a new age, new sunrise at spring equinox -- precession of the equinoxes--</span><br style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\" /><br style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; The naked truth can never be hate speech or defamation. This blogsite does not sacrifice truth on the altar of political correctness . You shall know the truth and the truth shall set you free . font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">https://www.booksfact.com/religions/goddess-anahita-sekhmet-forms-durga.html<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">I HAVE SEEN THE STATUES\nOF AMENHOTEP III AND GODDESS SEKMET AT THE LONDON MUSEUM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Amenhotep III , who\nruled Egypt for 63 years said, \u201cWhen I look to the sunrise, I come to the\ncountries of Punt\u201d ( Amarna letters )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Digression: Amenhotep\nIII also referred to the land of Mitanni . This is the kingdom of DHOFAR (\nsouth of Oman and North of Yemen ) owned by the Calicut King .. The Calicut\nking has his private post in Salalah , now in Oman.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dhofar had top soil\ntransported from North Kerala and Socotra -- myrrh and frankiincencse was planted\nhere . Calicut king Cheraman Perumal who met Mohammad at Mecca is buried at\nSalalah. The Vedic Sanskrit term RTA ( cosmic order and truth ) is the central\nconcept of the Rig Veda, was employed in the Mitanni kingdom.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Amenhotep III is the\nmost celebrated Pharoah of Egypt-- his reign was a period of unprecedented\nprosperity and artistic splendour, when Egypt reached the peak of its artistic\nand international power.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Amenhotep III\ncelebrated three Heb Sed (jubilee) festivals, in years 30, 34, and 37 of his 63\nyear old reign.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is on record that\nAmenhotep III sent several expeditions to Punt ( North Kerala , India ) to\nobtain Incense , Aloevera and exotic plants and tigers<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Queen Nefertiti was the\nchief wife of of Pharaoh Akhenaten\u2014 son of Amenhotep III<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nefertiti had many\ntitles including Lady of two lands Punt and Egypt..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Queen Nefertiti ruled\nEgypt when her husband Pharaoh Akhentaten was in ill health for a few years before\nhe died. She is remembered as a wise ruler.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">After Akhentaten died\nthe people wanted her to continue .. Nefertiti, like female Pharaoh Hatshepsut,\nassumed the kingship under the name Pharaoh Neferneferuaten after her husband's\ndeath.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-1GULSVk5dc<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Amenhotep III has the\ndistinction of having the most surviving statues of any Egyptian pharaoh, with\nover 255 of his statues having been discovered and identified.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ibn Batuta visited both\nPunt and Mitanni ( Dhofar )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/ibn-battuta-at-calicut-capt-ajit.html<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">ROTHSCHILDS USED HIS\nAGENT SAYYID FAZAL POOKOYA THANGAL TO DRIVE A WEDGE BETWEEN HINDUS AND MAPPILAS\n( HALF BREED MUSLIMS ) IN NORTH MALABAR. HE DID IT WELL AND AS A REWARD WAS\nMADE KING OF DHOFAR \u2013FROM WHERE HE WAS DRIVEN AWAY AFTER A FEW MONTHS BY THE\nLOCALS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">FAZALs FATHER SAYYID\nALAVI THANGAL ( A KORAN EXPERT AT AGE 8 \u2013 AND WHO WAS FLUENT IN MALAYALAM )\nFROM DHOFAR , WAS FIRST INTRODUCED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD AT THE AGE OF 17 AS A 30TH\nDESCENDANT OF MOHAMMAD THE PROPHET . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">HE WAS MADE TO MARRY A\nLOCAL MALAYALI GIRL FATIMA THE DAUGHTER OF THE QAZI OF TIRUR. ALL THIS WAS\nKNOWS WELL IN ADVANCE TO ALL MUSLIMS OF MALABAR \u2013 AS A DIVINE PREDICTION.\nROTHSCHILDs MEDIA ALSO DID THEIR PROPAGANDA \u201cTHE MESSIAHIS COMING \u201c<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">AFTER FATIMA 1 DIED HE\nMARRIED ANOTHER MALAYALI GIRL FATIMA 2 , THE DAUGHTER OF SAYYID ABOOBACKER\nMADANI FROM CHEMANCHERI -QUILANDY ( MY FATHERs VILAGE \u2013 JUST 24 KM FROM\nCALICUT).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">LIKE HOW WE ALL IN\nINDIA KNEW HOW GANDHI WOULD COME FROM SOUTH AFRICA SIX MONTHS BEFOREHAND \u2013 WE\nIN KERALA KNEW ABOUT A ISLAMIC MESSIAH A REVERED DESCENDANT OF COMING FROM\nDHOFAR A YEAR BEFORE HE ARRIVED AT CALICUT ( MY HOMETOWN )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONTINUED TO 2-</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">HIS UNCLES HASAN JIFRI\nAND SHEIKH JIFRI WENT ON FOOT EDUCATING ALL HALF BREED MAPPILAS THAT A MESSIAH\n, THE DESCENDANT OF MOHAMMAD WOULD SOON ARRIVE AT CALICUT FRO MECCA AFTER A\nYEAR<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">TODAY JEW KING OF SAUDI\nARABIA , ( THE AL SAUD DYNASTY) AND ALL OIL RICH KINGS OF THE GULG KINGDOMS --\nALL CLAIM TO BE DESCENDANTS OF PROPHET MOHAMMAD \u2013THEY HAVE JEW ROTHSCHIDs\nPERMISSION TO TELL SO.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Read all 5 parts of the\npost below\u2014<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/04/lawrence-of-arabia-truth-exhumed-capt.html<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">FAROOQ ABDULLAHs MOTHER\nAKBAR JEHAN WAS THE WIFE OF JEW .LAWRENCE . HER FATHER WAS AN ANEGNT OF FRENCH\nROTHSCHILD \u2013A JEW HOTELIER NAMED MICHAEL HARRY NEDOU . OMAR ABDULLAHs MOTHER IS\nA BRITISH JEWESS NURSE NAMED MOLLY. MAJJA HAI\u2014KISSI KOH KUCHCH NAHIN PATHA. S\nHEIKH ABDULLAR AND NEHRU LOOKED SAME SAME IN THEIR YOUNG AGE .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">AS PREDICTED THE 17\nYEAR OLD HANDSOME YOUTH ALAVI THANGAL ARRIVED , AND DAZZLED ALL WITH HIS EXPERT\nKNOWLEDGE ON KORAN. HE WAS SORT OF ZAKIR NAIK MULTIPLIED BY MILLION .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">HE SETTLED DOWN WITH\nHIS WIFE FATIMA 1 AT MAMBARAM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">MAMBARAM JAMA MASJID IS\nNOW THE LARGEST ISLAMIC PILRIMAGE CENTRE FOR INDIAN MUSLIMS. AFTER FATIMA 2\nDIED SAYYID ALAVI THANGAL MARRIED ANOTHER LOCAL MALAYALI GIRL NAMED AYIDHA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">SAYYID FAZAL POOKOYA\nTHANGALWAS BORN TO FATIMA 2 . AFTER AYIDHA DIED SAYYID ALAVI THANGAL TOOK A\nMALAYALI WIFE SWALAIHA FROM INDONESIA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The following are major\nmophla outrages under the inspiration of Sayyid Alavi Thangal ( under\ninstructions from Jew Rothschild )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Eranad riot in November\n20, 1836<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Eranad riot in April\n15, 1837<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Paruthan riot in April\n19<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1848 when son Fazal\nPookoya Thangal returned from Mecca, there was massive bloodshed at Manjeri\nwhere Hindus lost their ancestral lands to half breed Arab Mappilas.. The\nKollathoor revolt ( land grabbing from Hindus ) broke out on 22 August 1851. In\nthis rebellion seven major landowners were killed by Mappilas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then came the Mattanur\nrevolt\u2014again land grabbing. This time Rothchild said enough and send Fazal\nPookoya Thangal as King of Dhofar.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Before the advent of\nIslam all Mappillas of Dhofar were Hindus . Dhofar was owned by the Calicut\nking Eben today this place looks exactly like North Kerala. These Hindu\nMappilas ran the overland camel caravans from Aden port and Salalah port to\nMecca, Petra, Madein Saleh, Jeruselam etc for thousands of years <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Calicut collector HV\nConolly wrote that father Mamburam Alavi Thangal Thangal was the spearhead of\nland grabbing in Kerala and rebellions from 1849-1852 and son Fazal Pookoya\nThangal led the bloody revolts against Hindus from 1849 1852 .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Collector HV Conolly\nwas asked by Jew Rothschild to release Fazal Pookoya Thangal from jail \u2013and\ntheta he would be deported on Rothschild\u2019s ship.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fazal Thangal was\nallowed to transfer his personal grabbed landed property of Mamburam to his\nsister's husband, Sayyid Alavi Jifri.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">On the night of 19\nMarch 1852 he left Calicut with 61 of his family and servants on Rothschild\u2019s\nship to Salalah ( kingdowm of Dhofar ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fazal Thangal eft\ninstructions that Collector of Calicut HV Conolly should be murdered .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was a bloody\ngruesome murder where white Englishman Conolly ( who made the Kanoli canal of\nCaliuct ) was hacked to death in the presence of his wife when he was relaxing\nwith a post dinner brandy and cigar with his wife.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once If took my wife to\nsee the grave of HV Conolly at English Church Nadakavvu Calicut ( where we park\nour car when we buy fish )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">I will write a full\npost\u2014if I start blogging . I have just written less than ONE percent<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; CLASSMATE OF THEIF JEW MARK ZUKERBERG WHO FOUNDED FACEBOOK.<br />\n<br />\nTHE IDEA OF FACEBOOK SPROUTED FROM DIVYA NARENDRAs BRAIN<br />\n<br />\nDivya Narenda is portrayed by Max Minghella in The Social Network (2010), a film directed by David Fincher about the founding of Facebook<br />\n<br />\nIn the movie the bastards show him as a WHITE MAN<br />\n<br />\nIn the movie they show the Winklevoss twins who were part of the Divya Narendra team.<br />\n<br />\nIn November 2003, Divya Narendra and the Winklevoss twins approached Mark Zuckerberg about writing code for the idea of Facebook.<br />\n<br />\nDivya Narendra emailed Zuckerberg saying, \u201cWe\u2019re very deep into developing a site which we would like you to be a part of and ... which we know will make some waves on campus.\u201d Within a couple of days, Mark Zuckerberg was talking to the HarvardConnection team<br />\n<br />\nOn the evening of November 25, 2003, the Divya Narendra and the Winklevosses met with Zuckerberg in the dining hall of Harvard's Kirkland House, where they explained to an enthusiastic Zuckerberg, the HarvardConnection website, the plan to expand to other schools after launch, the confidential nature of the project<br />\n<br />\nDuring the meeting, Mark Zuckerberg allegedly entered into an ORAL contract ( NEVER TRUST A WHITE JEW WITH ORAL CONTRACTS ) with Divya Narendra and the Winklevosses and became a WORKING partner in HarvardConnection.<br />\n<br />\nHe was given the private server location and password for the unfinished HarvardConnection website and code, with the understanding that he would finish the programming necessary for launch.<br />\n<br />\nMark Zuckerberg allegedly chose to be compensated in the form of sweat equity.( remember Shashi Tharoor and Sunanda Pushkar ? )<br />\n<br />\nOn December 17, 2003, JEW THIEF Mark Zuckerberg met with Divya Narendra and the Winklevosses in his dorm room, allegedly confirming his interest and assuring them that the site was almost complete.<br />\n<br />\nOn the whiteboard in his room, Zuckerberg allegedly had scrawled multiple lines of code under the heading \u201cHarvard Connection.\u201d However, this would be the only time they saw any of his work.<br />\n<br />\nOn January 11, 2004, Mark Zuckerberg HIJACKED the ship and registered the domain name thefacebook.com.<br />\n<br />\nJEW THIEF Zuckerberg met again with the HarvardConnection team. However, he allegedly never mentioned registering the domain name thefacebook.com nor a competing social networking website, rather he reported progress on HarvardConnection, told them he would continue to work on it, and would email the group later in the week.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_77BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\">THE FATHER OF THE WIFE OF MOSES ZIPPORAH ( JETHRO ) WAS A KERALA SAGE</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\">MOSES WAS A MERE DISCIPLE OF JETHRO OF DRUZE PEOPLE ( HINDU ) SECT --WHO BELEIVED IN KARMA, AND MOKSHA. JETHRO A KERALA NAMBOODIRI WAS A VEGETARIAN..</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\">BULLSHIT BIBLICAL STORIES TALK ABOUT MOUNTAINS IN EGYPT-- SORRY- THERE ARE NO SUCH MOUNTAINS IN EGYPT</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\">JESUS CHRIST NEVER EXISTED--RED SEA NEVER PARTED--ALL THIS IS A FUCKIN' LIE !</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\">Jethro, known as Nabi Schweib by the Druze, was a Midianite (Exodus 18:1), a tribe descending from Keturah, a wife of Abraham (Genesis 25:1-2). Genesis (25:6) describes that Abraham sent the sons of Keturah to the East.</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\">Rabbi Menashe Ben Israel (Glazerson, 1984) asserts that Abraham sent them to land of OPHIR ( North Kerala ) by ship</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\">In Exodus (Chapter 18), Jethro brings Zipporah and her two sons to Moses, and Moses bows down and kisses Jethro.</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\">Then Jethro praises the God of the Jews and \"took a burnt-offering and sacrifices for God; and Aaron came, and all the elders of Israel, to eat bread with Moses' father-in-law before God.\"</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\">Jethro admonishes Moses for placing himself (Moses) as direct arbitrator for all decisions, great and small. Also, he introduces his remarks by stating: \"Hearken now unto my voice, I will give thee counsel, and God be with thee.\" It sounds like Jethro has quite a bit of authority, granted by God Himself. According to Exodus, \"Moses did all that he [Jethro] had said.\"</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\">Before returning to Egypt, Moses asks Jethro's permission to embark on the journey (Exodus 4:18).</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\">I HAVE WRITTEN SEVERAL TIMES THAT JETHRO ( BEING AN INDIAN ) WAS SUBSTITUTED BY JEWS. JETHRO WAS SUNK AND BURIED BY WHITE JEWS</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\">The first sacrifice in Israel was offered up not by Moses but by the Midianite priest Jethro</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\">Jethro was the first priest of the Israeli nation-- Hindu Jethro instructed Moses and Aaron in the practices of priesthood</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\">Moses asked Jethro to be his guide</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\">In The Midrash Rabbah (1977, Vol. 3: Numbers, p. 90) it is stated: \"The east ( OPHIR ) is the source from which light goes forth into the world, and there camped the standard of Judah which bred kings, scholars, and men of pious deeds.</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</span></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\">Legends of the Jews (1925, Vol. 5, p. 196) delineates stories of sages who went to India to obtain \"plants of paradise,\" and narrates how Solomon (Vol. 4, p. 149) secured water with special healing powers from India.</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\">And in Volume 1, page 11, of The Legends of the Jews, it is written: \"Beyond the inhabited parts to the east is Paradise with its seven divisions, each assigned to the pious of a certain degree.\"</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
